Title: *TOP NEWS*大中华财经

Content:
恒指逼近高位回气/ 林瑞芬

港股昨日先升后回，毕竟连续多日升市，抖抖都要。恒指昨高见31733，收市跌73点或0.23%，报31338点，大市成交额近1,686亿元。国指收报12470点，升1点或0.01%。

  

按月綫图所示，以恒指昨日高位计，其实已升穿2007年最高收市31638，昨收市距2007年最高位31958则只有225点，如无意外，相当大机会于后市反覆重探历史高位31958。目前来讲，预测恒指升穿31958已不算是大冒险，很多股民更着重看恒指若升穿历史高位之后，可以有多大的再上升空间。又或者临近历史高位，短期将如何反覆，回吐多少还可以接受。

  

单以技术分析而言，可见1980年以来，恒指在每次突破前高位的大浪，所筑顶部每次走法也不同，如1987年筑高位3968，就比1981年高位1810高出2158点、1994年所筑高位12599就比1987年高位3968高出8631点、1997年高位16820就较1994年高位12599高出4221点，2007年高位31958较2000年高位18397高出达13561点。一个高浪比一个高浪为高，恒指后市如能突破31958，至少比这个高位高出2000点才见顶，年内挑战33958以至34000就只是保守的估计了！

  

当然，市况有升有跌，今年内出现急抽升筑顶后急回的可能性也不可以抹杀。后市关键，还是强调看着息率的可能变化。短期而言，恒指今年来累计升幅近1600点，而若以去年12月低位28134计，升幅更达3000多点，即市探高之势逐步移近历史高位之余，也要有随时回吐的准备，缓步探高，32000左右若遇阻而回，即市支持30000作参考。

  

从蓝筹股升势所见，大户仍采取轮流攻坚之策，以让大市升势平缓些，大起大落也不是好现象。腾讯（00700）昨高见448.8元便有即市回吐压力，收报433.2元，全日跌2%。不过，金沙中国（01928）及银河娱乐（00027）昨分别升5.5%及3.4%，分别收报44元及62.2元，成幸运儿。金沙一举突破密集阻力位41.9元，高见45.2元。最新据中金公司报告认为，金沙旗下威尼斯人项目酒店房翻新可于今年首季完成，其令酒店房间达到1.3万间（全行总体3.6万间），中期可望受惠港珠澳大桥开通后提振其博彩业中场的需求，故此把金沙目标价调升38%至49.8元，投资建议由原来「持有」调升至「买入」。

  

北水也参考中资券商的报告，可见中资券商金口影响力也小。高盛估计，金沙去年第四季录得EBITDA为7.38亿美元，按季升13%，在行业中，增速仅次于澳博（料增长15%），高于行业平均增速9%。除了赌业双蓝筹升势亮丽外，以升幅计，美高梅中国（02282）昨升4.7%，至23.55元收市，一点也不逊色，集团旗下新项目「美狮美高梅」将于1月29日开幕，喜上加喜，股价再挑战去年12月高位25.3元可能性大。

  

内险股则重拾升势，中国太保（02601）及中国人寿（02628）分别上升2.9%及0.4%。中国平安（02318）昨一举突破去年11月高位87.1元，最高见90元，收报88.2元，升2.1%。平保与滙丰（00005）正在竞赛，看谁可以最先抵达100元大关，以滙丰昨收报84.1元计，如笔者较早前分析平保的中期投资价值，确是可以先秤平保。滙丰证券最新把平保中期目标价由88元调升至106元。综观平保H股上升之外，平保A股（沪：601318）升4.4%，���太保A股（沪：601601）及新华保险A股（沪：601336）则分别上升5.2%及4.6%，升势之全面，对内险股短期升势有一定确认性。

  

内险股再成为国指火车头，内银股也落力，工行（01398）、建行（00939）及农行（01288）昨升幅介乎0.15%至1%。

  

最新就有瑞信证券唱好，认为四大国有银行经过四年盈利表现停滞，今年大型银行盈利应可回复双位数增长，预料毛利率扩张速度亦会好过预期。瑞信还预测，四大银行今年盈利增长可达13%，或高于市场预期的5%。

  

总括而言，恒指及国指续在试冲高位，寄望升势的蔓延，增加市场的宽度。只有增加市场的宽度，一浪高于一浪升势才能在较为紮实的根基下推进，蓝筹股轮流上升就不寄望超落后的中移动（00941）也能急升，除非该股的基本面有根本上的扭转变强，不然，轮到中移动股价急升的话，就预示市场资金已拣无可拣，强势股估值隐含偏高的风险。中移动昨升1%，收报78.5元，暂平年初开市价，仍然大落后于恒指甚至国指的升幅。（完）

注：以上的评论仅为摘要，并且不代表路透立场。

(( alison.lui@thomsonreuters.com ; +852 2843 6552; Reuters Messaging:
alison.lui.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net ))

HSI approached high rebound / Lin Ruifen

Hong Kong stocks rose first back to back yesterday, after all, rising for many consecutive days, shaking all. Hang Seng Index hit 31733 yesterday, closing at 73 points or 0.23% at 31338 points. The turnover of the broader market reached 168.6 billion yuan. The H-Share Index closed at 12,470 points, up 1 point or 0.01%.

  

As shown on the monthly chart, the Hang Seng Index was yesterday's highest level in fact it has risen above the highest closing price of 31638 in 2007, and yesterday it closed at 225 points, the highest since 31958 in 2007. If there is no accident, it will have a chance to repeatedly probe into history High 31958. For now, it is not a big risk forecasting the Hang Seng Index to climb above 31958. Many investors are even more concerned about how much room for further growth the Hang Seng Index may rise after it has hit historical highs. Or near the historic highs, how short-term will be repeated, taking as much as acceptable.

  

From a technical analysis point of view, we can see that since 1980, the HSI hit a major high trough before each breakthrough and the top of each building has a different approach. For example, if the HSI set a high of 3968 in 1987, it would be 2158 points higher than the 1981 high of 1810 The highest level of 12599 in 1994 was 8631 points higher than the high of 3968 in 1987. The high of 1997 was 16820 points higher than the high of 1994 at 12941 points. The high of 2007 was 31958 points higher than the high of 2000 at 18397 points, up to 13,561 points. A high wave is higher than a high wave. If the HSI market breaks through 31958, it will peak at at least 2000 points above this high level. During the year, the challenges of 33958 and 34000 are just conservative estimates!

  

Of course, the market is up or down, and the possibility of hurriedly hurriedly building up-tops this year can not be denied. Market outlook, or emphasize the possible changes in interest rates. In the short term, the Hang Seng Index has gained nearly 1600 points this year. If the Hang Seng Index rose at a low of 28,134 points in December last year, it would reach an increase of more than 3,000 points. That is, the trend of the city's exploration high will gradually move closer to historical highs, Spit preparation, slowly exploration high, about 32000 in case of resistance and back, that is, the city supports 30,000 for reference.

  

From the blue-chip uptrend, large companies still take turns to tackle key problems in an effort to ease the rally in the broader market. It is not a good sign of ups and downs. Tencent Holdings Limited (00700) yesterday saw a high of 448.8 yuan, giving the market take the pressure to close at 433.2 yuan, down 2% the day. However, Sands China Ltd (01928) and GALAXY ENTERTAINMENT GROUP LIMITED (00027) rose 5.5% and 3.4% respectively yesterday, closing at 44 and 62.2 respectively, making us a lucky winner. Sands breakthrough resistance at 41.9 yuan in one fell swoop, high see 45.2 yuan. Latest According to the report of China International Capital Corporation Limited, renovation of hotel rooms in Golden Sands under its Venetian project could be completed in the first quarter of this year, bringing the total number of hotel rooms to 13,000 (36,000 for the whole bank) After the opening of the bridge, it boosted the demand for its gaming midfield. As a result, the target price of Sands was raised by 38% to HK $ 49.8. The investment proposal was raised from "HOLD" to "BUY."

  

Northwater also reference the report of Chinese brokers, showing that the influence of Chinese brokers Jintou is also small. Goldman Sachs estimates that Sands recorded an EBITDA of $ 738 million in the fourth quarter of last year, up 13% sequentially, behind the growth of SJM (up 15%) in the industry, up from the industry average of 9%. MGM China Holdings Ltd (02282) jumped 4.7% yesterday to close at HK $ 23.55, no less at the same pace. The group's new project, "Mermaid MGM," will be trading at 1 On the 29th of opening, like hi plus, the stock price challenge again in December last year, a high of 25.3 yuan.

  

Domestic insurance stocks rose again, with CPIC (02601) and CHINA LIFE INSURANCE COMPANY, LTD. (02628) up 2.9% and 0.4% respectively. Ping An China (02318) hit a high of 87.1 yuan in November last year. The highest hit 90 yuan and closed at 88.2 yuan, up 2.1%. Ping An Insurance and HSBC (00005) are racing to see who can first reach the 100 mark to HSBC yesterday closed at 84.1 yuan, as I earlier analysis of Ping An's medium-term investment value, is indeed the first scale Ping Bao. HSBC Securities Ping An Insurance interim target price from 88 yuan raised to 106 yuan. Looking at the increase of Ping An H-shares, Ping An A shares (Shanghai: 601318) rose 4.4%, while CIC A-shares (Shanghai: 601 016) and Xinhua Insurance A-shares (Shanghai: 601336) rose 5.2% and 4.6 %, The overall uptrend, a certain confirmation of the short-term rally in the insurance stocks.

  

Domestic insurance stocks have become the country's locomotives again. Domestic banks are also losing ground. ICBC (01398), CCB (00939) and ABC (01288) rose between 0.15% and 1% yesterday.

  

Credit Suisse Securities is the latest to sing the view that the four state-owned banks have shown stagnant earnings performance after four years. Large-cap bank earnings should recover double-digit growth this year, and gross margin expansion is expected to be faster than expected. Credit Suisse also predicts that the Big Four will have a 13% increase in earnings this year or 5% above market expectations.

  

All in all, the Hang Seng Index and the National Index continue to test highs, hope the spread of the rise, increase the width of the market. Only by increasing the width of the market can waves move above a rising edge to advance on a more solid basis. Blue chips can not be expected to rise in turns. China Mobile (00941) can rise sharply unless the fundamental fundamentals of the stock On the turnaround to become stronger, otherwise, turn the stock market soared in the turn, then heralded the market funds have been picked out of order, the risk of implied high valuation of strong stocks. China Mobile rose 1% yesterday, to close at 78.5 yuan, temporarily opening the beginning of the year market price, still lags far behind the HSI or HSCEI growth. (Finish)

Title: 港报财经评论：恒指逼近高位回气--经济日报1月16日

Content:
债转股未愿停步，集资伸手更堪忧/ 习广思

  

港股终于打破连升纪录，昨天一度由升逾300点变倒跌逾百点，收市仍跌73点，A股高台跳水由升变跌，是触发点之一。正如日前分析，债市资金极速撤退，资金流入股市短期内不易扭转，港股短线隐忧反而在个别股份的配股集资活动方面，尤其内房股伸手活动料陆续有来。

  

资金昨天有点避险倾向，日圆升至110.5水平，是去年9月以来最强滙率，相信主要是反映美元转弱，欧罗也升至近1.23美元高位。日本央行行长黑田东彦早前重申，决心维持大规模刺激措施，直到稳定实现2%的通胀目标。他称，日本金融体系保持稳定，货币环境非常宽松，央行将保持扩张货币基础的立场，必要时将调整货币政策以维持经济动能来达成物价目标。

  

黑田东彦发言后，日圆反而升多了，因为发言本身并无新意，与他今年初表示日本尚未摆脱「通缩心态」，基本上意思相近。然而，口里说要宽松，行动上实际上是在收水。日央行本月初披露的资产负债表显示，央行总资产自2012年实行再宽松以来首次缩水，去年12月底持日本国债规模较11月大幅减少2.9万亿日圆，其他资产类别包括房托、ETF等则稍稍增加。

  

在资产负债表公布后仅一周，日央行公开宣布将削减部分长期限国债的购债规模，10年至25年期及25年期以上国债的购买规模分别减少100亿日圆，到1900亿日圆和800亿日圆，令市场相信日央行正在悄悄退市。

  

全球债市面对三大央行退场，今年头8个交易日，孳息率为零以下的债券规模缩减约1万亿美元，至7.3万亿美元，为自去年7月以来最低，同时反映经济增长和通胀升温的环境有助全球债市正常化。

  

随着债市息率向上，通胀预期上扬，央行便有较大空间推行利率正常化。今年是全球央行的退市年，一如2008金融海啸后的几轮QE，全球都未经历过这种金融变化，如果把「缩表」、减买债与利率政策分开来看，则「缩表」与加息一齐来，代表的是金融紧缩打孖上。

  

「债王」格罗斯（Bill
Gross）早前警告，债券熊市已来临，他在Twitter贴文称，美国5年期与10年期国债跌穿25年趋势线，代表熊市已经确认来临。格罗斯认为，去年10年期美债孳息升至2.4厘以上，是熊市来临的讯号。

  

ｌ数据显示，计算10年期美债孳息与10年期美国通胀保值债券（TIPS）之间息差的平衡通胀率，近期已突破2厘，是9个月来首次，反映市场认为通胀即将达到联储局的2%目标。

  

芝加哥谘询机构Bianco
Research指出，如果通胀是国债收益率涨势背后的原因，有可能改变股市与债市之间的关系。这意味当前资金由债转股，推动股市上升的现象不再，变成利率主导股市走势。

  

当然，以上推论暂时仍言之尚早，中港股市才刚突破连升纪录，突然又说出现紧缩恐慌，未免说不过去。港股方面，反而更要留意过去几个交易日多家公司公��配股集资。内房股中国金茂（00817）以折让7%价格配股集资33亿元；铝材生产商中国宏桥（01378）传折让10%配售6.5亿股股份，集资约8亿美元。

  

枫叶教育（01317）及正通汽车（01728）上周已分别配股集资10亿元及17亿元，代表具规模的上市公司认为股价升至一个伸手集资的好价位，这是一般中型股投资者最大风险所在，因为当内线者亦认为股份到价，投资者死守亦未必可以等到股价重见天日，至少要守几个月。

  

内房股是最高危行业，因为即使卖楼积极套现，也同样要积极投地；此外，内房商发债成本飙升，有现成的股市集资渠道，当然要多加利用。最安全的板块可能是濠赌股，因扩张高峰期已过，只要博彩收入符合预期，过多的游资又会重新入市。
（完）

  

注：以上的评论仅为摘要，并且不代表路透立场。

Content_EN:
Debt-to-equity unwillingness to stop raising funds to reach even more worrisome / Xi Guang think

  

Hong Kong stocks finally broke the ascending record. As of yesterday, the index rose more than 300 points and fell more than 100 points. It still closed down 73 points. A-share high-rise diving fell from ascending to downside, making it one of the trigger points. As recently analyzed, the rapid withdrawal of funds in the bond market, the inflow of capital into the stock market is not easy to reverse short-term, short-term concerns about Hong Kong stock short-listed shares in individual shares instead of fund-raising activities, especially in the housing stocks reach activity materials have come.

  

Funds yesterday, a little risk-taking trend, the yen rose to 110.5 level, the strongest exchange rate since September last year, I believe mainly reflects the weaker dollar, the euro has risen to nearly 1.23 US dollars high. Bank of Japan Governor Haruhiko Kuroda reiterated earlier that he is determined to maintain a large-scale stimulus until the target of 2% inflation is stabilized. He said the Japanese financial system remained stable and the monetary environment was very liberal. The central bank will maintain its position of expanding the monetary base and, if necessary, adjust its monetary policy so as to maintain its economic momentum so as to reach the price target.

  

After Kuroda's speech, the Japanese yen rose instead because the speech itself was nothing new. As he said earlier this year that Japan has not yet got rid of the "deflationary mentality," it basically means similarities. However, the mouth to be relaxed, the operation is actually receiving water. The Bank of Japan's balance sheet disclosed earlier this month showed that the central bank's total assets shrank for the first time since easing easing in 2012. Japan's debt held by the end of December last year dropped sharply by 2.9 trillion yen against November. Other asset classes, including real estate, ETFs and others Then increase slightly.

  

Just one week after the publication of the balance sheet, the BOJ publicly announced that it will cut the size of its bond purchases on certain long-term government bonds by 10 billion yen to 190 billion yen and 10 billion to 25-year and 25-year bonds, respectively 80 billion yen, the market believes the central bank is quietly delisting.

  

The global bond market faced the withdrawal of the three central banks. In the first 8 trading days of the year, the size of bonds with yields below zero was reduced by about 1 trillion U.S. dollars to 7.3 trillion U.S. dollars, the lowest since July last year, reflecting the economy Growth and inflation warming environment will help to normalize the global bond market.

  

As bond market interest rates rise and inflation expectations rise, the central bank will have more room to normalize interest rates. This year marks the delisting year of the global central bank. Just as the QE after the 2008 financial tsunami did not experience this kind of financial change in the world, if we look at the differences between "reduced-form", debt-relief and interest rate policies, then the " Table "together with the rate hike, on behalf of the financial austerity measures.

  

"Debt King" Gross
Gross earlier warned that a bearish bond market has come. He posted on his Twitter post that the 5-year and 10-year U.S. Treasuries fell below the 25-year trend line, indicating that the bear market has been confirmed. Gross believes that last year's 10-year bond yield rose to 2.4% above the bear market signal.

  

l Data show that the equilibrium inflation rate, which calculates the interest rate differential between the 10-year U.S. debt and the 10-year U.S. TIPS, exceeded 2% recently, the first in 9 months, reflecting the market's belief that inflation will soon Achieve the Fed's 2% target.

  

Chicago consulting firm Bianco
Research pointed out that if inflation is the reason behind the rally in bond yields, it is possible to change the relationship between the stock market and the bond market. This means that the current capital from debt to equity, to promote the stock market is no longer the phenomenon of interest rate-led stock market trend.

  

Of course, the above inference is still still too early to say that China and Hong Kong stock markets have just broken the ascending record and suddenly said that there has been a tightening panic, which is justified. On the Hong Kong stock market, more attention should be paid to raising public funds for placement of shares in a number of companies over the past few trading days. China 房地产 股份 China Jinmao Holdings Group Ltd. (00817) raised RMB3.3bn at a discount of 7%; China HONGQIAO GROUP LIMITED (01378) passed the 10% increase in placing of 650m shares, raising about USD800m .

  

 Last week, China MAPLE LEAF EDUCATIONAL SYSTEMS LIMITED (01317) and China ZhengTong Auto Services Holdings Limited (01728) each raised shares of $ 1.0 billion and $ 1.7 billion respectively. As a representative of a large listed company, the share price rose to a good level of raising funds. This is the biggest risk for mid-cap investors in general. When the insiders also consider that the shares are priced, the loss of investors may not be able to wait for the share price to be redeemed for at least a few months.

  

Housing stocks are the most dangerous industries, because even if the cash-house actively cash, but also actively investing; In addition, the soaring cost of foreign exchange bonds, the existing stock market channels, of course, to make more use of. The safest sector is probably gambling stocks. As the peak of the expansion period has passed, as long as the gaming revenue is in line with expectation, too much hot money will re-enter the market.
(Finish)

  

Note: The above comments are only abstracts and do not represent Reuters' position.

Title: 港报财经评论：债转股未愿停步，集资伸手更堪忧--信报1月16日

Content:
《经济通通讯社１６日专讯》内地主要财经报章头版摘要如下：

《中国证券报》

姜洋：深化资本市场改革开放 助推高质量发展

＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝

证监会副主席姜洋１５日在第十一届亚洲金融论坛上表示，资本市场仍然是中国金融体系的一个

短板，还有很大的发展空间。证监会将按照高质量发展的根本要求，紧紧围绕供给侧结构性改革

这一主线，补短板，强弱项，防风险，不断提升资本市场服务实体经济的能力。

务实多层次市场塔基 新三板整装再出发

＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝

改革措施的密集亮相正推动刚满五周岁的新三板「整装」再出发。接受中国证券报记者采访的业

内人士称，新三板在服务中小企业融资、创新等方面发挥了重要作用，但目前也存在流动性不足

、定价功能难有效发挥等问题，期待在差异化发行交易制度、分类监管制度等方面出台更多的「

制度红利」。

债市调整延续 市场利率难言见顶

＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝

业内人士认为，２０１８年仍将是监管大年，金融去杠杆与金融生态重塑进程不可逆转。对于债

市而言，情绪冲击最剧烈的阶段可能已过去，但机构行为调整带来的影响将持续很长时间。在金

融业回归本源、脱虚向实过程中，债市将持续面临需求端收缩，调整趋势很难扭转，且未来还将

面临一系列潜在冲击，市场利率可能维持高位甚至进一步走高。

《上海证券报》

姜洋：加快双向开放 稳步开展Ｈ股全流通试点

＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝

中国证监会副主席姜洋昨日表示，中国证监会将著力构建双向开放新格局，坚持引进来和走出去

并重，大幅度放宽行业准入限制。同时，证监会也将不断优化完善内地及香港两地市场互联互通

机制，稳步开展Ｈ股「全流通」试点，进一步加强两地监管与执法合作。

一行三会发文 对深度贫困地区企业ＩＰＯ加快审核进度

＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝

金融支持脱贫攻坚力度再加强。人民银行、银监会、证监会、保监会日前联合印发《关于金融支

持深度贫困地区脱贫攻坚的意见》，要求金融部门坚持新增金融资金优先满足深度贫困地区、新

增金融服务优先布设深度贫困地区。

新三板集合竞价首日运行平稳

＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝

新三板正式迎来集合竞价交易。１月１５日，集合竞价交易成功上线，从市场表现来看，首日市

场整体运行平稳。当日，挂牌股票共成交３９５７３．５万元、８０９２．２１万股。集合竞价

股票盘中共成交３５９２．８７万元、５７２．２１万股；做市股票盘中共成交８４１２．９９

万元、２４５２．４１万股。全市场盘后协议转让成交２７５６７．６３万元、５０６７．５８

万股。

《证券时报》

姜洋：著力构建资本市场双向开放新格局

＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝

中国证监会副主席姜洋１月１５日在第十一届亚洲金融论坛上表示，推动经济高质量发展，离不

开金融的有力支撑。近年来，中国资本市场服务实体经济的能力迈上大台阶，但仍有很大发展空

间。证监会将把发展直接融资，特别是股权融资放在突出位置，著力增强对科技创新的服务能力

，著力构建双向开放新格局，大幅度放宽行业准入限制，著力维护资本市场稳健运行。

人民币中间价大涨３５８基点 在岸离岸双双升破６．４４

＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝

昨日，人民币对美元汇率中间价较上一交易日大涨３５８个基点，报６．４５７４，创下２０１

６年５月３日以来的新高。今年开年以来，人民币对美元中间价合计已上涨７６８个基点。而在

外汇市场上，在岸人民币日内最高达６．４１３８，一度大涨超５００个基点；离岸人民币对美

元日内最高也达到６．４１５２，双双升破６．４４。。

深圳经济高质量发展的经验与启示

＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝

根据官方最新公布的预测数据，２０１７年深圳名义国内生产总值（ＧＤＰ）达２．２万亿，增

长１２．８７％，增速在四大「一线城市」中居首。在中国城市经济总量排名中，深圳也将因此

前移一位。（ｋｌ）

Content_EN:
"Economic News Agency 16 News" Mainland's major financial news The first page is summarized as follows:

"China Securities Journal"

Jiang Yang: Deepening the Reform and Opening up of the Capital Market and Promoting High-quality Development

=====================

On the 15th, the Vice Chairman Jiang Yang of the China Securities Regulatory Commission said at the 11th Asian Financial Forum that the capital market is still one of China's financial systems

Short board, there is still much room for development. The Commission will follow the fundamental requirements of high-quality development and focus on supply-side structural reforms

This is the main line that supplements the shortcomings, strengths and weaknesses, and risks prevention and continuously improves the ability of capital markets to serve the real economy.

Pragmatic multi-tier market Taki new three-board package and then set off

==================

The intensified debut of reform measures is pushing another new board, "Pack", just under the age of five. Accept the China Securities Journal reporter interviewed industry

According to insiders, the new three board plays an important role in financing and innovation of SMEs, but there are also insufficient liquidity

, The pricing function is difficult to effectively play and other issues, looking forward to the issuance of differences in the transaction system, the classification of regulatory system to introduce more "

System bonus. "

Continuation of adjustment of bond market interest rates market is hard to reach its peak

===============

The industry believes that 2018 will continue to be the regulatory year, financial de-leveraging and financial eco-restructuring process irreversible. For debt

For the city, the period of strongest emotional shocks may have passed, but the effects of institutional behavior adjustments will continue for a long time. In gold

Financial industry back to its roots, take the virtual to the real process, the bond market will continue to face demand side contraction, the adjustment trend is difficult to reverse, and in the future will

Faced with a series of potential shocks, the market interest rates may remain high or even higher.

"Shanghai Securities News"

Jiang Yang: Accelerate Bidirectional Opening up and Steadily Conduct Pilot Project of Holistic H Shares Circulation

=====================

Jiang Yang, vice chairman of China Securities Regulatory Commission, said yesterday that China Securities Regulatory Commission will focus on building a new two-way opening up, adhere to the introduction and going out

Emphasize, substantially relax the industry access restrictions. At the same time, the SFC will also continue to optimize and perfect the market interconnection in the Mainland and Hong Kong

Mechanism and steadily carry out pilot projects for "full circulation" of H shares so as to further strengthen cooperation in supervision and enforcement between the two places.

A three-line document will speed up the progress of the audit of enterprises in areas with deep poverty

========================

Financial support for poverty alleviation efforts to strengthen. People's Bank of China, China Banking Regulatory Commission, China Securities Regulatory Commission and CIRC recently jointly issued the Circular on Financial Support

Hold Poverty Alleviation and Poverty Alleviation in Depressed Areas, "requiring the financial sector to adhere to the new financial resources to give priority to meeting the needs of those areas with deep poverty and new

Increase financial services to give priority to the deployment of deep poverty areas.

The new three-board collection auction runs smoothly on the first day

=============

The new board officially ushered in the auction auction. January 15, a collection of bidding transactions successfully on the line, from the market performance point of view, the first day of the city

Field overall smooth operation. On the same day, a total of 395,735,000 yuan of listed stocks were traded, 80,921,100 shares. Collection auction

A total of 35,928,700 yuan traded shares were traded, 572.21 million shares; making a total market transactions 8412.99 shares traded

Million, 24,521,400 shares. The market after-hours agreement transfer transaction 27567.63 million, 5067.58

Million shares.

Securities Times

Jiang Yang: Efforts to build a new pattern of two-way opening up of the capital market

==================

Jiang Yang, Vice Chairman of China Securities Regulatory Commission, said at the 11th Asian Financial Forum on January 15 that promoting high-quality economic development

Open a strong financial support. In recent years, the ability of China's capital market to serve the real economy has reached a large stage, but there is still a lot of development opportunities

between. The Commission will put the development of direct financing, especially equity financing on a prominent position, and strive to enhance service capabilities for technological innovation

, Efforts to build a new two-way opening up, significantly easing restrictions on industry access, strive to maintain the steady operation of capital markets.

RMB central parity rose 358 basis points in the offshore both rose 6.44

==========================

Yesterday, the central parity of RMB against the US dollar rose 358 basis points over the previous day, to 6.4574, a record 201

The highest since May 3, 2006. Since the beginning of this year, the central parity rate of RMB against the U.S. dollar has risen 768 basis points. And at

In the foreign exchange market, the intraday renminbi reached a maximum of 6.4138 days and surged over 500 basis points once. The offshore renminbi against the United States

Yuan also reached the highest 6.4152, both rising 6.44. .

Experiences and Enlightenment from Shenzhen Economic High Quality Development

===============

According to the latest official forecast, Shenzhen's nominal gross domestic product (GDP) in 2017 amounted to 2.2 trillion yuan

A growth of 12.87% over the first quarter of the four major cities. In China's total urban economic rankings, Shenzhen will therefore

Move forward one. (Kl)

Content:
For best results when printing this announcement, please click on link
below:http://pdf.reuters.com/htmlnews/htmlnews.asp...

  

小赢科技亮相零壹财经新金融年会，畅谈互金行业起点与责任  
PR Newswire

  

北京, 2018年1月15日电

  

北京2018年1月15日电 /美通社/ --  
近日，以“资本+技术=发展+责任”为主题的2018零壹财经新金融年会在北京举办。数百位来自监管机构、行业协会及金融科技企业的专家学者、企业家共商新金融未来发展的新趋势，探讨金融科技发展与责任之间的平衡。小赢科技首席风控官李侃受邀出席，并在主题为“资本盛宴之后行业的起点与责任”的圆桌论坛环节向参会嘉宾分享小赢科技在风控技术创新、合规运营及行业责任等方面的创新探索与引领实践。

  

金融公司应把更多精力用于踏实做产品  
近日，以“资本+技术=发展+责任”为主题的2018零壹财经新金融年会在北京举办。数百位来自监管机构、行业协会及金融科技企业的专家学者、企业家共商新金融未来发展的新趋势，探讨金融科技发展与责任之间的平衡。李侃在发言中首先回溯了小赢科技的发展战略。他强调，小赢科技崇尚积极、踏实地完善产品，以及严谨、科学的管理，用更好的品质来回报市场的信任。李侃介绍，小赢科技自创立之初起至今，在小赢理财、小赢卡贷等产品方面表现卓异，始终努力保持谦逊和对行业规则、对市场的敬畏，比较低调。李侃表示，董事长唐越要求小赢科技踏踏实实做业务、扎扎实实做风控，努力锻造过硬的产品，夯实自身内力，为更长远的发展打好基础。

  

创新可以成为起点，起点不一定是创新

  

关于讨论中提及的“新金融行业的新起点”问题，李侃回答，要说清楚金融科技的下一个划时代创新是什么，这其实很难预测。但他表示，一些金融行业的趋势已经浮现。比如在未来，企业借贷需求和个人借贷需求有可能会融合起来，彼此之间的分界线会越来越模糊，信息的沟通会越来越顺畅，不再存在任何障碍。

  

李侃表示，创新可以成为起点，起点不一定是创新，互金行业的新起点也可能来自市场的变化、政策的引导等等，小赢科技作为业内始终坚守金融科技创新的代表性机构，始终坚持创新，通过不断完善和优化管理体系、风控体系，使产品能够不断进化，适应未来的市场需求。

  

扎实做事，承担责任，稳步上升

  

李侃介绍说，从小赢科技成立至今，良好有序的运营状态与稳定靠谱的产品体验给投资者强有力的信心和丰厚的回报，公司也获得了稳步的提升和发展。在多年没有进行过堆砌知名度式宣传的前提下，小赢科技在融资上也同样流畅，于2015年10月拿到A轮4亿元与2017年3月拿到B轮10亿元的融资。

  

李侃表示，小赢科技自创立以来，始终坚持低调、稳重、踏实的经营风格，不唱高调、不说空话，实实在在将精力投入到对产品的打磨和运营上来。小赢科技一向倡导的“稳健”、“小赢就好”等，也已经深入用户人心，培养了十分忠诚的用户群体。因此，小赢科技一直以来的发展都是良性的、稳定的。李侃认为，在风云变幻的互联网金融领域，要踏实下来其实是很难的。企业其实不必空口表白自己将承担怎样的承诺，只要能够将自己应该承担的责任承担起来，严格管理、合规经营、稳步发展，切实为用户谋求回报，就是对互联网金融行业发展的最大贡献，也是对企业、社会、市场最大的负责任。

https://photos.prnasia.com/prnh/20180115/2032251-1-b

Small win-win technology debut Zero One financial new financial annual meeting, talk about mutual fund industry starting point and responsibility
PR Newswire

  

Beijing, January 15, 2018

  

Beijing, January 15, 2018 / PR Newswire /
Recently, the "2018 Zero One Financial and New Financial Annual Conference entitled" Capital + Technology = Development + Responsibility "was held in Beijing. Hundreds of experts, scholars, entrepreneurs from regulators, industry associations and financial technology companies are discussing new trends in the future development of new finance and discussing the balance between the development of finance technology and its responsibilities. Li Kan, Chief Tycoon of Small Win Technology, was invited to attend the forum and shared the win-win technology with other customers at the roundtable forum titled "The Starting Point and Responsibility of the Industry after the Capital Feast." Innovation and Compliance Operations and Industries Responsibility and other aspects of innovation to explore and lead the practice.

  

Financial companies should devote more energy to practical products
Recently, the "2018 Zero One Financial and New Financial Annual Conference entitled" Capital + Technology = Development + Responsibility "was held in Beijing. Hundreds of experts, scholars, entrepreneurs from regulators, industry associations and financial technology companies are discussing new trends in the future development of new finance and discussing the balance between the development of finance technology and its responsibilities. In his speech, McCain first recalled the development strategy of small win-win technology. He emphasized that Win-Win Technology advocates active and steadfast improvement of products as well as rigorous and scientific management, and returns the trust of the market with better quality. Li Kan introduction, small win since the founding of science and technology since its inception, in the small win of wealth management, small win cards and other products outstanding performance, and always strive to remain modest and industry rules, the market's awe, more low-key. Li Kan said that the chairman of Tang Yue requires a win-win-win technology to do business in a down-to-earth manner, do a solid wind control, and strive to forge excellent products, consolidate their internal forces and lay the foundation for more long-term development.

  

Innovation can be the starting point, starting point is not necessarily innovation

  

Regarding the "new starting point for the new financial industry" mentioned in the discussion, McCain replied that it is hard to predict what the next epoch-making innovation in financial technology should be. But he said some trends in the financial sector have emerged. For example, in the future, the demand for corporate loans and personal loans may be combined, the dividing line between them will be more and more modest, the communication of information will be more and more smoothly, there is no longer any obstacle.

  

Li Kan said that innovation can be a starting point, the starting point is not necessarily innovation, a new starting point for mutual gold industry may also come from the market changes, policy guidance, and so small win as the industry always adhere to the financial science and technology innovation representative institutions, always Adhere to innovation, through continuous improvement and optimization of management system, risk control system, so that products can continue to evolve to adapt to future market demand.

  

Solid work, take responsibility, steady rise

  

Li Kan said that since the founding of Science and Technology since its establishment, a well-ordered operating status and reliable product experience to give investors a strong confidence and generous returns, the company also received steady improvement and development. Under the premise of not being piled publicity for many years, Xiao-Qiang Technology is equally fluent in financing. In October 2015, it took 400 million yuan for round A and one billion yuan for round B in March 2017.

  

Li Kan said that small win-win technology since its inception, always adhere to the low-key, prudent and pragmatic management style, do not sing high profile, do not say empty words, and really will focus on product grinding and operation up. Win-win technology has always advocated "steady", "small win is good," etc.,have also been deeply user's mind, cultivate a very loyal user groups. Therefore, the small win always been the development of science and technology are benign and stable. Li Kan believes that in the ever-changing Internet finance field, it is actually very hard to be realistic. In fact, enterprises do not have to make empty promises about what promises they will undertake. As long as they can take responsibility for their own commitments, strictly manage, manage their businesses and develop steadily, and earnestly seek for returns from users, they are the most important contributions to the development of the Internet finance industry. The enterprise, society, the largest market responsible.

Title: 小赢科技亮相零壹财经新金融年会，畅谈互金行业起点与责任

Content:
《经济通通讯社１５日专讯》内地主要财经报章头版摘要如下：

《中国证券报》

张慎峰：深化交易所债市改革

＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝

中国证监会主席助理张慎峰１３日在第２２届中国资本市场论坛上表示，２０１８年证监会将深

入学习贯彻党的十九大精神，围绕全国金融工作会议和中央经济工作会议确定的目标任务，突出

抓重点、补短板、强弱项，强化依法全面从严监管，深化交易所债券市场改革，努力推动市场实

现高质量发展，稳步提高直接融资比重。

银监会进一步深化整治银行业市场乱象

＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝

银监会１３日发布《关于进一步深化整治银行业市场乱象的通知》，在全国范围内进一步深化整

治银行业市场乱象，要求各银行业金融机构全面开展专项整治评估工作，并于２０１８年３月

１０日前上报评估报告。银监会同时印发《进一步深化整治银行业市场乱象的意见》和

《２０１８年整治银行业市场乱象工作要点》。

国企指数开年大幅跑赢恒指

＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝

恒生指数开年９个交易日全部上涨，从去年１２月２２日起已连涨１４个交易日，创下港股历史

上最长连涨周期纪录。虽然恒生指数表现强势，但值得注意的是，恒生国企指数开年以来表现更

为优异，以６．４９％的涨幅超越恒指４．９９％的涨幅。

《上海证券报》

２０１８年积极财政政策的空间在哪里

＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝

按照中央经济工作会议的定调，今年积极的财政政策取向不变，将调整优化财政支出结构，确保

对重点领域和项目的支持力度，压缩一般性支出，切实加强地方政府债务管理。多位专家在接受

上证报记者采访时认为，在经济由高速增长转向高质量发展的阶段，２０１８年积极财政政策将

更加注重结构性调整。

张慎峰：推动交易所债市高质量发展

＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝

证监会主席助理张慎峰日前表示，我国交易所债市已经由快速发展阶段，转向提质增效的高质量

发展阶段。２０１８年，证监会将突出「抓重点、补短板、强弱项」，强化依法、全面、从严监

管，深化交易所债市改革，努力推动市场实现高质量发展，稳步提高直接融资比重。

「返场」还是「退市」？这些公司正上演生死时速

＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝

近期的ＳＴ板块一反往年喧嚣，显得有些沉寂，「保壳」依旧是主旋律。其中，最煎熬的是在

「待定区」内等候的暂停上市梯队，它们��将面临「返场」还是「退市」的生死判决。据上证报

资讯统计，目前的６家暂停上市公司中，＊ＳＴ烯碳、＊ＳＴ吉恩、＊ＳＴ昆机３家公司

２０１７年三季报业绩续亏，且亏损额较大，面临较大的退市危机。

《证券时报》

张慎峰：对各类债市违法违规行为露头就打

＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝

１月１３日，证监会助理张慎峰在出席中国资本市场论坛时表示，股市与债市协调发展一直是资

本市场改革发展的重要命题。２０１８年，证监会将深化交易所债券市场改革，增强服务供给侧

结构性改革的自觉性和能力水平，加强市场监管，对各类债市违法违规行为露头就打，加强交易

所债券市场流动性风险防控，坚决打好防范化解重大问题的攻坚战。

多手段齐出 交易所严防上市公司年末突击创利

＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝

去年１１月，中国证监会新闻发言人回应媒体提问时称，上市公司年末突击进行利润调节，会扭

曲资本市场正常的定价机制和优胜劣汰的市场功能，不利于资本市场长期稳定健康发展，对此将

从严监管。证券时报记者注意到，作为证监会的一线监管部门，沪深交易所在２０１７年底以来

，强化了对某些「突击创利」公司的监管问询。上市公司与交易所之间，上演了一出「鼠猫大战

」。

挤掉数据水分需要更加用「力」

＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝

继２０１６年辽宁承认财政数据造假后，近日，内蒙古、天津滨海新区也自曝存在财政、经济数

据造假的问题，让统计数据造假再成关注焦点。公众对于一些地方政府相继自曝虚增数据、挤掉

「水分」的行为，让人觉得既在意料之中，也在意料之外。意料之外，是水分之大出乎外界意料

。（ｋｌ）

  

Copyright (c) 2018 ET Net Limited. All rights reserved.
Content_EN:
"Economic News Agency 15 News" Mainland's major financial newspaper front page summary is as follows:

"China Securities Journal"

Zhang Shenfeng: Deepening Exchange Market Debt Market Reform

=============

Zhang Shenfeng, an assistant chairman of China Securities Regulatory Commission, said at the 22nd China Capital Markets Forum on the 13th that the China Securities Regulatory Commission

To study and implement the spirit of the 19th National Congress of the CPC Central Committee, focusing on the goals and tasks set by the National Financial Work Conference and the Central Economic Work Conference, highlighting

Grasp the important points, make up the short board, strengths and weaknesses, strengthen the comprehensive and strict supervision according to law, deepen the exchange bond market reform, and strive to promote the market

Now high-quality development, steady increase in the proportion of direct financing.

The CBRC further deepened and rectified the chaos in the banking market

=================

The CBRC promulgated the "Circular on Further Deepening the Chaos in the Banking Market" on the 13th and further deepening the whole nationwide

Governance the banking market chaos, requiring all banking financial institutions to carry out special rectification assessment work, and in March 2018

10 days before the assessment report. The CBRC also issued the Opinions on Further Deepening the Chaos in the Banking Market and

"2018 remediation banking industry chaos work points."

The H-Share Index outperformed the Hang Seng Index sharply in the first half of the year

============

The Hang Seng Index rose all 9 trading days for the first time in a year. It has risen by 14 trading days since December 22 last year, setting a record for the history of Hong Kong stocks

Up on the longest cycle record. Despite the strong performance of the Hang Seng Index, it is worth noting that the Hang Seng China Enterprises Index has performed even more since the start of the year

As excellent, surpassing the HSI 4.99% gain by 6.49%.

"Shanghai Securities News"

Where is the room for active fiscal policy in 2018?

=================

According to the setting of the Central Economic Work Conference, this year's proactive fiscal policy will remain unchanged and its structure of fiscal expenditure will be adjusted and optimized to ensure

Support to key areas and projects, reduce general expenditures, and earnestly strengthen local government debt management. Many experts are accepted

According to an interview with Shanghai Securities News, in the stage when the economy shifted from high-speed growth to high-quality development, the active fiscal policy in 2018

Pay more attention to structural adjustment.

Zhang Shenfeng: to promote the high-quality bond market development

================

Recently, CSRC Chairman Assistant Zhang Shenfeng said that the bond market in China's exchange has shifted from a stage of rapid development to a high-quality

development stage. In 2018, the Commission will give prominence to "focusing on the key points and supplementing the strengths and weaknesses of the weak points", and strengthen the compliance with law, comprehensiveness and strict supervision

The Bank deepened the bond market reform in the stock exchange and worked hard to bring the market to high-quality development and steadily raise the proportion of direct financing.

"Return" or "delisting"? These companies are staging speed of life and death

======================

The recent ST plate against the noise of previous years, it seems a bit quiet, "shell" is still the main theme. Among them, the most suffering is in

Pending suspensions of listed echelons in the "zone to be determined" will face the verdict of "return" or "delisting". According to the Shanghai Securities News

Information statistics, the current six listed companies suspended, * ST olefin carbon, * ST Ji Lin Ji En Nickel Industry Co.,Ltd.,* ST Kunji three companies

Three quarterly results in 2017 continued losses, and the larger the loss, facing a larger delisting crisis.

Securities Times

Zhang Shenfeng: All kinds of bonds of illegal behavior outcrop hit

===================

On January 13, when attending the China Capital Markets Forum, the CSRC assistant Zhang Shenfeng said that the coordinated development of the stock market and the bond market has always been a matter of capital.

The market reform and development of the important proposition. In 2018, the CSRC will deepen the reform of the exchange bond market and enhance the service supply side

Consciousness and ability of structural reforms, strengthening market supervision, cracking down on all kinds of illegal behaviors in various bond markets and strengthening trade

The bond market liquidity risk prevention and control, resolutely lay the defensive battle to resolve major issues.

Many means Qi exchange out of the market to prevent listed companies hit a surprise profit

=====================

Last November, China Securities Regulatory Commission spokesman responded to media questions, said the listed company assault profit adjustment at the end, will twist

The normal pricing mechanism of Qu capital market and the market function of survival of the fittest are not conducive to the long-term stable and healthy development of the capital market,

Strict supervision. Securities Times reporter noted that, as the SFC's front-line regulatory authorities, Shanghai and Shenzhen Stock Exchange since the end of 2017

, Intensified regulatory inquiries into certain "surprise raids" companies. Between the listed company and the exchange, staged a "mouse and cat war

」

To squeeze data moisture needs to be more "force"

==============

Following the recognition of fiscal data in Liaoning in 2016 after the fraud, recently, Inner Mongolia and Tianjin Binhai New Area have also exposed the existence of financial and economic numbers

According to the issue of fraud, statistics forged into focus again. The public for some local governments have exposed the inflated data, squeezed out

The "water" behavior makes people feel both expected and unexpected. Unexpectedly, the water is beyond the expectations of the outside world

. (Kl)

Title: 《神州头条》内地财经报章头版摘要：张慎峰称深化交易所债市改革

Content:
债涌股资金不绝，息爆上隐患懒理/ 习广思

  

美国上周五公布去年12月的零售销货值上升0.4%，消费物价指数则按月升0.1%，加上金融股业绩后股价造好，道指又破顶急升逾200点。美股升浪似无止境，也带动了中国内地及香港股市屡破连升纪录，这种不寻常的股市升势，讲到尾都是钱作怪，资金流出债市流入股市，顺住个势炒爆为止。

  

为美股财报季绩打头炮的3家华尔街银行，贝莱德与摩根大通的股价分别涨3.3%与1.6%，富国银行则下跌0.7%，由于无坏消息，其他金融股股价普遍向上。摩通去年第四季净利润骤减37%，调整后每股盈利1.76美元，高于分析师原本估计的1.69美元。

  

贝莱德去年第四季经调整后每股盈利6.24美元，优于分析师估计的5.98美元；收入34.7亿美元，也高于市场预估的33.1亿美元；美国税改带动去年股市急升，其ETF收入推动期内纯利大增12亿美元。三大银行只有富国银行的股价下跌，主要是收入不及预期。

  

金融股业绩短期受累税改，长远则受惠减税，再者金融市场兴旺令交易收入增加、缓慢加息令息差有序扩阔，金融股因此有望成为市场宠儿，不少基金经理都在等待这几天的银行股业绩，博业绩失望捞底。可是事与愿违，市场见业绩公布股价唔跌，就更积极买上。

  

踏入2018年，美国联储局开始减慢买债，欧央行也明确表示经济正在扩张，减QE收水步伐只会加快不会减慢，三大央行就连日本央行也早早缩减买债了。当全球央行都加紧收水，支持股市屡创新高的资金从何而来？

  

数据显示，本月3日至10日，流入股票基金的资金高达244亿美元，创下逾6个月以来最高水平，也是历史上第六高资金流入的一周。其中，流入美国股票的资金约64亿美元，流入日股的资金达32亿美元，流入欧股的资金约22亿美元，流入新兴市场的资金则达43亿美元，是年半以来的最大流入量。

  

同时，主动基金持续有资金流出，跟踪标普500等市场指数的大部分ETF则吸引大量资金，反映醒目钱投入到正确方向之余，也选择了正确的工具，拣选了收费最便宜的ETF。

  

2018年头两周，标指累涨4.2%，涨幅创2003年以来同期最大，港股已经连续14天上扬，沪指连续第11个交易日攀升，创1992年以来最长连涨纪录。

  

全球股市都有资金大举流入，那么资金来自哪里？伴随股市好景的是资金流出国债，不止美债市场，就连欧洲债市亦然，德国10年期债息由上月下旬的0.3%升至上周五曾破0.6%水平，升幅达100%。

  

大量资金从国债市场涌出，成为了股市资金的一大来源。这个趋势看来仍会持续，三大央行齐齐收水是重要原因，过去几年大量央行资金泵水入债市，强行将债息压低，跟风的债市基金同样加入这个国债升市派对，令年前欧洲主要国债息一度变负息债。现在央行资金只是减慢流入，却会令热钱由债转股，这股力量不容忽视，机构资金不同散户���钱，力度要大得多。

  

不过，当美债息升到了一个转折点，就会令人对美债信心大跌，真正市场风险会由此而来。高盛预计，未来4年税改将令美国财政赤字每年平均增超过2000亿美元，而且国会可能会批准大量新的支出方案。2018财政年度美国财政净借款按年将翻倍至超过万亿美元。

  

联储局第三号人物杜德利（William
Dudley）上周表达了对美国财政状况的担忧，高盛也对美国的债务负担发出警告。高盛指出，税改令赤字上升、国会或批准大兴土木的支出方案，以及联储局「缩表」将增加财政部向公众发行的国债数量，未来国债供应将猛增超过100%。

  

基于以上因素，高盛预期，美国财政净借款将从2017财政年度的4880亿美元，增加至2018财政年度的1.03万亿美元，并且2019财政年度的净借款也将处于类似水平。融资需求料会通过发行更多短期国债和附息债券进行。

  

金融博客ZeroHedge对此点评称，高盛没有说明的是，一方面，美国国债供应将翻倍；另一方面，联储局打算继续「缩表」、欧洲和日本央行将缩减QE，当愈来愈多的央行开始摆脱债务货币化时，谁会成为这场债务海啸的边际买家。

  

目前美国国债大买家之一是中国，中国未来买债方向当然不会有正式官方公布，但是透过各级官员发声，却可收到奇效，以对抗特朗普的贸易保护主义。

  

未来国债步入熊市，且全球通胀预期持续升温，利率必然向上，但这影响或在数月后以至一年后才显现，目前大家都沉醉在股市大派对，炒爆先算。（完）

  

注：以上的评论仅为摘要，并且不代表路透立场。

((路透中文新闻部： +852-2843 6318) (传真 852-3168 9117) ( joy.leung@thomsonreuters.com
))
Content_EN:
Debt stocks continue to fund the interest rate burst on the risk of lazy / learning Guangsi

  

The United States announced last Friday that the value of retail sales in December last year rose 0.4%. The CPI soared 0.1% MoM. After the financial results improved, the Dow surged sharply by more than 200 points. US stocks rise like endless waves, but also led the mainland and Hong Kong stock market repeatedly rose ascending record, this unusual stock market rally, talking about the tail are misunderstood, the funds flow out of the stock market into the stock market, Shun a potential speculation Burst so far.

  

Shares of Wall Street Bank, BlackRock and Morgan Shenzhen Capstone Industrial Co.,Ltd.,rose 3.3% and 1.6% respectively, while Wells Fargo dropped 0.7%. As no bad news, other financial Stock prices generally upward. Moton's net profit plunged 37% in the fourth quarter of last year, adjusted earnings per share of $ 1.76, higher than the analyst's original estimate of $ 1.69.

  

BlackRock fourth-quarter adjusted earnings per share of 6.24 US dollars last month, better than analysts estimated 5.98 US dollars; revenue of 3.47 billion US dollars, also higher than the market forecast of 3.31 billion US dollars; US tax reform boosted the stock market soared last year, Its ETF revenue boosted its net profit by $ 1.2 billion during the period. Only three major banks Wells Fargo shares fell, mainly income is less than expected.

  

Short-term financial sector performance tax reform, the long-term benefit from tax cuts, and then the financial markets so that trading revenue increased, the slow rate hike order spread widening, financial stocks so is expected to become the darling of the market, many fund managers are waiting Banking stocks these days performance, Bo disappointment disappointing performance. However, contrary to expectations, see the performance of the market share price is not down, more active buy.

  

Into 2018, the US Federal Reserve started to slow down the debt bondage, the European Central Bank also made it clear that the economy is expanding, reducing the QE income will only accelerate the pace will not slow down, the three central banks even the Bank of Japan also cut short debt. When the global central banks are stepping up their efforts to support the stock market hit a record high capital come from?

  

Data show that from the 3rd to the 10th of this month, the funds flowing into the equity funds reached as high as 24.4 billion U.S. dollars, setting the highest level in more than six months and the sixth-largest capital inflow in history. Among them, the inflow of funds to the U.S. stock market amounted to about 6.4 billion U.S. dollars, the inflow of Japanese yen into the stock market amounted to 3.2 billion U.S. dollars, the inflow of funds to the European Union amounted to 2.2 billion U.S. dollars and the inflow of SINECERE NAVIGATION CORPORATION reached 4.3 billion U.S. dollars. Maximum inflow.

  

Meanwhile, active funds continued to have outflows. Most ETFs tracking market indices such as the S & P500 attracted a large amount of capital, reflecting the obvious direction of investing in the right money. They also chose the right tools and selected the cheapest ETFs.

  

In the first two weeks of 2018, the benchmark index rose 4.2%, the largest gain since 2003, Hong Kong stocks have been rising for 14 consecutive days, the Shanghai Composite Index rose for 11 consecutive trading days, the highest since 1992, the longest continuous record.

  

Global stock markets have a large inflow of funds, then the money from where? With the good stock market is the outflow of government bonds, not just the US debt market, even the European bond market, the German 10-year debt rose from 0.3% in late last month rose to 0.6% last Friday, an increase of 100%.

  

A large number of funds poured from the bond market has become a major source of stock market funds. This trend seems to continue, the three central banks to collect water is an important reason, in the past few years a large number of central bank funds pump into the bond market, forcing the debt pressure down, follow the trend of the bond funds also join the bond market, So that years ago, the major European sovereign bond interest-bearing debt was changed. Now the central bank funds only slow down the inflow, but it will make the hot money from debt to equity, this force can not be ignored, the agency funds vary from individual investors, efforts should be much greater.

  

However, when the US debt interest rate rose to a turning point, it will make people's confidence in the United States plummeted, the real market risk will come from. Goldman Sachs predicts that the tax reform in the next four years will cause the U.S. fiscal deficit to increase by more than 200 billion U.S. dollars annually on average, and Congress may approve a large number of new spending plans. The fiscal net borrowing in the United States in fiscal year 201 will double to over trillion dollars a year.

  

Federal Reserve Third Number Dudley (William
Dudley) expressed concerns about the U.S. financial position last week, and Goldman Sachs also warned the U.S. debt burden. Goldman Sachs pointed out that the deficit increase tax reform, parliamentary approval or approval of spending big programs, and the Federal Reserve "shrink" will increase the Ministry of Finance issued to the public the number of bonds, the future supply of government bonds will increase by more than 100%.

  

Based on the above factors, Goldman Sachs expects net US borrowing to increase from $ 488 billion in FY 2017 to $ 1.03 trillion in FY 2018, and net borrowings in FY 2019 will be at similar levels. Financing requirements will be issued through the issuance of more short-term bonds and coupon bonds.

  

FinancialHealthBlog ZeroHedge commented on this, Goldman Sachs did not say that on the one hand, the supply of US government bonds will double; the other hand, the Fed intends to continue to "shrink" the European and Japanese central banks will reduce the QE, more and more When the central bank began to get out of debt monetization, who would become the marginal buyer of the debt tsunami.

  

At present, one of the big buyers of U.S. treasuries is China. Of course, there will be no official official announcement of China's future bond buying direction. However, officials at all levels may receive miraculous signs of fighting Trump's trade protectionism.

  

The next national debt into the bear market, and global inflation expectations continue to heat up, the interest rate inevitably upward, but the impact or in a few months or even years after the show, at present we all indulge in the stock market party, the first fried speculation. (Finish)

  

Note: The above comments are only abstracts and do not represent Reuters' position.

Title: 港报财经评论：债涌股资金不绝，息爆上隐���懒理--信报1月15日

Content:
大市未疯狂，买落后红筹/ 林瑞芬

  

2018年已过了近两个星期，港股升市当中，确有逐步蔓延，扩展宽度的情况，有大时代意味，还未够疯狂，年内可能更疯狂！

  

滙丰（00005）周内发力抽升，即带动中银香港（02388）及渣打（02888）于周四抽升。

  

去年落后的中型红筹股，近两周轮流开车了。如早前因加价声起，刺激华润啤酒（00291）股价抽升。落后的红筹也见发力，如去年跌穿供股价的中国建筑（03311），昨曾高见12.5元，已升上供股价。光国（00257）周四股价急升突破11元密集阻力后亦预示开车，昨进一步攀升2%至11.92元收市，大趋势挑战13元。华润燃气（01193）都不客气，股价昨升3.5%，收报25.2元。

  

中国建筑去年表现认真麻麻，全年下跌6%，跑输大市成条街。去年，公司亦作供股，供股价11.33元，但供股遇认购不足，股价直插，低见9.95元。经过此低潮后，这两周股价表现终有些起色，昨高见12.5元，收报11.94元，已企回供股价上，只要后市未有进一步失守11.3元，可望捱过低潮，股价走势逐步改善。技术来讲，短期如能有效收复12.4元阻力位，向上挑战13.3元。

  

月内分别有里昂、花旗、瑞银及中金公司发表中国建筑的分析报告，中期目标分别上望15元、14元、14.99元及14元。四行对该股2017年度的每股盈利预测分别为1.07元、1.16元、1.21元及1.13元，而2018年度分别为1.36元、1.46元、1.31元及1.35元。公司已公布2018年新签订单目标为1，150亿元，隐含11.5%的同比增长。中金认为在PPP项目监管政策趋严所带来的影响于今年第一季后逐渐消失后，在公司定单仍有增长势头，而预计现金流又改善下，前景尚见稳健。

  

论今年盈利及派息惊喜，可以考虑深圳国际（00152）。据银河国际援引公司管理层指出，截至2017年底，公司两个房地产项目取得良好进展，特别是前海项目，因为公司能为2017财年确认28.4亿元的一次性税前收益。银河就预计其2017财年度的派息将更高，有机会达到每股0.91元，以报告时股价造15.6元计算，相应股息率为5.83%。今年而言，相信深圳国际的土地资产可望逐步释放价值，如将梅林关专案的部分股权出售给协力厂商开发商，以及从深圳政府就前海专案获得更多赔偿，由此提升该股估值。

  

加上，公司持有深圳航空49%权益，由于滙兑收益的关系，人民币走势强劲，深圳航空2017年有望录得不俗利润，银河预计其2017年和2018年度的利润分别为11.26亿元和12.31亿元，占深圳国际此两年核心净利润预测的23.7%及24.5%。而年初内地又公布了飞机票价可市场化的消息，深航作为中国国航的子公司，相信未来可以受益票价的弹性安排。考虑到深国于2016至2019年核心利润预测年均复合增长率为26.7%，中期股价的目标上望至19.67元。

  

参考深圳国际月綫图走势，去年已有效突破14元阻力，按突破10元至14元的长方形推算，量度升幅约至18元。国泰君安月内也有报告设定该股目标挑战17.9元，保守可以此作为目标价，止蚀14元，昨收15.78元，回近15元可收集。

  

最后回说大市，升势持续。恒指昨收31412，升0.94%，大市成交额1,389.74亿元，守稳30000，亦步亦趋重探2007年高位近32000。国指方面，昨收报12468，升1.41%，守稳12000，反覆挑战14000。且看内险股周内股价表现较为反覆整固，但内银股耐力厚，逐步攀升，四大行中的农行（01288）、工行（01398）及建行（00939）已同步于国指升穿去年高位。留意内险股，短期股价虽稍有反覆，在整固，但只要抖足气，再发力，将有利国指反覆向上挑战新高，轮流攻坚，令中期升浪维稳。（完）

注：以上的评论仅为摘要，并且不代表路透立场。

Content_EN:
The market is not crazy, buy behind the red chips / Lin Ruifen

  

In 2018, nearly two weeks have passed. In Hong Kong stock markets, there is indeed a gradual spread and widening of the market. In the great era, it is not yet crazy enough and may be even more crazy during the year.

  

HSBC (00005) made a fortified move in the week, hoping Ningxia Zhongyin Cashmere Co.,Ltd. Hong Kong (02388) and Standard Chartered (02888) to pump up on Thursday.

  

Medium-sized red chips lagging behind last year took turns driving in two weeks. As earlier fare increases, the price hike of China Resources Beer (Holdings) Company Limited (00291) was stimulated. Outdated red chips also hit the jackpot. As China State Construction Engineering Corporation Limited (03311), which fell below the offer price last year, yesterday saw a gain of 12.5 yuan and has risen its offer price. Guangguo (00257) sharp rise in share price on Thursday broke through 11 yuan resistance also drove ahead, yesterday rose further 2% to 11.92 yuan closing, the major trend challenge 13 yuan. CHINA RESOURCES GAS GROUP LIMITED (01193) You are welcome, shares rose 3.5% yesterday to close at 25.2 yuan.

  

 Last year, China State Construction Engineering Corporation Limited was a serious loser with a 6% drop for the whole year, underperforming the market. Last year, the company also made a rights issue for the offering price of 11.33 yuan, but the subscription for the rights issue was insufficient and the stock price plunged to a low of 9.95 yuan. After this ebb, these stock prices ended up some improvement in the past two weeks. Last saw a gain of 12.5 yuan to close at 11.94 yuan. The stock price has been raised back. As long as the stock market fails to fall further to 11.3 yuan, it is expected to be able to weather the doldrums and the stock price will gradually improve. Technology, short-term, if effectively recovered 12.4 yuan resistance, up 13.3 yuan challenge.

  

Analysts report for China State Construction Engineering Corporation Limited released by Lyon, Citigroup, UBS and China International Capital Corporation Limited respectively in the month with medium-term targets of 15, 14, 14.99 and 14 respectively. The four-line estimate of EPS for 2017 is 1.07 yuan, 1.16 yuan, 1.21 yuan and 1.13 yuan respectively, compared with 1.36 yuan, 1.46 yuan, 1.31 yuan and 1.35 yuan respectively in 2018. The company has announced that the newly signed orders in 2018 will reach 115 billion yuan, implying a year-on-year increase of 11.5%. China International Capital Corporation Limited believes that the outlook for the Company is still solid due to the still growing momentum in the Company's orders after the gradual disappearance of the impact of tightened regulatory control on PPP projects after the first quarter of this year.

  

On this year's earnings and dividend surprise, you can consider SHENZHEN INTERNATIONAL HOLDINGS LIMITED (00152). According to Galaxy International, the management of the company pointed out that as of the end of 2017, the two real estate projects of the Company made good progress, especially the Qianhai project, as the Company was able to confirm a one-off pretax profit of RMB2.84 billion for FY17. Galaxy expects its dividend to be higher in FY17 with an opportunity to reach 0.91 yuan per share. Based on the report's price of 15.6 yuan, the corresponding dividend yield is 5.83%. For the current year, I believe SHENZHEN INTERNATIONAL HOLDINGS LIMITED is expected to gradually release its land assets such as selling part of the Merlin Project to third party developers and obtaining more compensation from the Shenzhen government for the Qianhai project, thereby enhancing the Stock valuation.

  

In addition, the Company holds a 49% interest in Shenzhen Airlines and due to the strong exchange rate gains, RMB is expected to record strong profits in 2017. Galaxy expects its profits in 2017 and 2018 to be RMB1,126 million and RMB 1,231 million, accounting for 23.7% and 24.5% of the core net profit forecast of SHENZHEN INTERNATIONAL HOLDINGS LIMITED for the two years respectively. In the beginning of this year, the Mainland announced the marketability of its fares. As a subsidiary of Air China Limited, Shenzhen Airlines believes in the flexibility of fares for the future. Taking into account the deep core 2016-2019 core profit forecast CAGR of 26.7%, medium-term target price hikes to 19.67 yuan.

  

With reference to the monthly chart of SHENZHEN INTERNATIONAL HOLDINGS LIMITED, it effectively broke the resistance of 14 yuan last year and calculated the increase to about 18 yuan according to a rectangle that exceeded 10 yuan to 14 yuan. Guotai Junan Securities Co.,Ltd. also reported that the unit set a target of 17.9 yuan during the month. Conservatives could target this target at a 14-point stop loss and a gain of 15.78 yuan and a return of nearly 15 yuan.

  

Finally, back to the market, the rally continued. The Hang Seng Index closed at 31412, up 0.94%. The turnover of the market was 138.974 billion yuan, holding steady at 30,000 points. In 2007, the Hang Seng Index swelled to a high of nearly 32,000 points. The H-Share Index yesterday closed at 12,468, up 1.41%, holding steady 12000, repeatedly challenged 14000. However, the performance of Stock Life Insurance Index within the week was relatively flat. However, the strength of domestic banking stocks was soaring and steadily rising. ABC (01288), ICBC (01398) and CCB (00939) High. Attention to the insurance stocks, although the short-term share price is slightly reversed, the consolidation, but as long as shake gas, and then force, will be conducive to the national index repeatedly challenge up a new high, turning storming, so that stable growth in the medium term. (Finish)

Title: 港报财经评论：大市未疯狂，买落后红筹--经济日报1月13日

Content:
中新社石狮1月14日电 题：“闽派服饰”智能破局 企业抱团闯“丝路”

中新社记者 孙虹

“以石狮为代表的‘闽派服饰’集群正积极融入‘海上丝绸之路’纺织服装经济带，通过与沿线国家地区贸易往来、原料供应、设计交融，携手在艰难的产业转型中破壳重生。”14日，福建石狮纺织服装产业联盟会长林宏楠接受记者采访时指出，“我们需要更多的改变和高质量订单来获取发展机会。”

作为“闽派服饰”策源地、“中国休闲服装名城”和“中国休闲面料商贸名城”，依托纺织鞋服产业，石狮从一个名不见经传的沿海侨乡小镇逐步发展成为中国最具活力的城市之一。

从纺纱、织造、漂染再到成衣加工、服装设计、面辅料、品牌营销、人才聚集，石狮涉及服装产业的配套一应俱全，产业基础雄厚、规模庞大，辐射全国乃至整个东南亚。然而，面对近年来全球范围内的环境保护、劳动力成本、贸易壁垒等严峻挑战，石狮纺织服装业也无法“独善其身”。

为了寻求发展，在抱团取暖的同时，越来越多企业“自救”破局。在石狮森科智能科技有限公司的展厅内，应用LED柔性屏、发光面料、自动松紧带的各种衣服、鞋子十分吸引眼球。

森科智能董事长王善炮是个“80后”创业者，从事传统鞋服行业10多年。“这几年订单年年萎缩，利润也越来越低，几乎到了举步维艰的境地。”王善炮坦言，我们需要进步、需要转型、更需要海内外市场的认可。

机缘巧合之下，王善炮与志同道合的生意伙伴联手创办了从事智能鞋服业务的新公司。他告诉记者，“伴随政府对科技型企业增大扶持力度，再加上纺织服装联盟的牵线搭桥，公司虽然成立不到一年，但从产品的设计研发，到客户的对接沟通，以及订单的磨合落地等都超过了预期效果，预计在今年6、7月可以实现量产。”

“公司所研发的智能面料不仅能在生产过程中将相关数据传送至云端，用于制作工艺的改进，还可以记录衣服售出后的使用状态，便于商家及时与顾客对接沟通。”王善炮说，目前，该公司已申请专利40余项，甚至智能技术输出给意大利某运动鞋品牌。接下来还将深耕年轻、个性化产品，同时为传统品牌量身定做智能化设计。

吴宇岩、吴宇泽两兄弟倾注28年心血，创办了石狮金利莱斯服饰。“一方面是鞋服产业总体产能过剩，另一方面则是好的款式设计产品供不应求。”吴宇岩说，为了应对传统鞋服企业库存量大的“老大难”问题，这几年我们逐渐将公司产品定位成从研发、采购、生产到销售的“快时尚”男装，依托当地和设在意大利的两个研发中心，每年投入两三百万元用于产品的研发，几乎每周都能推出新款式。

“目前，销往欧洲、美国、韩国、土耳其等国家及地区的外贸订单占公司销量的40%左右，并呈现平稳增长的趋势。”吴宇岩认为，不管是面料的研发，还是产品的推广，“走出去”已经成了企业继续生存发展的必然选择。

“好酒也怕巷子深。”为了把转变中的“闽派服饰”推向更广阔的市场，石狮纺织服装产业联盟为石狮及周边区域的外贸企业提供了“一站式”服务平台，助推石狮外贸板块做大做强。

“石狮融入‘海丝’纺织服装经济带的优势得天独厚。”在石狮纺织服装产业联盟会长林宏楠眼里，地处建设“21世纪海上丝绸之路”先行区的泉州境内，纺织服装产业规模大、辐射范围广，为石狮纺织鞋服企业“走出去”奠定了坚实的基础。

截至目前，石狮纺织服装产业联盟已吸引了400多家纺织服装企业加入，并汇集了石狮地区与纺织服装产业相关的13个社会团体。林宏楠表示，接下来将组织石狮服装外贸企业赴欧洲、东南亚等海外地区考察交流，与当地大型纺织企业进行面料对接合作，进一步加快开拓海外市场的脚步。（完）

  

Copyright (c) 2018 China News Service
Content_EN:
China news agency Shishi January 14th issue: "Min faction apparel" intelligent breaking enterprise Baotuan "Silk Road"

China News Service reporter Sun Hong

"The group of Min-fu garments represented by Shishi is actively integrating into the textile and apparel economic belt of the Maritime Silk Road. Through the trade with the countries and regions along the line, the supply of raw materials and the design blend with each other, the two sides work together to emerge from the difficult industrial restructuring "On the 14th, Fujian Shishi Textile and Garment Industry Federation President Lin Hongnan told reporters in an interview," We need more changes and high quality orders to gain development opportunities. "

As the source of "Minpai Clothing", "China's casual wear city" and "China's famous leisure fabric trade", relying on textile and apparel industry, Shishi from a little-known coastal township of overseas Chinese gradually developed into China's most dynamic city one.

From spinning, weaving, dyeing and finishing to clothing processing, garment design, surface materials, brand marketing, talent gathering, Shishi involved in the apparel industry is readily available, strong industrial base, large scale, radiation throughout the country and the entire Southeast Asia. However, facing the severe challenges such as environmental protection, labor costs and trade barriers in the world in recent years, the Shishi textile and clothing industry can not "stand aloof from the past."

In order to seek development, Baotuan heating at the same time, more and more enterprises "self-help" break. In Shishi Senke Intelligent Technology Co.,Ltd. showroom, the application of LED flexible screen, luminous fabrics, automatic elastic band of various clothes, shoes are very eye-catching.

Senke smart chairman Wang cannon is a "post 80" entrepreneurs, engaged in the traditional shoes and apparel industry for more than 10 years. "In recent years orders shrink each year, profits are getting lower and lower, almost to the difficult situation." Wang Shaopeng frankly, we need progress, the need for restructuring, but also the recognition needs of domestic and foreign markets.

By chance, Wang cannon and like-minded business partners jointly founded a new company engaged in smart shoes and apparel business. He told reporters, "With the government to increase support for science and technology enterprises, coupled with the textile and apparel union matchmaking, although the company was established less than a year, but from product design and development to customer docking communication, as well as the order of the run-in Landing, etc. are more than expected results expected in June and July this year, mass production can be achieved.

"The intelligent fabric developed by the company can not only transmit relevant data to the cloud in the production process for the improvement of the manufacturing process, but also record the usage status after the clothes are sold so that the merchants can communicate with the customers in time." Said that at present, the company has applied for more than 40 patents, and even smart technology exports to a certain Italian sports shoes brand. The next will be deep plowing young, personalized products, while tailor-made for the traditional brand of intelligent design.

Wu Yuyan, Wu Yuze two brothers devoted 28 years of hard work, founded the Shishi Jin Lilai Si costumes. "On the one hand, the overall over-capacity of the footwear industry, on the other hand is a good style design products in short supply." Wu Yu-yan said that in order to deal with the traditional shoes and apparel business inventories, the "big problem" in recent years, we gradually The company's products are positioned as "fast-fashion" menswear from R & D, purchasing, production to sales. Relying on two R & D centers in Italy and Italy, the company invests two to three million dollars each year for R & D of products and releases them almost weekly new style.

"At present, foreign trade orders sold to Europe, the United States, South Korea, Turkey and other countries and regions account for about 40% of the sales volume of the company and show a trend of steady growth." According to Wu Yuyan, whether it is the research and development of fabrics or the promotion of products, "Going Global" has become an inevitable choice for enterprises to survive and develop.

"Good wine is also afraid of the alley." In order to promote the transformation of "Min School Dress" to a broader market, Shishi Textile and Garment Industry Alliance provides a "one-stop" service platform for foreign trade enterprises in Shishi and the surrounding areas, Push lions foreign trade sector bigger and stronger.

"Shishi into the 'Haise' textile and apparel economic belt unique advantages." Shishi Textile and Garment Industry Alliance Lin Hongnan eyes, is located in the construction of "21st Century Maritime Silk Road" in Quanzhou area, textile and garment industry large-scale , A wide range of radiation, Shishi textile and garment enterprises "going global" laid a solid foundation.

Up to now, Shishi textile and garment industry alliance has attracted more than 400 textile and garment enterprises to join, and brought together the Shishi area and textile and garment industry related to 13 social groups. Lin Hongnan said that the next organization will Shishi garment foreign trade enterprises to visit Europe, Southeast Asia and other overseas exchanges, with large local textile enterprises fabric docking and cooperation, to further accelerate the pace of opening up overseas markets. (Finish)

Title: 【财经】（经济观察）“闽派服饰”智能破局 企业抱团闯“丝路”

Content:
《经济通通讯社１２日专讯》内地主要财经报章头版摘要如下：

《中国证券报》

地方国企改革谋绘「施工图」

＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝

新年伊始，地方国企改革马不停蹄。近期四川、山西、天津等地相继公布国企改革新进展，进一

步明确混改和资产证券化目标。数据显示，目前有２８家地方国企上市公司因重大事项或资产重

组处于停牌状态。国资委此前公布，２１家地方国企纳入第三批混改试点。专家认为，随著地方

国资国企工作会议以及地方两会相继召开，２０１８年地方国企改革「施工图」将绘就，试点方

案有望密集出台。

「漂亮５０」十连阳 期权期指行情旺

＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝

上证５０指数近期表现强势，收获「十连阳」。以之为标的期权、股指期货也受到资金热捧，上

证５０ＥＴＦ期权成交量创阶段新高，上证５０股指期货也维持较高升水。对于上证５０指数成

分股的中长期走势，多位机构人士表示看好。不过，面对「十连阳」，仍需留一分谨慎。

小票遭遇并购瓶颈 资金踌躇裹足不前

＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝

融资监管从严叠加二级市场并购题材「冰火两重天」，小盘股遭遇并购「瓶颈」。过去两个月，

超过３０家上市公司终止并购重组事项，其中７０％以上的公司市值在６０亿元以下。分析人士

指出，目前小盘股的并购重组操作中最大的阻碍是资金问题。再融资新规、减持新规发布后，定

向增发融资等难度加大。同时，一些中小市值股票重组复牌后股价持续低迷，这也使资金参与时

更为谨慎。

《上海证券报》

国务院督查地方国企改革 加速和突破料成今年重点

＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝

２０１８年伊始，「国务院深化国有企业改革重点工作任务落实情况专项督查组」就奔赴湖北、

安徽等地，督查国企国资改革落实情况。而江苏、山西等地方国资委则在新年第一个工作日就公

布了各自的国企改革计划或方案，释放出国企改革加速的信号。在资本市场，目前已有３１家国

企上市公司停牌筹划重组。

风险偏好回升 沪指走出十连阳

＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝

区块链概念１１日再掀涨停潮，带动科技类题材股集体走强，Ａ股三大股指呈现普涨格局，沪指

收获日线十连阳。与此同时，融资资金规模不断攀升，创下两年来的阶段性新高，显示市场风险

偏好在持续回升。

证监会进一步加强新形势下引进人才工作

＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝

证监会官网１１日披露，近日，证监会党委印发了《关于引进中高层次专业人才工作的意见》，

要求全系统增强大局意识和协作精神，以战略思维、国际视野和广阔胸怀，切实承担起引进人才

工作责任，真正做到人才「引得进、留得住、用得好」。

《证券时报》

李克强：去年ＧＤＰ预计增长６．９％左右

＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝

国务院总理李克强当地时间１月１０日下午在金边和平大厦出席澜沧江－湄公河合作第二次领导

人会议。李克强和柬埔寨首相洪森共同主持会议。李克强表示，澜湄合作是首个由流域六国共同

创建的新型次区域合作机制，是共商共建「一带一路」的重要平台。

全球最大第二代４０万吨级超大型矿砂船命名交付

＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝

１月１１日，全球最大的第二代４０万吨超大型矿砂船「远河海」号成功命名交付。该船为单桨

低速柴油机驱动的无限航区的矿砂船，船长３６２米，宽６５米，型深３０．４米，具有经济、

绿色、环保、节能、安全的特点，是一款世界领先的船舶产品，该船满足最新的强度标准，较第

一代大型矿砂船综合性能大幅提高，单位海里的油耗降低了３０％。

更高水平市场化才能把好企业留在国内

＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝

近日，证监会主席助理张慎峰在北京中关村科技园区调研时指出，要把好企业留在国内、让好企

业尽快上市。而与此同时，据媒体报道，热门科技企业小米将于今年赴海外上市。如何切实有效

地把好企业留在国内，引起了人们的思考。（ｋｌ）

  

Copyright (c) 2018 ET Net Limited. All rights reserved.
Content_EN:
"Economic News Agency Newsletters 12" The main financial newspapers in the Mainland Summary of the front page is as follows:

"China Securities Journal"

Local State-owned Enterprise Reform Seeking "Construction Plans"

=============

At the beginning of the new year, the reform of local state-owned enterprises is non-stop. Recent Sichuan, Shanxi, Tianjin and other places have announced the new progress of state-owned enterprises reform, into one

Step clear mix and change and asset securitization goals. Data show that there are currently 28 local state-owned listed companies due to major issues or assets

Group is in suspension status. SASAC had previously announced that 21 local state-owned enterprises were included in the third batch of mixed reform pilot projects. Experts believe that along with the place

The working conference of state-owned enterprises and state-owned and state-owned enterprises will be held one after another. In 2018, the "construction drawing" of local state-owned enterprises reform will be drawn up. The pilot party

The case is expected to be introduced intensively.

"Beautiful 50" ten Lian Yang option period refers to the market flourishing

=================

The SSE 50 index recently showed strong performance and won "ten consecutive positives." With the underlying options, stock index futures also been favorable for the funds, on

50ETF option volume hit a new high stage, Shanghai Futures 50 index futures also maintained a high premium. For the Shanghai index 50 into

Long-term sub-share market trends, many agencies said they are optimistic. However, in the face of "ten positive postings," one should still be cautious.

Small ticket encounter mergers and acquisitions bottleneck funds hesitantly stagnant

=================

Financing Supervision Tied to secondary market mergers and acquisitions subject matter "two days", small cap stocks suffered mergers and acquisitions "bottleneck." In the past two months,

More than 30 listed companies terminated the merger and reorganization, of which more than 70% of the company's market capitalization of less than 6 billion yuan. Analyst

Pointed out that the current small cap stocks M & A restructuring the biggest obstacle is the funding issue. Refinancing new regulations, after the release of new regulations to reduce, set

To raise additional financing more difficult. At the same time, some small and medium cap stocks resumed trading after the resumption of stock prices continued to slump, which also makes money involved

More cautious.

"Shanghai Securities News"

The State Council examines the acceleration and breakthroughs in the reform of local state-owned enterprises as the focus of this year

=======================

At the beginning of 2018, "the special inspection team under the State Council's task of deepening the reform of state-owned enterprises" went to Hubei,

Anhui and other places to supervise the implementation of state-owned assets reform in state-owned enterprises. However, SASAC in places such as Jiangsu and Shanxi started the first working day in the New Year

They plan their own plans or programs for the reform of state-owned enterprises and release the signal of accelerating the reform of state-owned enterprises. In the capital market, there are currently 31 countries

Corporate listed companies suspended restructuring planning.

Risk appetite rose stock index out of ten consecutive positive

==============

Blockchain concept set off again on the 11th rise and fall tide, led the collective section of science and technology theme stocks, A shares of the three major stock indexes showed broad pattern, stock index

Harvest day ten with positive. At the same time, the scale of financing has been on the rise, setting a new high in two years and showing the market risk

Preferences continue to rise.

The CSRC further strengthens the introduction of talents under the new situation

==================

SFC's official website disclosed on the 11th, recently, the Commission issued a "Commission on the introduction of high-level professionals in the views of work,

Demands that the whole system should enhance the awareness of the overall situation and the spirit of cooperation. With strategic thinking, international vision and broad-mindedness, we should earnestly assume the task of bringing in talents

Job responsibilities, and truly talent "to attract into, stay, use well."

Securities Times

Li Keqiang: GDP last year is expected to grow by about 6.9%

===================

State Council Premier Li Keqiang attended the second summit of the Lancang-Mekong cooperation at the Peace Building in Phnom Penh on the afternoon of January 10 local time

People meeting. Li Keqiang and Cambodian Prime Minister Hun Sen co-chaired the meeting. Li Keqiang said that Lanmei cooperation is the first of six countries by the basin common

The new sub-regional cooperation mechanism was set up as an important platform for jointly building the Belt and Road Initiative.

The world's largest second-generation 400,000-ton super-large ore ship named delivery

======================

On January 11, the world's largest second-generation 400,000-ton super-large ore ship "Yuanhehai" was successfully named for delivery. The boat is a single paddle

Low-speed diesel-powered unlimited area of ​​the ore ship, the captain of 362 meters, 65 meters wide, 30.4 meters deep, with economic,

Green, eco-friendly, energy-saving and safe. It is a world-leading marine product that meets the latest strength standards. Compared with the

A large generation of large-scale ore ship a substantial increase in overall performance, unit nautical miles of fuel consumption decreased by 30%.

A higher level of market-oriented enterprises can stay in the country

================

Recently, CSRC Chairman Assistant Zhang Shenfeng in Beijing Zhongguancun Science Park survey pointed out that enterprises should stay good at home, so that good enterprises

Industry as soon as possible. In the meantime, according to media reports, the hottest technology company millet will be listed overseas this year. How effective and effective

To keep a good business in China, has aroused people's thinking. (Kl)

Title: 《神州头条》内地财经报章头版摘要：地方国企改革加速成今年重点

Content:
大行派定心丸，舜宇有力回升/ 林瑞芬

  

腾讯控股（00700）虽回软，但滙丰控股（00005）股价向上、补位，蓝筹轮流发力，港股暂时只是稍缓涨势！

  

滙丰昨升2.4%，收报84.05元。月内为投资者积极部署，大涨小回之势或至2月才止！恒指昨收31120，升46点或0.15%，大市成交额1,288亿元。国指收报12295，升6点或0.05%。后市技术大趋势上，恒指守30000保反覆探高升势，国指守12000保反覆探高升势，大时代，强势蓝筹股股价难估顶，可依此作止蚀/止赚策略。

  

每段时期大市就会出现疯狂急升后大插水或股灾的实况，是否会在今年出现，机会不抹杀。论年初至今升浪，入市资金固之然有中资钱。他们的扫货策略，就不是一味死捧着去年累计升幅不小的内险或汽车股。转战实务股为主如内房、内银股，相关估值大多暂不偏离历史高估值水平，内银股更多是单位预估PE估值，有能力在股价推上后呈一浪高于一浪，每遇下跌就有机会回升。

  

长年落后的中国移动（00941），都未有被资金大手追捧，所以，恒指目前虽然距离2007年历史高位近32000只有1,000点，现况大势就未算大疯狂。个别股份仍活跃，光大国际（00257）昨抽升5.4%至11.68元，以近排开车股份通常都有两、三日升势来推算，光国冲试13元不为难。

  

未来窒碍环球股市牛势的可能风险，还是在息率的预期变化、通胀的预期变化。且看周三晚美股的回吐，就是因为市传中国政府可能减少买美债，致令债券价格下跌，10年期国债孳息曾升至10个月高位，息股相关。

  

回说港股，腾讯股价昨终回2.5%，收报429.4元。股价有所急回，暂时都只属于短期超买作回吐之现象，未终断中期强势。花旗发表最新研究报告指，据App
Annie于1月9日最新的iOS排名中，腾讯的《QQ飞车》已超越《王者荣耀》于内地游戏中排行第一，而该游戏自去年12月27日推出首日，已排行第四，第二日已升至第二位。看来，手机游戏的收入仍是腾讯增长来源之一势头仍巩固。保历加通道中轴现近412元，可为腾讯短期后市支持关键参考，如无意外，回吐应可守。

  

早前弱势的舜宇光学（02382）就有回升之兆，昨收报112.3元，升9%。公司最新公布去年12月手机镜头出货量，按年回升6%，但按月跌7%。其实，市场意见分歧，有指付运量令人失望，如瑞信、摩根士丹利就指符预期。

  

不过，摩根大通及中金公司就认为略胜于市场预期。见舜宇昨日反弹之强势，实际买盘似乎偏向认同付运量略胜于预期。摩根大通指出，舜宇股价在过去一个月跑输恒指，因市场担心内地手机库存问题。

  

���国家工信部数据，去年12月中国智能手机市场下滑33%，超过去年11月的22%跌幅，OPPO和Vivo等主要智能手机品牌在调整库存之故。不过，以舜宇所公布12月付运量显示，情况就未如预期般弱，启示公司具备多样化的客户群和领先的产品组合优势或是主因。摩根大通就看好，未来舜宇盈利仍有机会超越市场预期，给予目标价160元，重申「增持」评级。

  

整体而言，中金预计舜宇2017至2019年度，镜头业务有望取得64%的复合年均增长率；加上，舜宇产品车载镜头有望重拾高增速，今年出货量的增速主要由监管要求和主要厂商的2级ADAS系统应用率，2017至2019年相关业务有望维持52%的复式年均增长率。舜宇中期目标价153元。

  

目前来讲，舜宇有势回升，配合附图示，守稳200天綫95元，收复109元失地回试50天綫阻力近120元。不过，笔者上月引述瑞信证券指，按以往惯例，下半年手机设计在2、3月应有决定，这对手机元件供应商的关键时间窗口，到时，市场将可大约估算今年的定单情况。

  

由此推断，舜宇之中期回升趋势或在2、3月明朗化。到时才能较明确辨定股价已捱过下试200天綫的压力，筑底回升，重拾升势，尝试再冲150元高位阻力。（完）

注：以上的评论仅为摘要，并且不代表路透立场。
