Content_EN:
Dahon sent a dauntless, Sunny Optical Technology (Group) Company Limited rebounded / Lin Ruifen

  

 Tencent Holdings Limited (00700) Although the weakness, but HSBC Holdings (00005) share price up, make up, blue-chip force, the Hong Kong stock temporarily only a slight gain!

  

HSBC rose 2.4% yesterday to close at 84.05 yuan. Month for the active deployment of investors, rose small back trend or until February only! The Hang Seng Index closed at 31120 points, up 46 points or 0.15%. Its turnover was 128.8 billion yuan. The H-Share Index closed at 12295, up 6 points or 0.05%. Hang Seng Index to keep rising trend of 30000, the national guide 12000 Paul explored the ups and downs, in the big times, the strong blue-chip stocks are difficult to top, according to this stop-loss / stop strategy.

  

Each period of the market there will be crazy after the sudden plunge or stock market crash, whether this year will appear, the opportunity not to erase. On the rise so far this year, the capital into the market, of course, there are Chinese capital. Their strategy of sweeping goods is not blindly holding the domestic insurance or auto stocks that accumulated a large increase last year. Fought in the substantive stocks mainly within the room, the silver stocks, most of the relevant valuations temporarily deviate from the historical high valuation level, the silver stocks more units are estimated PE valuation, the ability to push up after the stock price was higher than Waves, there is a chance to pick up every fall.

  

The long-behind China Mobile Limited (00941) has not been sought-after by big money players. Therefore, although the Hang Seng Index currently stands at 1,000 points from its record high of around 32,000 in 2007, the current situation is far from over-crazy. Individual shares are still active, CHINA EVERBRIGHT INTERNATIONAL LIMITED (00257) yesterday rose 5.4% to 11.68 yuan to nearly drive shares usually have two or three days rise to projections, Guangguo test 13 yuan is not difficult.

  

The possible risk of hindering the bull market in the global stock market in the future is the expected change in the interest rate and the expected change in inflation. And looking at Wednesday's US stock retreat, it is because the market said the Chinese government may reduce the purchase of US debt, causing the bond prices to fall. The yield on the 10-year government bond rose to a 10-month high.

  

Back to Hong Kong stocks, Tencent Holdings Limited shares back to 2.5% yesterday, to close at 429.4 yuan. The stock price has quick response, for the time being only belong to the phenomenon of short-term overbought take-back, not the end of mid-term strong. Citi released the latest research report, according to App
Annie In the latest iOS rankings on January 9, Tencent Holdings Limited's "QQ Speed" has surpassed "King of Glory" in the rankings of the mainland games, and the game since the first day of December 27 last year, has been ranked Fourth, the second day has risen to second place. It appears that the momentum of mobile games remains a source of growth for Tencent Holdings Limited. Bollinger axis nearly 412 yuan, may be Tencent Holdings Limited short-term market outlook support key reference, if not accidental, take should be defensive.

  

Previously weakened Sunny Optical Technology (Group) Company Limited Optical (02382) has a recovery of trillion, yesterday reported 112.3 yuan, up 9%. The company announced the latest shipment of handset lenses in December last year, up 6% yoy but down 7% mom. In fact, there are differences of opinion in the market. There are disappointments in handling the traffic volume. For instance, Credit Suisse and Morgan Stanley expect the indicator to be satisfactory.

  

However, Morgan Shenzhen Capstone Industrial Co.,Ltd. and China International Capital Corporation Limited that the company slightly better than market expectations. See Sunny Optical Technology (Group) Company Limited strong rebound yesterday, the actual buying seems to favor shipping slightly better than expected. Pointed out that the shares of Sunny Optical Technology (Group) Company Limited underperformed the HSI in the past month as the market worried about inventory of mobile handsets in the Mainland.

  

     Ministry of Industry and Information Technology, December last year, China's smart phone market fell 33% over last year's 22% decline in November, and other major smartphone brands such as OPPO and Vivo in the stock adjustment. However, the December shipment delivered by Sunny Optical Technology (Group) Company Limited showed that the situation was not as weak as expected, suggesting that the company has a diversified customer base and a leading product portfolio strength or predominance. Morgan Stanley Shenzhen Capstone Industrial Co.,Ltd. is optimistic about the future of Sunny Optical Technology (Group) Company Limited earnings are still more than market expectations, given a target price of 160 yuan, reiterated the "overweight" rating.

  

Overall, China International Capital Corporation Limited expects Sunny Optical Technology (Group) Company Limited to have a CAGR of 64% from 2017 to 2019. In addition, Sunny Optical Technology (Group) Company Limited products automotive lenses Is expected to regain the high growth rate this year, shipments growth mainly due to regulatory requirements and major manufacturers level 2 ADAS system utilization, the relevant business is expected to maintain 52% from 2017 to 2019 compound annual growth rate. Sunny Optical Technology (Group) Company Limited interim target price of $ 153.

  

Currently, Sunny Optical Technology (Group) Company Limited rebounded modestly. In line with the figure, the Company kept the steady 200 antenna for 95 yuan and recovered the resistance for the 109-yuan land loss test for 50 antenna lines to nearly 120 yuan. However, the author quoted Credit Suisse Securities last month that, according to past practice, the second half of mobile phone design should be decided in February and March, the key time window for mobile phone component suppliers, the market will be able to estimate about this year's orders Happening.

  

As a result, the medium-term recovery trend of Sunny Optical Technology (Group) Company Limited may be clarified in February and March. To be more clearly when the stock price has been tested under the pressure of 200 under test, the bottom pick up, regain the rally, try to red 150 high resistance. (Finish)

Title: 港报财经评论：大行派定心丸，舜宇有力回升--经济日报1月12日

Content:
轮流强势，接力短炒/ 陆文

  

港股寻顶未休，恒指连升第13个交易天，创出最长升浪纪录，短期市况似乎未宜看淡，大市未见板块个股寻顶轮动，反而是个股不断呈现震仓性反覆调整格局，令月内维持以慢牛格局爬升，恒指昨收报31120点，再升46点（0.15%），国指收报12295点，涨6点（0.05%），两指数均以接近全日高位收市，大市全日成交金额维持在1288亿元的活跃水平。在现水平赢钱非易事，除非是善于短线炒作灵活走位的专业投机者。

  

滙控（00005）承着23亿元北水「狂扫」的余威，昨日再有进账，股价高见84.3元，收报84.05，升2.38%，交投维持活跃，渣打（02888）与中银香港（02388）升幅更达2.97%及2.51%。据花旗报告指出，本港银行业在全球已发展市场中最具盈利能力，受贷款增长强劲及净息差扩阔带动，滙控首季有望公布提高派息率，以及在低融资成本下扩展业务，不排除在85元水平巩固后进入炒业绩期。

  

市场热钱轮动，近期部分强势股出现调整，由另一批股份接力。近日被唱好的腾讯（00700），其《QQ飞车》IOS下载量超越《王者荣耀》，同时预期过往所作的投资项目陆续分拆上市，包括有份投资的游戏直播平台斗鱼等，股价却全日逆市低收2.5%，报429.4元；舜宇光学（02382）经历早前的调整后，日前公布去年12月手机镜头出货量按年增长6.5%，按月跌6.9%，中银国际仍维持强力买进评级，目标价188元不变，该股昨收报112.3元，上扬9%；同类股份瑞声科技（02018）亦录得4.4%升幅，收报148.7元，反映目前市场资金充裕，轮流接力短炒调整趋势不变，权重股成为慢牛寻顶的主要棋子，周五出现假期前获利回吐机会不低。

  

水泥板块近半年获持续追捧攀升，受惠去产能及配合环保政策，走势急升后亦难逃回吐，早前因市场憧憬企业业绩理想被抢高，然而有消息指长三角沿江熟料价格下调每吨最多170元人民币，反映寒冷天气下需求放缓。花旗报告称，数据显示，南京水泥目前价格每吨下降30元至50元人民币，华东地区熟料价格亦从每吨约500元人民币，下调了120元人民币，但花旗对中资水泥股前景维持正面，随着寒冷天气持续，而下月农历新年等传统行业淡季将至，不排除进入调整期。

  

德银则认为，相关板块升势，主要由于环保政策及新供应减少所致，维持高定价是生产商增加收入的唯一途径，水泥价格今年将保持高位，加上排放税项目，看好龙头股海螺水泥（00914），给予买入评级及46元目标价。水泥股昨天全线回落，海螺水泥跌5.7%、海螺创业（00586）挫6.4%、华润水泥（01313）下滑近6%、中国建材（03323）低收7.8%、金隅（02009）挫近3.3%。要留意全球气候变化对经济活动带来不确定性，周期性行业如商品矿务类股份，出现短暂性起伏机会大。

  

近期连番有炒作的内房与汽车板块，高位受压出现回吐，早前内房炒作个别省市适度放宽楼市调控措施，创新高的碧桂园（02007）呈回吐格局，板块荣辱互见，市场或觊觎新楼盘销情，态度维持乐观，其他如富力地产（02777）昨跌4.57%、融创中国（01918）挫4.66%、恒大（03333）下滑1.19%，龙光地产（03380）、新城发展（01030）及中国海外（00688）造好。

  

至于汽车板块，据中汽协公布，2017年内地乘用车销量2471.83万辆，按年增长1.4%，较2016年的14.93%增幅放缓，12月份更出现按年下跌0.71%，表现均逊预期，令早前发盈喜预期净利倍升的吉汽（00175）昨挫1.5%、华晨中国（01114）跌1.78%、广汽（02238）低收2.15%，但东风（00489）与北汽（01958）表现企稳。正通汽车（01728）停牌，涉及以每股7.6至8元配股集资最多约16亿元，作发展汽车融资业务。大市创新高及个别企业有融资需要，不排除今年配股集资活动将在一批强势板块中出现。（完）

  

注：以上的评论仅为摘要，并且不代表路透立场。

Take turns strong, relay short / Lu Wen

  

HSI climbed the thirteenth trading day, reaching the longest record-breaking record. The short-term market conditions seem to be unfavorable. In the market, no plate stocks peaked but instead the stocks continued to show a negative impact The Hang Seng Index closed at 31120 points and rose 46 points (0.15%) again. The H-Share Index closed at 12295 points, up 6 points (0.05%), with the two indices approaching the full-day High closing, the market turnover of the day to maintain the active level of 128.8 billion yuan. In the current level to win money is not easy, unless it is good at short-term speculation flexible go professional speculators.

  

HSBC Holdings (00005), with its 2.3 billion yuan of "Swept Up" at North Water, made further gains yesterday. The stock price hit 84.3 yuan to close at 84.05, up 2.38%. Trading remained active. Standard Chartered (02888) and Ningxia Zhongyin Cashmere Co .,Ltd. Hong Kong (02388) rose even more by 2.97% and 2.51%. According to Citi's report, the banking sector in Hong Kong is the most profitable in the developed markets in the world. Driven by strong loan growth and widening net interest margin, HSBC is expected to announce the increase in dividend payout ratio in the first quarter and the expansion of business with low financing costs , Do not rule out the level of 85 yuan to consolidate into the speculation performance.

  

Market hot money rotation, some recent strong stocks appear to be adjusted, by another batch of shares relay. Recently, it was sung by Tencent Holdings Limited (00700) and its "QQ Speed" IOS downloads surpassed the "King of Glory". At the same time, it is expected that the investment projects made in the past will be spun off one after another, including the invested online game platform Betta, (02382) After experiencing an earlier adjustment, it recently announced that its handset lens shipments increased 6.5% yoy in December last year, according to a press release of Down 6.9%, Ningxia Zhongyin Cashmere Co.,Ltd. International still maintain strong buy rating, the target price of 188 yuan unchanged, the stock closed at 112.3 yuan yesterday, up 9%; similar shares AAC TECHNOLOGIES HOLDINGS INC. Technology (02018) It also recorded an increase of 4.4% to HK $ 148.7. This reflects that the current market is well-resourced and the short-term rotation of relay turns is the same. The heavyweight is the main pawn of a slow-moving bullish top. On Fridays, there is a low chance of taking profit before taking a holiday.

  

Cement blocks continued to be sought after in the past six months to climb, benefit from capacity and with environmental protection policies, the trend also escaped after the ebb, due to the market looking forward to corporate performance was robbed, however, there is news that clinker prices along the Yangtze River Delta Downgrade up to 170 yuan per tonne, reflecting the slowdown in cold weather demand. Citigroup reported that the data show that the current price of Nanjing Cement dropped 30 yuan per ton to 50 yuan, the price of clinker in East China also from about 500 yuan per ton, down 120 yuan, but Citigroup cement the prospect of Chinese stocks to maintain Positive, with the cold weather continued, while the traditional Chinese lunar new year next month and other off-season approaching, do not rule out the adjustment period.

  

Deutsche Bank believes that the relevant sector rally, mainly due to the reduction of environmental protection policies and new supplies, to maintain high pricing is the only way for producers to increase revenue, cement prices will remain high this year, together with the emission tax items, optimistic about the leading unit Anhui Conch Cement Company Limited (00914), giving a Buy rating and a target price of HK $ 46. Cement stocks fell across the board yesterday, with Anhui Conch Cement Company Limited down 5.7%, Anhui Conch Cement Company Limited (00586) down 6.4%, CHINA RESOURCES CEMENT HOLDINGS LIMITED (01313) down 6%, China National Building Material Company Limited (03323) Lower yield of 7.8%, BBMG (02009) fell nearly 3.3%. Should pay attention to the impact of global climate change on economic activity is uncertain, cyclical industries such as commodities and mining shares, there is a great opportunity for short-term ups and downs.

  

Recently repeated speculation in the interior and automotive sector, the high pressure appeared to take the vomit, earlier speculation in individual housing market to moderate modest relaxation of individual provinces and cities control measures, record high COUNTRY GARDEN HOLDINGS COMPANY LIMITED (02007) , While the market or 觊 觎 new properties sales remained bullish. Others such as Guangzhou R & F Properties Co.,Ltd. (02777) lost 4.57%, SUNAC CHINA HOLDINGS LIMITED (01918) shed 4.66% and CHINA EVERGRANDE GROUP (03333) slipped 1.19% %, LOGAN PROPERTY HOLDINGS COMPANY LIMITED (03380), Metro Development (01030) and China Overseas (00688).

  

As for the auto sector, according to the Automobile Association (CIA), the sales volume of passenger cars in the Mainland in 2017 was 24.7183 million units, an increase of 1.4% over the 14.93% growth in 2016, and a deceleration of 0.71% It is expected that Ji & Co (00175), which previously raised its earnings expectation, will have lost 1.5% yesterday, while Brilliance China (01114) shed 1.78% and GAC (02238) closed 2.15% lower but Dongfeng (00489) and Beiqi Performance stabilized. China ZhengTong Auto Services Holdings Limited (01728) suspension of trading, involving a share placement of 7.6-8 yuan per share up to about 1.6 billion yuan for the development of automotive financing business. Market highs and individual companies have financing needs, do not rule out this year rights placement activities will be in a number of strong plate appear. (Finish)

Title: 港报财经评论：轮流强势，接力短炒--信报1月12日

Content:

below:http://pdf.reuters.com/htmlnews/htmlnews.asp...

  

再次联手法国力克，雅戈尔打造中国服装“智造”典范力克Vector®裁床优化裁剪效率和质量，助力雅戈尔智造升级  
PR Newswire

  

上海, 2018年1月11日电

  

上海2018年1月11日电 /美通社/ --  
力克公司，专注于为软性材料（纺织品、皮革、工业面料以及复合材料）行业提供整合技术解决方案的行业领导者，目前向中国服装业的龙头企业
--雅戈尔服装控股集团公司提供了五台先进的数字化自动裁剪设备，帮助雅戈尔实现裁剪技术升级，打造中国服装智造典范。

  

“创立国际品牌”是雅戈尔的发展目标，自1979年创建以来，迄今已经形成了以品牌服装经营为龙头的纺织服装垂直产业链，拥有衬衫、西服、西裤、茄克、领带和T恤六个中国名牌产品，雅戈尔也成为中国最受欢迎的男装品牌之一。从上世纪90年代开始，雅戈尔就已经逐步引入智能化设备。公司先后从德美日等国家引进世界领先的现代化生产线和高端设备，累计投资五亿元，其中包括法国力克公司的
CAD 设计制版系统和 CAM自动裁床。  
力克公司目前向中国服装业的龙头企业 --  
雅戈尔服装控股集团公司提供了五台先进的数字化自动裁剪设备，帮助雅戈尔实现裁剪技术升级，打造中国服装智造典范。伴随着“中国制造2025”国家战略的推进，2016年宁波成为全国首个“中国制造2025”试点示范城市，作为宁波服饰的领头羊
--雅戈尔也在智能制造之路上再次突破创新。在宁波建设衬衫、西服、时装三个精品车间，由规模化生产向精品化、定制化转型。而作为智能工厂的一部分，裁剪房也迫切需要紧跟趋势，实现设备升级。作为智能工厂数字化工程的重要实施举措，雅戈尔安装了5台力克数字化裁剪设备，包括最新一代的
VectorIQ80 和 Vector IX。

  

凭借在自动裁剪领域30年的丰富经验和持续创新，力克新一代
Vector融合了可直观控制的强大软件和结构设计独特的机体，可以提供更高质量和快速的裁剪，帮助服装制造商在提高生产率的同时降低生产成本。无论哪种生产模式：小批量、多品种或是大批量生产，Vector的卓越性能都能满足最严格的生产要求。其内置的180个传感器使之成为市面上第一个与互联网连接并使用预测维护系统的裁剪解决方案，Vector系列完美诠释了工业4.0概念。

  

“我们很早就认识到了智能制造对于���装行业意义非凡，中国服装产业正在进行新一轮转型升级，引进高性能创新解决方案是中国企业贯彻‘中国制造2025’十年战略计划的关键。雅戈尔希望紧跟智能制造最新趋势，借助领先的智能制造设备，让主业奔跑，铸百年企业。”雅戈尔西服公司总经理陈晓春表示。

  

力克大中华区总经理 Andreas Kim  
表示：“这是力克和雅戈尔继1997年合作基础上的又一个重要里程碑。力克和雅戈尔都是中国服装产业智能制造产业联盟成员，双方的合作源远流长，我们希望凭借在服装行业40余年的技术和经验，帮助雅戈尔向‘中国制造2025’目标迈进。”

  

    
    
    ###

  

关于雅戈尔

  

雅戈尔集团创建于1979年，经过36年的发展，逐步确立了以品牌服装为主业，涉足地产开发、金融投资领域，多元并进、专业化发展的经营格局，成为拥有员工5万余人的大型跨国集团公司，旗下的雅戈尔集团股份有限公司为上市公司。雅戈尔在全国拥有772家自营专卖店，各品牌商业网点2632家。

  

2016年8月，雅戈尔集团在“2016中国企业500强”中排名第219位。

  

关于力克

  

力克是软性材料整合技术解决方案的全球领导者，为使用纺织品、皮革、工业面料以及复合材料的制造行业提供专业的软件、自动裁剪设备和专业服务。力克服务于众多全球市场，涵盖时尚服装业、汽车、家具以及其它多个行业。力克的解决方案为每个市场量身定制，帮助客户实现产品设计、开发和制造的自动化及运营优化。力克拥有1,600名员工，已与来自全球100多个国家的知名客户建立伙伴关系，致力于帮助客户实现卓越运营。2016年力克的营业收入为2.88亿美元；公司的股票在泛欧证交所上市交易。

  

欲了解更多信息，请关注力克公司官方微信：Lectra力克，或访问网站www.lectra.cn

  

(®)Vector 属于力克的注册商标。

Partnering again with Lorry, Youngor Group Co.,Ltd. to create Hubei Xinyangfeng Fertilizer Co.,Ltd. "Lizhichen" Lectra Vector® cutting table Optimized cutting efficiency and quality, helping Youngor Group Co.,Ltd. to upgrade
PR Newswire

  

Shanghai, January 11, 2018

  

SHANGHAI, January 11, 2018 / PR Newswire /
Lectra, an industry leader focused on solutions for the integration of soft materials (textiles, leather, industrial fabrics and composites), currently leads a leading company in Hubei Xinyangfeng Fertilizer Co.,Ltd.
- Youngor Group Co.,Ltd. Garment Holdings Corporation provides five advanced digital automatic cutting equipment to help Youngor Group Co.,Ltd. achieve cutting technology upgrades and build a model for Hubei Xinyangfeng Fertilizer Co.,Ltd.

  

Since its founding in 1979, Youngor Group Co.,Ltd. has established a vertical chain of textile and apparel businesses led by the brand apparel business. It owns shirts, suits, trousers, jackets, Tie and T-shirt six Chinese brand names, Youngor Group Co.,Ltd. has also become one of China's most popular men's brand. Since the 90s of the last century, Youngor Group Co.,Ltd. has gradually introduced intelligent equipment. The company successively imported the world's leading modernized production lines and high-end equipment from Germany, the United States and Japan, and other countries. It has invested a total of 500 million yuan, including Lectra
CAD design plate system and CAM automatic cutting bed.
Lectra currently to Hubei Xinyangfeng Fertilizer Co.,Ltd.'s leading enterprises -
 Youngor Group Co.,Ltd. Garment Holdings Corporation provides five advanced digital automatic cutting equipment to help Youngor Group Co.,Ltd. to achieve cutting-edge technology upgrades, to create Hubei Xinyangfeng Fertilizer Co.,Ltd. wisdom make a model. With the advancing of "Made in China 2025" national strategy, Ningbo became the first pilot city of "Made in China 2025" pilot project in 2016, as a leader in Ningbo apparel
- Youngor Group Co.,Ltd. is again innovating on the road to smart manufacturing. In Ningbo to build shirts, suits, fashion boutique three workshops, from the scale of production to fine, customized transformation. As part of the smart factory, cutting room also urgently need to keep up with the trend, to achieve equipment upgrades. Youngor Group Co.,Ltd. installed five Lectra digital cutting devices as an important implementation of the smart factory digital engineering project, including the latest generation
VectorIQ80 and Vector IX.

  

With more than 30 years of experience in automated cutting and continuous innovation, Lectra is the next generation
Vector combines intuitive software with powerful software and a structurally unique body that delivers higher quality and faster cropping to help apparel manufacturers reduce productivity while increasing productivity. No matter what kind of production mode: small quantities, multiple varieties or high-volume production, Vector's superior performance to meet the most stringent production requirements. Its built-in 180 sensors make it the first cutting-edge solution in the market to be connected to the Internet and using a predictive maintenance system. The Vector Series is a perfect example of the Industry 4.0 concept.

  

"We have long recognized that intelligent manufacturing is of extraordinary significance to the outfitting industry. The industry is undergoing a new round of transformation and upgrading. The introduction of innovative solutions of high performance is that Chinese enterprises implement the 'Made in China 2025' Youngor Group Co.,Ltd. wants to keep up with the latest trend of smart manufacturing and make the main business run with a leading intelligent manufacturing equipment to create a century-old enterprise. "Youngor Group Co.,Ltd. General Manager of Suit Company Chen Xiaochun said.

  

Andreas Kim, General Manager, Lectra Greater China
Said: "This is another important milestone in the cooperation between Lectra and Youngor Group Co.,Ltd. in 1997. Lectra and Youngor Group Co.,Ltd. are all subsidiaries of Hubei Xinyangfeng Fertilizer Co.,Ltd. Industry Intelligent Manufacturing Industry Alliance Members, the cooperation between the two parties goes back to ancient times and we hope Youngor Group Co.,Ltd. will make the goal of 'Made in China 2025' by virtue of more than 40 years of technology and experience in the apparel industry. "

  

    
    
    ###

  

About Youngor Group Co.,Ltd.

  

 Founded in 1979, Youngor Group Co.,Ltd. has gradually established itself as a brand-oriented apparel industry in the real estate development, financial investment, diversified and professional development through 36 years of development. More than 10,000 large multinational corporations, its subsidiary Youngor Group Co.,Ltd. is a listed company. Youngor Group Co.,Ltd. owns 772 self-owned specialty stores nationwide with 2,632 commercial outlets of all brands.

  

In August 2016, Youngor Group Co.,Ltd. was ranked 219 out of the Top 500 China Business Companies.

  

About Lectra

  

Lectra is a global leader in solutions technology for the integration of soft materials and provides specialized software, automatic cutting equipment and professional services for the manufacturing industries that use textiles, leather, industrial fabrics and composite materials. Lectra serves a large number of global markets covering the fashion apparel industry, automotive, furniture and many other industries. Lectra's solutions are tailored to each market and help customers automate and optimize their product design, development and manufacturing. With 1,600 employees, Lectra has partnered with well-known customers from more than 100 countries around the world to help clients achieve operational excellence. Lectra earned revenues of $ 288 million in 2016; shares of the company are traded on the Euronext.

  

For more information, follow Lectra's official Wechat: Lectra Lectra, or visit www.lectra.cn

  

(®) Vector is a registered trademark of Lectra.

Title: 再次联手法国力克，雅戈���打造中国服装“智造”典范

Content:
东兴证券陈凤珠：推荐三生制药及中国旺旺

三生制药（０１５３０）：三生制药为内地的生物制药企业，旗下三大核心产品特比澳、益

赛普及益比奥于内地的市场占有领导地位，特比澳及益赛普于去年上半年的市占率超过四成；而

集团的多只药物被纳入国家医保目录中，或可提升产品于医院的渗透，料未来销售或有机会增加

。另外，集团的糖尿病新药百达扬已获国家食品药品监督管理总局批准，而集团将继续研发新药

并向国家药品总局递交新药申请，预期发展潜力庞大。除此之外，三生去年公布收购加拿大生物

制药公司Ｔｈｅｒａｐｕｒｅ的ＣＤＭＯ业务，以进入北美市场，料收购将于今年完成，而集团

亦于内地展开ＣＤＭＯ业务，预期将可产生协同效应。目标价１７．８０元，买入价１６．５０

元，止蚀价１５．９０元。（建议时股价：＄１６．６２）

中国旺旺（００１５１）：内地消费品零售总额稳定增长，加上消费升级，内需股普遍受支

持，其中中国旺旺截至去年９月底的首三季纯利按年下跌１３．８％至２０．２亿元人民币，而

收入则同比下滑１．１％至１３５．９亿元人民币，惟６月至９月的收入按年上升５．１％，核

心产品于第二季及第三季持续录得正增长，预期业绩将会逐步改善。虽然成本如包装、白糖及奶

粉等价格上涨，但集团预期未来销售将可录得中至高单位数增长，且新产品及产品组合优化将可

推动销售及毛利率改善。另外，集团手持现金达１０４亿元人民币，财政稳健，同时亦进行回购

及派息，预期春节前旺旺的产品需求将会增加，料股价或会受支持。目标价７．００元，买入价

６．４０元，止蚀价６．１０元。（建议时股价：＄６．５０）《东兴证券（香港）研究部总监

陈凤珠》（作者本人并没有持有上述股票）

永隆赵卓峰：推荐比亚迪股份及枫叶教育

比亚迪股份（０１２１１）：２０１７年９月份工信部开始研究何时停止生产销售传统能源

汽车及印发《乘用车企业平均燃料消耗量与新能源汽车积分并行管理办法》，加上新能源汽车免

徵收１０％的「车辆购置税」获续期三年至２０２０年年底，这些措施将有助推动内地汽车产业

发展。据中国汽车工业协会统计资料显示，去年首１１个月，内地新能源车销量达６０．９万辆

，同比增长５１．４％，今年的销量增速可望保持４０％至５０％。在逐渐淘汰化石燃料车辆的

政策下，新能源汽车发展空间巨大，身为内地电动车市场的车企龙头，集团最能受惠。集团将于

２０１８年推出多款新型号电动车，补贴后的售价非常有竞争力。除汽车业务外，「云轨」（架

空单轨铁路）作为集团的战略性产品，在有效解决城市交通拥堵难题时，也为集团的长期成长开

辟了一项新领域。在技术走势上，股价于去年最高升至＄８３．７０，经过两个月多的调整后，

于１００天线受到支持，有望重拾升势。故建议于５０天线约＄６９买入，目标价为＄８０，止

蚀价＄６１。（本周二建议时股价：＄７０．１）

枫叶教育（０１３１７）：截至去年８月底止年度，集团营业额上升３０．５％至人民币

１０．８亿元，股东应占溢利增长３３．５％至人民币４．１亿元。主要由于学费的收益增加及

注册入学人数上升带动利润率提升所致。集团拥有逾２２年经验，通过结合中西方教育理念的精

华，致力于内地及加拿大提供学前教育至第十二级（「Ｋ－１２」）的优质双语教育服务。集团

近年不断开设及透过收购提高学校及学生数目，于上月公布以现金代价人民币８９０４．５万元

向独立第三方收购伊思顿国际教育５５％股权。后者拥有可容纳１５００名学生，并配备现代先

进设施的深圳市伊思顿龙岗书院１００％股权。于完成收购事项后，集团将承担该校的营运，将

为集团于内地一线城市及经济最发达地区之一的省份建立战略据点及打造品牌知名度，强大的学

校网络将提升集团的盈利能力，并巩固其于内地教育行业的地位。教育行业较少受经济周期影响

，故预期集团收购活动将会持续。在技术走势上，股价于��日创新高，故建议待回调至约

＄９．５买入，目标价约＄１０．５，止蚀价＄８．６。（本周二建议时股价：＄１０．３）

《永隆银行证券分析师 赵卓峰》（本人并没持有上述股份）

Title: 《胜算在握》东兴证券陈凤珠：推荐三生制药及中国旺旺

Content:
資料提供:

分析重點：

1\. 民航局及發改委剛下達新政，推進民航國內綫市場化改革，熱門航綫有望加價，改善民航公司盈利能力。

2\. 民航版「供給側改革」持續發酵，新航季供需改善。航空股板塊指數自2017年12月至今已累升17.3%，市場反應正面。

3\. 綜合大行觀點，新政下南航（01055）盈利助力更大。

\---------------------------------

三大航空股南航、國航（00753）、東航（00670），自上月起全綫強勢起飛，打破過去2年的橫行格局，帶領航空股板塊指數同期上升17.3%。久旱逢甘露，皆因國策接連出擊，改善民航市場營運生態。

最近國策利好，莫過於今年1月5日，民航局及國家發改委印發《關於進一步推進民航國內航空旅客運輸價格改革有關問題的通知》，進一步推進民航市場化改革。內地航空業的票價市場化，其實早於2004年已開始推進（詳見下文「MT政策追蹤
--民航市場化 財來有大門」），惟今次在兩方面的放寬力度均見加強，且超過市場預期。

航綫加價 迎消費升級

一是新增「市場調節價」（即由政府指導價改為市場定價）航綫數量。今次新增306條市場調節價航綫，令總數增至1,030條。同時，今次出現多條熱門航綫，特別是北京、上海、廣州、深圳，四大一綫城市的五條互飛航綫全數放開。

由於這四大一綫城市人均消費力強，而且商務客佔比重，加價空間龐大。以例子說話，北京往上海的經濟艙票價最高限在1,240元（人民幣‧下同），但飛去旁邊的杭州，最貴票價已達2,200元。在人均可支配收入增加、消費升級大環境下，國人出行更願意搭飛機，令民航客運量近年維持高速增長，並為價格市場化提供合適空間。

二是加價幅度：每條航綫每航季（即半年）最多加10%。另外，由過往每間公司最多10條航綫加價，增為可加價航綫的15%。華創證券計算出，三大航空公司中以南航本次可加價航綫數最多，詳見表一。

民航供給側 立竿見影

加價迎質變，航班調整為市場帶來量變。民航局2017年9月發布《關於把控運行總量調整航班結構提升航班正點率的若干政策措施》，並從2017年冬春航季（去年10月底起），調整航班結構並控制航綫運行總量，被視為民航版「供給側改革」。

新例實行後，三大航空公司去年11月的營運數據立竿見影。南航、國航、東航該月客座率分別達82.3%、81.4%及80.4%，同比增加3、1.8及1.3個百分點。營運指標則顯示，在屬於淡季的11月，機位已供不應求，並為即將展開的2月春節客運高峰奠下加價基礎。

在航班縮減的大方向下，華創證券指出，大型航空公司在航距拉長下，優勢將明顯高於其他航企，更能提升飛機的使用效���。如此一來便造就出供給側改革的一貫場景：市場逐漸向行業龍頭集中，強者愈強。

南航盈利助力較大

摩根士丹利上周四調升三大航空股評級，再推動一波升勢。該行認為，國內航綫於2018年至2020年的票價定價水平有上升空間，將可推動中資航空股盈利上升。當中，對南航最為進取，評級由「減持」升至「增持」，目標價由4.65元升至10.8元，更大升公司2018年及2019年純利預測79%及235.7%

另外，最新的市場化改革集中於國內航綫，對南航利好尤甚（另外兩家分析可見另文「MT板塊攻略--炒航空股
油價滙價也要識」）。華創及興業證券分別推算，加價一次對三大航空股的影響，一致認為對南航提升純利助力最大，反映票價上升空間開放後，將大大提振航企盈利。高盛則估計，國內航綫每加價1%，南航2018年每股盈利可增加12%，優於國航、東航的7%及9%。

彭博綜合市場預測，南航2018年每股盈利增長19.4%，對應PE為11.9倍。瑞信、中銀國際分別給予目標價9.8及9.7元。

  

Copyright (c) 2018 Hong Kong Economic Times Limited
Content_EN:
Information provided:

Analysis focus:

1 \ Civil Aviation Authority and Development and Reform Commission just issued a new deal to promote civil aviation domestic market-oriented reform, the hot airlines are expected to increase fares to improve the profitability of civil aviation companies.

2 \. Civil Aviation version of "supply-side reform" continued to ferment, SIA season supply and demand improved. The aviation sector sector index has soared 17.3% so far in December 2017 and the market is positive.

3 \. Integrated Bank of China point of view, under the New Deal China Southern Airlines Company Limited (01055) more profitable.

\ ---------------------------------

China Southern Airlines Company Limited (00753) and China Eastern Airlines (00670), the top three airliners, took off vigorously from the beginning of last month, breaking the horizontal pattern of the past two years and leading the aviation sector sector index by 17.3% over the same period. A long drought every nectar, are due to national policy one after another to improve the operation of civil aviation market ecology.

Recent national policy is good, than January 5 this year, the Civil Aviation Authority and the National Development and Reform Commission issued "on the further promotion of civil aviation domestic air passenger transport price reform notice" and further promote the civil aviation market-oriented reform. In fact, the marketization of fares in the Mainland's aviation industry started earlier than 2004 (see "MT Tracking Policy" below
- Civil Aviation market to have the door to wealth "), but both efforts to ease the current efforts to strengthen, and exceeded market expectations.

Route fare upgrade welcome consumption

The first one is the addition of "market adjustment price" (that is, the price changed from the government guidance price to the market price) to the number of routes. This time, an additional 306 market adjustment routes have been added to increase the total number to 1,030. In the meantime, there are a number of hot air routes appearing this time, in particular the five inter-airline routes opened in Beijing, Shanghai, Guangzhou, Shenzhen and the four major first-tier cities.

As the per capita spending power of the four major first-tier cities, and the proportion of business customers, a huge space for price increases. As an example, the maximum economy class fare for Beijing to Shanghai is 1,240 yuan (RMB ‧ the same as below), but the most expensive fare has reached 2,200 yuan to fly to Hangzhou next to it. Under the circumstance of increasing disposable income per capita and upgrading of consumption, people traveling abroad are more willing to fly so that civil aviation passenger traffic will maintain rapid growth in recent years and provide suitable space for the marketization of prices.

Second, the rate of increase: each route season (ie half a year) up to 10%. In addition, a fare increase of up to 10 routes per company in the past will be increased to 15% of the flotilla route. China Resources Beer (Holdings) Company Limited Securities calculated that the three largest airlines China Southern Airlines Company Limited this fare increase routes, as shown in Table I.

Civil Aviation supply side immediate

Fare increase the quality of change, flight adjustment brought changes in the market. Civil Aviation Authority issued in September 2017 "on the control of the total amount of flight structure to adjust the flight punctuality of a number of policy measures", and from the winter season in 2017 (late last year), adjust the flight structure and control the total route operation Amount, is regarded as the civil aviation version of "supply-side reform."

After the implementation of the new lawsuit, the operating statistics of the three major airlines in November last year immediately. China Southern Airlines Company Limited, Air China, China Eastern Airlines this month, passenger load factor reached 82.3%, 81.4% and 80.4%, an increase of 3,1.8 and 1.3 percentage points. Operating indicators also showed that in November when the off-season was in the off-season, the supply was in short supply and laid the ground for a fare increase for the forthcoming peak of passenger traffic in February.

In the general direction of the reduction of flights, the securities of China Resources Beer (Holdings) Company Limited pointed out that advantages of large airlines will be significantly higher than those of other airlines while their airlines are lengthened, which will further enhance the efficiency of the aircraft. As a result, a consistent scenario of supply-side reform has been created: the market is gradually becoming more and more concentrated in the industry, and the stronger are the stronger.

 China Southern Airlines Company Limited profitability larger

Morgan Stanley on Thursday raised the rating of the three major aviation stocks, and then promote a wave of rally. The bank believes there is room for domestic airlines to raise ticket prices from 2018 to 2020, which will boost the profitability of Chinese-funded airline stocks. Among them, China Southern Airlines Company Limited was the most aggressive and its rating was upgraded from "Underweight" to "Overweight". Its target price increased from $ 4.65 to $ 10.8, further boosting the company's net profit forecasts for 2018 and 2019 by 79% and 235.7%

In addition, the latest marketization reform focused on domestic routes, especially for China Southern Airlines Company Limited (the other two analysts see another article, "MT Block Raiders - fried airlines
Oil prices have to know the exchange rate "). China Resources Beer (Holdings) Company Limited and INDUSTRIAL SECURITIES CO.,LTD. Respectively estimated that the impact of the fare increase on the three major aviation stocks was unanimously considered to be the largest boost to China Southern Airlines Company Limited's net profit. After the opening of the fare increase space, Airlines will greatly boost profitability. Goldman Sachs reckons that for every 1% fare increase of domestic routes, China Southern Airlines Company Limited's EPS will increase 12% in 2018, which is better than 7% and 9% of Air China and China Eastern Airlines.

Bloomberg comprehensive market forecast, China Southern Airlines Company Limited 2018 Earnings per share increased 19.4%, corresponding to PE 11.9 times. Credit Suisse and BOCI respectively gave their target price of 9.8 and 9.7 yuan.

Title: 供給側+票價升 南方航空衝上雲霄

Content:
For best results when printing this announcement, please click on link
below:http://pdf.reuters.com/htmlnews/htmlnews.asp...

  

深圳华强电子交易网络有限公司再次通过“双高”企业认证开启电子元器件+电商+数据服务新篇章PR Newswire

  

深圳, 2018年1月10日电

  

深圳2018年1月10日电 /美通社/ --  
日前，深圳华强电子交易网络有限公司继2014年获“双高”企业资质认证后，再一次通过国家高新技术企业和深圳市高新技术企业的认证。国家高新技术企业证书由深圳市科技创新委员会、深圳市财政委员会、深圳市国家税务局、深圳市地方税务局联合颁布，公司连续获此认证标志着公司凭借专业的研发队伍、雄厚的技术实力、持续的创新能力、规范的企业管理，在高新技术服务行业的成就得到国家相关部门一直以来的肯定与认可。

  

  

  

深圳华强电子交易网络有限公司是隶属于深圳华强集团深圳华强实业股份有限公司（股票代码：000062）旗下子公司，公司立足电子产业链，以第三方平台形式，有机结合电子产业链与电子商务网络，致力于为全球电子元器件采购商、供应商、贸易商、制造商提供全程电子商务服务。公司旗下华强电子网是全国电子元器件领域知名的垂直B2B网站，平台近年来活跃买家超过10万，注册用户达到170万家，网站月访问量超4000万次，遍及全球200余个国家和地区。日前，深圳华强电子交易网络有限公司继2014年获“双高”企业资质认证后，再一次通过国家高新技术企业和深圳市高新技术企业的认证。近年来随着电商大力发展，电商经营最大的难题是如何获得客户，在企业电商经营过程中，因为客户和流量有限，导致企业电商难以生存。12月20日，华强电子网的华强电子云平台云商城产品正式发布上线，该产品是以SaaS  
模式打造的商户自建电子元器件商城系统，通过网络提供软件服务的模式，提供商城软件服务，帮助企业快速搭建商城。华强电子云平台借助华强电子网的强势引流，凭借自身拥有专业的运营团队及���大的营销推广能力，在帮助企业提升品牌曝光度的同时专注研发了在线交易商城和企业全方位信息化管理系统，华强电子云平台还提供专业的库存管理系统－库管家，型号报价查询－找货帮手及市场风向标－烽火台，帮助企业实现数字化管理，一站式搜索供应商和产品信息，并通过大量的数据分析，如型号指数、价格波动、行业指数、搜索指数等，为客户带来更多的商业机会和价值。

  

在电商平台领域，创新永远是引领发展的第一动力。相信随着华强电子云商城产品的发布，将为国内电子行业企业带来更多商机，开启电子元器件+电商+数据服务新篇章。

Stream TV与京东方携手为全球市场带来高清裸眼3D产品  
PR Newswire

  

费城, 2018年1月10日电

  

费城2018年1月10日电 /美通社/ -- Stream TV Networks,
Inc.和京东方科技集团股份有限公司（简称“京东方”）欣然宣布，双方公司共同合作，将京东方的高清面板与Stream TV 屡获殊荣的祼眼 3D  
技术（@UltraD3）相结合。从手机面板到电脑监视器面板再到大屏电视面板，该项目将支持整个消费电子行业的设备开发。

  

Stream TV Networks,  
Inc.和京东方科技集团股份有限公司欣然宣布，双方公司共同合作，将京东方的高清面板与StreamTV屡获殊荣的祼眼3D技术相结合。  
Stream TV 首席执行官 Mathu Rajan 表示：“随着 8K面板的推出，4K  
电视和电脑监视器已经过时。与京东方合作使我们能够在全球市场上获得强大增长动力。”#8K#8KTV

  

Stream TV 的 Ultra-D 解决方案被广泛公认为全球最佳裸眼
3D技术，它采用先进的光学器件和强大的渲染算法，创建140度视角，让房间内的每个人都能够获得清晰明快、充满活力且可调整的3D 体验，而无需眼镜或护目镜。

  

Rajan 补充说：“在二维空间中，人眼无法辨别 4K 和
8K的区别。如果不使用第三平面，所有这些像素基本上都会浪费掉。我们利用这些额外像素，打造身临其境的沉浸式体验，为设备制造商及他们的客户带来实际价值。”

  

8K Lite 裸眼 Ultra-3D 显示器是 Stream TV与京东方合作打造的第一款产品。您可通过预约，在 Stream  
TV  
位于拉斯维加斯会展中心中央展厅的消费者电子展（@CES #CES2018）#10939展位上体验这款产品。详情请发电邮至press@Ultra-D.com。

  

    
    
    ###

  

STREAM TV NETWORKS, INC 简介

  

Stream TV 是一家总部位于费城的技术公司，其突破性 Ultra-D技术是目前唯一的裸眼 3D  
专利解决方案，既可以带来震撼的显示效果，还可以转换任何  
2D 或 3D 内容。http://www.ultra-d.com/

  

京东方简介：

  

京东方引领 TFT-LCD  
技术的创新和发展，致力于加快柔性显示、增强现实和虚拟现实等新型显示器件的进步。京东方旨在打造色彩逼真、画质清晰和视角广阔的轻薄节能型环保产品，正在不断改善手机、平板电脑、笔记本、监视器、电视和其它设备的视觉体验。http://www.boe.com/en/index/pei.html

Stream TV and BOE Technology Group Co.,Ltd. work together to bring HD naked eye 3D products to the global market
PR Newswire

  

Philadelphia, January 10, 2018

  

Philadelphia, January 10, 2018 / PRNewswire / - Stream TV Networks,
Inc. and BOE Technology Group Co.,Ltd. Technology Group Co.,Ltd. ("BOE Technology Group Co.,Ltd.") are pleased to announce that both companies will work together to bring the high-definition panel of BOE Technology Group Co.,Ltd. Stream TV's award winning eyeball 3D
Technology (@ UltraD3). From cellphone panels to PC monitor panels to big screen TV panels, the project will support device development across the consumer electronics industry.

  

Stream TV Networks,
Inc. and BOE Technology Group Co.,Ltd. Technology Group Co.,Ltd. is pleased to announce the joint efforts of both companies to combine the high-definition panel of BOE Technology Group Co.,Ltd. with StreamTV's award-winning eye-catching 3D technology.
Mathu Rajan, CEO of Stream TV, said: "With the introduction of 8K panels, 4K
TV and computer monitors are outdated. Working with BOE Technology Group Co.,Ltd. enables us to gain strong growth momentum in the global market. "# 8K # 8KTV

  

Stream TV's Ultra-D solution is widely recognized as the best naked eye in the world
3D technology that uses advanced optics and powerful rendering algorithms to create a 140-degree viewing angle that gives everyone in the room a crisp, vibrant and adaptable 3D experience without glasses or goggles.

  

Rajan added: "In two-dimensional space, the human eye can not distinguish between 4K and
8K difference. If you do not use the third plane, all these pixels are basically wasted. We use these extra pixels to create immersive, immersive experiences that bring real value to device manufacturers and their customers. "

  

8K Lite's naked-eye Ultra-3D display is the first product Stream Stream has partnered with BOE Technology Group Co.,Ltd. You can make an appointment at Stream
TV
Experience the CES2018 booth # 10939 at the Consumer Electronics Show in the Central Pavilion of the Las Vegas Convention Center. For more information, please email press@Ultra-D.com.

STREAM TV NETWORKS, INC introduction

Patented solution, can bring shocking display, you can convert any
2D or 3D content. http://www.ultra-d.com/

  

 BOE Technology Group Co.,Ltd. Introduction:

  

 BOE Technology Group Co.,Ltd. leads TFT-LCD
Technology innovation and development, committed to accelerating the flexible display, augmented reality and virtual reality and other new display device advances. BOE Technology Group Co.,Ltd. aims to create a thin, energy-efficient and environment-friendly product with vivid colors, clear images and wide viewing angles, and is continuously improving the visual experience of mobile phones, tablets, notebooks, monitors, TVs and other devices. http://www.boe.com/en/index/pei.html

Linkface人脸识别技术携手神州信息打造智慧楼宇解决方案  
PR Newswire

  

北京, 2018年1月9日电

  

北京2018年1月9日电 /美通社/ --  
近日，Linkface与神州信息达成合作，在办公楼宇门禁、考勤及访客管理等方面使用人脸识别技术，实现楼宇的智能监控和管理。近日，Linkface与神州信息达成合作，在办公楼宇门禁、考勤及访客管理等方面使用人脸识别技术，实现楼宇的智能监控和管理。神州信息，作为国内最早参与行业信息化建设的企业之一，历经三十年的发展，以其业务模式和技术产品创新引领和推动了中国信息化进程和信息服务产业的发展，支撑数字中国的使命；依托云计算、大数据、量子通信等技术，面向金融、政企、电信、农业、制造等行业提供规划咨询、应用软件设计与开发、技术服务、云服务、数据服务、量子通信服务等服务内容，助力产业升级、价值重塑，打造“IT+”产业融合新业态。

  

神州信息一直以来都非常关注怎样将新的IT技术应用于生活和工作中，以人脸识别为核心的技术解决方案相较于传统的刷卡门禁考勤和纸质化访客管理，可解决诸如易忘带、提高通行效率、促进访客管理自动化等问题，其独特的优势吸引了神州信息的关注。

  

近年来，人脸识别以其自然性、非强制性、非接触性、并发性、唯一性和不易被复制等良好特性正在被很多智慧城市和智慧楼宇所采用。通过神州信息IT团队认真的评估，Linkface的方案具有先进的人脸识别算法并且可以很灵活地部署。

  

Linkface近来一直在“修炼内功”，技术上得到持续完善。在金融领域，Linkface的人脸识别技术已广泛的服务于金融领域的多家知名企业。在不断探索人工智能在金融领域创新落地应用的同时，人脸识别核心算法也接受了安全等级要求很高的金融行业用户的考验和洗礼，得到了不断的打磨和优化。此次，神州信息与Linkface达成合作，可以看出Linkface对业务精进和踏实的追求。

  

日前，在北京市海淀区的神州信息大厦内，其时正值上班高峰期，不断有人经过门口的“人脸识别”闸机，员工和访客都能无时滞地通过闸机，这跟之前使用刷卡验证身份通行的方式相比更方便、快捷。

  

此次“Linkface智能楼��解决方案”在神州信息大厦的应用得到了很多正面的反馈。几位经过闸机的员工和访客，她们都表示刷脸闸机通过的方式很便捷，也很有意思。少了之前忘带卡不得入，早高峰争分夺秒排队刷卡考勤仍迟到，访客手工登记繁琐等不便和烦恼，在大厦上班的陈女士自从装上人脸识别闸机后感觉比较新鲜，每次都要多摆几个pose来测试下闸机；很多男员工还要拿手机拍的照片来测试人脸识别的可靠性。

  

Linkface副总裁张法吾表示：在某类信息技术有所突破的最初时期，人们往往认为该技术能近乎解决所有问题，出现唯技术论的倾向，但信息科技的发展历史证明，技术在商业需求中的应用往往更为重要。Linkface正是致力于用现已突破的机器视觉技术去解决金融、身份验证等具体商业环境中的问题，并持续发现新的问题，研发新的技术来解决，从而形成一个技术与应用相互促进的良性闭环。

  

    
    
    ###

Linkface face recognition technology together with Digital China Information Service Company Ltd. to create smart building solutions
PR Newswire

  

Beijing, January 9, 2018

  

Beijing, January 9, 2018 / PR Newswire /
Recently, Linkface has partnered with Digital China Information Service Company Ltd. to use face recognition technology in office building access control, time and attendance management, and visitor management to achieve intelligent monitoring and management of buildings. Recently, Linkface has partnered with Digital China Information Service Company Ltd. to use face recognition technology in office building access control, time and attendance management, and visitor management to achieve intelligent monitoring and management of buildings. As one of the earliest enterprises involved in the informatization construction of the industry in China, Digital China Information Service Company Ltd. led and promoted the development of China's informatization process and information service industry with its business model and technological product innovation after 30 years of development , Supporting the mission of Digital China; relying on technologies such as cloud computing, big data and quantum communication, providing planning and consulting, application software design and development, technical services, cloud services and data services to finance, government, enterprises, telecommunications, agriculture and manufacturing industries , Quantum communication services and other services to help upgrade the industry, reshape the value and create a new industry convergence format of "IT LIMITED +".

  

 Digital China Information Service Company Ltd. has always been very concerned about how to apply the new IT LIMITED technology to life and work. Face recognition as the core technology solutions compared to the traditional credit card access control attendance and paperless visitor management , Which can solve problems such as forgetfulness belt, improve traffic efficiency and promote visitor management automation. Its unique advantages have attracted the attention of Digital China Information Service Company Ltd.

  

In recent years, face recognition has been adopted by many smart cities and smart buildings due to its good features such as naturalness, non-compulsion, non-contact, concurrency, uniqueness and difficulty of being copied. With careful assessment by the I.T LIMITED team at Digital China Information Service Company Ltd.,Linkface's solutions have advanced face recognition algorithms and are flexible enough to deploy.

  

Linkface has been "practicing internal strength" recently and has been continuously improved in technology. In the financial field, Linkface's face recognition technology has been widely used in many well-known financial companies. In the continuous exploration of artificial intelligence in the field of innovation and application of the financial field at the same time, the core algorithm of face recognition also accepted the high level of security requirements of the financial industry users test and baptism, has been constantly polished and optimized. This time, Digital China Information Service Company Ltd. and Linkface reached a cooperation, we can see that Linkface's business development and pragmatic pursuit.

  

Recently, in the Digital China Information Service Company Ltd. building in Haidian District, Beijing, it was time for rush hour. Someone passing through the door of the "Face Recognition" gate was able to pass through the gate without delay Machine, which is more convenient and faster than before using credit card verification identity.

  

The application of "Linkface Intelligent Building Solution" in Digital China Information Service Company Ltd. Building got a lot of positive feedback. Several employees and visitors who passed through the gate all said that the way of passing the brush face gates was very convenient and very interesting. Forgotten before the card is not forgotten less, the morning peak race against time Queuing credit card attendance is still late, visitors manual registration and other inconveniences and troubles, Ms. Chen working in the building since the face mounted face recognition gates feel fresh, every time Put a few more pose to test the next gate; a lot of male employees also take photos taken by the phone to test the reliability of face recognition.

  

Zhang Fa-wu, vice president of Linkface, said: In the initial period of breakthroughs in some types of information technology, people often considered the technology to solve almost all problems and appeared the tendency of technicalism. However, the history of the development of information technology proved that the technology is in commercial demand Applications are often more important. Linkface is dedicated to solving the problems in specific business environments such as finance and authentication with the now-breakthrough machine vision technology and constantly finding new problems and developing new technologies to solve them, so as to form a technology and application mutual promotion Benign closed loop.

  

    
    
    ###

Content:
中新社北京1月15日电
中共官媒《人民日报》15日在头版发表题为《紧紧抓住大有可为的历史机遇期》的文章称，习近平总书记1月5日在学习贯彻党的十九大精神研讨班开班式上发表重要讲话，鲜明指出，当前，中国正处于一个大有可为的历史机遇期。这是习近平总书记纵观过去、当下与未来的历史演进，通览国家、政党、民族的沉浮兴衰，作出的重大战略判断，是中国特色社会主义进入新时代的国家表达、民族表达，彰显着当代中国共产党人洞察历史的睿智、创造历史的担当。

文章称，历史的发展，总有一些关键的节点、关键的时期。2017年10月，历史会记下这个金秋。一个拥有8900多万党员的世界最大政党，一个在世界最大发展中国家久经考验、成熟执政的马克思主义政党——中国共产党，在世界瞩目下展开了中华民族新时代的华章。

文章称，“两个一百年”奋斗目标的历史交汇期，梦想和现实在这里转承，奋斗和拼搏在这里接续。从全面建成小康社会到基本实现现代化，再到全面建成社会主义现代化强国，党的十九大如此擘画。

文章指出，在这个时间与空间的交汇点上，没有什么能比“机遇”这两个字更能揭示中国的当下、昭示民族的前程，没有什么能比“历史性”这一词汇更能描绘这个机遇的涵义和意义。

文章指出，在五千多年的历史长河中，中华民族曾有过很多机遇，但真正抓住机遇、开创盛世的屈指可数。5年前，中国共产党鲜明提出实现中华民族伟大复兴中国梦的重大历史性命题，追梦逐梦、筑梦圆梦成为激荡人心的高昂旋律，历史性成就、历史性变革托起新的辉煌。一路求索，一路奋斗，中华民族迎来了从站起来、富起来到强起来的伟大飞跃。

文章称，当今世界，“民主赤字”“治理赤字”“发展陷阱”此起彼伏，贫富分化、恐怖主义、气候变化问题层出不穷。资本主义主导的国际政治经济体系弊端丛生，全球治理体系深刻变革，新的国际秩序正在孕育。世界怎么了？人类要往哪里去？已成为人类的“哈姆雷特之问”。历史并未终结，文明的多样性蕴藏着人类的无限希望，中国的实践为解决人类共同问题提供了全新选择。

文章指出，机遇抓住了就是良机，错失了就是挑战。40年前，我们以“摸着石头过河”的勇气、“杀出一条血路”的决心，拉开了改革开放的恢弘巨幕，抓住了加快发展的有利条件，使中国在落后世界现代化进程一个多世纪后，赶上了现代化的最新浪潮。我们迎来了改革开放40周年。世界每时每刻都在发生变化，中国也每时每刻都在发生变化。不敢拥抱变化，就不能在变化的世界中有所成就。我们仍要用改革推开机遇的大门，以改革的精神、靠改革的勇气、用改革的方法，把蕴藏着必然性的机遇，变成一个国家、一个民族发展的现实，这正是我们对改革开放40年最好的致敬。

��章称，抓住了机遇，落后的国家和民族就有可能实现超越式发展，成为时代发展的引领者；丧失了机遇，原本强盛的国家和民族则会不进反退，成为时代发展的落伍者。历史的契机，正等待坚定者、奋进者、搏击者。

文章指出，2018年，改革开放40周年；2019年，新中国成立70周年；2020年，全面建成小康社会；2021年，中国共产党成立100周年；2035年，基本实现社会主义现代化；2050年，全面建成社会主义现代化强国……这些时间节点，标注着历史前行的足迹，让人心向往之、行亦趋之。

文章说，在这一大有可为的历史机遇期，我们面对一个空前广阔的时代，整个世界正在我们面前展开；面对一个空前激荡的时代，风云际会中孕育无数可能与希望；面对一个空前厚重的时代，经济增长、技术进步、制度创新叠加起改变历史的力量。（完）

  

Copyright (c) 2018 China News Service
Content_EN:
China news agency, Beijing, January 15
On the front page of the 15th, the official media "People's Daily" published an article titled "Grasping the Promising Period of Historical Opportunity," General Secretary Xi Jinping held a seminar on studying and implementing the party's 19th National Congress on January 5 In an important speech, it is clearly stated that at present China is at a promising historic opportunity. This is a general strategic review made by General Secretary Xi Jinping when he reviewed the historical evolution of the past, present and future, and reviewed the ups and downs of the country, the political parties and the nation. It is a manifestation of the new era when the socialism with Chinese characteristics enters a new era. Contemporary Chinese Communists Inspire the Wisdom of History and Create History.

The article said that the history of development, there are always some key nodes, a crucial period. October 2017, history will remember this golden autumn. One of the largest political parties in the world with more than 89 million party members and the well-proven and mature Marxist political party in the largest developing country in the world, the Chinese Communist Party, has drawn the attention of the world in the new era of the Chinese nation.

The article said that the "two one hundred years" goal of the history of the intersection of history, dreams and reality here to transfer, struggle and hard work here to continue. From comprehensively building a moderately prosperous society to basically realizing modernization and then to fully building a powerful socialist modernization country, the 19th CPC National Congress has done so.

The article points out that at this juncture of time and space there is nothing better than the word "opportunity" to reveal the present moment of China and to show the future of the nation. Nothing can be more portrayed than the term "historic." The meaning and meaning of this opportunity.

The article points out that there have been many opportunities for the Chinese nation in the long history of over 5,000 years. However, there are many opportunities for the Chinese nation to grasp the opportunities and create prosperity. Five years ago, the Chinese Communist Party clearly put forward major historic propositions for realizing the great rejuvenation of the Chinese dream of the Chinese nation. Dreams and dreams became the high melody of stirring up people's hearts. The historic achievements and historical changes have brought about new glories. All the way to search, all the way to struggle, the Chinese nation ushered in from the stand up, get rich to a great leap forward.

The article said that in today's world, the "development deficits" of the "deficit in governance" and the "deficits in governance" have come one after another, and the issue of polarization between the rich and the poor, terrorism and climate change has emerged one after another. The disadvantages of the international political and economic system dominated by capitalism are manifold, profound changes have taken place in the global governance system and a new international order is being built. What's wrong with the world? Where do humans go? Has become the human's "Question of Hamlet." History has not come to an end. The diversity of civilizations contains the infinite hope of mankind. The practice of China has provided VISUAL PHOTONICS EPITAXY CO.,LTD. To solve the common problems of mankind.

The article points out that it is a good opportunity to seize the opportunity, missed is the challenge. Forty years ago, with the courage of "crossing the river by feeling the stones," the determination to "bring out a thoroughfare" opened the grand curtain of reform and opening up, seized the favorable conditions for accelerating development and made China modernization in a backward world More than a century after the process, catch up with the latest wave of modernization. We have ushered in the 40th anniversary of the reform and opening up. The world is changing all the time, and China is changing all the time. Not embracing change can not accomplish anything in a changing world. We must still use the reform to open the door to opportunities, take the spirit of reform, rely on the courage to reform, and reform the methods to turn the opportunities with necessity into a reality of the development of a country and a nation. This is exactly what we are doing to reform Open 40 years the best tribute.

According to the chapter, seizing the opportunity, lagging countries and nations are likely to achieve transcendental development and become leaders in the development of the times. Without opportunities, the countries and nations that were originally powerful will not go into recession and become the development of the times Of the laggards. The turning point of history is waiting for the staunders, the activists and the fighters.

The article points out that in 2018, the 40th anniversary of the reform and opening up; in 2019, the 70th anniversary of founding of new China; in 2020, the building of a well-off society in an all-round way; 2021, the Communist Party of China 100th anniversary; 2035, the basic realization of socialist modernization; 2050, comprehensive Build a powerful socialist modernization ... These time nodes, marking the footsteps of historical advances, people aspire to, the line also trend.

The article said: During this promising historic period, we have been facing an era of unprecedented universalism in which the entire world is being launched. In the face of an unprecedented turbulent era, the worldly affairs of the world have given birth to numerous possibilities and hopes. In the face of an unprecedented heavy weight Era, economic growth, technological progress and institutional innovation are the forces that change history. (Finish)

  

Copyright (c) 2018 China News Service

Content:
For best results when printing this announcement, please click on link
below:http://pdf.reuters.com/htmlnews/htmlnews.asp...

  

  

pmdtechnologies展示其全新3D时差测距深度感测成像仪IRS238XC和全球最小3D摄像头

  

(美国商业资讯)--pmdtechnologies  
ag今日宣布，公司全新3D成像仪IRS238XC将在拉斯维加斯CES上首次亮相。该成像仪由pmd和英飞凌科技公司(InfineonTechnologies  
AG)共同开发，可满足快速增长的3D深度感测市场需求。自iPhoneX面市以来，因其3D表情包(animojis)和人脸识别(FaceID)等面向用户的应用程序广泛使用了深度感测技术，使得整个智能手机行业对深度感测的需求大大增加。

  

本新闻稿包含多媒体。此处查看新闻稿全文：  
http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180110005464/zh-
CN/(http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180110005464/zh-CN/)

  

  

  

3D depth sensing cameras for face authentication. (Photo: Business Wire)

  

  

pmd的3D深度感测技术已占据巨大的市场份额，智能手机、AR耳机、智能家居设备以及机器人等普遍应用的设备上已广泛集成该项技术，与此同时，pmd公司在市场需求方面已汲取大量宝贵经验，因此公司在IRS238XC成像仪上采用了市场最期望的深度感测时差测距3D摄像头。

  

该产品集成有一系列专用功能，可为3D深度感测摄像头模块与1类激光的兼容性提供支持，极大地提高了摄像头模块布局和集成的简便性。通过集成MIPI接口和数字逻辑，使得3D摄像头模块的操作变得极为简便。IRS238XC成像仪每个像素点内均采用了背景光抑制(SBI)电路，在户外强日光下能实现可靠的深度感测。此外，IRS238XC具有38,000像素，其分辨率高于当前所有的3D深度感测集成芯片，该产品还支持940nm工作波长，因此户外操作性能得到了进一步改善。

  

不容忽视的一点是，pmd在其CES展位上展示的IRS238XC摄像头模块样品包括成像仪、镜头、IR发射器以及相互之间的连接电路，其封装尺寸仅12mmx
8mm，是目前市场上全球最小的3D摄像头模块。

  

pmdtechnologies ag首席执行官Bernd  
Buxbaum博士表示：“自时差测距芯片产品于2005年上市以来，我们积累了丰富的经验，同时2016年公司在消费产品领域也实现了极大的增长，我们很高兴能够将这项技术应用在新一代功能���全、高度集成的成像仪上，而且我们还恰好契合了市场需求正急剧增长的正确时间点。”

  

借助pmd和英飞凌的软件合作伙伴提供的相应应用软件，IRS238XC将满足市场对人脸识别3D深度感测摄像头的需求。不仅如此，IRS238XC还有望用于AR/VR耳机、机器人、无人机和智能家居设备等其他设备上。公司目前已开始供应IRS238XC样品并计划在2018第四季度开始大批量生产。欲索取样品和了解更多信息，敬请访问Infineon.com/real3(http://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT...)。

  

经众多著名的模块封装厂商证明：使用pmd和英飞凌研发的成像仪的3D摄像头可实现快速量产，且拥有最稳定的一次校准通过率，它们也可用于使用新上市的IRS238XC的模块并能够实现批量化生产。

  

如需抢先目睹这一开创性芯片和全球最小3D摄像头模块，敬请莅临pmd在CES

    
    
    2018(http://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT...)上的展位：Westgate Hospitality Suites 1310, Tech East。

  

如需面谈，请联系events@pmdtec.com。

  

关于pmdtechnologies ag

  

无晶圆厂IC公司pmdtechnologies  
ag坐落于德国锡根与美国圣何塞，是一家全球领先的基于CMOS的3D时差测距数字成像技术供应商。公司成立于2002年，拥有超过200项全球专利，主要涉及基于pmd的应用以及pmd测量原理与实现。pmd3D传感器的目标市场是工业自动化、汽车制造以及AR/VR等广泛的消费类应用领域。

  

垂询详情，请访问：www.pmdtec.com  
(http://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT...)。

  

免责声明：本公告之原文版本乃官方授权版本。译文仅供方便了解之用，烦请参照原文，原文版本乃唯一具法律效力之版本。

  

  

  

  

  

在 businesswire.com 上查看源版本新闻稿:  
http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180110005464/zh-
CN/(http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180110005464/zh-CN/)

  

pmdtechnologies agSabrina Buxbaum企业战略与市场部电话：+49 271 2385 38 800传真：+49 271 23
85 38 809电子邮箱：s.buxbaum@pmdtec.com(mailto:s.buxbaum@pmdtec.com)
www.pmdtec.com(http://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT...)

Content_EN:
For best results when printing this announcement, please click on link
below: http: //pdf.reuters.com/htmlnews/htmlnews.asp ...

  

  

pmdtechnologies showcases its VISUAL PHOTONICS EPITAXY CO.,LTD. The 3D Time Difference Range Sensing Camera IRS238XC and the world's smallest 3D camera

  

(Business Wire) - pmdtechnologies
ag today announced the company's VISUAL PHOTONICS EPITAXY CO.,LTD. 3D Imager IRS238XC will debut at CES in Las Vegas. The imager by pmd and Infineon Technologies (InfineonTechnologies
AG) to meet the rapidly growing market demand for 3D depth sensing. Since iPhoneX was introduced, depth sensing technology has been used extensively for user-facing applications such as animojis and FaceID, resulting in a significant increase in the need for depth sensing throughout the smartphone industry.

  

This press release contains multimedia. View full text of press release here:
http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180110005464/zh-
CN / (http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180110005464/en/)

  

  

  

3D depth sensing cameras for face authentication. (Photo: Business Wire)

  

  

Pmd's 3D depth sensing technology has taken a significant market share and has been widely integrated with commonly used devices such as smartphones, AR headsets, smart home devices, and robots, while pmd has learned about market needs A lot of valuable experience, so the company in the IRS238XC imager using the market's most anticipated depth sensing TDC distance camera.

  

The product incorporates a series of special features that support the compatibility of 3D depth-sensing camera modules with Class 1 lasers, greatly improving the camera module layout and ease of integration. By integrating the MIPI interface and digital logic, the operation of the 3D camera module becomes extremely easy. The IRS238XC Imager uses a background light suppression (SBI) circuit in each pixel for reliable depth sensing outdoors in strong sunlight. In addition, the 38,000-pixel IRS238XC has a higher resolution than all current 3D depth sensing ICs, and the product also supports 940-nm operating wavelengths, further improving outdoor operating performance.

  

It should not be overlooked that the sample of the IRS238XC camera module exhibited by pmd at its booth at CES included an imager, lens, IR emitter and interconnecting circuitry with a package size of only 12mmx
8mm, is the world's smallest 3D camera module on the market.

  

Bernd, CEO of pmdtechnologies ag
Dr. Buxbaum said: "We have accumulated a wealth of experience since the market for TDD chips was launched in 2005, and the company has also seen tremendous growth in consumer products in 2016. We are pleased to be able to apply this technology to A new generation of fully featured, highly integrated imagers, and we also fit in exactly with the market at the right time for dramatic growth. "

  

The IRS238XC will meet the market demand for face-based 3D depth-sensing cameras with the application software provided by pmd and Infineon's software partners. Not only that, IRS238XC is also expected to be used on other devices such as AR / VR headsets, robots, drones and smart home devices. The company has now begun supplying samples of the IRS238XC and plans to begin mass production in the fourth quarter of 2018. For samples and more information, visit Infineon.com/real3 (http://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT ...).

  

Proven by a number of prominent module package makers: 3D cameras using pmd and Infineon-developed imagers offer fast mass production with the most stable primary pass-through rates and are also available for use with the newly introduced IRS238XC module Can achieve mass production.

  

For the first to see this groundbreaking chip and the world's smallest 3D camera module, please visit pmd at CES

    
    
    2018 (http://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT ...): Westgate Hospitality Suites 1310, Tech East Group Co.,Ltd.

  

For an interview, contact events@pmdtec.com.

  

About pmdtechnologies ag

  

Fabless IC company pmdtechnologies
Located in Siegen, Germany and San Jose, USA, ag is a leading provider of CMOS-based 3D time-difference digital imaging technology. The company was founded in 2002 and has more than 200 global patents, mainly related to pmd-based applications and pmd measurement principles and implementation. The target markets for pmd3D sensors are a wide range of consumer applications such as industrial automation, automotive manufacturing and AR / VR.

  

For more information, visit: www.pmdtec.com
(http://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT ...).

东兴证券陈凤珠：推荐三生制药及中国旺旺

三生制药（０１５３０）：三生制药为内地的生物制药企业，旗下三大核心产品特比澳、益

赛普及益比奥于内地的市场占有领导地位，特比澳及益赛普于去年上半年的市占率超过四成；而

集团的多只药物被纳入国家医保目录中，或可提升产品于医院的渗透，料未来销售或有机会增加

。另外，集团的糖尿病新药百达扬已获国家食品药品监督管理总局批准，而集团将继续研发新药

并向国家药品总局递交新药申请，预期发展潜力庞大。除此之外，三生去年公布收购加拿大生物

制药公司Ｔｈｅｒａｐｕｒｅ的ＣＤＭＯ业务，以进入北美市场，料收购将于今年完成，而集团

亦于内地展开ＣＤＭＯ业务，预期将可产生协同效应。目标价１７．８０元，买入价１６．５０

元，止蚀价１５．９０元。（建议时股价：＄１６．６２）

中国旺旺（００１５１）：内地消费品零售总额稳定增长，加上消费升级，内需股普遍受支

持，其中中国旺旺截至去年９月底的首三季纯利按年下跌１３．８％至２０．２亿元人民币，而

收入则同比下滑１．１％至１３５．９亿元人民币，惟６月至９月的收入按年上升５．１％，核

心产品于第二季及第三季持续录得正增长，预期业绩将会逐步改善。虽然成本如包装、白糖及奶

粉等价格上涨，但集团预期未来销售将可录得中至高单位数增长，且新产品及产品组合优化将可

推动销售及毛利率改善。另外，集团手持现金达１０４亿元人民币，财政稳健，同时亦进行回购

及派息，预期春节前旺旺的产品需求将会增加，料股价或会受支持。目标价７．００元，买入价

６．４０元，止蚀价６．１０元。（建议时股价：＄６．５０）《东兴证券（香港）研究部总监

陈凤珠》（作者本人并没有持有上述股票）

永隆赵卓峰：推荐比亚迪股份及枫叶教育

比亚迪股份（０１２１１）：２０１７年９月份工信部开始研究何时停止生产销售传统能源

汽车及印发《乘用车企业平均燃料消耗量与新能源汽车积分并行管理办法》，加上新能源汽车免

徵收１０％的「车辆购置税」获续期三年至２０２０年年底，这些措施将有助推动内地汽车产业

发展。据中国汽车工业协会统计资料显示，去年首１１个月，内地新能源车销量达６０．９万辆

，同比增长５１．４％，今年的销量增速可望保持４０％至５０％。在逐渐淘汰化石燃料车辆的

政策下，新能源汽车发展空间巨大，身为内地电动车市场的车企龙头，集团最能受惠。集团将于

２０１８年推出多款新型号电动车，补贴后的售价非常有竞争力。除汽车业务外，「云轨」（架

空单轨铁路）作为集团的战略性产品，在有效解决城市交通拥堵难题时，也为集团的长期成长开

辟了一项新领域。在技术走势上，股价于去年最高升至＄８３．７０，经过两个月多的调整后，

于１００天线受到支持，有望重拾升势。故建议于５０天线约＄６９买入，目标价为＄８０，止

蚀价＄６１。（本周二建议时股价：＄７０．１）

枫叶教育（０１３１７）：截至去年８月底止年度，集团营业额上升３０．５％至人民币

１０．８亿元，股东应占溢利增长３３．５％至人民币４．１亿元。主要由于学费的收益增加及

注册入学人数上升带动利润率提升所致。集团拥有逾２２年经验，通过结合中西方教育理念的精

华，致力于内地及加拿大提供学前教育至第十二级（「Ｋ－１２」）的优质双语教育服务。集团

近年不断开设及透过收购提高学校及学生数目，于上月公布以现金代价人民币８９０４．５万元

向独立第三方收购伊思顿国际教育５５％股权。后者拥有可容纳１５００名学生，并配备现代先

进设施的深圳市伊思顿龙岗书院１００％股权。于完成收购事项后，集团将承担该校的营运，将

为集团于内地一线城市及经济最发达地区之一的省份建立战略据点及打造品牌知名度，强大的学

校网络将提升集团的盈利能力，并巩固其于内地教育行业的地位。教育行业较少受经济周期影响

，故预期集团收购活动将会持续。在技术走势上，股价于��日创新高，故建议待回调至约

＄９．５买入，目标价约＄１０．５，止蚀价＄８．６。（本周二建议时股价：＄１０．３）

《永隆银行证券分析师 赵卓峰》（本人并没持有上述股份）

Content:
(新增文末收盤表格)

  * 歐元兌美元升至2014年底來最高
  * 美元指數觸及四個月低點
  * 英鎊兌美元升至英退公投來最高水準
  * 比特幣在大跌11%後反彈

路透紐約1月12日 - 美元兌歐元周五跌至逾三年低點，因投資人預期歐洲央行正準備縮減大規模貨幣刺激計劃，歐元擴大升勢。

  

歐元兌美元升1.21%，報1.2177美元，勢將錄得逾六個月最大單日百分比升幅。

  

歐元兌美元周四已經大漲0.72%，之前歐洲央行12月政策會議記錄顯示，歐洲央行決策者稱，他們可能在2018年初重新考慮政策溝通立場。(Full Story)

  

投資者將此視為，如果歐洲經濟繼續保持良好增長勢頭，歐洲央行今年將開始縮減2.55萬億歐元(3.07萬億美元)購債計劃的信號。

  

“歐洲央行最新會議記錄略偏鷹派，所以給了歐元更多的活力，”矽谷銀行高級匯市交易員Minh Trang稱。

  

歐元大漲令美元指數 .DXY 承壓，紐約尾盤美元指數跌0.92%，報91.008，盤中跌至四個月最低的90.954。

  

英鎊勁升也拖累美元指數下挫。英鎊兌美元盤中急升至英退公投以來最高水準，此前有報導稱，荷蘭和西班牙對英國和歐盟保持盡可能緊密的聯繫持開放態度。

  

“每次有英退進展順利的消息，英鎊都會獲得一些提振，”Trang稱。

  

英鎊兌美元大漲1.43%，報1.3729美元。

  

鑒於歐元和英鎊動能強勁，美元未能從強勁的數據中得益。數據顯示12月美國核心消費者物價錄得11個月最大升幅，這助漲了今年通脹將加快的預期。

  

比特幣 BTC=BTSP
在盧森堡Bitstamp交易所升3.8%，報13,749.05美元，昨日比特幣大跌逾11%，因韓國政府表示，正在考慮禁止加密貨幣交易的計劃。

Content_EN:
(New closing closing form)

  * The euro rose to the highest against the dollar by the end of 2014
  * The dollar index hit a four-month low
  * The pound rose to its highest level against the U.S. dollar
  * Bitcoin rebounded after plunging 11%

NEW YORK, January 12 - The dollar fell to a more than three-year low against the euro on Friday, as investors are expecting that the European Central Bank is preparing to curtail a massive monetary stimulus package, boosting the euro's gains.

  

The euro rose 1.21% against the dollar at 1.2177 U.S. dollars, marking the biggest one-day percentage increase in more than six months.

  

The euro rose 0.72% against the dollar on Thursday, after the ECB's December policy meeting showed ECB policymakers said they may reconsider their policy communications in early 2018. (Full Story)

  

Investors see this as a sign that the European Central Bank will start to trim its 2.55 trillion euros ($ 3.07 trillion) debt-buying program this year if the European economy continues its good momentum of growth.

  

"The ECB's last-minute minutes are slightly hawkish, giving the euro more vitality," said Minh Trang, senior currency dealer at Silicon Valley Bank.

  

The dollar rose so much the dollar index .DXY under pressure, the New York dollar index fell 0.92% late in late trading, to 91.008, intraday fell to a four-month low of 90.954.

  

Pound gains also dragged the dollar index down. The pound rose sharply to the highest level since the British Open and the British surrendered, following reports that the Netherlands and Spain are open to keeping the UK and the EU as closely linked as possible.

  

"Every time there is a good news of the recession, the pound will get some boost," Trang said.

  

The pound rose 1.43% against the dollar at 1.3729 U.S. dollars.

  

The dollar failed to benefit from strong data given the strong euro and pound dynamics. Data show that in December US core consumer prices recorded the largest increase in 11 months, which helped boost inflation this year is expected.

  

Bitcoin BTC = BTSP
Shares in Bitstamp rose 3.8% to $ 13,749.05 after Bitcoin slumped 11% yesterday as the South Korean government said it is considering a ban on encrypted currency trading.

Title: 更新版 1-《全球匯市》歐洲央行縮減QE希望拖累美元兌歐元跌至逾三年低點，英鎊跳升

Content:
(新增文末收盘表格)

  * 欧元兑美元升至2014年底来最高
  * 美元指数触及四个月低点
  * 英镑兑美元升至英退公投来最高水准
  * 比特币在大跌11%后反弹

路透纽约1月12日 - 美元兑欧元周五跌至逾三年低点，因投资人预期欧洲央行正准备缩减大规模货币刺激计划，欧元扩大升势。

  

欧元兑美元升1.21%，报1.2177美元，势将录得逾六个月最大单日百分比升幅。

  

欧元兑美元周四已经大涨0.72%，之前欧洲央行12月政策会议记录显示，欧洲央行决策者称，他们可能在2018年初重新考虑政策沟通立场。(Full Story)

  

投资者将此视为，如果欧洲经济继续保持良好增长势头，欧洲央行今年将开始缩减2.55万亿欧元(3.07万亿美元)购债计划的信号。

  

“欧洲央行最新会议记录略偏鹰派，所以给了欧元更多的活力，”硅谷银行高级汇市交易员Minh Trang称。

  

欧元大涨令美元指数 .DXY 承压，纽约尾盘美元指数跌0.92%，报91.008，盘中跌至四个月最低的90.954。

  

英镑劲升也拖累美元指数下挫。英镑兑美元盘中急升至英退公投以来最高水准，此前有报导称，荷兰和西班牙对英国和欧盟保持尽可能紧密的联系持开放态度。

  

“每次有英退进展顺利的消息，英镑都会获得一些提振，”Trang称。

  

英镑兑美元大涨1.43%，报1.3729美元。

  

鉴于欧元和英镑动能强劲，美元未能从强劲的数据中得益。数据显示12月美国核心消费者物价录得11个月最大升幅，这助涨了今年通胀将加快的预期。

  

比特币 BTC=BTSP
在卢森堡Bitstamp交易所升3.8%，报13,749.05美元，昨日比特币大跌逾11%，因韩国政府表示，正在考虑禁止加密货币交易的计划。

Content_EN:
(New closing closing form)

  * The euro rose to the highest against the dollar by the end of 2014
  * The dollar index hit a four-month low
  * The pound rose to its highest level against the U.S. dollar
  * Bitcoin rebounded after plunging 11%

NEW YORK, January 12 - The dollar fell to a more than three-year low against the euro on Friday, as investors are expecting that the European Central Bank is preparing to curtail a massive monetary stimulus package, boosting the euro's gains.

  

The euro rose 1.21% against the dollar at 1.2177 U.S. dollars, marking the biggest one-day percentage increase in more than six months.

  

The euro rose 0.72% against the dollar on Thursday, after the ECB's December policy meeting showed ECB policymakers said they may reconsider their policy communications in early 2018. (Full Story)

  

Investors see this as a sign that the European Central Bank will start to trim its 2.55 trillion euros ($ 3.07 trillion) debt-buying program this year if the European economy continues its good momentum of growth.

  

"The ECB's last-minute minutes are slightly hawkish, giving the euro more vitality," said Minh Trang, senior currency dealer at Silicon Valley Bank.

  

The dollar rose so much the dollar index .DXY under pressure, the New York dollar index fell 0.92% late in late trading, to 91.008, intraday fell to a four-month low of 90.954.

  

Pound gains also dragged the dollar index down. The pound rose sharply to the highest level since the British Open and the British surrendered, following reports that the Netherlands and Spain are open to keeping the UK and the EU as closely linked as possible.

  

"Every time there is a good news of the recession, the pound will get some boost," Trang said.

  

The pound rose 1.43% against the dollar at 1.3729 U.S. dollars.

  

The dollar failed to benefit from strong data given the strong euro and pound dynamics. Data show that in December US core consumer prices recorded the largest increase in 11 months, which helped boost inflation this year is expected.

  

Bitcoin BTC = BTSP
Shares in Bitstamp rose 3.8% to $ 13,749.05 after Bitcoin slumped 11% yesterday as the South Korean government said it is considering a ban on encrypted currency trading.

能源存储公司Fluence推出新的太阳能光伏技术平台SunFlex EnergyStorage

  

新技术可以消除太阳能的不稳定性，使太阳能发电量增加50％

  

(美国商业资讯)--西门子和爱依斯电力公司(The AES  
Corporation)合资成立的储能公司Fluence宣布推出名为SunFlex
EnergyStorage的新技术平台，该技术平台可以提高和延伸电力行业增长最快的太阳能光伏发电能力。公司最新的储能技术平台可消除了白天的太阳能波动（例如受云层影响），并将电能输送延伸到夜晚，实现太阳能发电的按需供应，让每个太阳能发电站的清洁能源销售额最多提高50％。

  

Fluence  
(http://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT...)总裁兼首席执行官Stephen  
Coughlin表示：“太阳能加存储是当今许多市场上最廉价的供电方式，将在未来五年内在更多的国家达到经济平价。客户现在通过Fluence的SunFlexEnergy  
Storage平台，在白天和夜晚都能实现清洁、丰富和低价太阳能的按需提供。”

  

据彭博新能源财经报道，全球太阳能发电量增长显著，光伏发电占总发电量的比例在2000至2015年间七次翻倍。但随着太阳能发电的不断增加，负责控制系统可靠性的电网运营商在管理这种能源的不确定性时面临挑战，这给行业带来了一些困难。现在有了Fluence的新技术平台，就可以在最需要的时候提供太阳能电力，而不仅仅是���有电的时候。这项创新也不再需要应对太阳能波动的后备发电（如调峰燃气电厂或往复式发动机）。这一点对于许多微电网和岛屿尤为重要，因为在这些地方，太阳能和蓄能相结合成了现在最便宜和最可靠的能源形式。

  

Fluence首席运营官John  
Zahurancik表示：“Fluence团队最初开发的能源存储解决方案是为了取代效率或利用率低下的传统电力设施资产，如电力储备、调峰或线路。但现在，随着新电力投资主要流向太阳能发电，我们有机会从一开始就让它更有效率。我们的解决方案可以让同样的发电站获得更多的太阳能电力，并让电网得到最佳利用。”

  

Fluence的SunFlex Energy  
Storage技术平台建立在公司两个技术平台Advancion和Siestorage的许多行业领先的控制和架构原理，以及与领先的太阳能开发商（如sPower和AESDistributed  
Energy）合作中获得的经验上。这个新平台可获取此前每天太阳能高峰期原本会流失的太阳能，而且能让开发者添加更多的太阳能板而无需互连变更成本，从而将单个站点的电力交付量最高增加50％。此外，新平台还能平滑和限制太阳能输出的大幅波动，在许多领域简化太阳能和储能设施的并网过程，从而提高了电厂的稳定性。只有Fluence的SunFlexEnergy  
Storage平台等量身定制的储能解决方案才能提供这些改进优势。能源存储还能通过提高电厂的容量系数，以及增加调频和其他电网服务新收入的方式扩展太阳能设施的容量。

  

Fluence是拥有10年经验的领先的储能技术和服务公司，已部署或获得合同的储能项目近500兆瓦。Fluence融合了行业巨头和储能市场领导者西门子和AES的经验、人才和支持，提供前所未有的储能组合方案。Fluence团队专注于解决客户的能源问题，优先考虑持久的合作伙伴关系，而不仅仅是交付产品

  

欲了解Fluence及其团队、服务和新技术的更多信息，请访问http://fluenceenergy.com(http://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT...)。

  

关于Fluence

  

Fluence是西门子和爱依斯电力公司(AES)合资成立的一家全球性的储能技术解决方案和服务公司，是技术公司的敏捷性和两家行业巨头的专业知识、愿景和财力支持的优势组合。作为行业先锋AESEnergy  
Storage和西门子储能部门的继承者，Fluence的目标是通过改变世界电力供应方式以创造更加可持续的未来。公司在160多个国家提供设计、交付和集成，通过成熟的储能技术解决方案，解决客户在快速变化的能源环境中的各种需求和挑战。Fluence提供咨询、融资和项目生命周期服务，在所有过程中始终与客户紧密合作。到目前为止，Fluence团队已在15个国家部署或获得合同的项目达到市场领先的56个，总容量485兆瓦。垂询详情，请访问http://fluenceenergy.com/(http://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT...)或在Twitter上关注我们：@FluenceEnergy  
(http://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT...)。

http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180115005409/zh-
CN/(http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180115005409/zh-CN/)

703-721-8673steven.goldman@fluenceenergy.com(mailto:steven.goldman@fluenceenergy.com)

Fluence, the energy storage company, introduced SunFlex EnergyStorage, a new solar photovoltaic technology platform

  

New technology can eliminate the instability of solar energy, the solar power generation increased by 50%

  

(BUSINESS WIRE) - The AES
Corporation Fluence, a joint venture energy storage company, announced the launch of a company called SunFlex
EnergyStorage's new technology platform that enhances and extends the fastest-growing solar PV capacity in the power industry. The company's state-of-the-art energy storage technology platform eliminates daytime solar fluctuations (such as cloud cover) and extends power delivery to nighttime, enabling on-demand solar power and maximizing clean energy sales per solar power plant 50%.

  

Fluence
(http://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT ...) President and CEO Stephen
Coughlin said: "Solar plus storage is the cheapest way to power many of today's markets and will bring economic parity in more countries over the next five years. Customers are now using Fluence's SunFlexEnergy
Storage platform that delivers on-demand, clean, rich and low-cost solar energy both day and night. "

  

According to Bloomberg New Energy Finance reported that the global solar power output growth significantly, the proportion of photovoltaic power generation in the total power generation in 2000 to 2015 doubled seven times. However, as solar power generation continues to grow, grid operators responsible for controlling system reliability face challenges in managing the uncertainty of this energy source, creating some difficulties for the industry. Now with Fluence's new technology platform, solar power can be delivered when it's needed most, not just when it's on. This innovation no longer needs to deal with solar-powered back-up generation (such as peaking gas plants or reciprocating engines). This is especially important for many microgrids and islands, where the combination of solar and energy storage is now the cheapest and most reliable form of energy.

  

Fluence COO John
Zahurancik said: "The Fluence team originally developed an energy storage solution to replace inefficient or underutilized traditional utility assets such as power storage, peak shaving, or wiring, but now as new power investments go largely to solar power, we Have the opportunity to make it more efficient from the very beginning, and our solution allows the same power station to get more solar power and make the best use of the grid. "

  

Fluence's SunFlex Energy
The Storage Technology Platform builds on many of the company's two technology platforms, Advancion and Siestorage, with industry-leading control and architecture principles, as well as with leading solar developers such as sPower and AESDistributed
Energy). This new platform captures the amount of solar energy that was previously lost during the peak solar per day and allows developers to add more solar panels without the cost of interconnection to change costs, increasing up to 50% in power delivery at a single site. In addition, the new platform also smoothes and captures large fluctuations in solar output, simplifies the grid-connecting process of solar energy and energy storage facilities in many areas, and increases the plant's stability. Only Fluence's SunFlexEnergy
Tailored energy storage solutions such as the Storage platform provide these benefits. Energy storage can also expand the capacity of solar energy installations by increasing the capacity factor of the power plant and by increasing new revenues from FM and other grid services.

  

Fluence is a leading energy storage technology and services company with 10 years of experience with nearly 500 MW of deployed or contracted energy projects. Fluence combines experience, talent and support from industry giants and energy market leaders Siemens and AES to deliver unprecedented energy portfolio options. Fluence's team focuses on solving customer's energy issues, prioritizing long-lasting partnerships, not just delivering products

  

To learn more about Fluence and its teams, services, and new technologies, visit http://fluenceenergy.com (http://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT ...).

  

About Fluence

  

Fluence is a global energy storage technology solutions and services joint venture between Siemens and AES (AES), a combination of the agility of technology companies and the expertise, vision and financial support of two industry giants . As a pioneer in the industry AESEnergy
Storage and successor to Siemens Energy Storage, Fluence's goal is to create a more sustainable future by altering the world's electricity supply. The company designs, delivers and integrates in over 160 countries to address customers' diverse needs and challenges in a rapidly changing energy environment with proven energy storage solutions. Fluence provides consulting, financing and project lifecycle services, always working closely with clients throughout all processes. So far, Fluence's team has 56 market-leading projects in 15 countries with contracts or contracts with a total capacity of 485 MW. For more information, visit http://fluenceenergy.com/ (http: //cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT ...) or follow us on Twitter: @FluenceEnergy
(http://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT ...).

Content:
For best results when printing this announcement, please click on link
below:http://pdf.reuters.com/htmlnews/htmlnews.asp...

  

2018深圳国际家具展创造全新乐活美学  
PR Newswire

  

深圳, 2018年1月15日电

  

深圳2018年1月15日电 /美通社/ --  
2018年3月19-22日，深圳时尚家居设计周暨第33届深圳国际家具展将为观众带来一个旨在聚集并培养出最具全球设计竞争力、品牌竞争力、设计多样化发展的设计平台，毫无疑问，爬梯行动展区已成为新生代原创设计师走向市场的首选地。今年，28名设计师将在4号馆设计馆展出他们的设计作品，以鲜明的设计个性和对当代生活的率性表达，集合众多新锐原创设计品牌，向世界发出来自中国家具原创设计的声音。

  

深圳国际家具展，爬梯行动，一个原创设计的孵化平台

  

爬梯行动是深圳时尚家居设计周暨深圳国际家具展为时下年轻设计师及新锐原创设计品牌提供的专属狂欢舞台，“爬梯”，即连通两端空间、目标及攀爬的工具（连接工具）。在爬梯行动展区，设计师们不仅享受到设计的狂欢，还将收获万众瞩目的展示机会以及助推自己成长的配套资源，从而找到适合自己品牌发展的阶梯。2018年3月19-22日，深圳时尚家居设计周暨第33届深圳国际家具展将为大家带来一个旨在聚集并培养出最具全球设计竞争力、品牌竞争力、设计多样化发展的设计平台，毫无疑问，爬梯行动展区已成为新生代原创设计师走向市场的首选地。爬梯行动，这个聚集并培养最具全球设计竞争力、品牌竞争力的设计群体平台，为中国家具产业搭建了一个原创设计的孵化平台，让这些设计思维不受限于空间内外、敢于突破惯性思维打破常规、善于探索新材料新技术及设计手法、重视设计的可持续性发展和生态环保的新锐设计师有更多精力和更好的平台来创作设计出经得起考验的作品。

  

深圳国际家具展，爬梯行动，洋溢小资情调的别样空间

  

凹凸的轻奢简约、本来设计的原木温暖、本土创造的材质本原、But  
design  
的创新变革……深圳国际家具展的家居产品展示空间将化为这群都市生活美学师小资情调的绽放舞台。每件产品都凝聚着设计师对于美、对于生活的感悟和情怀，他们将自身对设计与产品的独特理解，对过往的设计经验以及对未来的不同期许，融入设计与产品当中，为全面展现材料内涵品质和生活美学而不断坚持。

  

深圳国际家具展，爬梯行动，品质生活与个性齐飞

  

参与爬梯行动的原创家居品牌产品，不只是外形的简单优雅，更是内在的高品质，设计师们将产品设计通过“可实现的工艺、可视化的传播、可感受的体验”三点合一的方式转达给客户，让这些高品质且具有独特设计语言的家具或家居产品，展现一种简约、时尚、自由、舒适的生活美学，传达设计师的原创家居生活理念。

  

随着90后，甚至00后消费主力军的崛起，个性且具有品味的产品将成为市场消费主向，相信爬梯行动中这些独特的、与众不同的家居物品将成为居住者生活品味最完美的诠释。

  

一场都市生活美学师的狂欢派对，一群年轻、富有创意的新锐设计师，一个不见不散的品质家居生活课堂，2018年3月19-22日，深圳时尚家居设计周暨33届深圳国际家具展“爬梯行动”展，与大家不见不散。

2018 SHENZHEN INTERNATIONAL HOLDINGS LIMITED 家具展创造 VISUAL PHOTONICS EPITAXY CO.,LTD. 乐活美学  
PR Newswire

  

深圳, 2018年1月15日电

  

深圳2018年1月15日电 /美通社/ --  
2018年3月19-22日，深圳时尚家居设计周暨第33届 SHENZHEN INTERNATIONAL HOLDINGS LIMITED 家具展将为观众带来一个旨在聚集并培养出最具全球设计竞争力、品牌竞争力、设计多样化发展的设计平台，毫无疑问，爬梯行动展区已成为新生代原创设计师走向市场的首选地。今年，28名设计师将在4号馆设计馆展出他们的设计作品，以鲜明的设计个性和对当代生活的率性表达，集合众多新锐原创设计品牌，向世界发出来自中国家具原创设计的声音。

  

 SHENZHEN INTERNATIONAL HOLDINGS LIMITED 家具展，爬梯行动，一个原创设计的孵化平台

  

爬梯行动是深圳时尚家居设计周暨 SHENZHEN INTERNATIONAL HOLDINGS LIMITED 家具展为时下年轻设计师及新锐原创设计品牌提供的专属狂欢舞台，“爬梯”，即连通两端空间、目标及攀爬的工具（连接工具）。在爬梯行动展区，设计师们不仅享受到设计的狂欢，还将收获万众瞩目的展示机会以及助推自己成长的配套资源，从而找到适合自己品牌发展的阶梯。2018年3月19-22日，深圳时尚家居设计周暨第33届 SHENZHEN INTERNATIONAL HOLDINGS LIMITED 家具展将为大家带来一个旨在聚集并培养出最具全球设计竞争力、品牌竞争力、设计多样化发展的设计平台，毫无疑问，爬梯行动展区已成为新生代原创设计师走向市场的首选地。爬梯行动，这个聚集并培养最具全球设计竞争力、品牌竞争力的设计群体平台，为中国家具产业搭建了一个原创设计的孵化平台，让这些设计思维不受限于空间内外、敢于突破惯性思维打破常规、善于探索新材料新技术及设计手法、重视设计的可持续性发展和生态环保的新锐设计师有更多精力和更好的平台来创作设计出经得起考验的作品。

  

 SHENZHEN INTERNATIONAL HOLDINGS LIMITED 家具展，爬梯行动，洋溢小资情调的别样空间

  

凹凸的轻奢简约、本来设计的原木温暖、本土创造的材质本原、But  
design  
的创新变革…… SHENZHEN INTERNATIONAL HOLDINGS LIMITED 家具展的家居产品展示空间将化为这群都市生活美学师小资情调的绽放舞台。每件产品都凝聚着设计师对于美、对于生活的感悟和情怀，他们将自身对设计与产品的独特理解，对过往的设计经验以及对未来的不同期许，融入设计与产品当中，为全面展现材料内涵品质和生活美学而不断坚持。

  

 SHENZHEN INTERNATIONAL HOLDINGS LIMITED 家具展，爬梯行动，品质生活与个性齐飞

  

参与爬梯行动的原创家居品牌产品，不只是外形的简单优雅，更是内在的高品质，设计师们将产品设计通过“可实现的工艺、可视化的传播、可感受的体验”三点合一的方式转达给客户，让这些高品质且具有独特设计语言的家具或家居产品，展现一种简约、时尚、自由、舒适的生活美学，传达设计师的原创家居生活理念。

  

随着90后，甚至00后消费主力军的崛起，个性且具有品味的产品将成为市场消费主向，相信爬梯行动中这些独特的、与众不同的家居物品将成为居住者生活品味最完美的诠释。

  

一场都市生活美学师的狂欢派对，一群年轻、富有 Global Unichip Corp. 的新锐设计师，一个不见不散的品质家居生活课堂，2018年3月19-22日，深圳时尚家居设计周暨33届 SHENZHEN INTERNATIONAL HOLDINGS LIMITED 家具展“爬梯行动”展，与大家不见不散。
