2018深圳国际家具展引进国际优秀设计资源  
PR Newswire

  

深圳, 2018年1月15日电

  

深圳2018年1月15日电 /美通社/ --  
2018年3月19日至22日，深圳时尚家居设计周暨第33届深圳国际家具展沿袭“国际设计师商业对接展”，汇聚意大利组团、芬兰组团、欧美组团、亚洲组团及中国组团的国际设计理念，为中国企业对接国际优秀设计师搭建对接平台，27位设计师将以真实产品展示他们的设计理念与能力，推进中国家具产业转型升级，以持续的设计创新引领中国家具与设计的未来发展。

  

寻找北欧设计师  
芬兰区：感受最自然经典的北欧设计

  

清新自然的北欧田野风光促生了蕴含芬兰人单纯自然的国际设计，芬兰人从大自然汲取灵感，并将它们融入自己的设计之中。由国际顶尖设计大师TapioAnttila，Jonas
Hakaniemi，SaaraRenvall 与 Elina
Helenius在深圳国际家具展上共同打造的“芬兰森林”展区，将为我们展现纯粹灵动的芬兰设计。2018年3月19日至22日，深圳时尚家居设计周暨第33届深圳国际家具展沿袭“国际设计师商业对接展”，汇聚意大利组团、芬兰组团、欧美组团、亚洲组团及中国组团的国际设计理念，为中国企业对接国际优秀设计师搭建对接平台。寻找意大利设计师  
意大利区：感受最纯正的意式设计

  

对色彩的极致运用，对细节和触感的百般挑剔，意式设计旨在为人们带来不可取代的家居体验。由意大利顶级设计师Riccardo
Giovanetti，Giuliano Cappelletti 及 Gabriele
Cappelletti在深圳国际家具展打造的“米兰假日”展区，用颜色和形状再现意大利的历史和文化，用感官和灵魂诠释生活之美，向世界传达意大利美丽简单的生活方式。

  

寻找欧美设计师  
欧美区：感受最自由烂漫的欧美设计

  

作为文艺复兴的发源地，欧洲的设计以自由烂漫为其特色，以多变的线条、丰富的色彩、细腻的材质为表达方式。由欧美顶级设计师MikkoLaakkonen，Shannon
Sadler ，Louis Houdart& Riccardo Dal Maso，GlenMeikle 及 Lucas Bertucco  
共同打造的欧美设计师主题展区，将集合众多国际设计师的奇异构思和灵感，通过不同时尚家居风格混搭，展现丰富的欧美风情家居魅力，为大众带来��场时尚嘉年华。

  

寻找亚洲设计师  
亚洲区：感受传统与现代交融的东南亚风情

  

新亚洲风格主张以具有浓厚地域特色的传统文化为根基，融入西方文化，将传统意境和现代风格对称运用，在关注现代生活舒适性的同时，让亚洲传统文化得以传承和发扬。建立一种适合现代亚洲人生活习惯的家居文化，是当代亚洲家居业积极探索的方向。黄竞、阮文韬、黄泽源、田灿钧、陈彦豪、廖柏晴、张简士扬、蘇嘉欣及Sandy
Walter  
将携手在深圳国际家具展上打造亚洲设计师主题展区，相信新亚洲风格的出现，使家居在传统与现代之间找到了最好的平衡点。

  

寻找中国设计师  
中国区：感受中国新原创设计力量

  

凭借灵敏的时尚触觉、极致的美学创意、丰富的设计阅历以及国际化视野与专业化设计背景，中国本土原创设计师在短短几年内异军突起。中国设计师在深圳国际家具展上的主题展区“四合院”，由曾荣获IF  
国际设计大奖、并拥有丰厚国际设计阅历的李希米、赵云、邱思敏、蔡烈超共同打造，通过简洁现代的手法营造一个通透灵活的集成空间，让观众徜徉其中，享受未来生活的理想空间氛围。

  

世界设计，中国制造，3月19日至22日，2018深圳时尚家居设计周暨33届深圳国际家具展，来自全球五大地区的设计资源，为国内家居家具市场注入真正专业的原创设计和充满养分的清泉活水，推动传统制造业提升设计能力水平，不断促进行业的蓬勃发展。

  

    
    
    ###

2018 SHENZHEN INTERNATIONAL HOLDINGS LIMITED Furniture Fair to introduce international outstanding design resources
PR Newswire

  

Shenzhen, January 15, 2018

  

SHENZHEN, January 15, 2018 / PR Newswire /
From March 19 to March 20, 2018, Shenzhen Fashion Home Design Week & 33rd SHENZHEN INTERNATIONAL HOLDINGS LIMITED Furniture Fair followed the "International Designers Commercial Docking Exhibition", bringing together Italy, Finland, Europe and the United States, Asia and China Of the international design concept for Chinese enterprises dock docking international outstanding designers docking platform, 27 designers will showcase their real product design concepts and capabilities to promote the transformation and upgrading of China's furniture industry, with continuous design innovation to lead the Chinese furniture and design The future development.

  

Looking for Nordic designers
Finland: Experience the most natural classic Nordic design

  

The fresh, natural Nordic landscape has inspired international design that contains Finnish nature alone, Finns draw inspiration from nature and incorporate them into their designs. Top international design masters TapioAnttila, Jonas
Hakaniemi, SaaraRenvall and Elina
The "Finnish Forest" exhibition that Helenius co-founded at SHENZHEN INTERNATIONAL HOLDINGS LIMITED Furniture Show will showcase purely smart Finnish designs. From March 19 to March 20, 2018, Shenzhen Fashion Home Design Week & 33rd SHENZHEN INTERNATIONAL HOLDINGS LIMITED Furniture Fair followed the "International Designers Commercial Docking Exhibition", bringing together Italy, Finland, Europe and the United States, Asia and China The international design concept for Chinese enterprises Docking International outstanding designers dock docking platform. Looking for Italian designer
Italy area: feel the most pure Italian design

  

The ultimate use of color, detail and feel every pick, Italian-style design aims to bring people an irreplaceable home experience. Top Italian designer Riccardo
Giovanetti, Giuliano Cappelletti and Gabriele
Cappelletti is exhibiting at "Milan Holiday", a furniture fair created by SHENZHEN INTERNATIONAL HOLDINGS LIMITED. It reproduces Italy's history and culture with color and shape, interprets the beauty of life with sensuality and soul, and conveys the beautiful and simple lifestyle of Italy to the world.

  

Looking for European and American designers
Europe and the United States: feel the most free of charge of the European and American design

  

As the birthplace of the Renaissance, the design of Europe is characterized by the freedom of its own way, with its changing lines, rich colors and exquisite materials. Top designers from Europe and the United States MikkoLaakkonen, Shannon
Sadler, Louis Houdart & Riccardo Dal Maso, Glen Meikle and Lucas Bertucco
Together to create the theme of the European and American designers exhibition area, will bring together many international designers singular ideas and inspiration, through different styles of home mix and match fashion, to show the rich charm of home-style European and American style, bring the public fashion fair carnival.

  

Looking for Asian designers
Asia: Southeast Asian style with a blend of tradition and modernity

  

The new Asian style advocates the traditional culture with strong regional characteristics as the foundation, integrates western culture, uses traditional conception and modern style symmetrically, and pays attention to the comfort of modern life while allowing Asian traditional culture to be inherited and carried forward. Building a home culture that suits the lifestyle of modern Asians is the direction that contemporary Asian home industry is actively exploring. Huang Jing, Nguyen Van Tao, Huang Zeyuan, Tian Canjun, Chen Yanhao, Liao Pak Ching, Zhang Jian Shi Yang, So Chia Hin and Sandy
Walter
Will join hands in SHENZHEN INTERNATIONAL HOLDINGS LIMITED Furniture Fair to create Asian designer theme exhibition area, I believe the emergence of new Asian style, so that the home in the traditional and modern to find the best balance between.

  

Looking for Chinese designers
China: Experience China's new original design power

  

With its sensitive fashion sense, ultimate aesthetics Global Unichip Corp.,rich design experience, international perspective and professional design background, Chinese native designers have been on the rise in just a few years. Chinese designers at the SHENZHEN INTERNATIONAL HOLDINGS LIMITED furniture exhibition theme show "courtyard", won by the IF
International Design Awards and rich international design experience of Li Xi Mi, Zhao Yun, Qiu Si Min, Cai Lie Chao together to create a transparent and flexible integration of space through simple and modern approach, so that viewers wander among them and enjoy the ideal space for future life atmosphere.

  

World Design, Made in China, March 19-22, 2018 Shenzhen Fashion Home Design Week & 33rd SHENZHEN INTERNATIONAL HOLDINGS LIMITED Furniture Fair, with design resources from five major global regions, injecting real professional original design and Full of nutrients Qingquanhuoshui, promote the traditional manufacturing industry to enhance the design ability level, continue to promote the vigorous development of the industry.

Title: 2018深圳国际家具展引进国际优秀设计资源

Content:

below:http://pdf.reuters.com/htmlnews/htmlnews.asp...

  

久邦GOMO三个转型背后的中国移动互联网发展史  
PR Newswire

  

广州, 2018年1月15日电

  

广州2018年1月15日电 /美通社/ --  
2017年，手机终端的数量在全球范围内已经超过了电脑终端。移动互联网也基于手机终端的普及和通信技术的迭代蓬勃发展起来。在中国移动互联网发展的历史中，久邦GOMO是一家绕不开的企业。2003年久邦GOMO成立于广州，3G门户、GO桌面、出海这几个关键词分别对应着久邦GOMO的三次转型：模式转型、平台转型、战场转型。从收费到免费、从塞班到安卓、从国内到国外的战略转型，在一次次成就久邦GOMO的同时，也引领着中国移动互联网的发展。2003年久邦GOMO成立于广州，3G门户、GO桌面、出海这几个关键词分别对应着久邦GOMO的三次转型：模式转型、平台转型、战场转型。模式转型：从收费到免费

  

在2004年3G门户出现之前，中国手机上网主要通过通信运营商，这会产生一定的费用。移动端便于携带，可以随时随地获取信息，但人们希望通过手机获取信息的需求和昂贵的上网门槛产生了冲突。

  

当时，久邦GOMO的创始人邓裕强嗅到了移动互联网中免费的先机，率先开创了国内首个免费的WAP网站

    
    
    --3G门户，从此引领移动互联网走上免费模式的道路。从收费到免费，意味着移动互联网更加贴合自身的属性，意味着手机用户在随时随地获取免费的信息的同时，商业模式也随之改变。

  

免费的信息获取并不代表信息本身不具备价值，而是信息通过更广泛的传播获取收益。当在手机上获取信息越来越便捷的时候，用户数和使用粘性会不断提高，流量越多的地方，广告价值越高，成为连接买方与卖方的新桥梁。

  

3G门户运用其大量用户来进行移动互联网商业模式的探索，率先在移动互联网广告中获取收益。从收费到免费的模式转变，���就了早期的久邦GOMO。

  

平台转型：从塞班到安卓

  

在3G门户作为移动互联网入口之一取得巨大成功之时，久邦GOMO已经开始研发另外的手机流量入口

    
    
    --基于塞班平台的“手机心脏”。2008年，久邦GOMO的领导人邓裕强带领团队研发“手机心脏”已经有一年多，“手机心脏”是一款集桌面美化、天气预报、智能IP拨号和网络浏览器于一集的多功能软件。

  

当项目已经初步成型的时候，安卓来了。谷歌2008年10月发布了第一款安卓手机。安卓系统自身所具备的开放性能够兼容各式各样的移动硬件，在安卓平台上软件开发的方便自由，让久邦GOMO意识到，这将是移动互联网的未来。于是高层立即做出决策，放弃塞班，转向安卓。但这也意味着，团队一百多人努力了一年多的结果喊停。据久邦GOMO总裁朱志描述：“
当时很多人哭了。但裕强对趋势的判断非常准确，面对大家的压力，裕强很坚定。”

  

几个月后，久邦GOMO研发的GO桌面、GO输入法、GO短信等一系列GO产品发布，席卷全球总榜。伴随着手机终端的不断普及和通信技术的不断迭代，安卓在全球的市场份额逐渐取代了塞班。

  

放弃塞班，转向安卓，这个基于移动互联网趋势精准判断下的取舍，再次成就了久邦GOMO。

  

战场转型：从国内到国外

  

平台转型之后，久邦GOMO逐渐从门户业务转向移动互联网的APP业务。

  

移动互联网迅猛发展，使得百度、阿里、腾讯这三大互联网公司也逐渐进入到移动互联网领域，三足鼎立的局面逐渐形成。随着时间的推移，中国的移动互联网人口红利减弱，市场也逐渐稳定饱和。但是，国外的移动互联网仍是一片蓝海。相对国内用户而言，海外用户有着比较良好的软件使用付费习惯，对于在免费的应用中植入广告的形式接受程度也较高。

  

移动工具类产品成为第一个攻占点。久邦GOMO以其工具产品中个性化的主题、皮肤，轻便快速启动的桌面、相机等应用迅速抢占了海外手机工具应用市场。

  

久邦GOMO目前拥有超过三十款的APP在海外安卓平台发布，旗下应用中的主题、皮肤出售，以及在流量大的基础上进行的广告发行，第三次成就了久邦GOMO，也奠定其移动互联网出海领导者的地位，制造了一定的移动互联网出海壁垒。久邦GOMO是最早进行移动互联网出海的企业，也是第一个在纳斯达克上市的中国移动互联网企业。

  

如今，越来越多的中国移动互联网企把目光转向海外，工具类产品的竞争也日趋激烈。2017年，久邦GOMO在海外工具市场成熟的情况下，战略布局了游戏、以及内容（直播GOLive、短视频Viedo  
Me、新闻资讯BuzzHunt等）业务，将再次寻求移动互联网的转型。

  

久邦GOMO��方网址：www.gomo.com

The long history of GOMO behind the three transformations of China Mobile Limited Internet history
PR Newswire

  

Guangzhou, January 15, 2018

  

Guangzhou, January 15, 2018 / PRNewswire / -
In 2017, the number of mobile terminals in the world has exceeded the computer terminal. Mobile Internet is also booming based on the popularity of mobile terminals and the iteration of communication technologies. In the history of the Internet development of China Mobile Limited, the long-awaited GOMO is a company that can not be turned around. 2003 Gubon GOMO was founded in Guangzhou, 3G portal, GO desktop, sea, these three keywords correspond to the three transitions of long state GOMO: model transformation, platform transformation, battlefield transformation. From charging to freeing, the strategic transformation from Saipan to Android and from home to foreign countries led the development of the China Mobile Limited Internet while implementing the GOMO for a long time. 2003 Gubon GOMO was founded in Guangzhou, 3G portal, GO desktop, sea, these three keywords correspond to the three transitions of long state GOMO: model transformation, platform transformation, battlefield transformation. Model transformation: from free to free

  

Prior to the emergence of the 3G portal in 2004, China's mobile Internet access was mainly through the telecommunications carriers, which incurred a certain fee. The mobile is easy to carry and has access to information anytime, anywhere, but people want the conflict between the need to access information via their mobile phones and the expensive Internet access threshold.

  

At that time, the founder of long-state GOMO Deng Yuqiang smelled free mobile Internet initiative, pioneered the first free WAP site in China

    
    
    - 3G portal, from leading the mobile Internet on the road to free mode. From charging to free means that the mobile Internet is more fitting with its own attributes, which means that while mobile users get free information anytime, anywhere, the business model also changes.

  

Free access to information does not mean that the information itself does not have the value, but rather through a wider dissemination of information for revenue. When getting information on mobile phones more and more convenient, the number of users and the use of viscosity will continue to increase, the more traffic, the higher the value of advertising, as buyers and sellers to connect the new bridge.

  

3G portal to use its large number of users to explore the business model of mobile Internet, the first mobile Internet advertising for income. From charges to free mode change,     on the early long Bang GOMO.

  

Platform Transformation: From Symbian to Android

  

When the 3G portal was a huge success as one of the mobile Internet portals, the long-awaited GOMO has started to develop additional handset traffic entrances

    
    
    - "Cell Phone Heart" based on Symbian platform. In 2008, a long time ago, the leader of the GOMO leader Deng Yuqiang led the team to develop the "mobile phone heart" which is a multi-functional software that integrates desktop beautification, weather forecasting, intelligent IP dialing and web browser .

  

When the project has been initially formed, Andrews came. Google released the first Android phone in October 2008. Android system itself has the openness to be compatible with a wide range of mobile hardware, software development on the Android platform, free and easy, so long Bang state GOMO realize that this will be the future of the mobile Internet. So senior immediate decision-making, to give up Saipan, turned to Andrews. But that also means that more than a hundred people in the team worked hard for more than a year to halt their results. According to Zhu Zhi, president of GOMO for a long time, "
Many people were crying at that time. However, Yu Qiang's judgment on the trend is very accurate. In the face of everyone's pressure, Yu Qiang is very firm. "

  

A few months later, GOBO Bang GOMO developed GO desktop, GO input method, GO SMS and a series of GO products released, sweeping the world total list. With the continuous popularization of mobile terminals and the continuous iteration of communication technologies, Android gradually replaced Saipan in the global market share.

  

Abandoned Saipan, turned to Andrews, this based on the precise judgments of the trend of mobile Internet trade-offs, once again achieved the long-Bang GOMO.

  

Battlefield transition: from home to abroad

  

After the platform transformation, the long-Bang GOMO gradually shifted from the portal business to the mobile Internet APP business.

  

Rapid development of mobile Internet, making Baidu, Ali, Tencent Holdings Limited these three Internet companies have gradually entered the field of mobile Internet, the three pillars of the gradual formation of the situation. With the passage of time, China's mobile Internet demographic dividend weakened, and the market also gradually stabilized and saturated. However, the overseas mobile Internet is still a blue ocean. Compared with domestic users, overseas users have relatively good paying habits of software usage, and are also more accepting of the form of advertisement embedded in free applications.

  

Mobile tools products become the first capture point. Jubang GOMO quickly seized the market for mobile handset applications overseas with its personalized themes in its tool products, skins, lightweight quick-start desktops and cameras.

  

Jubang GOMO currently has more than thirty models of APP released in the overseas Android platform, its application theme, the sale of the skin, as well as the flow of large-scale advertising, the third achievement of the long state GOMO, also laid Mobile Internet leader in the sea to the status of mobile Internet to create a certain barrier to the sea. The long-established GOMO is the earliest mobile internet company and the first China Mobile Limited internet company listed on NASDAQ.

  

Nowadays, more and more China Mobile Limited Internet companies turn their attention overseas, and the competition for tool products is getting fiercer. In 2017, Jubang GOMO strategic layout of the game in the overseas tool market, as well as the content (live GOLive, short video Viedo
Me, BuzzHunt, etc.) business, will once again seek the transformation of the mobile Internet.

  

Goodbang GOMO square website: www.gomo.com

TCL多媒体在CES 2018上展出其2018年产品阵容

  

(美国商业资讯)--全球电视制造商前三强和领先的消费电子品牌TCL在CES2018上展出了其2018年产品阵容，包括QLED  
X6、C6和P5。该公司同时还宣布了面向美国市场的最新产品，包括6系列和5系列，以及TCLRoku智能回音壁(Smart  
Soundbar)——这是Roku新的全家娱乐许可项目下推出的首个设备。

  

本新闻稿包含多媒体。此处查看新闻稿全文：  
http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180111005504/zh-
CN/(http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180111005504/zh-CN/)

  

  

  

The award-winning TCL QLED X6 (Photo: Business Wire)

  

  

TCL还宣布在2017年取得了全球业务增长创五年新高的业绩，并介绍了其2018年业务战略。

  

QLED X6、C6和P5

  

在CES 2018上获得创新奖的85英寸QLED  
X6拥有惊人的画质和杜比全景声(Dolby  
Atmos®)沉浸式音效技术，并配备了Harman Kardon音响系统。

  

C6是一款应用了WCG、HDR Pro和Micro  
Dimming技术的超高清(UHD)智能电视。它提供HarmanKardon回音壁和DTS Premium Sound。C6在Android
TV（7.0Nougat已推出，未来数月内升级至8.0  
Oreo）的支持下提供多种娱乐选择。

  

P5是一款曲面超高清智能电视，超薄型式和6.9mm窄边框是其设计亮点。

  

面向美国市场的产品

  

6系列将综合4K  
HDR图像性能和强大的隐形金属设计，提供出色的电视体验。此系列电视支持杜比视觉(DolbyVision)。6系列还配有新的Roku电视语音遥控器，带语音搜索功能。新的5系列将出色的4K超高清图像质量和杜比视觉相结合，为您提供精彩的成像体验。

  

TCL Roku智能回音壁预计于2018年年底推出。

  

2017年业绩表现

  

2017年是TCL多媒体成功的一年，创下了五年来创纪录的全球业务增长。液晶电视机销量同比增长16.4％，至23,231,141台。

  

在海外市场，其液晶电视销量同比增长33.5％，主要是北美和巴西等新兴市场表现良好。北美市场销量同比大幅增长131.5％。

  

技术战略

  

人工智能将成为TCL在2018年的主要战略支柱之一。TCL将继续与行业领导者合作，让用户直接访问个性化内容。TCL正在将GoogleAssistant带到新的电视机中，帮助用户直接从电视上控制智能家庭设备和寻找新电影。

  

除了人工智能以外，TCL也在QLED技术、5G、大数据等领域进行重大投入。

  

关于TCL多媒体

  

TCL多媒体科技控股有限公司(HKSE:  
01070)是全球电视产业的领导企业之一，总部位于中国，专门从事消费电子产品的研发和产销。借助以新产品和用户为中心的业务模式，公司立志以“双+”战略实现“智能+互联网”和“产品+服务”，成为为消费者提供综合娱乐解决方案的“全球娱乐科技企业”。

在 businesswire.com 上查看源版本新闻稿:  
http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180111005504/zh-
CN/(http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180111005504/zh-CN/)

  

联系方式：媒体联系人：TCL多媒体Phillip Wu办公室：+86 7553331 1958wulf@tcl.com
(mailto:wulf@tcl.com)

 TCL Corporation Multimedia exhibited its 2018 product lineup at CES 2018

  

(BUSINESS WIRE) - TCL Corporation, a top three global television manufacturer and leading consumer electronics brand, unveiled its 2018 line-up at CES2018 including QLED
X6, C6 and P5. The company also announced the latest products for the U.S. market, including the 6 Series and 5 Series, as well as the TCL Corporation Roku Smart Smart Wall
Soundbar) - This is the first device launched under Roku's new family-wide entertainment licensing program.

  

This press release contains multimedia. View full text of press release here:
http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180111005504/zh-
CN / (http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180111005504/en/)

  

  

  

The award-winning TCL Corporation QLED X6 (Photo: Business Wire)

  

  

 TCL Corporation also announced its fifth consecutive year of global business growth in 2017 and its 2018 business strategy.

  

QLED X6, C6 and P5

  

85-inch QLED with Innovation Award at CES 2018
X6 has amazing picture quality and Dolby panoramic sound (Dolby
Atmos® immersive sound technology with Harman Kardon sound system.

  

C6 is a application of WCG, HDR Pro and Micro
Dimming technology ultra-high definition (UHD) smart TV. It offers Harman Kardon whispering gallery and DTS Premium Sound. C6 on Android
TV (7.0Nougat has been released to upgrade in the next few months to 8.0
Oreo) with a variety of entertainment options.

  

P5 is a surface ultra-high definition smart TV, slim design and 6.9mm narrow border is the highlight of its design.

  

For the United States market products

  

6 series will be integrated 4K
HDR image performance and strong invisible metal design, providing a great TV experience. This series of TVs supports Dolby Vision. The 6 Series is also equipped with the new Roku TV voice remote control with voice search. The new 5 Series combines excellent 4K ultra HD image quality with Dolby Vision to provide you with a great imaging experience.

  

 TCL Corporation Roku intelligent echo wall is expected to be launched by the end of 2018.

  

2017 performance

  

2017 is a successful year for TCL Corporation Multimedia, setting a record global business growth in five years. Sales of LCD TVs increased 16.4% YoY to 23,231,141 units.

  

In overseas markets, its LCD TV sales increased 33.5% YoY, mainly due to the good performance of SINCERE NAVIGATION CORPORATION in North America and Brazil. North American sales increased 131.5% YoY.

  

Technical strategy

  

Artificial Intelligence will be one of TCL Corporation's major strategic pillars in 2018. TCL Corporation will continue to work with industry leaders to give users direct access to personalized content. TCL Corporation is bringing GoogleAssistant to new TVs to help users control smart home devices and find new movies directly from their TVs.

  

In addition to artificial intelligence, TCL Corporation also makes significant investments in QLED technology, 5G, big data and more.

  

About TCL Corporation Multimedia

  

 TCL Corporation Multimedia Technology Holdings Limited (HKSE:
01070) is one of the leading companies in the global TV industry. Headquartered in China, it specializes in R & D and sales of consumer electronics products. With its new product and user-centric business model, the company is determined to realize "Smart + Internet" and "Products + Services" in a "Double +" strategy and become a "global entertainment technology company" that provides consumers with integrated entertainment solutions.

http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180111005504/zh-
CN / (http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180111005504/en/)

  

Contact: Media Contact: TCL Corporation Multimedia Phillip Wu Office: +86 7553331 1958wulf@tcl.com
(mailto: wulf@tcl.com)

EQS 新闻 / 2018-01-11 / 18:48 UTC+8

TCL多媒体于2018国际消费电子产品展(CES)荣获多项大奖

X5、C6、P5三大系列旗舰电视新品耀眼全球

    
    
       * * *   致力于科技创新 布局量子点显示及人工智能等尖端技术领域

（二零一八年一月十一日，香港）TCL多媒体科技控股有限公司（「TCL多媒体」或「

该集团」；香港联交所股份编号：01070）于美国拉斯韦加斯举行的2018国际消费电

子产品展（「CES」）不仅荣获「中国创意品牌奖」，在CES中亮相展出的旗下旗舰新

品X5、C6、P5系列更获得「中国创造产品奖」，体现了该集团以技术创新驱动企业发

展，将技术优势转化为产品领先的理念优势，向全球消费者展现了来自中国消费电子

品牌的科技创新力量。

由美国国际数据集团（「IDG」）主办的「2017-2018年全球领先品牌」颁奖典礼也同

时在CES上隆重举行。TCL再度荣获「2017-2018消费电子产业领先品牌10强」、

「2017-2018全球电视品牌15强」、「2017-2018全球消费电子领先品牌50强」三项大

奖，反映该集团雄厚的品牌实力。

专注创新研发 聚焦量子点显示与人工智能等多项尖端技术领域

本次CES所展出的X5、C6、P5三大系列电视新品，针对不同的消费人群，从用户真实

需求出发，精心打造满足消费者需求的设计和功能，延续了以用户体验为核心的理念

。产品涵盖了量子点显示技术、人工智能技术、曲面全面屏、高端工艺美学设计等创

新亮点。

XESS X5系列新品在画质方面搭载了包括原色量子点技术、杜比(R)视界（Dolby

Vision(TM)）HDR影像技术 、Q画质引擎、四维场景优化等技术，增强了电视画质的

表现效果，细节更丰富，色彩更逼真，层次更清晰。音质方面采用豪华定制的哈曼卡

顿音响，并应用杜比全景声(R)（Dolby Atmos^(R)）沉浸式音频技术 。工业设计方

面，现场展出的65吋X5具有4.9mm超薄机身、曲面全面屏、360 一体化设计，精简主

义设计理念重新打造的音响外观以及浮空底座设计，更是体现出了TCL对匠心与创新

的追求。

C6采用原色高色域屏幕配合全面屏无边框设计，支持杜比(R)视界（Dolby

Vision(TM)），采用哈曼卡顿音响，同时支持杜比全景声(R)（Dolby Atmos^(R)）。

在外观上，C6突破性地采用了圆柱形音响及绅士灰音响网布，让这款电视彰显出了低

调内涵的美感。P5配备了4000R的黄金曲面屏，5.9mm极窄边框和7.9mm超薄机身，再

配合一体成型工艺、延续的智慧之眼设计与MEMC运动补偿技术。这三大系列新品共同

构成强大的产品阵营，更加满足消费者的多样化需求，彰显了TCL以用户体验为核心

的理念。

展览会上，该集团独家开设了量子点技术体验区及人工智能技术体验区，两项技术让

电视产品在音画质体验和交互体验上实现了有效互补，更展现了未来家居娱乐享受的

发展趋势。值得注意的是X、C、P系列产品均配备的TCL独家研制的人工智能小T，具

有「全交互、快回应、强生态」三大特点。TCL与全球顶级企业开展深度合作，搭建

起开放性AI平台，在系统、识别、内容、服务等领域全面合作，将全球最新的技术快

速应用于产品中，为消费者带来更好的体验。

赢占成熟北美市场 全球化成果再攀新高

受益于产品结构持续改善、渠道结构优化，以及全产业链整合优势带来的整体效率提

升，该集团2017年的全球销量创新高超2,323万台，实现五年来最高增幅。其中海外

市场销售量持续强劲增长态势，北美市场表现尤其突出，二零一七年全年累计销售量

同比大幅提升131.5%，实现翻倍增长。作为最早进军海外市场的中国企业之一，该集

团凭借极具竞争力的产品、渠道开拓以及品牌推广等方面的实力，得以赢占北美市场

，令TCL品牌稳居北美市场第一阵营。

TCL多媒体首席执行官王成先生表示：「TCL积极布局核心显示技术、智能开发及应用

领域，在产业变革中具备抢占先机的实力。未来TCL电视将朝着人工智能、量子点技

术、大屏三大方向持续创新，致力于为用户提供极致体验的产品与服务，同时加快全

球化步伐，除了继续巩固在欧美市场的份额，还将不断战略性扩展巴西、印度、俄罗

斯、阿根廷等新兴市场。���团还将继续以创新驱动发展，力争在创新技术领域取得新

突破，建立起产品和技术的全面竞争优势，为品牌的国际化与市场竞争打造坚实基础

。」

-完-

Content_EN:
============

EQS News / 2018-01-11 / 18:48 UTC + 8

 TCL Corporation Multimedia won several awards at the 2018 International Consumer Electronics Show (CES)

X5, C6, P5 flagship TV series three flagship global dazzling

    
    
       * * * Dedicated to cutting-edge technology areas such as quantum dot display and artificial intelligence in scientific and technological innovation layout

(January 11, 2018, Hong Kong) TCL Corporation Multimedia Technology Holdings Limited ("TCL Corporation Multimedia" or "

The Group "; Hong Kong Stock Exchange (stock code: 01070) held in Las Vegas, USA 2018 International Consumer Electronics

Sub-Products ("CES") not only won the "Global Unichip Corp. Brand Award" in China, but also debuted at CES as its flagship new

Products X5, C6, P5 series also won the "China Create Product Award", reflecting the group to technology innovation-driven enterprises

Show, the technological advantages into the product's leading edge of ideas to show consumers around the world from China Consumer Electronics

Brand of technological innovation.

The "2017-2018 World's Leading Brands" Award Ceremony, sponsored by the American International Data Corporation ("IDG")

Held at CES. TCL Corporation Awarded "Top 10 Leading Brands in the Consumer Electronics Industry in 2017-2018"

"2017-2018 Top 15 Global TV Brands" and "Top 50 Global Leader in Consumer Electronics 2017-2018"

Award, reflecting the strong brand strength of the group.

Focus on innovative research and development focused quantum dot display and artificial intelligence and many other cutting-edge technology

The CES exhibited X5, C6, P5 series of three new TV series, for different consumer groups, from the user real

Demands start, carefully crafted to meet the needs of consumers design and functionality, continuing the concept of user experience as the core

. Products cover the quantum dot display technology, artificial intelligence technology, the surface of a full screen, high-end aesthetics of the design process

New bright spot.

XESS X5 series of new products in terms of quality equipped with primary color quantum dot technology, Dolby (R) vision (Dolby

Vision (TM)) HDR video technology, Q-quality engine, four-dimensional scene optimization and other technologies to enhance the quality of the TV

Performance, more details, more vivid color, clearer level. Sound quality using the Haman card luxury custom

Audio, and Dolby Atmos ^ (R) immersive audio technology. Industrial Design

Surface, on-site display of the 65-inch X5 with 4.9mm slim body, full-screen surface, 360 integrated design, streamlined

The design concept of re-create the sound appearance and the design of the floating base, but also reflects the TCL Corporation on the ingenuity and innovation

The pursuit of

C6 with high color gamut screen with a full screen borderless design, support Dolby (R)

Vision (TM)) with Harman Sounds and Dolby Atmos ^ (R).

In appearance, C6 breakthrough with a cylindrical sound and gentleman gray audio mesh, so that this TV highlights the low

Adjust the beauty of meaning. P5 is equipped with 4000R gold curved screen, 5.9mm very narrow border and 7.9mm slim body, and then

With one molding process, the continuation of the eye of wisdom and MEMC motion compensation technology. These three series of new products together

Constitute a strong product camp, more to meet the diverse needs of consumers, demonstrates TCL Corporation to user experience as the core

Concept.

At the exhibition, the group exclusively opened the Quantum Dot Experience Area and the Artificial Intelligence Experience Area, two technologies

TV products in the audio and video quality experience and interactive experience to achieve effective complementarity, but also show the future of home entertainment enjoyment

development trend. It is noteworthy that X, C, P series products are equipped with TCL Corporation exclusive development of artificial intelligence small T, with

There are three characteristics of "full interaction, quick response and strong ecology". TCL Corporation and the world's top enterprises to carry out in-depth cooperation and build

Opened the AI ​​platform, in the system, identification, content, services and other fields in full cooperation, the world's latest technology fast

Speed ​​applied to products, to provide consumers with a better experience.

Win the share of the mature North American market and reach a new high in globalization

Benefit from the continuous improvement of product structure, channel structure optimization, and the overall efficiency of the entire industrial chain brought about by the integration of efficiency

L. The Group surpassed 23.23 million sets in global sales volume in 2017, achieving the highest increase in five years. Among them overseas

The strong growth in sales volume in the North American market was particularly remarkable. The cumulative sales in 2017

A substantial increase of 131.5% as compared with the same period of last year, doubling the growth. As one of the earliest Chinese companies to enter the overseas market, this episode

Group with a very competitive product, channel development and brand promotion and other aspects of the strength to win the North American market

, So that TCL Corporation brand ranked first North American market camp.

 Mr. Wang Cheng, Multimedia CEO of TCL Corporation, said: "TCL Corporation actively distributes core display technology, smart development and application

Field, with the strength to seize the initiative in the industrial transformation. The future TCL Corporation television will move toward artificial intelligence, quantum dot technology

Surgery, big screen continuous innovation in the three major directions, is committed to providing users with the ultimate experience of products and services, while accelerating

The pace of globalization, in addition to continue to consolidate the market share in Europe and the United States, will continue to be a strategic expansion of Brazil, India, Russia

Sri Lanka, Argentina and other SINCERE NAVIGATION CORPORATION market.     mission will continue to drive innovation-driven development and strive to make new innovations in the field of technology

Breakthrough, establish a comprehensive competitive advantage of products and technologies, and create a solid foundation for the internationalization of the brand and market competition

. "

Title: *TOP NEWS*大中华��经

Content:
路透1月16日 - 亞洲貨幣周二走低，因投資者在其今年大幅上漲之後，對於增加新頭寸變得有些謹慎。

  

美元/日圓 JPY= 漲0.3%至110.85，脫離周一觸及的四個月低點110.32。

  

“我認為，亞洲貨幣在昨日大漲之後，目前處於盤整階段，”瑞穗銀行的外匯策略師Chang Wei Liang表示。

  

“短期內，美元兌亞洲貨幣的跌勢可能持續，反映出該地區正面的增長環境，”Chang Wei Liang稱。

  

他指出，歐元目前對亞幣構成扶助。歐元兌美元 EUR= 上漲0.03%至1.2265。

  

相對強弱指標(RSI)等技術指標顯示，印尼盧比 IDR=ID、台幣 TWD=TP、馬幣 MYR=、泰銖 THB=TH 和坡元 SGD= 處於超買。

  

亞幣去年大漲後，一些央行料將干預匯市，讓本幣貶值以保護出口。

  

泰銖小跌，韓元 KRW=KFTC 也下滑，日內下跌近0.25%。

  

但油價上漲周二提振馬幣。

  

中國人民幣兌美元即期 CNY=CFXS 周二早盤繼續大漲，但未升破昨日盤中高點，中間價則創25個月新高。(Full Story)

  

一些分析師表示，有關歐洲央行(ECB)將縮減貨幣刺激措施的預期增強，亞洲貨幣也受到影響。

  

從以往來看，亞洲貨幣受益於主要央行提供的全球流動性。

  

印度盧比兌美元 INR=D2 跌0.31%，至63.683，受到原油價格近期飆升打��。

  

印度是亞洲僅次於中國的第二大石油進口國。

  

馬來亞銀行周二公布的一項報告稱，油價上漲及其它通脹壓力有可能促使印度央行較預期提前升息。

  

“盧比有可能會是亞洲同步復甦中的一個異數，”報告稱。

Content_EN:
Reuters, January 16 - Asian currencies were lower Tuesday as investors became cautious about adding new positions after their sharp rise this year.

  

USD / JPY JPY = up 0.3% at 110.85, hitting 110.32, the four-month low touched on Monday.

  

"I think Asian currencies are in a consolidation phase after yesterday's rally," said Chang Wei Liang, currency strategist at Mizuho Bank.

  

"The dollar's decline against Asian currencies may continue in the short term, reflecting the positive growth environment in the region," Chang Wei Liang said.

  

He pointed out that the euro is currently aiding the Asian currencies. The euro was up 0.03% to 1.2265 against the dollar.

  

Relative strength index (RSI) and other technical indicators show that the Indonesian rupiah IDR = ID, TWD TWD = TP, MYR MYR =, Thai Baht THB = TH and SGD SGD = Overbought.

  

After the Asian currency rose sharply last year, some central banks expected to intervene in the foreign exchange market to depreciate their currencies to protect their exports.

  

The Thai baht slipped, the won KRW = KFTC also slipped and fell nearly 0.25% during the day.

  

But rising oil prices boosted the Malaysian ringgit on Tuesday.

  

China Renminbi vs. USD Spot CNY = CFXS continued to rise sharply in early trading Tuesday but failed to rise above yesterday's intraday high while the median price hit a 25-month high. (Full Story)

  

Some analysts said Asian currencies have also been affected by expectations that the European Central Bank will curtail its monetary stimulus.

  

In the past, Asian currencies have benefited from the global liquidity offered by major central banks.

  

Indian rupee fell 0.31% to US $ 63.683 against US dollar at INR = D2, hit by recent surge in crude oil prices.

  

India is the second largest oil importer in Asia after China.

  

A report released by Maybank said on Tuesday that rising oil prices and other inflationary pressures could push the Bank of India to raise interest rates earlier than expected.

  

"Rupiah may be an alien in the synchronized recovery in Asia," the report said.

Title: ���興匯市：亞洲貨幣走貶，因投資者在大漲之後趨於謹慎

Content:
路透1月16日 - 亚洲货币周二走低，因投资者在其今年大幅上涨之后，对于增加新头寸变得有些谨慎。

  

美元/日圆 JPY= 涨0.3%至110.85，脱离周一触及的四个月低点110.32。

  

“我认为，亚洲货币在昨日大涨之后，目前处于盘整阶段，”瑞穗银行的外汇策略师Chang Wei Liang表示。

  

“短期内，美元兑亚洲货币的跌势可能持续，反映出该地区正面的增长环境，”Chang Wei Liang称。

  

他指出，欧元目前对亚币构成扶助。欧元兑美元 EUR= 上涨0.03%至1.2265。

  

相对强弱指标(RSI)等技术指标显示，印尼卢比 IDR=ID、台币 TWD=TP、马币 MYR=、泰铢 THB=TH 和坡元 SGD= 处于超买。

  

亚币去年大涨后，一些央行料将干预汇市，让本币贬值以保护出口。

  

泰铢小跌，韩元 KRW=KFTC 也下滑，日内下跌近0.25%。

  

但油价上涨周二提振马币。

  

中国人民币兑美元即期 CNY=CFXS 周二早盘继续大涨，但未升破昨日盘中高点，中间价则创25个月新高。(Full Story)

  

一些分析师表示，有关欧洲央行(ECB)将缩减货币刺激措施的预期增强，亚洲货币也受到影响。

  

从以往来看，亚洲货币受益于主要央行提供的全球流动性。

  

印度卢比兑美元 INR=D2 跌0.31%，至63.683，受到原油价格近期飙升打击。

  

印度是亚洲仅次于中国的第二大石油进口国。

  

马来亚银行周二公布的一项报告称，油价上涨及其它通胀压力有可能促使印度央行较预期提前升息。

  

“卢比有可能会是亚洲同步复苏中的一个异数，”报告称。

Content_EN:
Reuters, January 16 - Asian currencies were lower Tuesday as investors became cautious about adding new positions after their sharp rise this year.

  

USD / JPY JPY = up 0.3% at 110.85, hitting 110.32, the four-month low touched on Monday.

  

"I think Asian currencies are in a consolidation phase after yesterday's rally," said Chang Wei Liang, currency strategist at Mizuho Bank.

  

"The dollar's decline against Asian currencies may continue in the short term, reflecting the positive growth environment in the region," Chang Wei Liang said.

  

He pointed out that the euro is currently aiding the Asian currencies. The euro was up 0.03% to 1.2265 against the dollar.

  

Relative strength index (RSI) and other technical indicators show that the Indonesian rupiah IDR = ID, TWD TWD = TP, MYR MYR =, Thai Baht THB = TH and SGD SGD = Overbought.

  

After the Asian currency rose sharply last year, some central banks expected to intervene in the foreign exchange market to depreciate their currencies to protect their exports.

  

The Thai baht slipped, the won KRW = KFTC also slipped and fell nearly 0.25% during the day.

  

But rising oil prices boosted the Malaysian ringgit on Tuesday.

  

China Renminbi vs. USD Spot CNY = CFXS continued to rise sharply in early trading Tuesday but failed to rise above yesterday's intraday high while the median price hit a 25-month high. (Full Story)

  

Some analysts said Asian currencies have also been affected by expectations that the European Central Bank will curtail its monetary stimulus.

  

In the past, Asian currencies have benefited from the global liquidity offered by major central banks.

  

Indian rupee fell 0.31% to U.S. dollar 63.683 against US dollar INR = D2, hit by the recent surge in crude oil prices.

  

India is the second largest oil importer in Asia after China.

  

A report released by Maybank said on Tuesday that rising oil prices and other inflationary pressures could push the Bank of India to raise interest rates earlier than expected.

  

"Rupiah may be an alien in the synchronized recovery in Asia," the report said.

Title: 新兴汇市：亚洲货币走贬，因投资者在大涨之后趋于谨慎

Content:
路透底特律1月15日 \-
一項路透分析顯示，全球車企在電池和電動汽車領域掀起投資大潮，目前投資總計達900億美元且還在增長，福特(Ford)F.N將其電動汽車支出增加一倍的計劃就是其中的一部分。

  

資金正在湧入尚未壯大的電動汽車領域，在每年達9,000萬輛的汽車銷量中，電動汽車的占比還不到1%，馬斯克(Elon
Musk)的特斯拉TSLA.O則是這個領域的主力先鋒，該公司目前僅售三款車型，2017年的銷量只有10萬余輛。

  

隨著全球頭號車企準備在接下來五年推出數十種新款電動汽車和油電混合動力汽車，其中多數將在中國推出，行業高管不禁要問：誰會買下所有這些汽車？

  

“我們押上了所有籌碼，”福特汽車執行董事長Bill Ford
Jr提到公司周日在底特律北美國際車展宣布進行110億美元投資一事時說。“唯一的問題是，客戶會買我們的帳嗎？”

  

“特斯拉面臨著真正的競爭，”美國最大汽車零售連鎖業者AutoNation的執行長Mike
Jackson稱。他表示，預計到2030年，電動汽車將占到美國新車銷量的15-20%。

  

迄今已宣布的電動汽車投資中，包括美國汽車廠商的至少190億美元、中國的210億美元和德國的520億美元。

  

但美國和德國車企高管在底特律車展的間隙接受訪問時稱，上述投資中多數用於中國市場。中國政府已公布從2019年開始逐步擴大電動汽車配額。

  

主流車企也是在對歐洲與美國加州監管機構的施壓作出回應。這些機構要求車企大幅減少化石燃料的碳排放。與此同時，這些車企還面臨特斯拉取得成功的壓力；特斯拉生產的電動轎車和運動型車(運動休旅車，SUV)受到有意購車者的熱烈追捧。

  

戴姆勒DAIGn.DE已表示，將花費至少117億美元，推出10款純電動車和40款混合動力車，並稱其有意將旗下從小型緊湊車型到重型卡車的全系列車型均改為電動款。

  

目前日產汽車7201.T已推出七年的Leaf仍是全球銷量最高的電動汽車，也是該公司唯一一款純電動車型。很快其他廠商就將推出大量新電動車型，導致競爭日益激烈，從而可能加劇定價壓力。

  

豐田汽車7203.T北美執行長Jim
Lentz稱，豐田花了18年，讓混合動力在整體市場中的份額達到3%。而且混合動力的成本低一些，不需要新的充電基礎設施，也不會像電動汽車那���受里程限制。

  

Lentz稱， 電動汽車要達到4-5%的份額將需要更長的時間。

  

最大的一筆投資來自大眾汽車(福斯汽車, Volkswagen)
VOWG_p.DE。該公司計劃在2030年之前斥資400億美元，為旗下全球超過300款車打造電動版本。

  

美國方面，通用汽車已經規劃在2030年之前推出20款新的電池及燃料電池電動車，當中多數將會建構在一個專屬的模組化平台，該平台將在2021年推出。

  

中國的汽車製造商都公布了激進的投資計劃，包括福特、大眾和通用汽車在本地的合作夥伴。

  

但不是所有跨國汽車廠都這樣積極地進入電動汽車領域。

菲亞特克萊斯勒汽車 FCHA.MIFCAU.N馬爾基翁內(Sergio
Marchionne)周一在底特律稱，宣布新款電動車的具體數字沒什麼意義。他稱該公司沒有壓力，但在努力達到排放要求。他稱在歐洲由於排放法規關係，電動汽車可能成為強制性規定。(完)

(編譯 侯雪蘋/徐文焰/王麗鑫；審校 白雲/王穎/張明鈞)

(( lixin.wang@thomsonreuters.com ; 86-10-66271045; Reuters Messaging:
lixin.wang.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net ))

  

Keywords: AUTOSHOW-DETROIT/ELECTRIC (PIX)
Content_EN:
Reuters Detroit January 15 \ -
A Reuters analysis shows that global auto makers are investing heavily in batteries and electric vehicles. With investments totaling $ 90 billion and still growing, Ford's FN plan to double its EV spending is part of it .

  

Funding is pouring into the yet-to-be-developed field of electric vehicles, with EVs accounting for less than 1% of the 90 million vehicles sold each year. Elon
Musk) Tesla TSLA.O is the main pioneer in this area, the company currently only for three models, in 2017 sales of only 100,000 units.

  

As the number one car company in the world plans to launch dozens of new electric vehicles and hybrid electric vehicles in the next five years, most of which will be launched in China, industry executives can not but ask: Who will buy all these cars?

  

"We put on all the chips," said Bill Ford, executive chairman of Ford Motor Company
Jr said the company said Sunday at the North American International Auto Show in Detroit announced a $ 11 billion investment. "The only question is, will the customer buy our account?"

  

"Tesla faces real competition," Mike Mike, chief executive of AutoNation, the nation's largest automotive retail chain,
Jackson said. He said it expects that by 2030, electric cars will account for 15-20% of new car sales in the United States.

  

The investment in electric vehicles announced so far includes at least 19 billion U.S. dollars of U.S. auto makers, 21 billion U.S. dollars in China and 52 billion U.S. dollars in Germany.

  

However, when executives of US and German auto companies interviewed at the Detroit Auto Show, most of the above investments were for the Chinese market. The Chinese government has announced that it will gradually expand its quota for electric vehicles starting from 2019.

  

Mainstream car companies are also responding to pressure from regulatory agencies in Europe and California. These agencies require that car prices substantially reduce their carbon emissions from fossil fuels. At the same time, these car prices also face the pressure of Tesla's success; Tesla's electric cars and sport-utility vehicles (SUVs) are highly sought after by car buyers.

  

Daimler DAIGn.DE has said it will spend at least $ 11.7 billion to launch 10 pure electric vehicles and 40 hybrids and said it intends to convert its full range of models, from compact compact models to heavy trucks, to electric paragraph.

  

Currently Nissan 7201.T has launched seven years of Leaf is still the world's highest-selling electric vehicles, but also the company's only pure electric car. Soon other vendors will launch a large number of new electric models, leading to increasing competition, which may exacerbate pricing pressures.

  

Toyota 7203.T North American chief executive Jim
Lentz said that Toyota spent 18 years, so hybrid in the overall market share of 3%. And hybrids are less costly, do not require new charging infrastructure, and are not subject to mileage limitations like electric cars.

  

Lentz said it will take longer for electric cars to reach a 4-5% share.

  

The biggest investment came from Volkswagen (Volkswagen)
VOWG_p.DE. The company plans to spend 40 billion U.S. dollars by 2030 to build an electric version of its 300+ vehicles worldwide.

  

The United States, General Motors has been planning to introduce 20 new batteries and fuel cell electric vehicles by 2030, most of them will be built on a proprietary modular platform, which will be launched in 2021.

  

Chinese automakers have announced aggressive investment plans, including local partners for Ford, Volkswagen and General Motors.

  

But not all multinational automobile manufacturers are so active in the field of electric vehicles.

Fiat Chrysler Automobile FCHA.MIFCAU.N Marchionne (Sergio
Marchionne said in Detroit on Monday that it makes no sense to announce the exact figures for the new electric car. He said the company is under no pressure but struggling to meet its emissions requirements. He said that in Europe due to emissions regulations, electric vehicles may become a mandatory requirement. (Finish)

Keywords: AUTOSHOW-DETROIT / ELECTRIC (PIX)
Title: 《焦點》全球車企掀起電動汽車投資熱潮，規模至少達900億美元

Content:
路透底特律1月15日 \-
一项路透分析显示，全球车企在电池和电动汽车领域掀起投资大潮，目前投资总计达900亿美元且还在增长，福特(Ford)F.N将其电动汽车支出增加一倍的计划就是其中的一部分。

  

资金正在涌入尚未壮大的电动汽车领域，在每年达9,000万辆的汽车销量中，电动汽车的占比还不到1%，马斯克(Elon
Musk)的特斯拉TSLA.O则是这个领域的主力先锋，该公司目前仅售三款车型，2017年的销量只有10万余辆。

  

随着全球头号车企准备在接下来五年推出数十种新款电动汽车和油电混合动力汽车，其中多数将在中国推出，行业高管不禁要问：谁会买下所有这些汽车？

  

“我们押上了所有筹码，”福特汽车执行董事长Bill Ford
Jr提到公司周日在底特律北美国际车展宣布进行110亿美元投资一事时说。“唯一的问题是，客户会买我们的帐吗？”

  

“特斯拉面临着真正的竞争，”美国最大汽车零售连锁业者AutoNation的执行长Mike
Jackson称。他表示，预计到2030年，电动汽车将占到美国新车销量的15-20%。

  

迄今已宣布的电动汽车投资中，包括美国汽车厂商的至少190亿美元、中国的210亿美元和德国的520亿美元。

  

但美国和德国车企高管在底特律车展的间隙接受访问时称，上述投资中多数用于中国市场。中国政府已公布从2019年开始逐步扩大电动汽车配额。

  

主流车企也是在对欧洲与美国加州监管机构的施压作出回应。这些机构要求车企大幅减少化石燃料的碳排放。与此同时，这些车企还面临特斯拉取得成功的压力；特斯拉生产的电动轿车和运动型车(运动休旅车，SUV)受到有意购车者的热烈追捧。

  

戴姆勒DAIGn.DE已表示，将花费至少117亿美元，推出10款纯电动车和40款混合动力车，并称其有意将旗下从小型紧凑车型到重型卡车的全系列车型均改为电动款。

  

目前日产汽车7201.T已推出七年的Leaf仍是全球销量最高的电动汽车，也是该公司唯一一款纯电动车型。很快其他厂商就将推出大量新电动车型，导致竞争日益激烈，从而可能加剧定价压力。

  

丰田汽车7203.T北美执行长Jim
Lentz称，丰田花了18年，让混合动力在整体市场中的份额达到3%。而且混合动力的成本低一些，不需要新的充电基础设施，也不会像电动汽车那样受里程限制。

  

Lentz称， 电动汽车要达到4-5%的份额将需要更长的时间。

  

最大的一笔投资来自大众汽车(福斯汽车, Volkswagen)
VOWG_p.DE。该公司计划在2030年之前斥资400亿美元，为旗下全球超过300款车打造电动版本。

  

美国方面，通用汽车已经规划在2030年之前推出20款新的电池及燃料电池电动车，当中多数将会建构在一个专属的模组化平台，该平台将在2021年推出。

  

中国的汽车制造商都公布了激进的投资计划，包括福特、大众和通用汽车在本地的合作伙伴。

  

但不是所有跨国汽车厂都这样积极地进入电动汽车领域。

菲亚特克莱斯勒汽车 FCHA.MIFCAU.N马尔基翁内(Sergio
Marchionne)周一在底特律称，宣布新款电动车的具体数字没什么意义。他称该公司没有压力，但在努力达到排放要求。他称在欧洲由于排放法规关系，电动汽车可能成为强制性规定。(完)

(编译 侯雪苹/徐文焰/王丽鑫；审校 白云/王颖/张明钧)

lixin.wang.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net ))

Keywords: AUTOSHOW-DETROIT / ELECTRIC (PIX)
Title: 《焦点》全球车企掀起电动汽车投资热潮，规模至少达900亿美元

Content:
路透1月15日 - 亞幣周��持堅，因美元大跌至三年低位。人民幣漲勢領先，因德國央行決定在外匯儲備中納入人民幣。

  

交易商稱，全球風險偏好走強以及大宗商品價格上漲推動區域人氣上漲。

  

美元指數 .DXY 稍早跌0.2%至90.857，為2015年1月以來最低。

  

人民幣兌美元 CNY=CFXS 跳漲至兩年多高位，此前德國央行委員會的一名委員稱，該央行已決定將人民幣納入其外匯儲備。(Full Story)

  

此外部分人士樂觀預計，周四出爐的數據料將顯示，中國12月當季國內生產總值(GDP)增長至少6.7%。

  

OANDA旗下亞太交易主管Stephen Innes稱，周一人民幣表現堅挺給亞幣帶來提振。

  

馬幣(林吉特)兌美元 MYR= 日內上漲逾0.25%，受油價升勢支撐。

  

泰銖兌美元 THB=TH 亦上揚，受外資流入亞洲之助。

  

泰銖兌美元今年以來上漲超過2%，為亞洲漲幅第二大貨幣。

  

三菱東京日聯銀行一篇報告稱，約23億美元外資湧入泰國債市，為泰銖貢獻多數升幅。

  

“這類資金流入顯示日本以外的亞洲資產仍具吸引力，儘管面臨歐洲央行縮減量化寬鬆、美聯儲升息、及日本央行的‘隱形縮減’，”報告稱。

  

0525 GMT，印尼盧比兌美元 IDR=ID 漲0.19%。

  

外資上周在印尼股市買入1.113億美元股票，9.883億美元債券。

  

分析師稱，外國資金流增加，是因投資者發現印尼盧比有利差交易的機會。

Content_EN:
Reuters January 15 - Asian currencies held sharp weekly, as the dollar plunged to a three-year low. Renminbi gains lead, as the German central bank decided to include the yuan in foreign exchange reserves.

  

Traders said stronger global risk appetite and higher commodity prices have helped boost regional sentiment.

  

The dollar index, DXY, slipped 0.2% to 90.857 earlier, its lowest level since January 2015.

  

The yuan jumped to a two-year high against the dollar CNY = CFXS, after a member of the German central bank said a member of the central bank has decided to include the renminbi in its reserves. (Full Story)

  

In addition, some optimistic projections, released on Thursday data will show that China's December gross domestic product (GDP) growth of at least 6.7%.

  

Stephen Innes, head of Asian-Pacific trading at OANDA, said the yuan's strength on Monday boosted the currency.

  

Ringgit (ringgit) against the dollar MYR = up more than 0.25% in the day, supported by rising oil prices.

  

Thai baht against the dollar THB = TH also rose, thanks to the inflow of foreign capital to Asia.

  

The baht rose more than 2% against the dollar this year, the second-largest currency in Asia.

  

Mitsubishi UFJ Bank said in a report that about 2.3 billion U.S. dollars of foreign capital poured into the Thai bond market, contributing most to the Thai baht.

  

"This inflow of funds shows that Asian assets outside Japan are still attractive, despite the ECB's curtailment of quantitative easing, the Fed's interest rate hike and the Bank of Japan's 'stealth drawdown,'" the report said.

  

At 0525 GMT, the Indonesian rupiah was up 0.19% against the dollar IDR = ID.

  

Foreign investors bought 111.3 million U.S. dollars of stock and 988.8 million U.S. dollars of bonds last week in the Indonesian stock market.

  

Analysts said the increase in foreign cash flow was due to investors' finding that the Indonesian Rupiah had a profitable trade.

Title: 新興匯市：風險偏好升溫扶助亞幣上漲，人民幣兌美元創逾兩年最強

Content:
路透1月15日 - 亚币周一持坚，因美元大跌至三年低位。人民币涨势领先，因德国央行决定在外汇储备中纳入人民币。

  

交易商称，全球风险偏好走强以及大宗商品价格上涨推动区域人气上涨。

  

美元指数 .DXY 稍早跌0.2%至90.857，为2015年1月以来最低。

  

人民币兑美元 CNY=CFXS 跳涨至两年多高位，此前德国央行委员会的一名委员称，该央行已决定将人民币纳入其外汇储备。(Full Story)

  

此外部分人士乐观预计，周四出炉的数据料将显示，中国12月当季国内生产总值(GDP)增长至少6.7%。

  

OANDA旗下亚太交易主管Stephen Innes称，周一人民币表现坚挺给亚币带来提振。

  

马币(林吉特)兑美元 MYR= 日内上涨逾0.25%，受油价升势支撑。

  

泰铢兑美元 THB=TH 亦上扬，受外资流入亚洲之助。

  

泰铢兑美元今年以来上涨超过2%，为亚洲涨幅第二大货币。

  

三菱东京日联银行一篇报告称，约23亿美元外资涌入泰国债市，为泰铢贡献多数升幅。

  

“这类资金流入显示日本以外的亚洲资产仍具吸引力，尽管面临欧洲央行缩减量化宽松、美联储升息、及日本央行的‘隐形缩减’，”报告称。

  

0525 GMT，印尼卢比兑美元 IDR=ID 涨0.19%。

  

外资上周在印尼股市买入1.113亿美元股票，9.883亿美元债券。

  

分析师称，外国资金流增加，是因投资者发现印尼卢比有利差交易的机会。

Title: ****主要国家及地区金融市场假期代码一览表****

Content:
路透1月12日 - 新興亞幣周五全線走堅，受美元下跌影響，之前公布的美國生產者物價指數表現疲軟，且歐洲央行的會議記錄立場偏鷹派。

  

歐元兌美元周四走堅，之前歐洲央行12月政策會議記錄顯示，歐洲央行決策者可能很快開始重新考慮政策信號，以便讓市場為其縮減大規模貨幣刺激計劃做好準備。(Full
Story)

  

美國12月生產者物價近一年半以來首次下滑，因服務成本下降，這可能導致2018年通脹將加速攀升的預期降溫。這也加劇了美元的頹勢。(Full Story)

Jan 12 (Reuters) -

“歐洲央行會議記錄略微顯示鷹派立場，以及美國12月PPI數據大幅不及預期，使美元受到打擊。12月PPI是16個月來首次下跌，”AxiTrader的首席市場策略師Greg
McKenna在報告中寫道。

  

韓元 KRW=KFTC 在亞幣中的漲幅居前，上漲0.8%，不過本周料錄得五周來首次周線下跌。

  

馬幣 MYR= 走強0.4%，本周料收漲0.6%。

  

印度盧比上漲0.2%，今天稍晚該國將公布通脹數據。

  

路透調查顯示，12月印度零售物價通脹可能上升至17個月高點，受到部分食品價格上漲以及政府雇員工資上漲的影響。

  

通脹上升可能促使央行收緊貨幣政策，印度央行12月重申了中性立場，但表示取決於物價壓力和增長的發展情況，“不排除任何選項”。

  

泰銖 THB=TH 漲0.3%，周線料上漲1%，在區域貨幣中表現最佳。

  

豐業銀行外匯策略師高奇稱，泰國強勁基本面以及持續的債券組合資金流，繼續為泰銖漲勢提供支撐。

  

人民幣兌美元即期 CNY=CFXS
漲0.3%，此前公布的數據顯示，中國12月出口數據超出分析師預估，貿易順差增至540億美元，為2016年1月以來最高。(Full Story)

  

���幣持倉方面，過去三周來，投資者擴大多數亞洲貨幣的多頭倉位，其中印度盧比的增幅最大，而美元則受到美國升息前景的不確定性、歐元上漲以及日本可能縮減刺激政策等因素的打擊。(Full
Story)

  

    
    
                                         亞洲     當日  今年以來   2017年                         最新報價  上日尾盤   漲跌%   漲跌%    收市價

  

    
    
        日圓       <JPY=>      111.26    111.24   -0.02   +1.27    112.67    坡元       <SGD=>      1.3285    1.3292   +0.05   +0.66    1.3373    台幣       <TWD=TP>    29.594    29.605   +0.04   +0.86    29.848    韓元       <KRW=>     1063.85   1072.00   +0.77   +0.63   1070.50    泰銖       <THB=>       31.96     32.00   +0.13   +1.94     32.58    菲律賓披索 <PHP=>       50.30     50.36   +0.12   -0.74     49.93    印尼盧比   <IDR=>    13365.00  13397.00   +0.24   +1.50  13565.00    印度盧比   <INR=IN>     63.54     63.66   +0.19   +0.53     63.87    馬幣       <MYR=>      3.9700    3.9850   +0.38   +1.86    4.0440    人民幣     <CNY=>      6.4805    6.4978   +0.27   +0.41    6.5069    注：人民幣“上日尾盤”一欄為“上日夜盤終”的報價     (完)

Content_EN:
Reuters, January 12 - SINCERE NAVIGATION CORPORATION Asian currencies strengthened on Friday as the dollar fell, after the previously released US producer price index was weak and the minutes of the European Central Bank meeting were hawkish.

  

The euro strengthened against the dollar on Thursday after ECB's December policy meeting minutes showed that ECB policymakers may soon begin to reconsider the policy signals in preparation for the market to trim its massive monetary stimulus plan. (Full
Story)

  

US producer prices fell in December for the first time in nearly a year and a half, due to lower service costs, which could lead to an expected slowdown in 2018 when inflation will accelerate. This also exacerbated the dollar's decline. (Full Story)

Jan 12 (Reuters) -

"The dollar plunged after the ECB minutes slightly showed hawkish positions and the US's PPI data fell sharply from expectations in December. December PPI dropped for the first time in 16 months," chief market strategist at AxiTrader Greg
McKenna wrote in the report.

  

Won KRW = KFTC rose 0.8% in Asian currencies, but fell for the first time in five weeks on the weekly archive.

  

MYR = MYR = 0.4% stronger and up 0.6% for the week.

  

The Indian rupee rose 0.2% after the country will release inflation data later in the day.

  

Reuters survey shows retail price inflation in India in December may rise to 17-month highs, affected by rising food prices and rising government wages.

  

Rising inflation may push the central bank to tighten monetary policy. India's central bank reiterated its neutral stance in December, but hinted at the development of price pressures and growth and "does not rule out any options."

  

Thai baht THB = TH up 0.3%, weekly up 1%, the best performance in the regional currency.

  

Scotiabank Bank of China foreign exchange strategist Gao Qi said that Thailand's strong fundamentals and continued bond portfolio flows continue to provide support for the Thai baht rally.

  

RMB to USD spot CNY = CFXS
Earlier, the data released earlier showed that China's December export data surpassed analysts' estimates and the trade surplus increased to 54 billion U.S. dollars, the highest since January 2016. (Full Story)

  

In terms of currency positions, investors have extended their long positions in most Asian currencies over the past three weeks, with the largest growth in the Indian rupee, while the U.S. dollar is subject to the uncertainty of the prospect of an interest rate increase in the United States, the rising euro and the possible downsizing stimulus in Japan And other factors blow. (Full
Story)

Title: 新興匯市：亞幣全線走堅，受美元下跌影響

Content:
路透1月12日 - 新兴亚币周五全线走坚，受美元下跌影响，之前公布的美国生产者物价指数表现疲软，且欧洲央行的会议记录立场偏鹰派。

  

欧元兑美元周四走坚，之前欧洲央行12月政策会议记录显示，欧洲央行决策者可能很快开始重新考虑政策信号，以便让市场为其缩减大规模货币刺激计划做好准备。(Full
Story)

  

美国12月生产者物价近一年半以来首次下滑，因服务成本下降，这可能导致2018年通胀将加速攀升的预期降温。这也加剧了美元的颓势。(Full Story)

Jan 12 (Reuters) -

“欧洲央行会议记录略微显示鹰派立场，以及美国12月PPI数据大幅不及预期，使美元受到打击。12月PPI是16个月来首次下跌，”AxiTrader的首席市场策略师Greg
McKenna在报告中写道。

  

韩元 KRW=KFTC 在亚币中的涨幅居前，上涨0.8%，不过本周料录得五周来首次周线下跌。

  

马币 MYR= 走强0.4%，本周料收涨0.6%。

  

印度卢比上涨0.2%，今天稍晚该国将公布通胀数据。

  

路透调查显示，12月印度零售物价通胀可能上升至17个月高点，受到部分食品价格上涨以及政府雇员工资上涨的影响。

  

通胀上升可能促使央行收紧货币政策，印度央行12月重申了中性立场，但表示取决于物价压力和增长的发展情况，“不排除任何选项”。

  

泰铢 THB=TH 涨0.3%，周线料上涨1%，在区域货币中表现最佳。

  

丰业银行外汇策略师高奇称，泰国强劲基本面以及持续的债券组合资金流，继续为泰铢涨势提供支撑。

  

人民币兑美元即期 CNY=CFXS
涨0.3%，此前公布的数据显示，中国12月出口数据超出分析师预估，贸易顺差增至540亿美元，为2016年1月以来最高。(Full Story)

  

���币持仓方��，过去三周来，投资者扩大多数亚洲货币的多头仓位，其中印度卢比的增幅最大，而美元则受到美国升息前景的不确定性、欧元上涨以及日本可能缩减刺激政策等因素的打击。(Full
Story)

Title: 新兴汇市：亚币全线走坚，受美元下跌影响

Content:
* 菲律賓披索多倉減少至2017年5月以來最低
  * 印度盧比多倉急劇增加

路透1月11日 -
過去三周來，投資者擴大多數亞洲貨幣的多頭倉位，其中印度盧比的增幅最大，而美元則受到美國升息前景的不確定性、歐元上漲以及日本可能縮減刺激政策等因素的打擊。

  

美元在2017年下跌，美元指數 .DXY 全年下跌近10%。

  

根據路透對11位分析師、交易商和基金經理的調查，在亞洲貨幣當中，印度盧比 INR=IN 的多倉達到2017年8月以來最高水平。

  

12月盧比受到國內政治形勢的提振。執政黨印度人民黨(BJP)在總理莫迪家鄉所在邦的選舉中獲勝。

  

另一項路透調查顯示，由此帶來的經濟效益，包括廢除大額紙幣之後以及實施商品和服務稅所帶來的效益，可能在近期提振盧比人氣。

  

人民幣兌美元 CNY=CFXS 多頭倉位增至9月9日以來最高水平。

  

中國央行周二表示，將降低“逆周期因子”在人民幣中間價決定中的作用，放鬆對人民幣匯率的管制，在中間價形成方面給市場更大空間。

  

中國央行去年5月在人民幣兌美元中間價報價模型中引入逆周期因子，意在緩解市場因素對人民幣中間價的影響。2017年年初人民幣匯率一度遇挫。

  

中國央行參事盛松成周末表示，較長期內人民幣兌美元可能穩定在6.6元人民幣左右。

  

韓元 KRW=KFTC 多倉最為強勁，增至11月末以來最高水平。

  

本周早些時候，韓元創三年盤中高點。截至去年11月，韓國經常帳已連續69個月實現盈餘。

  

基本看多亞幣的押注受到有關美聯儲今年升息步伐的不確定性影響。

  

美元勢頭還是受到歐元漲勢的抑制，歐元因市場預期歐洲央行將很快開始縮減刺激而受到提振。

  

東京方面，市場興起對日本央行今年後期可能開始放緩貨幣刺激的揣測，令日圓獲得穩健買興支���。

  

馬幣(林吉特) MYR= 多倉保持強勁，不過規模略低於三周前的水平。

  

上周馬幣兌美元漲至2016年8月以來最高位，受油價上漲支撐。

  

投資者削減了菲律賓披索多倉 PHP=PDSP，規模降至2017年5月以來最低，因預期菲律賓央行將採取中性政策立場。

  

惠譽上調菲律賓評級，該國第三季經濟增長強勁，以及稅改議案的通過，這些似乎都沒有入披索投資者的法眼。

  

對於國際收支狀況的擔憂或許是背後的原因。周三，菲律賓公布11月貿易逆差創下紀錄最高，因進口飆升。

  

菲律賓政府為今年設定的預算達到創紀錄的3.8萬億(兆)披索，計劃建設更多的港口、機場和鐵路，以吸引投資並提振經濟增長。

  

這暗示持續的進口需求或將令菲律賓出現15年來的首次經常帳赤字，這鎮住了披索多頭，因投資者擔心若外國投資不能維持的話，政府或面臨彌補經常帳赤字的困難。

  

這次調查是在周二及周三間進行，多數受訪者是在周三進回復的。

  

這項路透調查集中於亞洲新興市場九種貨幣的當前倉位情況，它們是人民幣、韓國韓元 、新加坡坡元、印尼盧比、台幣、印度盧比、菲律賓 披索、馬來西亞馬幣和泰國泰銖。

  

調查採用對凈多頭或凈空頭部位的估值，從負3到正3。正3表示市場極度作多美元。

  

該數據包括無本金交割遠期外匯(NDF)的部位。

  

調查結果如下(美元兌各種貨幣)：

Content_EN:
* Philippine peso short positions decreased to the lowest since May 2017
  * Indian Rupee sharply increased

Reuters January 11 -
Over the past three weeks, investors have extended their long positions in most Asian currencies, with the biggest increase in the Indian rupee, while the U.S. dollar has been hit by factors such as uncertainty about the prospect of a rate increase in the United States, the euro's rise and Japan's possible easing of stimulus.

  

The dollar fell in 2017, the dollar index, and DXY fell nearly 10% throughout the year.

  

According to Reuters survey of 11 analysts, traders and fund managers, the long position of Indian Rupee INR = IN reached the highest level since August 2017 among Asian currencies.

  

December rupee boosted by domestic political situation. The ruling party, the Bharatiya Baptist (BJP), won in the state of Prime Minister Modi's home town.

  

Another Reuters survey showed that the resulting economic benefits, including the repeal of large banknotes and the implementation of GST, may have boosted popularity in the near term.

  

RMB against the US dollar CNY = CFXS long positions to the highest level since Sept. 9.

  

The People's Bank of China said on Tuesday it would reduce the role of the "countercyclical factor" in deciding the mid-price of the renminbi and relax its control over the exchange rate of the renminbi, giving the market a bigger space in forming the mid-price.

  

In May last year, the People's Bank of China introduced a countercyclical factor in the mid-price quotation of RMB against the US dollar to mitigate the impact of market factors on the mid-point price of the renminbi. In early 2017, the renminbi exchange rate once suffered a setback.

  

Over the weekend, Senate Shengsong Cheng, China's central bank governor, said the renminbi may stabilize around 6.6 yuan against the U.S. dollar in the longer term.

  

Won KRW = KFTC's long position was the strongest, rising to the highest level since late November.

  

Earlier in the week, the won hit a three-year high. As of last November, South Korea's current account has been 69 consecutive months to achieve a surplus.

  

Basically, the multi-currency bets have been affected by the uncertainty surrounding the Fed's rate hike this year.

  

The momentum of the dollar is still being dampened by the euro's gains, boosted by the market's expectation that the European Central Bank will soon begin to trim its stimulus.

  

In Tokyo, the rise of the market speculated that the Bank of Japan may begin to slow monetary stimulus later this year, giving the yen a healthy buying interest.

  

MYR (MYR) MYR = Long positions remained strong, but slightly below the level of three weeks ago.

  

Last week the Ringgit against the U.S. dollar rose to the highest level since August 2016, supported by rising oil prices.

  

Investors cut PHPP PDSP for PHP, falling to the lowest level since May 2017 as the Central Bank of the Philippines is expected to take a neutral policy stance.

  

Fitch raised the Philippine rating, the country's third quarter of strong economic growth, as well as the adoption of the tax reform bill, these do not seem to have entered the peso investor's eye.

  

Concerns about the balance of payments situation may be the reason behind. On Wednesday, the Philippines announced that its trade deficit hit a record high in November as imports soared.

  

The Philippine government has set a record high of 3.8 trillion pesos for this year's budget and plans to build more ports, airports and railways to attract investment and boost economic growth.

  

This suggests that continued import demand may lead to the first ever current account deficit in 15 years in the Philippines, which has dampened the pesos for bulls as investors fear that the government will face the difficulty of making up for the current account deficit if foreign investment can not be sustained.

  

The survey was conducted on Tuesdays and Wednesdays, and most respondents returned on Wednesday.

  

The Reuters survey focused on the current position of nine currencies in Asia's SINCERE NAVIGATION CORPORATION market: Renminbi, South Korean won, Singaporean won, Indonesian rupiah, Taiwan dollar, Indian rupee, Philippine peso, Malaysian ringgit and Thai baht.

  

The survey used a valuation of net longs or net shorts, from negative 3 to positive 3. Positive 3 means that the market is extremely much for the dollar.

  

The data includes non-deliverable forward foreign exchange (NDF) sites.

  

The survey results are as follows (US dollar against various currencies):

  

    
    
     Date RMB won Slope yuan Indonesia Taiwan dollar Indian Ringgit Philippine baht (day / month) Rupees pesos 11/1 -0.47 -1.06 -0.75 -0.40 -0.88 -0.86 -1.05 0.00 -1.04 14/12 -0.25 -1.02 -0.25 0.00 -0.45 -0.17 -1.08 0.38 -1.12 30/11 -0.39 -1.34 -0.66 0.00 -0.54 -0.56 -1.16 0.35 -1.16 16/11 -0.24 -0.72 -0.31 0.16 -0.27 -0.42 -0.85 0.84 -0.87 2 / 11 -0.27 -0.7 -0.06 0.2 -0.1 -0.5 -0.42 1.18 -0.75 19/10 -0.06 0.14 -0.11 -0.35 -0.17 -0.55 -0.5 0.88 -0.58 5/10 -0.13 0.8 0.11 -0.03 0 0.3 -0.27 0.86 -0.34 21/9 -0.5 0.21 -0.39 -0.63 -0.28 -0.41 -0.46 0.71 -0.99 7/9 -1.32 0.13 -0.58 -0.46 -0.46 -0.73 -0.35 0.83 -0.99 24/8 -1.1 -0.19 -0.47 - 0.52 -0.35 -0.99 -0.17 0.97 -1.01 10/8 -1.14 -0.6 -0.74 -0.64 -0.33 -1.34 -0.37 0.55 -1.16 (End)

Title: 路透調查：多數亞幣多倉增加，中國人民幣和印度盧比獲穩定支撐

Content:
* 菲律宾披索多仓减少至2017年5月以来最低
  * 印度卢比多仓急剧增加

路透1月11日 -
过去三周来，投资者扩大多数亚洲货币的多头仓位，其中印度卢比的增幅最大，而美元则受到美国升息前景的不确定性、欧元上涨以及日本可能缩减刺激政策等因素的打击。

  

美元在2017年下跌，美元指数 .DXY 全年下跌近10%。

  

根据路透对11位分析师、交易商和基金经理的调查，在亚洲货币当中，印度卢比 INR=IN 的多仓达到2017年8月以来最高水平。

  

12月卢比受到国内政治形势的提振。执政党印度人民党(BJP)在总理莫迪家乡所在邦的选举中获胜。

  

另一项路透调查显示，由此带来的经济效益，包括废除大额纸币之后以及实施商品和服务税所带来的效益，可能在近期提振卢比人气。

  

人民币兑美元 CNY=CFXS 多头仓位增至9月9日以来最高水平。

  

中国央行周二表示，将降低“逆周期因子”在人民币中间价决定中的作用，放松对人民币汇率的管制，在中间价形成方面给市场更大空间。

  

中国央行去年5月在人民币兑美元中间价报价模型中引入逆周期因子，意在缓解市场因素对人民币中间价的影响。2017年年初人民币汇率一度遇挫。

  

中国央行参事盛松成周末表示，较长期内人民币兑美元可能稳定在6.6元人民币左右。

  

韩元 KRW=KFTC 多仓最为强劲，增至11月末以来最高水平。

  

本周早些时候，韩元创三年盘中高点。截至去年11月，韩国经常帐已连续69个月实现盈余。

  

基本看多亚币的押注受到有关美联储今年升息步伐的不确定性影响。

  

美元势头还是受到欧元涨势的抑制，欧元因市场预期欧洲央行将很快开始缩减刺激而受到提振。

  

东京方面，市场兴起对日本央行今年后期可能开始放缓货币刺激的揣测，令日圆��得稳健买兴支撑。

  

马币(林吉特) MYR= 多仓保持强劲，不过规模略低于三周前的水平。

  

上周马币兑美元涨至2016年8月以来最高位，受油价上涨支撑。

  

投资者削减了菲律宾披索多仓 PHP=PDSP，规模降至2017年5月以来最低，因预期菲律宾央行将采取中性政策立场。

  

惠誉上调菲律宾评级，该国第三季经济增长强劲，以及税改议案的通过，这些似乎都没有入披索投资者的法眼。

  

对于国际收支状况的担忧或许是背后的原因。周三，菲律宾公布11月贸易逆差创下纪录最高，因进口飙升。

  

菲律宾政府为今年设定的预算达到创纪录的3.8万亿(兆)披索，计划建设更多的港口、机场和铁路，以吸引投资并提振经济增长。

  

这暗示持续的进口需求或将令菲律宾出现15年来的首次经常帐赤字，这镇住了披索多头，因投资者担心若外国投资不能维持的话，政府或面临弥补经常帐赤字的困难。

  

这次调查是在周二及周三间进行，多数受访者是在周三进回复的。

  

这项路透调查集中于亚洲新兴市场九种货币的当前仓位情况，它们是人民币、韩国韩元 、新加坡坡元、印尼卢比、台币、印度卢比、菲律宾 披索、马来西亚马币和泰国泰铢。

  

调查采用对净多头或净空头部位的估值，从负3到正3。正3表示市场极度作多美元。

  

该数据包括无本金交割远期外汇(NDF)的部位。

  

调查结果如下(美元兑各种货币)：

  

    
    
     日期   人民币   韩元    坡元    印尼   台币     印度    马币  菲律宾   泰铢(日/月)                          卢比            卢比           披索 11/1    -0.47   -1.06   -0.75  -0.40    -0.88   -0.86   -1.05   0.00   -1.04 14/12   -0.25   -1.02   -0.25   0.00    -0.45   -0.17   -1.08   0.38   -1.12 30/11   -0.39   -1.34   -0.66   0.00    -0.54   -0.56   -1.16   0.35   -1.16 16/11   -0.24   -0.72   -0.31   0.16    -0.27   -0.42   -0.85   0.84   -0.87 2/11    -0.27   -0.7    -0.06   0.2     -0.1    -0.5    -0.42   1.18   -0.75 19/10   -0.06   0.14    -0.11   -0.35   -0.17   -0.55   -0.5    0.88   -0.58 5/10    -0.13   0.8     0.11    -0.03   0       0.3     -0.27   0.86   -0.34 21/9    -0.5    0.21    -0.39   -0.63   -0.28   -0.41   -0.46   0.71   -0.99 7/9     -1.32   0.13    -0.58   -0.46   -0.46   -0.73   -0.35   0.83   -0.99 24/8    -1.1    -0.19   -0.47   -0.52   -0.35   -0.99   -0.17   0.97   -1.01 10/8    -1.14   -0.6    -0.74   -0.64   -0.33   -1.34   -0.37   0.55   -1.16  (完)

Title: 路透调查：多数亚币多仓增加，中国人民币和印度卢比获稳定支撑

Content:
路透1月11日 - 多數新興亞幣周四微漲，美元隔夜下跌，此前有報導稱，中國準備放緩或停止購買美國公債，這推高了美國公債收益率。

  

彭博周三報導，負責評估中國外匯儲備管理的官員已建議放緩或停止購買美國公債，因為美國公債對中國的吸引力降低，而且美國與中國之間的貿易緊張關係升溫。(Full
Story) 這帶動美國公債收益率漲至10個月高位，美元下跌。

  

本周稍早日本央行聲明稱，將減少購買長期日債，令外界臆測日本央行今年可能將縮減貨幣刺激規模，美元因此受到打壓。

  

但周四亞幣漲勢因全球人氣下跌而受到抑制，因投資者重新評估風險水平，另外亞股因人們對美國貿易保護主義升溫的憂慮而下跌。

  

“亞洲除日本以外的貨幣多數上漲，因美元仍受到美債疑慮打壓，”  
馬來亞銀行分析師Saktiandi Supaat在一份研究報告中寫道。

  

“今天早上的避險情緒引爆股市賣盤，可能會使亞洲貨幣承壓，並限  
制盤中漲勢。”

  

泰銖兌美元 THB=TH 上漲0.3%至近三年半高點，印尼盧比 IDR= 則是小幅上漲。

  

另一方面，人民幣貶值0.1%。周三公布數據顯示，中國12月生產者物價創下13個月來最小漲幅。

  

“中國通脹數據有些消沉，這讓交易員們有了深思的理由，”Oanda亞太交易主管Stephen Innes表示。

  

馬幣 MYR= 在亞洲貨幣中漲幅最大，此前公布的數據顯示馬來西亞11月工業生產超出分析師預期，受三個主要領域全部實現增長提振。

  

馬來西亞11月工業生產 MYIP=ECI 同比增加5%，增幅高於10月份的3.4%。

  

油價上漲也對馬幣構成支撐，因為能源出口對馬來西亞國內生產總值(GDP)貢獻巨大。

  

儘管油價上漲提振了馬幣，但令印度盧比承壓。因為印度是僅次於中國的亞洲第二大石油進口國。印度盧比周四下跌0.2%，油價守在三年高點附近。

  

油價上漲可能導致印度經常帳赤字擴大。

Content_EN:
Reuters, January 11 - Most SINCERE NAVIGATION CORPORATION Asian currencies edged up on Thursday with the overnight decline in the dollar following reports that China is slowing or stopping buying U.S. bonds, pushing up the U.S. bond yields.

  

Bloomberg reported Wednesday that officials responsible for assessing China's foreign exchange reserves have suggested easing or halting purchases of U.S. bonds because of their reduced attractiveness to China and a tightening of trade tensions between the United States and China. (Full
This led the yield on U.S. bonds to rise to a 10-month high and the dollar fell.

  

Earlier this week, the Bank of Japan said in a statement that it will reduce the purchase of long-term Japanese bonds, leaving the outside world speculated that the Bank of Japan will likely reduce the size of the monetary stimulus this year, thus depressing the U.S. dollar.

  

However, the Asian currency rally on Thursday was dampened by the global recession as investors re-evaluated the level of risk while the other Asian shares fell as concerns over the warming of U.S. trade protectionism.

  

"Most Asian currencies other than Japan have risen because the dollar is still under pressure from the U.S. debt,"
Saktiandi Supaat, a Maybank analyst, wrote in a research note.

  

"This morning's risk aversion detonated stock market selling, Asian currencies may be under pressure, and limited
Intraday gains. "

  

The Thai baht was up 0.3% against the dollar THB = TH to nearly three-and-a-half-year highs, while the Indonesian rupiah IDR = rose marginally.

  

On the other hand, the RMB devaluation 0.1%. Data released on Wednesday showed that China's producer prices in December hit the smallest increase in 13 months.

  

"There has been some reason for traders' pause as inflation data in China is somewhat depressed," said Stephen Innes, Oanda Asia Pacific trading director.

  

MYR = The largest increase in Asian currencies, previously released data showed that Malaysian industrial production in November exceeded analysts' expectations and was boosted by the full realization of growth in all three major sectors.

  

Malaysia's MYIP for industrial production in November = ECI increased 5% YoY, up from 3.4% in October.

  

Rising oil prices also supported the Malaysian Ringgit because energy exports contributed hugely to Malaysian gross domestic product.

  

Despite rising oil prices boosted the Malaysian Ringgit, the Indian Rupee under pressure. Because India is second only to China, Asia's second largest oil importer. The Indian rupee fell 0.2% on Thursday, keeping oil near the three-year high.

  

Rising oil prices may lead to a widening current account deficit in India.

Title: 新興匯市：多數亞幣上漲，泰銖觸及近三年半高位

Content:
路透1月11日 - 多数新兴亚币周四微涨，美元隔夜下跌，此前有报导称，中国准备放缓或停止购买美国公债，这推高了美国公债收益率。

  

彭博周三报导，负责评估中国外汇储备管理的官员已建议放缓或停止购买美国公债，因为美国公债对中国的吸引力降低，而且美国与中国之间的贸易紧张关系升温。(Full
Story) 这带动美国公债收益率涨至10个月高位，美元下跌。

  

本周稍早日本央行声明称，将减少购买长期日债，令外界臆测日本央行今年可能将缩减货币刺激规模，美元因此受到打压。

  

但周四亚币涨势因全球人气下跌而受到抑制，因投资者重新评估风险水平，另外亚股因人们对美国贸易保护主义升温的忧虑而下跌。

  

“亚洲除日本以外的货币多数上涨，因美元仍受到美债疑虑打压，”  
马来亚银行分析师Saktiandi Supaat在一份研究报告中写道。

  

“今天早上的避险情绪引爆股市卖盘，可能会使亚洲货币承压，并限  
制盘中涨势。”

  

泰铢兑美元 THB=TH 上涨0.3%至近三年半高点，印尼卢比 IDR= 则是小幅上涨。

  

另一方面，人民币贬值0.1%。周三公布数据显示，中国12月生产者物价创下13个月来最小涨幅。

  

“中国通胀数据有些消沉，这让交易员们有了深思的理由，”Oanda亚太交易主管Stephen Innes表示。

  

马币 MYR= 在亚洲货币中涨幅最大，此前公布的数据显示马来西亚11月工业生产超出分析师预期，受三个主要领域全部实现增长提振。

  

马来西亚11月工业生产 MYIP=ECI 同比增加5%，增幅高于10月份的3.4%。

  

油价上涨也对马币构成支撑，因为能源出口对马来西亚国内生产总值(GDP)贡献巨大。

  

尽管油价上涨提振了马币，但令印度卢比承压。因为印度是仅次于中国的亚洲第二大石油进口国。印度卢比周四下跌0.2%，油价守在三年高点附近。

  

油价上涨可能导致印度经常帐赤字扩大。

Title: 新兴汇市：多数亚币上涨，泰铢触及近三年半高位

Content:
路透1月10日 - 菲律賓披索周���觸及逾三周低點，該國之前公布貿易逆差創下紀錄；其他亞幣多數缺乏方向，美元苦於維持近來反彈走勢。

  

今日稍早公布的數據顯示，菲律賓11月貿易逆差升至創紀錄的37.8億美元，這可能使該國15年來首次錄得經常帳赤字。

  

“披索在過去一個月走強，但鑒於貿易逆差繼續惡化，市場焦點將重新轉到該國的外部形勢上，這應該會拖累披索，”ANZ Banking
Group的亞洲研究主管Khoon Goh說。

  

其他多數亞幣缺乏明確指引，美元指數 .DXY 回吐亞洲市場早些時候的漲幅。

  

美國指標國債收益率周二觸及10個月高點後，美元盤中早些時候走高，但0513GMT美元跌0.1%。

  

Goh補充說，他預計亞洲貨幣近期將盤整，因為去年12月和今年初走勢強勁。

  

韓元 KRW=KFTC 是2017年漲幅最大的亞洲貨幣。韓元日內跌0.3%，與韓國綜合股價指數(KOSPI) .KS11
走勢一致，KOSPI下跌近0.25%。

  

韓元或將連續第四天下跌，自從韓國央行稱將在韓元波動幅度太大時做出回應後，韓元一直下跌。

  

兩位外匯交易員對路透表示，韓國外匯當局周一疑似在市場買入美元，當時韓元漲至逾三年盤中高位。(Full Story)

  

台幣 TWD=TP 也走軟；印尼盧比 IDR= 跌0.1%。

  

但泰銖 THB=TH 升0.2%，印度盧比 INR=IN 則走強0.1%。

  

人民幣 CNY=CFXS 升0.1%，周三人民幣兌美元中間價降至近兩周低位6.5207。

Content_EN:
Reuters January 10 - The Philippine peso weekly     hit a three-week low, after the country announced a record trade deficit; most other currencies lacked direction and the dollar struggled to sustain the recent rally.

  

Data released earlier today showed that the Philippine trade deficit rose to a record 3.78 billion U.S. dollars in November, possibly causing the country to make a current account deficit for the first time in 15 years.

  

"The peso has strengthened in the past month but with the trade deficit deteriorating, the focus of the market will shift back to the country's external situation, which should drag the peso," said ANZ Banking
Khoon Goh, head of Asia research at the Group, said.

  

Most other currencies lack clear guidance, the dollar index, DXY vomit Asian markets earlier gains.

  

The US dollar climbed earlier in the session after the U.S. benchmark Treasury yield hit a 10-month high on Tuesday, but the greenback for the 0513GMT fell 0.1%.

  

Goh added he expects Asian currencies to consolidate in the near term because of strong growth in December and early this year.

  

Won KRW = KFTC is the Asian currency with the largest increase in 2017. South Korean won fell 0.3% in the day, and the Korean Composite Price Index (KOSPI). KS11
In line with the trend, KOSPI dropped nearly 0.25%.

  

The South Korean won may fall for the fourth day in a row, and the won has been falling since the Bank of Korea said it will respond when the South Korean won fluctuates too much.

  

The two foreign exchange traders told Reuters that South Korean foreign exchange authorities were suspected of buying U.S. dollars in the market on Monday, when the Korean won rose to more than three-year highs. (Full Story)

  

Taiwan dollar TWD = TP also softened; Indonesian rupiah IDR = down 0.1%.

  

However, the Thai baht THB = TH gained 0.2%, while the Indian rupee INR = IN gained 0.1%.

  

Renminbi CNY = CFXS rose 0.1%, the central parity of RMB against the U.S. dollar dropped to a low of 6.5207 in the recent two weeks on Wednesday.

Title: 新興匯市：亞幣漲跌互見，菲律賓披索創逾三周低點受貿易數據拖累

Content:
路透1月10日 - 菲律宾披索周三触及逾三周低点，该国之前公布贸易逆差创下纪录；其他亚币多数缺乏方向，美元苦于维持近来反弹走势。

  

今日稍早公布的数据显示，菲律宾11月贸易逆差升至创纪录的37.8亿美元，这可能使该国15年来首次录得经常帐赤字。

  

“披索在过去一个月走强，但鉴于贸易逆差继续恶化，市场焦点将重新转到该国的外部形势上，这应该会拖累披索，”ANZ Banking
Group的亚洲研究主管Khoon Goh说。

  

其他多数亚币缺乏明确指引，美元指数 .DXY 回吐亚洲市场早些时候的涨幅。

  

美国指标国债收益率周二触及10个月高点后，美元盘中早些时候走高，但0513GMT美元跌0.1%。

  

Goh补充说，他预计亚洲货币近期将盘整，因为去年12月和今年初走势强劲。

  

韩元 KRW=KFTC 是2017年涨幅最大的亚洲货币。韩元日内跌0.3%，与韩国综合股价指数(KOSPI) .KS11
走势一致，KOSPI下跌近0.25%。

  

韩元或将连续第四天下跌，自从韩国央行称将在韩元波动幅度太大时做出回应后，韩元一直下跌。

  

两位外汇交易员对路透表示，韩国外汇当局周一疑似在市场买入美元，当时韩元涨至逾三年盘中高位。(Full Story)

  

台币 TWD=TP 也走软；印尼卢比 IDR= 跌0.1%。

  

但泰铢 THB=TH 升0.2%，印度卢比 INR=IN 则走强0.1%。

  

人民币 CNY=CFXS 升0.1%，周三人民币兑美元中间价降至近两周低位6.5207。

Data released earlier today showed that the Philippine trade deficit rose to a record 3.78 billion U.S. dollars in November, possibly causing the country to make a current account deficit for the first time in 15 years.

  

"The peso has strengthened in the past month but with the trade deficit deteriorating, the focus of the market will shift back to the country's external situation, which should drag the peso," said ANZ Banking
Khoon Goh, head of Asia research at the Group, said.

  

Most other currencies lack clear guidance, the dollar index, DXY vomit Asian markets earlier gains.

  

The US dollar climbed earlier in the session after the U.S. benchmark Treasury yield hit a 10-month high on Tuesday, but the greenback for the 0513GMT fell 0.1%.

  

Goh added he expects Asian currencies to consolidate in the near term because of strong growth in December and early this year.

  

Won KRW = KFTC is the Asian currency with the largest increase in 2017. South Korean won fell 0.3% in the day, and the Korean Composite Price Index (KOSPI). KS11

Taiwan dollar TWD = TP also softened; Indonesian rupiah IDR = down 0.1%.

  

However, the Thai baht THB = TH gained 0.2%, while the Indian rupee INR = IN gained 0.1%.

Title: 新兴汇市：亚币涨跌互见，菲律宾披索创逾三周低点受贸易数据拖累

Content:
森鉅 8942.TWO 即時重大訊息之詳細內容  
本資料由(上櫃公司)森鉅公司提供

  

    
    
    序號:2            發言日期:107/01/15              發言時間:16:45:16發言人:陳啟煌  發言人職稱:副總經理         發言人電話:06-2397257主旨:本公司向關係人取得土地公告符合條款第20款 事實發生日:106/07/17說明1.標的物之名稱及性質（如坐落台中市北區ＸＸ段ＸＸ小段土地）:歸仁北段988等地號土地2.事實發生日:106/7/17~106/7/173.交易單位數量（如ＸＸ平方公尺，折合ＸＸ坪）、每單位價格及交易總金額:建地205.81坪，每坪11萬，合計22,639,100元。路地40.31坪，依公告地價(每坪66,280)購買，合計2,671,733元。建地+路地合計25,310,833元4.交易相對人及其與公司之關係（交易相對人如屬自然人，且非公司之關係人者，得免揭露其姓名）:交易相對人-鄭憲松為本公司之總經理及董事5.交易相對人為關係人者，並應公告選定關係人為交易對象之原因及前次移轉之所有人、前次移轉之所有人與公司及交易相對人間相互之關係、前次移轉日期及移轉金額:森鉅公司於2014年購買歸仁北段 988地號等地號，該土地位於歸仁區生活機能佳之地段，從2014年到2017年與該土地之其他共同持分之地主溝通向購買土地後開發，因其他共同持分之所有人意見不同，與土地代書討論後建議以土地法第34條逕行向法院提存購入其他共有人之土地，適當時機點再開發。於2017年5月份董事會通過依市價向關係人鄭憲松購入土地後，森鉅公司可以土地持有超過1/2者身分以土地法34條提存土地讓歸仁北段988地號土地可以完整開發。6.交易標的最近五年內所有權人曾為公司之關係人者，尚應公告關係人之取得及處分日期、價格及交易當時與公司之關係:關係人鄭憲松土地之前手均非關係人，自民國81年、85年及89年分批取得該共同持分土地，關係人取得成本新台幣15,777,178元。7.預計處分利益（或損失）（取得資產者不適用）（遞延者應列表說明認列情形）:不適用8.交付或付款條件（含付款期間及金額）、契約限制條款及其他重要約定事項:訂金10,000,000元土地登記後支付尾款9.本次交易之決定方式（如招標、比價或議價）、價格決定之參考依據及決策單位:依購買價格依市價執行、交易條件與非關係人相同。106年5月份向非關係人-A及106年6月份向非關係人-B交易之合約，本公司購入土地之建地市價分別為150,000元/坪及110,000元/坪。本公司向關係人購入之建地價格為110,000元/坪，同一持分土地，可見關係人成交價格與非關係人相同。10.專業估價者事務所或公司名稱及其估價金額:不適用11.專業估價師姓名:不適用12.專業估價師開業證書字號:不適用13.估價報告是否為限定價格、特定價格或特殊價格:否或不適用14.是否尚未取得估價報告:是15.尚未取得估價報告之原因:依購買價格依市價執行、交易條件與非關係人相同。106年5月份向非關係人-A及106年6月份向非關係人-B交易之合約，本公司購入土地之建地市價分別為150,000元/坪及110,000元/坪。本公司向關係人購入之建地價格為110,000元/坪，同一持分土地，可見關係人成交價格與非關係人相&16.與交易金額比較有重大差異原因及會計師意見:不適用17.經紀人及經紀費用:不適用18.取得或處分之具體目的或用途:本公司持有歸仁北段地號988及989等土地，該土地有其他共有人持分，該地自2014年向非關係人持續購入，待適當時機開發，在台南市升格為直轄市後不動產行情仍熱絡，在歸仁區歸仁北段地號988及989等土地在中心點，開發建設不動產非常適合。19.本次交易表示異議之董事之意見:無20.本次交易為關係人交易:是21.董事會通過日期:民國106年05月22日通過議案，依適當時機購買。22.監察人承認或審計委員會同意日期:民國106年05月22日23.本次交易係向關係人取得不動產:否24.依「公開發行公司取得或處分資產處理準則」第十五條規定評估之價格:不適用25.依前項評估之價格較交易價格為低者，依同準則第十六條規定評估之價格:不適用26.其他敘明事項:NA

  

*以上資料均由各公司依發言當時所屬市場別之規定申報後，由本系統對外公佈，資料如有虛偽不實，均由該公司負責。

Reasons for not obtaining the Valuation Report: The purchase price will be executed at the market price with the same trading conditions as the non-related parties. In May 106 to non-affiliates -A and June 106 to non-affiliate-B transactions, the purchase price of the land of the Company were RMB150,000 / ping and RMB110,000 / ping, respectively. The land price of the land acquired by the Company from the related parties is RMB110,000 / ping and the same land holding place shows that the transaction price of the related parties is the same as that of the non-related parties 16. Significant difference compared with the transaction amount Reason and accountant opinion: Not applicable 17. Brokerage Person and brokerage fee: N / A 18. Specific purpose or purpose of acquisition or disposal: The Company holds land such as No. 988 and No. 989 of Quy Nhon Section, which is under the control of other co-owners. Since 2014, People continue to purchase, to be developed at the right time, upgraded to a municipality directly under the central government in Tainan Quotes are still hot, in Quy Nhon district Quy Nhon No. 988 and 989 and other land at the center, the development and construction of real estate is very suitable. 19. Opinion of the Dissenting Director on the Transaction: Nil 20. The Transaction is for a Related Party Transaction: Yes 21. Date of Board Approval: The Republic of China was approved on May 22, 2006 and is due at an opportune time. 22. Approval of the Supervisory Committee or Approval of the Audit Committee Date: 22 May 106 23. The transaction was made on the acquisition of real property by the acquiree: No 24. Title: [即時重大訊息] 森鉅<8942.TWO>本公司向關係人取得土地公告

Content:
【時報-盤中焦點股】1.南亞科(2408)：昨外資轉賣超+美光昨夜重挫，早盤股價續跌逾3%。

2.同欣電(6271)：去年12月營收月減6.63%、全年減3.88%，投信連日賣超，外資昨亦加入空頭行列，衝擊早盤股價急跌逾8.5%。

3.佳大(2033)：今起恢復原融資比率及融券保證金成數，買盤持續搶進，股價跳空鎖在漲停價12.05元，續創新高。

4.世紀鋼(9958)：昨外資轉買超，不甩列注意股，早盤衝上40元大關，續創新高價。

5.第一銅(2009)：連跌5個交易日後，昨獲外資轉買超，今早交投火熱，盤初成交量即輕鬆突破萬張、股價漲近7%。

6.大成鋼(2027)：美稅務政策利多續熱，三大法人持續聯手買超，帶動早盤股價再漲逾4%。

  

7.中鴻(2014)：中國限產有利產業，昨獲三大法人擴大買超18131張，早盤股價續漲至14.25元、再創新高。

8.麗清(3346)：去年12月、Q4、全年營收皆創新高，早盤放量衝上78.5元、股價漲逾6%。

9.羅昇(8374)：去年每股盈餘估近2元，今年營運亦有機會續走高，近日股價緩步走高，早盤漲近3%。

10.永冠-KY(1589)：今起買回庫藏股，早盤量增價漲逾8.5%。

11.盟立(2464)：去年12月營收年增57.39%，今年營收看增雙位數，股價終結修正格局，早盤大漲8%。

12.致茂(2360)：上月合併營收11.99億元，月減51%，股價大受打擊，重跌5.5%。

13.雷虎(8033)：推出4G空中基地台無人直升機等新品搶市，早盤續強再漲3%，一舉突破前高。

14.雄獅(2731)：三大法人續偏多，昨日合計買超778張，今早股價逼近125元，創2年來新高價。

15.台玻(1802)：對岸去產能力道加大，今年大陸平板玻璃獲利樂觀，股價多頭行情未改，一度大漲3%。

16.樺漢(6414)：母子齊旺，上月、上季、去年營收飆3高，推升股價反彈逾3.5%。

17.宏碁(2353)：上月營收站穩200億元，年增逾1成，早盤多頭回頭，股價一度漲近2%。

  

  

18.華豐(2109)：甩高層財務糾紛，昨外資相挺大漲，早盤續漲逾1.8%，挑戰14元前波高價

    
    
    。

19.信昌化(4725)：受惠美國酚、丙酮供應減少，市場對今年營運持正面期待，昨日獲三大法人聯手買超1650張，短多氣勢如虹，早盤帶量衝高半根停板，站上近5年高點。

20.台聚(1304)：獲外資力挺，連五日買超5795張，早盤挾量上攻2%，站上10個月新高。

  

  

21.南亞(1303)：EG報價站高檔，加上大陸執行嚴格環保稽查，利差空間受惠提振，昨獲三大法人聯手買超3754張，早盤攻上83.1元，改寫逾6年半新高價。

22.智易(3596)：上月營收年減35.74%，早盤賣壓湧出，股價重挫7%，跌落���線。

23.友訊(2332)：攜手國際一線大廠共組大友訊聯盟，在轉機題材持續發熱下，早盤價量俱揚大漲4%。

24.集盛(1455)：抗寒概念股題材發燒，早盤獲多頭點火，股價衝高近3%。

25.禾伸堂（3026）：上季被動元件營收占比維持40%以上，由於MLCC市場需求依然強勁，樂觀看待2018年營運績效，股價一度漲逾4%。

26.富喬(1815)：外資連續買超4日計6608張，盤初股價漲2.25%。

27.嘉澤(3533) ：三大法人連續賣超3日，與鴻海的訴訟結果引發關注，股價一度跌逾6%。

28.華通(2313)：去年12月營收創歷史次高，月減1.28%，惟昨遭三大法人連人賣超萬餘張，股價跌2.4%。

29.力麗(1444)：寒冬商機發威，早盤獲買盤搶進，股價急拉大漲6%，衝上近6年高峰。

    
    
    1303 1304 1444 1455 1589 1802 1815 2009 2014 2027 2033 2109 2313 2332 2353 23602408 2464 2731 3026 3346 3533 3596 4725 6271 6414 8033 8374 9958

联华实业 1229.TW 即时重大讯息之详细内容  
本资料由(上市公司)联华实业公司提供

  

    
    
    序号:1            发言日期:107/01/10              发言时间:18:24:38发言人:景虎士  发言人职称:总经理            发言人电话:(02)27861188-1100主旨:本公司董事会通过於美金1,500万元范围内由本公司或本公司之关联企业参与投资大陆地区「福建福华气体有限公司」（名称暂订）。符合条款第20款 事实发生日:107/01/10说明1.事实发生日:自民国107/1/10至民国107/1/102.本次新增（减少）投资方式:由本公司或本公司关联企业以直接或间接方式（透过第三地区转投资公司）投资大陆地区公司。3.交易单位数量、每单位价格及交易总金额:投资金额不超过美金1,500万元范围内。4.大陆被投资公司之公司名称:「福建福华气体有限公司」（暂订）。5.前开大陆被投资公司之实收资本额:新设公司，不适用。6.前开大陆被投资公司本次拟新增资本额:人民币1.9亿元。7.前开大陆被投资公司主要营业项目:生产及销售工业气体。8.前开大陆被投资公司最近年度财务报表会计师意见型态:新设公司，不适用。9.前开大陆被投资公司最近年度财务报表净值:新设公司，不适用。10.前开大陆被投资公司最近年度财务报表损益金额:新设公司，不适用。11.迄目前为止，对前开大陆被投资公司之实际投资金额:无。12.交易相对人及其与公司之关系:不适用。13.交易相对人为关系人者，并应公告选定关系人为交易对象之原因及前次移转之所有人、前次移转之所有人与公司及交易相对人间相互之关系、前次移转日期及移转金额:不适用。14.交易标的最近五年内所有权人曾为公司之关系人者，尚应公告关系人之取得及处分日期、价格及交易当时与公司之关系:不适用。15.处分利益（或损失）:不适用。16.交付或付款条件（含付款期间及金额）、契约限制条款及其他重要约定事项:经济部投审会核准后依资金需求进度分次汇出。17.本次交易之决定方式、价格决定之参考依据及决策单位:董事会。18.经纪人:不适用。19.取得或处分之具体目的:长期投资。20.本次交易表示异议董事之意见:无。21.本次交易为关系人交易:否22.董事会通过日期:不适用。23.监察人承认或审计委员会同意日期:不适用。24.迄目前为止，投审会核准赴大陆地区投资总额（含本次投资）:美金101,320仟元。25.迄目前为止，投审会核准赴大陆地区投资总额（含本次投资）占最近期财务报表实收资本额之比率:33.66%。26.迄目前为止，投审会核准赴大陆地区投资总额（含本次投资）占最近期财务报表总资产之比率:12.37%。27.迄目前为止，投审会核准赴大陆地区投资总额（含本次投资）占最近期财务报表归属於母公司业主之权益之比率:13.42%。28.迄目前为止，实际赴大陆地区投资总额:美金57,905仟元。29.迄目前为止，实际赴大陆地区投资总额占最近期财务报表实收资本额之比率:18.95%。30.迄目前为止，实际赴大陆地区投资总额占最近期财务报表总资产之比率:6.97%。31.迄目前为止，实际赴大陆地区投资总额占最近期财务报表归属於母公司业主之权益之比率:7.56%。32.最近三年度认列投资大陆损益金额:105年：新台币(38,617)仟元104年：新台币(34,767)仟元103年：新台币(35,348)仟元33.最近三年度获利汇回金额:无。34.本次交易会计师出具非合理性意见:不适用35.其他叙明事项:1.董事会授权董事长视实际需要由本公司或本公司之关联企业作为投资主体及为本投资案完成之其他必要相关行为。2.董事会授权副董事长代表本公司与陆方议定及签署合资企业合同及其他相关必要合约或文件。

  

*以上资料均由各公司依发言当时所属市场别之规定申报后，由本系统对外公布，资料如有虚伪不实，均由该公司负责。
