Title: [即时重大讯息] 联华实业<1229.TW>本公司董事会通过於美金1,500万元范围内由本公司或本公司之关联企业参与投资大陆地区「福建福华气体有限公司」（名称暂订）。

Content:
路透1月16日 - 亚洲货币周二走低，因投资者在其今年大幅上涨之后，对于增加新头寸变得有些谨慎。

  

美元/日圆 JPY= 涨0.3%至110.85，脱离周一触及的四个月低点110.32。

  

“我认为，亚洲货币在昨日大涨之后，目前处于盘整阶段，”瑞穗银行的外汇策略师Chang Wei Liang表示。

  

“短期内，美元兑亚洲货币的跌势可能持续，反映出该地区正面的增长环境，”Chang Wei Liang称。

  

他指出，欧元目前对亚币构成扶助。欧元兑美元 EUR= 上涨0.03%至1.2265。

  

相对强弱指标(RSI)等技术指标显示，印尼卢比 IDR=ID、台币 TWD=TP、马币 MYR=、泰铢 THB=TH 和坡元 SGD= 处于超买。

  

亚币去年大涨后，一些央行料将干预汇市，让本币贬值以保护出口。

  

泰铢小跌，韩元 KRW=KFTC 也下滑，日内下跌近0.25%。

  

但油价上涨周二提振马币。

  

中国人民币兑美元即期 CNY=CFXS 周二早盘继续大涨，但未升破昨日盘中高点，中间价则创25个月新高。(Full Story)

  

一些分析师表示，有关欧洲央行(ECB)将缩减货币刺激措施的预期增强，亚洲货币也受到影响。

  

从以往来看，亚洲货币受益于主要央行提供的全球流动性。

  

印度卢比兑美元 INR=D2 跌0.31%，至63.683，受到原油价格近期飙升打��。

  

印度是亚洲仅次于中国的第二大石油进口国。

  

马来亚银行周二公布的一项报告称，油价上涨及其它通胀压力有可能促使印度央行较预期提前升息。

  

“卢比有可能会是亚洲同步复苏中的一个异数，”报告称。

Content_EN:
Reuters, January 16 - Asian currencies were lower Tuesday as investors became cautious about adding new positions after their sharp rise this year.

  

USD / JPY JPY = up 0.3% at 110.85, hitting 110.32, the four-month low touched on Monday.

  

"I think Asian currencies are in a consolidation phase after yesterday's rally," said Chang Wei Liang, currency strategist at Mizuho Bank.

  

"The dollar's decline against Asian currencies may continue in the short term, reflecting the positive growth environment in the region," Chang Wei Liang said.

  

He pointed out that the euro is currently aiding the Asian currencies. The euro was up 0.03% to 1.2265 against the dollar.

  

Relative strength index (RSI) and other technical indicators show that the Indonesian rupiah IDR = ID, TWD TWD = TP, MYR MYR =, Thai Baht THB = TH and SGD SGD = Overbought.

  

After the Asian currency rose sharply last year, some central banks expected to intervene in the foreign exchange market to depreciate their currencies to protect their exports.

  

The Thai baht slipped, the won KRW = KFTC also slipped and fell nearly 0.25% during the day.

  

But rising oil prices boosted the Malaysian ringgit on Tuesday.

  

China Renminbi vs. USD Spot CNY = CFXS continued to rise sharply in early trading Tuesday but failed to rise above yesterday's intraday high while the median price hit a 25-month high. (Full Story)

  

Some analysts said Asian currencies have also been affected by expectations that the European Central Bank will curtail its monetary stimulus.

  

In the past, Asian currencies have benefited from the global liquidity offered by major central banks.

  

Indian rupee fell 0.31% to US $ 63.683 against US dollar at INR = D2, hit by recent surge in crude oil prices.

  

India is the second largest oil importer in Asia after China.

  

A report released by Maybank said on Tuesday that rising oil prices and other inflationary pressures could push the Bank of India to raise interest rates earlier than expected.

  

"Rupiah may be an alien in the synchronized recovery in Asia," the report said.

Title: 新兴汇市：亚洲货币走贬，因投资者在大涨之后趋于谨慎

Content:
路透1月15日 - 亚币周一持坚，因美元大跌至三年低位。人民币涨势领先，因德国央行决定在外汇储备中纳入人民币。

  

交易商称，全球风险偏好走强以及大宗商品价格上涨推动区域人气上涨。

  

美元指数 .DXY 稍早跌0.2%至90.857，为2015年1月以来最低。

  

人民币兑美元 CNY=CFXS 跳涨至两年多高位，此前德国央行委员会的一名委员称，该央行已决定将人民币纳入其外汇储备。(Full Story)

  

此外部分人士乐观预计，周四出炉的数据料将显示，中国12月当季国内生产总值(GDP)增长至少6.7%。

  

OANDA旗下亚太交易主管Stephen Innes称，周一人民币表现坚挺给亚币带来提振。

  

马币(林吉特)兑美元 MYR= 日内上涨逾0.25%，受油价升势支撑。

  

泰铢兑美元 THB=TH 亦上扬，受外资流入亚洲之助。

  

泰铢兑美元今年以来上涨超过2%，为亚洲涨幅第二大货币。

  

三菱东京日联银行一篇报告称，约23亿美元外资涌入泰国债市，为泰铢贡献多数升幅。

  

“这类资金流入显示日本以外的亚洲资产仍具吸引力，尽管面临欧洲央行缩减量化宽松、美联储升息、及日本央行的‘隐形缩减’，”报告称。

  

0525 GMT，印尼卢比兑美元 IDR=ID 涨0.19%。

  

外资上周在印尼股市买入1.113亿美元股票，9.883亿美元债券。

  

分析师称，外国资金流增加，是因投资者发现印尼卢比有利差交易的机会。

Content_EN:
Reuters January 15 - The Asian currencies held firm on Monday as the dollar plunged to a three-year low. Renminbi gains lead, as the German central bank decided to include the yuan in foreign exchange reserves.

  

Traders said stronger global risk appetite and higher commodity prices have helped boost regional sentiment.

  

The dollar index, DXY, slipped 0.2% to 90.857 earlier, its lowest level since January 2015.

  

The yuan jumped to a two-year high against the dollar CNY = CFXS, after a member of the German central bank said a member of the central bank has decided to include the renminbi in its reserves. (Full Story)

  

In addition, some optimistic projections, released on Thursday data will show that China's December gross domestic product (GDP) growth of at least 6.7%.

  

Stephen Innes, head of Asian-Pacific trading at OANDA, said the yuan's strength on Monday boosted the currency.

  

Ringgit (ringgit) against the dollar MYR = up more than 0.25% in the day, supported by rising oil prices.

  

Thai baht against the dollar THB = TH also rose, thanks to the inflow of foreign capital to Asia.

  

The baht rose more than 2% against the dollar this year, the second-largest currency in Asia.

  

Mitsubishi UFJ Bank said in a report that about 2.3 billion U.S. dollars of foreign capital poured into the Thai bond market, contributing most to the Thai baht.

  

"This inflow of funds shows that Asian assets outside Japan are still attractive, despite the ECB's curtailment of quantitative easing, the Fed's interest rate hike and the Bank of Japan's 'stealth drawdown,'" the report said.

  

At 0525 GMT, the Indonesian rupiah was up 0.19% against the dollar IDR = ID.

  

Foreign investors bought 111.3 million U.S. dollars of stock and 988.8 million U.S. dollars of bonds last week in the Indonesian stock market.

  

Analysts said the increase in foreign cash flow was due to investors' finding that the Indonesian Rupiah had a profitable trade.

Title: 新兴汇市：风险偏好升温扶助亚币上涨，人民币兑美元创逾两年最强

Content:
路透1月12日 - 新兴亚币周五全线走坚，受美元下跌影响，之前公布的美��生产者物价指数表现疲软，且欧洲央行的会议记录立场偏鹰派。

  

欧元兑美元周四走坚，之前欧洲央行12月政策会议记录显示，欧洲央行决策者可能很快开始重新考虑政策信号，以便让市场为其缩减大规模货币刺激计划做好准备。(Full
Story)

  

美国12月生产者物价近一年半以来首次下滑，因服务成本下降，这可能导致2018年通胀将加速攀升的预期降温。这也加剧了美元的颓势。(Full Story)

Jan 12 (Reuters) -

“欧洲央行会议记录略微显示鹰派立场，以及美国12月PPI数据大幅不及预期，使美元受到打击。12月PPI是16个月来首次下跌，”AxiTrader的首席市场策略师Greg
McKenna在报告中写道。

  

韩元 KRW=KFTC 在亚币中的涨幅居前，上涨0.8%，不过本周料录得五周来首次周线下跌。

  

马币 MYR= 走强0.4%，本周料收涨0.6%。

  

印度卢比上涨0.2%，今天稍晚该国将公布通胀数据。

  

路透调查显示，12月印度零售物价通胀可能上升至17个月高点，受到部分食品价格上涨以及政府雇员工资上涨的影响。

  

通胀上升可能促使央行收紧货币政策，印度央行12月重申了中性立场，但表示取决于物价压力和增长的发展情况，“不排除任何选项”。

  

泰铢 THB=TH 涨0.3%，周线料上涨1%，在区域货币中表现最佳。

  

丰业银行外汇策略师高奇称，泰国强劲基本面以及持续的债券组合资金流，继续为泰铢涨势提供支撑。

  

人民币兑美元即期 CNY=CFXS
涨0.3%，此前公布的数据显示，中国12月出口数据超出分析师预估，贸易顺差增至540亿美元，为2016年1月以来最高。(Full Story)

  

亚币持仓方面，过去三周来，投资者扩大多数亚洲货币的多头仓位，其中印度卢比的增幅最大，而美元则受到美国升息前景的不确定性、欧元上涨以及日本可能缩减刺激政策等因素的打击。(Full
Story)

Content_EN:
Reuters, January 12 - SINCERE NAVIGATION CORPORATION Asian currencies strengthened on Friday as the dollar plunged after the previously released US producer price index weakened and the European Central Bank's minutes were skeptical of hawks.

  

The euro strengthened against the dollar on Thursday after ECB's December policy meeting minutes showed that ECB policymakers may soon begin to reconsider the policy signals in preparation for the market to trim its massive monetary stimulus plan. (Full
Story)

  

US producer prices fell in December for the first time in nearly a year and a half, due to lower service costs, which could lead to an expected slowdown in 2018 when inflation will accelerate. This also exacerbated the dollar's decline. (Full Story)

Jan 12 (Reuters) -

"The dollar plunged after the ECB minutes slightly showed hawkish positions and the US's PPI data fell sharply from expectations in December. December PPI dropped for the first time in 16 months," chief market strategist at AxiTrader Greg
McKenna wrote in the report.

  

Won KRW = KFTC rose 0.8% in Asian currencies, but fell for the first time in five weeks on the weekly archive.

  

MYR = MYR = 0.4% stronger and up 0.6% for the week.

  

The Indian rupee rose 0.2% after the country will release inflation data later in the day.

  

Reuters survey shows retail price inflation in India in December may rise to 17-month highs, affected by rising food prices and rising government wages.

  

Rising inflation may push the central bank to tighten monetary policy. India's central bank reiterated its neutral stance in December, but hinted at the development of price pressures and growth and "does not rule out any options."

  

Thai baht THB = TH up 0.3%, weekly up 1%, the best performance in the regional currency.

  

Scotiabank Bank of China foreign exchange strategist Gao Qi said that Thailand's strong fundamentals and continued bond portfolio flows continue to provide support for the Thai baht rally.

  

RMB to USD spot CNY = CFXS
Earlier, the data released earlier showed that China's December export data surpassed analysts' estimates and the trade surplus increased to 54 billion U.S. dollars, the highest since January 2016. (Full Story)

  

Asian currency positions, investors over the past three weeks to expand the long positions in most Asian currencies, of which the largest increase in Indian Rupee, while the United States dollar is subject to the uncertainty of the prospects for the United States to raise interest rates, the euro rise and Japan may reduce the stimulus policy and other factors The blow. (Full
Story)

Title: 新兴汇市：亚币全线走坚，受美元下跌影响

Content:
路透伦敦1月11日 \-
日本或将比预期更快地退出刺激举措的担忧，本周已在包括新兴经济体在内的全球市场掀起波澜；若日圆走升，可能会让日本基金减少在新兴市场的海外投资配置。

  

日本央行周一减少购债，推升全球债券收益率并令新兴市场货币受挫后，日圆飙升，许多新兴市场货币兑日圆创下数月来最差周线表现。

  

之后日本央行未削减购债规模，安抚了市场。但鉴于日本央行坐拥日债市场的半数，其或许已接近缩减购买。届时随着日本基金汇回资金，日圆可能会飙升。

  

难以预测新兴市场受到的影响。但本周的动向或将提供线索。

  

新兴市场货币兑美元跌幅在0.3-0.8%。而土耳其里拉兑日圆本周累计已跌近3%，巴西雷亚尔、墨西哥披索和南非兰特兑日圆的跌幅则在1.5-2.5%。

  

“市场将日本央行之举解读为，他们的货币宽松或许触顶，因此已见到新兴市场货币交叉汇率做出了反应。”瑞银(UBS)策略师Manik Narain称。

  

“我们的分析显示，日本投资组合中的新兴市场占比已增，不过美国的投资者在这块市场中占比仍远大得多。”

  

日本勇敢的散户大军--统称渡边太太--
投资新兴市场有据可查。但机构投资者对此的兴趣自2010年以来也在增加，尽管速度缓慢。2010年时，规模1.2万亿美元的日本政府退休金投资基金(GPIF)宣布，将配置更多资产于新兴市场。GPIF是全球最大的投资者之一。

  

国际金融协会(IIF)数据估计，自2013年以来的日本资金流约为660亿美元，分配在新兴债市和股市的近乎各半。

  

IIF表示，其中约100亿美元是在2017年前10个月做出的。但这与去年流向新兴资产的投资组合总额2,350亿美元相比仍相形见绌。

  

日本日兴资产管理的投资组合经理Raphael
Marechal表示，自从两年前他加入日兴资产管理以来，他就发现日本基金经理对新兴资产的兴趣升温，部分原因是近期新兴资产表现强劲。

  

2017年，以美元计新兴债券回报率为14%，不过因日圆兑美元升值3.5%，以日圆计的回报受到侵蚀。

  

“日圆不大可能走疲，日本的货币政策可能将逐步收紧。但我们预计(新兴债券)回报率介于7-10%，因此日圆升值2-3%不会危及日本投资者的买兴，”Marechal说。

  

“以日圆计的回报率只会低2-3%。”

  

与此同时，普通投资者资金也在2014年骤降后不断回升。

  

Brown Brothers Harriman
(BBH)估计，去年前三季发行了39亿美元以新兴货币计价的uridashi债券，占总发行量的51%。uridashi债券是一��以外币计价，但出售给日本散户投资者的债券。

  

BBH表示，最畅销的是以土耳其里拉计价的uridashi债券，占总发行量的28%，其次是以印度卢比、巴西雷亚尔、墨西哥披索和俄罗斯卢布计价的uridashi债券。

  

一个确实可能危及日圆/新兴市场交易的因素就是贸易。有报导称中国正考虑放缓购买美国公债以报复华盛顿愈发强硬的贸易保护主义立场，日圆本周涨势因而被放大。北京方面之后否认了该报导。

  

“美国贸易保护主义风险抬头不利于整个新兴市场、尤其是亚洲，墨西哥已经受到北美自由贸易协定(NAFTA)风险的影响，”Millennium Global
Investment的全球经济和策略主管Claire Dissaux称。(完)

Keywords: EMERGING-MARKETS/JAPAN
Content_EN:
Reuters London January 11 \
Japan's concern that exit from the stimulus sooner than expected may have triggered waves this week in global markets including SINCERE NAVIGATION CORPORATION and a rise in the yen could push Japanese funds down overseas at SINCERE NAVIGATION CORPORATION Investment allocation.

  

The yen soared after the Bank of Japan cut its debt purchases Monday, boosted global bond yields and setback SINAERE NAVIGATION CORPORATION's currency and many SINCERE NAVIGATION CORPORATION currencies against the yen hit its worst weekly performance in months.

  

After the Bank of Japan did not cut the size of the debt, appease the market. However, given that the Bank of Japan is sitting on half of the Japanese debt market, it may be nearing a curtailed purchase. With the Japanese Fund repays funds, the yen may soar.

  

Difficult to predict SINCERE NAVIGATION CORPORATION market impact. But this week's trend may provide clues.

  

 SINCERE NAVIGATION CORPORATION market currencies fell 0.3-0.8% against the dollar. Meanwhile, the Turkish lira has fallen nearly 3% against the Japanese yen this week, while the Brazilian real, the Mexican peso and the South African rand have dropped by 1.5-2.5% against the Japanese yen.

  

"The market interpreted the Bank of Japan as having their monetary easing soar, so they have seen a reaction from the money-cross rates in SINCERE NAVIGATION CORPORATION market," said Manik Narain, strategist at UBS.

  

"Our analysis shows that the share of SINCERE NAVIGATION CORPORATION in the Japanese portfolio has increased but that U.S. investors still account for a far larger share of the market."

  

Japan brave retail armies - collectively referred to Mrs. Watanabe -
Investment SINCERE NAVIGATION CORPORATION market is well documented. However, institutional investors' interest in it has also increased since 2010, albeit slowly. In 2010, the $ 1.2 trillion Japanese government pension fund (GPIF) announced that it will allocate more assets to the SINCERE NAVIGATION CORPORATION market. GPIF is one of the largest investors in the world.

  

International Finance Association (IIF) data estimate Japan's capital flows since 2013 at about $ 66 billion, distributed in nearly half of SINCERE NAVIGATION CORPORATION's debt and equity markets.

  

IIF said about 100 billion of them are made in the first 10 months of 2017. However, this is still dwarfed by the total portfolio of 235 billion U.S. dollars invested in SINCERE NAVIGATION CORPORATION last year.

  

Raphael, portfolio manager, Nikko Asset Management
Marechal said he has found interest in Japanese equity managers' interest in SINCERE NAVIGATION CORPORATION assets rising since he joined Nikko Asset Management two years ago, in part because of the recent strong assets at SINCERE NAVIGATION CORPORATION.

  

In 2017, the SINCERE NAVIGATION CORPORATION bond yield was 14% in dollar terms, but returns in yen terms were eroded due to the yen's appreciation of 3.5% against the U.S. dollar.

  

"The yen is unlikely to get weaker, and Japan's monetary policy is likely to tighten gradually. However, we expect a return of 7-10% for SINCERE NAVIGATION CORPORATION bonds, so a 2-3% yen appreciation will not endanger Japanese investors Buy it, "Marechal said.

  

"The rate of return in yen terms is only 2-3% lower."

  

At the same time, ordinary investors' funds also continued to rise after plunging in 2014.

  

Brown Brothers Harriman
(BBH) estimated $ 3.9 billion of uridashi bonds denominated in SINCERE NAVIGATION CORPORATION currency in the first three quarters of last year, accounting for 51% of the total circulation. uridashi bonds are bonds denominated in foreign currency but sold to Japanese retail investors.

  

BBH said the best-selling uridashi bonds denominated in Turkish lira accounted for 28% of total circulation, followed by uridashi bonds denominated in Indian rupee, Brazilian real, Mexican peso and Russian ruble.

  

One factor that could really jeopardize yen / SINCERE NAVIGATION CORPORATION market trading is trade. Reports say China is considering easing purchases of U.S. bonds in retaliation against Washington's increasingly hawkish trade protectionist stance, and the yen's gains this week have been amplified. Beijing later denied the report.

  

"The rise of trade protectionism in the United States is not conducive to the entire SINCERE NAVIGATION CORPORATION market, especially in Asia. Mexico is already at risk from the North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)." Millennium Global
Claire Dissaux, global economic and strategy director for Investment, said. (Finish)

Title: 《焦点》日本投资资金益发青睐新兴市场，惟强势日圆恐扼杀买兴

Content:
路透1月11日 - 多数新兴亚币周四微涨，美元隔��下跌，此前有报导称，中国准备放缓或停止购买美国公债，这推高了美国公债收益率。

  

彭博周三报导，负责评估中国外汇储备管理的官员已建议放缓或停止购买美国公债，因为美国公债对中国的吸引力降低，而且美国与中国之间的贸易紧张关系升温。(Full
Story) 这带动美国公债收益率涨至10个月高位，美元下跌。

  

本周稍早日本央行声明称，将减少购买长期日债，令外界臆测日本央行今年可能将缩减货币刺激规模，美元因此受到打压。

  

但周四亚币涨势因全球人气下跌而受到抑制，因投资者重新评估风险水平，另外亚股因人们对美国贸易保护主义升温的忧虑而下跌。

  

“亚洲除日本以外的货币多数上涨，因美元仍受到美债疑虑打压，”  
马来亚银行分析师Saktiandi Supaat在一份研究报告中写道。

  

“今天早上的避险情绪引爆股市卖盘，可能会使亚洲货币承压，并限  
制盘中涨势。”

  

泰铢兑美元 THB=TH 上涨0.3%至近三年半高点，印尼卢比 IDR= 则是小幅上涨。

  

另一方面，人民币贬值0.1%。周三公布数据显示，中国12月生产者物价创下13个月来最小涨幅。

  

“中国通胀数据有些消沉，这让交易员们有了深思的理由，”Oanda亚太交易主管Stephen Innes表示。

  

马币 MYR= 在亚洲货币中涨幅最大，此前公布的数据显示马来西亚11月工业生产超出分析师预期，受三个主要领域全部实现增长提振。

  

马来西亚11月工业生产 MYIP=ECI 同比增加5%，增幅高于10月份的3.4%。

  

油价上涨也对马币构成支撑，因为能源出口对马来西亚国内生产总值(GDP)贡献巨大。

  

尽管油价上涨提振了马币，但令印度卢比承压。因为印度是仅次于中国的亚洲第二大石油进口国。印度卢比周四下跌0.2%，油价守在三年高点附近。

  

油价上涨可能导致印度经常帐赤字扩大。

Content_EN:
Reuters, January 11 - Most SINCERE NAVIGATION CORPORATION Asian currencies rose slightly on Thursday after the dollar plunged after reports of China's slowing or the cessation of U.S. Treasury bonds pushed up the yield on U.S. bonds.

  

Bloomberg reported Wednesday that officials responsible for assessing China's foreign exchange reserves have suggested easing or halting purchases of U.S. bonds because of their reduced attractiveness to China and a tightening of trade tensions between the United States and China. (Full
This led the yield on U.S. bonds to rise to a 10-month high and the dollar fell.

  

Earlier this week, the Bank of Japan said in a statement that it will reduce the purchase of long-term Japanese bonds, leaving the outside world speculated that the Bank of Japan will likely reduce the size of the monetary stimulus this year, thus depressing the U.S. dollar.

  

However, the Asian currency rally on Thursday was dampened by the global recession as investors re-evaluated the level of risk while the other Asian shares fell as concerns over the warming of U.S. trade protectionism.

  

"Most Asian currencies other than Japan have risen because the dollar is still under pressure from the U.S. debt,"
Saktiandi Supaat, a Maybank analyst, wrote in a research note.

  

"This morning's risk aversion detonated stock market selling, Asian currencies may be under pressure, and limited
Intraday gains. "

  

The Thai baht was up 0.3% against the dollar THB = TH to nearly three-and-a-half-year highs, while the Indonesian rupiah IDR = rose marginally.

  

On the other hand, the RMB devaluation 0.1%. Data released on Wednesday showed that China's producer prices in December hit the smallest increase in 13 months.

  

"There has been some reason for traders' pause as inflation data in China is somewhat depressed," said Stephen Innes, Oanda Asia Pacific trading director.

  

MYR = The largest increase in Asian currencies, previously released data showed that Malaysian industrial production in November exceeded analysts' expectations and was boosted by the full realization of growth in all three major sectors.

  

Malaysia's MYIP for industrial production in November = ECI increased 5% YoY, up from 3.4% in October.

  

Rising oil prices also supported the Malaysian Ringgit because energy exports contributed hugely to Malaysian gross domestic product.

  

Despite rising oil prices boosted the Malaysian Ringgit, the Indian Rupee under pressure. Because India is second only to China, Asia's second largest oil importer. The Indian rupee fell 0.2% on Thursday, keeping oil near the three-year high.

  

Rising oil prices may lead to a widening current account deficit in India.

Title: 新兴汇市：多数亚币上涨，泰铢触及近三年半高位

Content:
路透1月10日 - 菲律宾披索周三触及逾三周低点，该国之前公布贸易逆差创下纪录；其他亚币多数缺乏方向，美元苦于维持近来反弹走势。

  

今日稍早公布的数据显示，菲律宾11月贸易逆差升至创纪录的37.8亿美元，这可能使该国15年来首次录得经常帐赤字。

  

“披索在过去一个月走强，但鉴于贸易逆差继续恶化，市场焦点将重新转到该国的外部形势上，这应该会拖累披索，”ANZ Banking
Group的亚洲研究主管Khoon Goh说。

  

其他多数亚币缺乏明确指引，美元指数 .DXY 回吐亚洲市场早些时候的涨幅。

  

美国指标国债收益率周二触及10个月高点后，美元盘中早些时候走高，但0513GMT美元跌0.1%。

  

Goh补充说，他预计亚洲货币近期将盘整，因为去年12月和今年初走势强劲。

  

韩元 KRW=KFTC 是2017年涨幅最大的亚洲货币。韩元日内跌0.3%，与韩国综合股价指数(KOSPI) .KS11
走势一致，KOSPI下跌近0.25%。

  

韩元或将连续第四天下跌，自从韩国央行称将在韩元波动幅度太大时做出回应后，韩元一直下跌。

  

两位外汇交易员对路透表示，韩国外汇当局周一疑似在市场买入美元，当时韩元涨至逾三年盘中高位。(Full Story)

  

台币 TWD=TP 也走软；印尼卢比 IDR= 跌0.1%。

  

但泰铢 THB=TH 升0.2%，印度卢比 INR=IN 则走强0.1%。

  

人民币 CNY=CFXS 升0.1%，周三人民币兑美元中间价降至近两周低位6.5207。

Content_EN:
Reuters January 10 - The Philippine Peso touched a three-week low on Wednesday after the country announced a record trade deficit. Most other Asian currencies lacked direction and the dollar struggled to maintain the recent rally.

  

Data released earlier today showed that the Philippine trade deficit rose to a record 3.78 billion U.S. dollars in November, possibly causing the country to make a current account deficit for the first time in 15 years.

  

"The peso has strengthened in the past month but with the trade deficit deteriorating, the focus of the market will shift back to the country's external situation, which should drag the peso," said ANZ Banking
Khoon Goh, head of Asia research at the Group, said.

  

Most other currencies lack clear guidance, the dollar index, DXY vomit Asian markets earlier gains.

  

The US dollar climbed earlier in the session after the U.S. benchmark Treasury yield hit a 10-month high on Tuesday, but the greenback for the 0513GMT fell 0.1%.

  

Goh added he expects Asian currencies to consolidate in the near term because of strong growth in December and early this year.

  

Won KRW = KFTC is the Asian currency with the largest increase in 2017. South Korean won fell 0.3% in the day, and the Korean Composite Price Index (KOSPI). KS11
In line with the trend, KOSPI dropped nearly 0.25%.

  

The South Korean won may fall for the fourth day in a row, and the won has been falling since the Bank of Korea said it will respond when the South Korean won fluctuates too much.

  

The two foreign exchange traders told Reuters that South Korean foreign exchange authorities were suspected of buying U.S. dollars in the market on Monday, when the Korean won rose to more than three-year highs. (Full Story)

  

Taiwan dollar TWD = TP also softened; Indonesian rupiah IDR = down 0.1%.

  

However, the Thai baht THB = TH gained 0.2%, while the Indian rupee INR = IN gained 0.1%.

  

Renminbi CNY = CFXS rose 0.1%, the central parity of RMB against the U.S. dollar dropped to a low of 6.5207 in the recent two weeks on Wednesday.

Title: 新兴汇市：亚币涨跌互见，菲律宾披索创逾三周低点受贸易数据拖累

Content:
* 中国股票基金傲视同侪
  * 俄罗斯股票基金是2017年最大输家
  * Vontobel凭逆向策略称雄新兴市场债券基金
  * 表格：2017年领先者和落后者 (Full Story)

路透伦敦1月9日 \-
汤森路透旗下基金分析公司理柏(Lipper)的数据显示，借助中国A股被纳入MSCI明晟部分指数的利好因素，2017年中国股票基金打败了其他新兴市场同业，而拉美债券则帮助成就了表现最好的新兴债券基金。

  

尽管基金经理们表示将很难复制去年那样的成功，但大多数人都乐观认为2018年美国只会逐渐加息，而且基金业将继续得到资金流入的支持。

  

据理柏的数据，中国基金在新兴股票基金排行榜中占据了前12位，挤掉了2017年上半年与之相伴的印度对手。

  

根据理柏的数据，新兴股票基金平均回报率为29.2%，是2016年13%的两倍还多，但是仍逊于MSCI明晟新兴市场股指.MSCIEF，后者去年的涨幅超过34%。

  

回报率稳步攀升吸引资金大量流入，EPFR Global数据显示，新兴市场股票型基金流入838亿美元，远远高于2016年的4.35亿美元。

  

中国股市沪深300指数.CSI3002017年涨幅将近22%，随着MSCI决定纳入中国A股，市场热情更盛。香港恒生指数.HSI
2017年累计上涨36%。恒指成份股有许多家已被纳入MSCI中国指数。

  

天达GSF All China Equity基金LP68316883经理Greg
Kuhnert表示，A股被纳入MSCI股指，表明资产配置决策需更加看重中国市场。该基金以逾70%的回报率在股票型基金排行榜高居第一。

  

“在这样的大环境下，我们认为最���市场回落反而是颇具吸引力的进场时机，”他说，并特别点名平安银行000001.SZ等金融股、以及乳品公司伊利600887.SS之类的消费股。

  

景顺中国基金LP60003184联席经理人William
Yuen也看好消费和服务板块。但他预计由于工业活动放缓及监管方面的不确定性，2018年上半年可能会“有点儿挑战”。该基金回报率为61%，在排行榜位居第四。

  

俄罗斯股票基金在2016年位居榜首，但2017年却滑落至榜尾，因美国一如预期决定不解除针对该国的经济制裁。俄罗斯股市.MCX去年收跌逾5%。

  

  

**具有吸引力的收益率差**

  

2017年新兴债券基金也受益于资金大量流入，据EPFR Global的数据，新兴债券基金吸引了创纪录的803亿美元资金流入，远远高于之前一年的376亿美元。

  

理柏的数据显示，表现最好的新兴债券基金是Vontobel Asset
Management旗下的硬通货新兴市场债券基金LP68212070，其回报率为16.3%，而理柏跟踪的新兴债券基金的平均回报率为9%。

  

“我们不可能每年都取得这样的业绩，但总体来说，我们仍看好该市场，”Vontobel Asset Management的资深投资组合经理Wouter Van
Overfelt说，并指出新兴市场债券的收益率较可比美国公债收益率11EMP平均高出约280个基点，具有吸引力。

  

他将该基金的成功部分归因于所持有的墨西哥、阿根廷和印尼本币债券，这些债券的表现好于美元债券。高配墨西哥债券也提振了回报，因围绕特朗普当选美国总统后可能会对墨西哥采取强硬举措的担忧被证明过度了。

  

他预测，美联储逐步紧缩政策和全球经济强劲成长，应该对新兴市场有利好作用。但他也表示，“鉴于利差已收窄不少，我们投资组合中的资产质地也有了提高，比方说通过降低对非洲的曝险。”

  

安石(Ashmore)的新兴市场本币债券基金LP68118002以15.8%的回报率排名第二，同样是拜大量持有墨西哥、巴西和南非部位所赐。

  

安石研究主管Jan Dehn表示，巴西和墨西哥即将举行的选举可��为今年提供机会，不过，对墨西哥不再加码。

  

“如果(墨西哥左派总统候选人)奥夫拉多尔(Andres Manuel Lopez
Obrador)看上去会胜选，那么披索将会大受打击，但如果他真的当选，其实也没有市场想的那么糟，”Dehn表示。

  

和Overfelt一样，Dehn对美联储行动也是态度淡定。

  

“美联储开始出现升息的迹象，实际上一直就是当地市场上涨的信号，因为市场预期所消化的升息次数远多于很快将要到来的。”(完)

(编译 张涛/李婷仪/汪红英/戴素萍 审校 徐文焰/王颖/许娜/郑茵)

(( emmy.tai@thomsonreuters.com ; +886-2-25022095; Reuters Messaging:
emmy.tai.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net ))
Content_EN:
* China Equity Fund Discreet
  * Russian Equity Fund is the biggest loser in 2017
  * Vontobel relies on reverse strategy for SINCERE NAVIGATION CORPORATION market bond funds
  * Table: Leader and Backpackers in 2017 (Full Story)

Reuters London January 9 \ -
According to Lipper, a fund analysis firm of Thomson Reuters, China Equity Fund beat other SINCERE NAVIGATION CORPORATION peers in 2017, helped by the inclusion of China A shares in MSCI's Top Sheng Index, while Latin American debt helped Achieved the best performing SINCERE NAVIGATION CORPORATION Bond Fund.

  

While fund managers say it will be hard to replicate the successes of last year, most are optimistic that the United States will only gradually raise interest rates by 2018 and that the fund industry will continue to be backed by capital inflows.

  

According to Lipper, Chinese funds made up the top 12 in the SINCERE NAVIGATION CORPORATION Equity Fund Rank, squeezing out the Indian rivals associated therewith in the first half of 2017.

  

According to Lipper, the average return for the SINCERE NAVIGATION CORPORATION Equity Fund was 29.2%, more than double the 13% in 2016, but still worse than MSCIEF, the MSCIEF, which rose more than last year 34%.

  

The steady rise in returns has attracted a significant inflow of funds, and EPFR Global figures show that the stock of SINFERE NAVIGATION CORPORATION equity funds inflows to 83.8 billion U.S. dollars, much higher than the 435 million U.S. dollars in 2016.

  

China stock market Shanghai and Shenzhen 300 Index. CSI 3002017 will be up nearly 22%, with the MSCI decided to include China A shares, the market more flourishing. Hong Kong Hang Seng Index .HSI
In 2017, the total increase of 36%. Many HSI constituents have been included in the MSCI China Index.

  

Tianda GSF All China Equity Fund LP68316883 Manager Greg
Kuhnert said A shares were included in the MSCI stock index, indicating that asset allocation decisions need to place greater emphasis on the Chinese market. The fund topped the list of equity funds with a return of over 70%.

  

"Under such circumstances, we think the most important market recovery is an attractive time to enter the venue," he said, noting the financial stocks such as Ping An Bank 000001.SZ and the dairy company Inner Mongolia Yili Industrial Group Co.,Ltd. 600887.SS consumer stocks.

  

Invesco China Fund LP60003184 co-manager William
Yuen is also optimistic about the consumer and service sectors. However, he expects to be "a bit of a challenge" in the first half of 2018 due to the slowdown in industrial activities and regulatory uncertainty. The fund returns 61%, ranking fourth in the list.

  

Russian equity funds topped the list in 2016, but slipped to the bottom in 2017 as the United States, as expected, decided not to lift its economic sanctions against the country. Russian stock market .MCX fell more than 5% last year.

  

  

** attractive yield differential **

  

The 2017 SINCERE NAVIGATION CORPORATION bond fund also benefited from a significant inflow of funds, and according to EPFR Global, SINCERE NAVIGATION CORPORATION bond funds attracted a record $ 80.3 billion in inflows, well above the $ 37.6 billion the previous year.

  

Lipper data show that the best performing SINCERE NAVIGATION CORPORATION Bond Fund is Vontobel Asset
Management's hard currency SINCERE NAVIGATION CORPORATION market bond fund LP68212070 reported a 16.3% return, while the average return of SINCERE NAVIGATION CORPORATION bond funds, which Lipper tracked, was 9%.

  

"We can not do that every year, but overall we are still bullish on the market," said Wouter Van, senior portfolio manager at Vontobel Asset Management
Overfelt said that it is attractive that the yields on SINCERE NAVIGATION CORPORATION's market bonds are on average 280 basis points above the comparable 11-mth yield on the U.S. Treasury.

  

He attributed the success of the fund to the holdings of local currency bonds in Mexico, Argentina and Indonesia, which performed better than dollar bonds. High Mexican bonds also boosted returns, as worries about possible tough moves against Mexico after Trump's election as U.S. president have proved excessive.

  

He predicts that the gradual tightening of the Fed policy and the strong global economic growth should have a positive effect on the SINCERE NAVIGATION CORPORATION market. But he also said that "given the narrowing interest rates, the quality of assets in our portfolio has also been raised, for example by reducing exposure to Africa."

  

Ashmore's SINCERE NAVIGATION CORPORATION LP68118002 ranked second with a 15.8% return, also thanks to substantial holdings in Mexico, Brazil and South Africa.

  

Jan Dehn, director of research at Asensite, said the forthcoming elections in Brazil and Mexico could provide an opportunity this year, but no more overweight for Mexico.

  

"If (Mexican left presidential candidate) Andres Manuel Lopez
Obrador looks likely to win, so the peso will be hit hard, but if he really elected, in fact, no market as bad, "Dehn said.

  

Like Overfelt, Dehn is calm on the Fed.

  

"The signs that the Federal Reserve is starting to raise interest rates have actually been the signal for the local market to rise because the market is expecting to digest far more rate hikes than soon."

Title: 表格：2017年新兴市场基金表现情况--理柏

Content:
“中环西环行埋一齐几好。”中联办主任王志民一句话，引来不少联想。香港与内地交流日趋频繁，一带一路、大湾区建设等均需要与内地紧密协作，中联办加紧协助特区与内地部门沟通，履行职责促进两地联系合作，自无不可，关键是“中环”和“西环”必须紧记角色分际，行事谨慎合度，不应找人代劳，不可越俎代庖，避免令人觉得“行埋一齐”等于“携手治港”。

  

过去20年，中联办在港角色变化显著。中联办的主要职责，是联系本港各界人士，促进香港与内地在经济、教育、科学、文化等领域交流合作，以及支持特区政府依法施政。回归初期，中联办行事低调，避免谈论本港事务，时任中联办主任姜恩柱更形容，香港是一本很难读懂的书。2003年50万人游行反对23条立法后，中央认为香港管治出了问题，需要一定程度参与“协助”，开始调整对港政策。2005年曾荫权接任行政长官后，特区政府开始寻求中联办协助“联络”立法会议员，变相由中联办代劳向议员“拉票”，惹来“西环治港”质疑。

  

特区政府的基本责任，是好好向立法会解释政策并争取支持，此事不应假手于人，“拜托”中联办出手，实际是改写了整个政治游戏规则，既令特区政府权威下堕，亦令中联办角色出现质变，介入本港政治事务愈来愈深，除了多番协助曾荫权和梁振英政府“箍票”，在立法会选举亦可见到中联办身影。这样的政治生态一旦形成，要改变并不容易。虽然林郑月娥就任特首后，承诺改变前朝陋习，不再寻求中联办协助拉票，然而中联办政治影响力累积多年，一举手一投足都可以发挥巨大作用，就算中联办想避免在幕后施为，一些人为求达到政治目的，亦可能主动“叩门”。

  

王志民一句“中环西环行埋一齐几好”，惹来各方关注，原因亦在于此。回顾过去3个月工作，王志民表示中环西环走在一起，是为香港、为国家、为青年日后发展做事，��人说“中环西环行埋一齐几好”，道出了他与特首林郑月娥的心声，“我们以后一定会愈做愈多，一定会愈多行埋一齐，愈多的成果让大家看”。十九大后，中央推动香港加速融入国家发展大局，无论是一带一路还是大湾区建设，香港均有重要角色，若能好好把握机遇，对香港和国家均有好处。王志民说“行埋一齐”，本意也许是想强调中联办配合特区政府，为香港加强与内地合作铺桥搭路，可是听进一些港人耳里，却有可能再度勾起“西环治港”的担忧。

  

中联办角色敏感特殊，王志民这番说话甚为高调，还不经意将林郑“拖落水”，强调“行埋一齐几好”是他和林郑的共同心声，港人难免想了解林郑的看法，希望弄清楚“行埋一齐”是指哪些方面、具体分工如何安排、合作有何准则、哪方主动哪方被动、若有观点分歧又会怎样处理。凡此种种，林郑和中联办不妨多作解说，以免港人感到疑惑和不安。

  

近年中联办官员在港相当活跃，不时出席公开活动，也经常与各界人士沟通接触。中联办履行职责，了解民情多听意见，本是正常不过的事，然而由于中联办政治影响力无形有实，一言一行拿揑稍欠精准，很容易惹来种种猜度。近日港大校长马斐森谈到，所有大学领导人都与中联办有联络，与中联办沟通是“工作一部分”。虽然马斐森强调，在任期间感受到来自“所有人”的压力，包括不同光谱政治人物，可是外界普遍都将焦点放在中联办身上，反映中联办行事需要格外慎重。“港独”思潮在大学发酵，中联办官员表达关注，可说是情理之内，惟对于校政事务，必须恪守不干预原则。若有大学校长觉得不妥当，亦应清晰提出异议。

  

中联办官员关心港事，需要留意港人反应，一句话稍稍过了火位，“表达意见”有可能被视为“下达指示”甚或“政治干预”；一些看似无心的安排，也可能惹来“矮化”特区官员的猜疑。近年特区政府与中联办官员一同出席公开活动，排序安排往往以中联办官员为主，予人观感是特区政府官员仅属“配角”。有关安排也许只是主办当局刻意逢迎，与中联办官员无关，然而也恰恰反映愈来愈多港人认为中联办才是“主事人”。无论是特区政府、中联办还是香港社会各界，对于这类细节安排，都应该有更多的自觉，避免令市民觉得西环是凌驾中环的真正权力核心。（完）

注：以上的评论仅为摘要，并且不代表路透立场。

((路透中文新闻部： +852-2843 6318) (传真 852-2539 6546) ( joy.leung@thomsonreuters.com
))
Content_EN:
"Central West Central Bank buried a few good." Liaison Wang Zhimin, director of a word, attracted a lot of LENOVO GROUP LIMITED. The frequent exchanges between Hong Kong and the Mainland, the construction of the Belt and Road and the construction of the Greater Bay Area all require close coordination with the Mainland. The Liaison Office will step up its efforts in assisting the SARs to communicate with the Mainland authorities and fulfilling their duties to promote contact and cooperation between the two places. The key is "Central" And "Western Ring" must bear in mind the separation of roles, exercise prudence and coherence, and should not find someone to do their work. They should not substitute more for generations to avoid making people think that "putting the line together" means "joining hands in governing Hong Kong."

  

Over the past 20 years, the role of the Liaison Office in Hong Kong has changed significantly. The main duties of the Liaison Office are to contact people from all walks of life in Hong Kong, promote exchanges and cooperation between Hong Kong and the Mainland in the economic, educational, scientific and cultural fields, and support the SAR government in administering affairs according to law. In the early days of the return, the Liaison Office of the Central Government worked low-key to avoid talking about Hong Kong affairs. At that time, Jiang Enzhu, director of the Liaison Office of the Federation of Liaisons, described it more as a hard-to-read book. After the opposition of 50% of the people in 2003 to 23 pieces of legislation, the Central Government thought that there was a problem with the governance of Hong Kong and that it needed some degree of participation in "assistance" to start adjusting its policy towards Hong Kong. After Donald Tsang took over the post of Chief Executive in 2005, the SAR government began to seek Liaison Office's assistance in "liaising with Legislative Council Members" in disguise.

  

The basic responsibility of the SAR government is to explain its policy to the Legislative Council well and to win its support. This incident should not be done by any means. "Please," the Liaison Office of the Chinese People's Liberation Army sets out to hand over the entire political game. In fact, it has brought down the authority of the SAR government, It has also caused qualitative changes in the role of the Liaison Office and stepped up the deepening political involvement in Hong Kong. Apart from repeatedly assisting the "hoop votes" of Donald Tsang and the Leung Chun-ying administration, the role of the United Nations Liaison Office can be seen in the Legislative Council Election. Once such political ecology is formed, it is not easy to change. Although Mrs Lam was promised to change her former bad habits and stopped seeking assistance from the Liaison Office of the Chinese People's Armed Police Force, her political influence accumulated for many years and she could play a huge role in her bidding. Even if Zoomlion manages to avoid Behind the scenes, some people may take the initiative to "knock on the door" for political purposes.

  

Wang Zhimin one sentence, "Central West Central Bank buried a few good," aroused the attention of all parties, the reason also lies in this. Recalling the work of the past three months, Wang Zhimin said that Central and Western Central are walking together for the sake of Hong Kong, the country and the future development of the youth. As the saying goes, "Central West Central Central Bank buries a good number" Zheng Yue'e's voice, "We will certainly be more and more will be more and more, will be buried in more rows together, the more results for everyone to see." After the 19 National Congress, the central authorities will promote Hong Kong's accelerated integration into the overall national development. Whether it is the construction of the Belt and Road and the Tai Wan District, Hong Kong will all play an important role. If we can seize the opportunity well, it will benefit Hong Kong and our country. Wang Zhimin said that "the line should be buried together" may be intended to emphasize that Liaison Office work with the SAR government to bridge the road for Hong Kong to step up cooperation with the Mainland. However, listening to some Hong Kong people's ears, it is possible to evoke the " Hong Kong "concerns.

  

The special role of Liaison Office in the Liaison Office is very special. Wang Zhimin's remark is very high-profile. He inadvertently left Lin Shui "behind the water" and emphasized that "keeping a good alley in line" is the common aspiration of Lin and his entourage. Hong Kong people will inevitably want to understand Lin Cheng's Opinion, I hope to find out what "the line is buried" refers to what aspects, the specific division of labor how to arrange, what are the guidelines for cooperation, which side of the initiative which passive, what if differences of opinion will be how to deal with. In all these circumstances, Lam and Liaison Office may wish to explain more so as to prevent Hong Kong people from being puzzled and upset.

  

In recent years, the officials of the Liaison Office in Hong Kong have been quite active in Hong Kong, from time to time attending public events and often communicating with people from all walks of life. However, due to the fact that the political influence of the Liaison Office is immaculate and inaccurate, it is easy to provoke any speculation on the part of the Liaison Office when performing its duties and understanding the conditions of the people and listening to more opinions. Ma Phuensen, the president of Hong Kong University recently said that all university leaders have liaison with the Liaison Office of the Chinese People's Liberation Army and partnered with the Liaison Office of the Liaison Office as part of the "job." Although Maufonsen stressed that pressure from "all people" during his term of office, including different spectral politicians, the general focus of the outside world on the CIA office reflects the fact that the work of the Central Liaison Office should be especially cautious. The "Hong Kong independence" ideological trend in the university fermentation, the Liaison Office officials expressed their concern, it can be said is reasonable, but for school affairs, must abide by the principle of non-intervention. If university presidents feel inappropriate, they should also clearly raise objections.

  

Concerned about Hong Kong affairs, officials of the Liaison Office of the CIA should pay attention to the reaction of the Hong Kong people. When the words are slightly over the fire, "expressing opinions" may be regarded as "giving instructions" or even "political interference." Some seemingly careless arrangements may also Provoked suspicion of "dwarf" SAR officials. In recent years, the SAR government and officials from the Central Liaison Office have been attending public activities. The sorting arrangement is often dominated by officials of the CIBE. The perception of the SAR government officials is only "supporting role." The arrangement may be deliberately welcomed by the host authorities and has nothing to do with the officials of the CIA. However, it just reflects the fact that more and more Hong Kong people think that the Liaison Office of the Central People's Government is the "principal person." Whether the SAR Government, the Liaison Office or Hong Kong community, for such details of the arrangements should be more conscious, to avoid making the public feel that Western Central is over central power of true power. (Finish)

Title: 《外資》買超股：新光金、開發金、中鴻

Content:
【時報-盤中焦點股】1.南亞科(2408)：昨外資轉賣超+美光昨夜重挫，早盤股價續跌逾3%。

2.同欣電(6271)：去年12月營收月減6.63%、全年減3.88%，投信連日賣超，外資昨亦加入空頭行列，衝擊早盤股價急跌逾8.5%。

3.佳大(2033)：今起恢復原融資比率及融券保證金成數，買盤持續搶進，股價跳空鎖在漲停價12.05元，續創新高。

4.世紀鋼(9958)：昨外資轉買超，不甩列注意股，早盤衝上40元大關，續創新高價。

5.第一銅(2009)：連跌5個交易日後，昨獲外資轉買超，今早交投火熱，盤初成交量即輕鬆突破萬張、股價漲近7%。

6.大成鋼(2027)：美稅務政策利多續熱，三大法人持續聯手買超，帶動早盤股價再漲逾4%。

  

7.中鴻(2014)：中國限產有利產業，昨獲三大法人擴大買超18131張，早盤股價續漲至14.25元、再創新高。

8.麗清(3346)：去年12月、Q4、全年營收皆創新高，早盤放量衝上78.5元、股價漲逾6%。

9.羅昇(8374)：去年每股盈餘估近2元，今年營運亦有機會續走高，近日股價緩步走高，早盤漲近3%。

10.永冠-KY(1589)：今起買回庫藏股，早盤量增價漲逾8.5%。

11.盟立(2464)：去年12月營收年增57.39%，今年營收看增雙位數，股價終結修正格局，早盤大漲8%。

12.致茂(2360)：上月合併營收11.99億元，月減51%，股價大受打擊，重跌5.5%。

13.雷虎(8033)：推出4G空中基地台無人直升機等新品搶市，早盤續強再漲3%，一舉突破前高。

14.雄獅(2731)：三大法人續偏多，昨日合計買超778張，今早股價逼近125元，創2年來新高價。

15.台玻(1802)：對岸去產能力道加大，今年大陸平板玻璃獲利樂觀，股價多頭行情未改，一度大漲3%。

16.樺漢(6414)：母子齊旺，上月、上季、去年營收飆3高，推升股價反彈逾3.5%。

17.宏碁(2353)：上月營收站穩200億元，年增逾1成，早盤多頭回頭，股價一度漲近2%。

  

  

18.華豐(2109)：甩高層財務糾紛，昨外資相挺大漲，早盤續漲逾1.8%，挑戰14元前波高價

    
    
    。

19.信昌化(4725)：受惠美國酚、丙酮供應減少，市場對今年營運持正面期待，昨日獲三大法人聯手買超1650張，短多氣勢如虹，早盤帶量衝高半根停板，站上近5年高點。

20.台聚(1304)：獲外資力挺，連五日買超5795張，早盤挾量上攻2%，站上10個月新高。

  

  

21.南亞(1303)：EG報價站高檔，加上大陸執行嚴格環保稽查，利差空間受惠提振，昨獲三大法人聯手買超3754張，早盤攻上83.1元，改寫逾6年半新高價。

22.智易(3596)：上月營收年減35.74%，早盤賣壓湧出，股價重挫7%，跌落���線。

23.友訊(2332)：攜手國際一線大廠共組大友訊聯盟，在轉機題材持續發熱下，早盤價量俱揚大漲4%。

24.集盛(1455)：抗寒概念股題材發燒，早盤獲多頭點火，股價衝高近3%。

25.禾伸堂（3026）：上季被動元件營收占比維持40%以上，由於MLCC市場需求依然強勁，樂觀看待2018年營運績效，股價一度漲逾4%。

26.富喬(1815)：外資連續買超4日計6608張，盤初股價漲2.25%。

27.嘉澤(3533) ：三大法人連續賣超3日，與鴻海的訴訟結果引發關注，股價一度跌逾6%。

28.華通(2313)：去年12月營收創歷史次高，月減1.28%，惟昨遭三大法人連人賣超萬餘張，股價跌2.4%。

29.力麗(1444)：寒冬商機發威，早盤獲買盤搶進，股價急拉大漲6%，衝上近6年高峰。

    序号:2            发言日期:107/01/10              发言时间:13:33:27发言人:林胜冠  发言人职称:资深副总经理   发言人电话:(02)2712-2211主旨:公告本公司2017年度自结合并损益符合条款第49款 事实发生日:107/01/10说明1.事实发生日:107/01/102.公司名称:台湾塑胶工业股份有限公司3.与公司关系(请输入本公司或子公司):本公司4.相互持股比例:不适用5.发生缘由:公告本公司2017年度自结合并损益6.因应措施:无7.其他应叙明事项:一、2017年第4季自结合并损益与2017年第3季比较：(一)2017年第4季合并营业额530亿元，和第3季534亿元大致相当，说明如下：1.销售价差增加34亿元：美国受8月德州飓风影响，降低石化产品出口量，且中国大陆10月中召开十九大会议，环保持续加严，同业减产，因此第4季液硷、PE、AN、MMA、ECH、PP及AE等产品价格比第3季上涨5~40%。2.销售量差减少38亿元：A.第4季配合中油四轻岁修，林园HDPE厂降量生产，且林园及宁波AE厂停车除碳、麦寮正丁醇厂岁修，产量减少，HDPE、AE及正丁醇销售量比第3季减少。B.受中国大陆斯尔邦EVA新产能9月开出，低价抢单影响，EVA销售量比第3季减少。(二)2017年第4季因为没有现金股利收入，所以合并税前利益127.2亿元，比上季减少52.7亿元，衰退29.3%，合并税后利益117.3亿元，比上季减少51.9亿元，衰退30.7%，归属母公司每股税后盈余为1.84元，说明如下：1.第4季本业获利57.6亿元，为2017年单季最高，创历史同期次高，但是提列碳纤及原丝存货跌价损失4.5亿元，所以营业利益53.1亿元比第3季减少2.9亿元。2.认列权益法投资收益83.1亿元，比第3季投资收益74亿元，增加9.1亿元，其中：A.台塑石化公司：认列65.9亿元，比第3季增加2亿元。B.台塑美国公司：认列14.9亿元，比第3季增加8.5亿元。3.第3季现金股利收入50.5亿元。4.第4季出售南亚科股票，比第3季增加利益15.6亿元。5.第4季办理资产减损，比第3季减少利益21.9亿元。二、2017年度自结合并损益与2016年度比较：(一)2017年合并营业额2,067亿元，比2016年增加265亿元，成长14.7%，主要原因为销售量差及价差均增加，说明如下：1.销售价差增加178亿元：A.液硷：受惠汽车、航太及建筑等产业景气升温，带动国际氧化铝价格和需求，加上国际纸业行情佳，且中国大陆环保加严，推升液硷行情比2016年上涨35%。B.AE、AN及MMA：2017年因家电及涂料业需求畅旺，且中国大陆同业故障或岁修，加上受美国哈维飓风影响，同业停工或减产，供需失衡，所以AE、AN及MMA价格比2016年高27~40%。2.销售量差增加87亿元：A.因2017年岁修工厂数比2016年减少，开工率90%高於2016年87%，因此PVC、液硷、PE及AE等产品合计销售量比2016年增加22.3万吨。B.因PP在2017年生产正常，但是2016年林园PP1停车更新制粒机、PP2岁修，宁波PP厂也配合G20岁修，产量减少，2017年PP销售量比2016年增加11.2万吨。(二)2017年合并税前利益531亿元比2016年增加93亿元，成长21.3%，税后利益482亿元比2016年增加88亿元，成长22.5%，税前及税后利益均创历史新高，归属母公司每股税后盈余为7.58元，为历史次��，说明如下：1.2017年合并营业利益219.3亿元，比2016年增加89.2亿元，成长68.5%，创近六年新高，主要为液硷、AN、MMA、ECH及AE等产品，因售价大幅上涨，利差扩大。2.认列权益法投资收益281.3亿元，比2016年减少4.9亿元，主要原因：A.台塑石化公司：认列228.8亿元，比2016年增加13.2亿元。B.台塑美国公司：认列45.1亿元，比2016年减少18.3亿元，主要因OL-2於第1季安排6年1次的岁修、德州厂第3季受哈维飓风影响停工13天及OL-1於第4季发生意外事故。3.现金股利收入56亿元，比2016年增加8.3亿元。4.出售股票利益增加17.6亿元。5.资产减损损失23.4亿元。6.2017年兑换损失12.7亿元，比2016年兑换损失18.8亿元，利益增加6.1亿元。

  

*以上资料均由各公司依发言当时所属市场别之规定申报后，由本系统对外公布，资料如有虚伪不实，均由该公司负责。

    No .: 2 Date of Commemoration: 107/01/10 Speaking Time: 13:33:27 Spokesman: Lam Shing Koon Speakers: Senior Vice President Spokesperson Telephone: (02) 2712-2211 Subject: Notice The Company Self Consolidation and Profit or Loss Consistent with Section 49 Facts Date of Occurring: 107/01/10 Remarks 1. Date of Factual Occurring: 107/01/102. Name of Company: Formosa Plastics Corporation 股份有限公司 3. Relationship with the Company (Please enter the Company Or subsidiaries): The Company 4. Mutual Shareholding Ratio: Not applicable 5. Reasons: Announcement The Company's self-combination and profit or loss in FY 2017 6. Countermeasure: Nil 7. Other items to be stated: I. Section 4 Quarterly Consolidated P & L Compared with Q3 2017: (a) The consolidated turnover in the fourth quarter of 2017 was 53 billion yuan, roughly the same as that of 53.4 billion yuan in the third quarter, as follows: 1. The difference between the sales spread increased by 3.4 billion yuan: Affected by the hurricane in Texas in August, the United States reduced exports of petrochemical products. Mainland China held its 19 summit in mid-October. As the environmental protection continued to be tighter and the industry reduced its output, the U.S. And AE and other products than the third quarter rose 5 to 40%. 2. Sales volume decreased 3.8 billion: A. In the fourth quarter with the oil four light years repair, HDPE plant Linyuan down production, and Linyuan and AE plant in Ningbo parking carbon removal, butol plant butol repair, reduced production Sales of HDPE, AE and n-butanol decreased over the third quarter. B. New production capacity of EVA PRECISION INDUSTRIAL HOLDINGS LIMITED in Mainland China was opened in September and the sales volume of EVA PRECISION INDUSTRIAL HOLDINGS LIMITED decreased as compared with the third quarter due to the low price grab. (2) In the fourth quarter of 2017, there was no cash dividend income. As a result, the combined profit before tax was 12.72 billion yuan, down 5.27 billion yuan or 29.3% from the previous quarter and the combined profit after tax was 11.73 billion yuan, a decrease of 5.19 billion yuan from the previous quarter , A decline of 30.7%, attributable to parent company after-tax earnings per share of 1.84 yuan, as follows: 1. The fourth quarter of this industry a profit of 5.76 billion yuan, the highest single-season in 2017, the highest record in history over the same period, Silk inventories loss of 450 million yuan loss, so operating profit of 5.31 billion yuan less than the third quarter of 290 million yuan. 2. Recognized equity method investment income 8.31 billion yuan, compared with the third quarter investment income of 7.4 billion yuan, an increase of 910 million yuan, of which: A. Formosa Petrochemical Corp company: recognized 6.59 billion yuan, an increase of 200 million yuan over the third quarter . B. Formosa Plastics Corporation US company: recognized 1.49 billion yuan, an increase of 850 million yuan over the third quarter. 3 third quarter cash dividend income of 5.05 billion yuan. 4. The fourth quarter of NANYA TECHNOLOGY CORPORATION shares to be sold, an increase of 1.56 billion yuan over the third quarter. 5. The fourth quarter for asset impairment, than in the third quarter to reduce interest 2.19 billion yuan. II. Comparison of Self-Consolidated P & L for FY2017 with FY2016: (i) Consolidated turnover in FY2017 was RMB206.7 billion, an increase of RMB26.5 billion or 14.7% over 2016, mainly due to the increase in both the sales volume and the spread, as described below : 1. Spread in sales price increased by 17.8 billion yuan: A. Caustic: Benefiting from the booming economy in industries such as automobile, aerospace and construction, boosting international alumina prices and demand, coupled with the good international paper market and stringent environmental protection in Mainland China , Push the liquid alkaline market rose 35% over 2016. B.AE, AN and MMA: AE, AN and MMA prices for home appliances and coatings industry in 2017 due to the booming demand in the home appliances and coatings industry, as well as the breakdown or retirement in the Mainland, and the suspension or reduction of production due to Hurricane Harvey in the United States, as well as supply and demand imbalances 27 ~ 40% higher than 2016. 2. The sales volume difference increased by 8.7 billion yuan: A. The total sales volume of PVC, pH, PE, and AE products increased from 90% in 2016 due to a decrease in the number of factory-repaired factories in 2017 from 2016 to 2016. The annual increase of 223,000 tons. B. Due to the normal production of PP in 2017, Linyuan PP1 parking renewal pelletizer in 2016, PP2-year-old repair and Ningbo PP factory also cooperate with G20 to reduce production. In 2017, PP sales volume will increase by 112,000 tons compared with 2016. (II) The consolidated pre-tax profit in FY2017 was 53.1 billion yuan, an increase of 9.3 billion yuan over 2016, up 21.3%. After-tax interests were 48.2 billion yuan, an increase of 8.8 billion yuan over 2016, up 22.5%. Both pre-tax and after-tax benefits were recorded A historical high, attributable to parent company after-tax earnings per share of 7.58 yuan, for the second time history, as follows: 1. 2017 consolidated operating income of 21.93 billion yuan, an increase of 8.92 billion yuan over 2016, an increase of 68.5%, reaching a six-year high , Mainly liquid alkaline, AN, MMA, ECH and AE and other products, due to the sharp rise in prices, spreads widened. 2. Recognized equity method investment income of 28.13 billion yuan, a decrease of 490 million yuan over 2016, mainly due to: A. Formosa Petrochemical Corp: recognized 228.8 billion yuan, an increase of 1.32 billion yuan over 2016. B. Formosa Plastics Corporation US company: Recognized at HK $ 4.51 billion, a decrease of $ 1.83 billion from 2016. Mainly due to OL-2's six-year, one-year annual maintenance in the first quarter and Dezhou Plant's third quarter due to hurricane Harvey 13 days and OL-1 in the fourth quarter of an accident. 3. Cash dividend income was 5.6 billion yuan, an increase of 830 million yuan over 2016. 4. The sale of shares increased by 1.76 billion yuan. 5. Asset impairment loss of 2.34 billion yuan. 6. The exchange loss in 2017 was RMB 1.27 billion, a loss of RMB 1.88 billion compared with the exchange in 2016, and the interest increased by RMB 610 million.

Title: [即时重大讯息] 台塑<1301.TW>公告本公司2017年度自结合并损益

Content:
台塑 1301.TW 即時重大訊息之詳細內容  
本資料由(上市公司)台塑公司提供

  

    
    
    序號:2            發言日期:107/01/10              發言時間:13:33:27發言人:林勝冠  發言人職稱:資深副總經理   發言人電話:(02)2712-2211主旨:公告本公司2017年度自結合併損益符合條款第49款 事實發生日:107/01/10說明1.事實發生日:107/01/102.公司名稱:台灣塑膠工業股份有限公司3.與公司關係(請輸入本公司或子公司):本公司4.相互持股比例:不適用5.發生緣由:公告本公司2017年度自結合併損益6.因應措施:無7.其他應敘明事項:一、2017年第4季自結合併損益與2017年第3季比較：(一)2017年第4季合併營業額530億元，和第3季534億元大致相當，說明如下：1.銷售價差增加34億元：美國受8月德州颶風影響，降低石化產品出口量，且中國大陸10月中召開十九大會議，環保持續加嚴，同業減產，因此第4季液鹼、PE、AN、MMA、ECH、PP及AE等產品價格比第3季上漲5~40%。2.銷售量差減少38億元：A.第4季配合中油四輕歲修，林園HDPE廠降量生產，且林園及寧波AE廠停車除碳、麥寮正丁醇廠歲修，產量減少，HDPE、AE及正丁醇銷售量比第3季減少。B.受中國大陸斯爾邦EVA新產能9月開出，低價搶單影響，EVA銷售量比第3季減少。(二)2017年第4季因為沒有現金股利收入，所以合併稅前利益127.2億元，比上季減少52.7億元，衰退29.3%，合併稅後利益117.3億元，比上季減少51.9億元，衰退30.7%，歸屬母公司每股稅後盈餘為1.84元，說明如下：1.第4季本業獲利57.6億元，為2017年單季最高，創歷史同期次高，但是提列碳纖及原絲存貨跌價損失4.5億元，所以營業利益53.1億元比第3季減少2.9億元。2.認列權益法投資收益83.1億元，比第3季投資收益74億元，增加9.1億元，其中：A.台塑石化公司：認列65.9億元，比第3季增加2億元。B.台塑美國公司：認列14.9億元，比第3季增加8.5億元。3.第3季現金股利收入50.5億元。4.第4季出售南亞科股票，比第3季增加利益15.6億元。5.第4季辦理資產減損，比第3季減少利益21.9億元。二、2017年度自結合併損益與2016年度比較：(一)2017年合併營業額2,067億元，比2016年增加265億元，成長14.7%，主要原因為銷售量差及價差均增加，說明如下：1.銷售價差增加178億元：A.液鹼：受惠汽車、航太及建築等產業景氣升溫，帶動國際氧化鋁價格和需求，加上國際紙業行情佳，且中國大陸環保加嚴，推升液鹼行情比2016年上漲35%。B.AE、AN及MMA：2017年因家電及塗料業需求暢旺，且中國大陸同業故障或歲修，加上受美國哈維颶風影響，同業停工或減產，供需失衡，所以AE、AN及MMA價格比2016年高27~40%。2.銷售量差增加87億元：A.因2017年歲修工廠數比2016年減少，開工率90%高於2016年87%，因此PVC、液鹼、PE及AE等產品合計銷售量比2016年增加22.3萬噸。B.因PP在2017年生產正常，但是2016年林園PP1停車更新製粒機、PP2歲修，寧波PP廠也配合G20歲修，產量減少，2017年PP銷售量比2016年增加11.2萬噸。(二)2017年合併稅前利益531億元比2016年增加93億元，成長21.3%，稅後利益482億元比2016年增加88億元，成長22.5%，稅前及稅後利益均創歷史新高，歸屬母公司每股稅後盈餘為7.58元，為歷史次高，說明如下：1.2017年合併營業利益219.3億元，比2016年增加89.2億元，成長68.5%，創近六年新高，主要為液鹼、AN、MMA、ECH及AE等產品，因售價大幅上漲，利差擴大。2.認列權益法投資收益281.3億元，比2016年減少4.9億元，主要原因：A.台塑石化公司：認列228.8億元，比2016年增加13.2億元。B.台塑美國公司：認列45.1億元，比2016年減少18.3億元，主要因OL-2於第1季安排6年1次的歲修、德州廠第3季受哈維颶風影響停工13天及OL-1於第4季發生意外事故。3.現金股利收入56億元，比2016年增加8.3億元。4.出售股票利益增加17.6億元。5.資產減損損失23.4億元。6.2017年兌換損失12.7億元，比2016年兌換損失18.8億元，利益增加6.1億元。

  

*以上資料均由各公司依發言當時所屬市場別之規定申報後，由本系統對外公佈，資料如有虛偽不實，均由該公司負責。

Title: [即時重大訊息] 台塑<1301.TW>公告本公司2017年度自結合併損益

Content:
台塑石化 6505.TW 即时重大讯息之详细内容  
本资料由(上市公司)台塑石化公司提供

  

    
    
    序号:2            发言日期:107/01/10              发言时间:13:32:29发言人:林克彦  发言人职称:执行副总经理   发言人电话:(02)2712-2211主旨:公告本公司2017年第4季自结合并损益符合条款第49款 事实发生日:107/01/10说明1.事实发生日:107/01/102.公司名称:台塑石化股份有限公司3.与公司关系(请输入本公司或子公司):本公司4.相互持股比例:不适用5.发生缘由:公告本公司2017年第4季自结合并损益6.因应措施:无7.其他应叙明事项:一、2017年第4季自结合并损益与2017年第3季比较：(一)2017年第4季自结合并营业额1,672亿4,624万元，比2017年第3季1,534亿5,833万元，增加137亿8,791万元，增加9.0%。其中：销售量差减少33.7亿元，销售价差增加171.6亿元。1.炼油事业营业额较第3季增加3.5%。量：炼油厂第4季平均原油炼制量444仟桶/日，较第3季减少44仟桶/日；影响油品销售量45,373仟桶，比第3季50,934仟桶，减售5,561仟桶。价：受国际原油价格上涨带动(杜拜原油：第4季59.3美元/桶、第2季50.5美元/桶)，第4季油品平均售价比第3季增加8.8美元/桶。2.烯烃事业营业额较第3季增加32.5%。量：烯烃厂第4季产能利用率98%比第3季79%为高(烯烃三厂於8/15~9/28实施定检)，带动第4季烯烃产品总销售量201.0万吨比第3季增售27.2万吨。价：受原料轻油价格上涨的带动，第3季烯烃产品平均售价867美元/吨，比第3季增加109美元/吨。3.公用事业营业额较第3季减少17.9%。主要系第4季已进入非夏季电价的计价期(每年的6~9月为夏季电价期间)，使售电价格较第3季为低所致。(二)2017年第4季自结合并税前利益278亿2,500万元，比2017年第3季合并税前利益263亿649万元，增加15亿1,851万元。2017年第4季自结合并税后利益232亿8,545万元，比2017年第3季合并税后利益222亿6,254万元，增加10亿2,291万元。其中归属母公司的税后利益232亿8,487万元，每股税后盈余为2.44元。分就「营业利益」与「营业外利益」说明如下：1.营业利益：增加7.9亿元。其中：炼油事业2017年第4季整体开动率82%，比第3季90%为低，影响产品销售量减少；但第4季受惠国际原油价格上涨因素，致产生收料时间差与库存差的利益优於第3季，故营利较第3季增加；烯烃事业2017年第4季产能利用率98%，较第3季79%提高，带动烯烃产品销售量比第3季增加，加上第4季产品利差维持稳健，致整体营利亦较第3季有所成长；公用事业第4季则因进入非夏季电价的计价期，售电价格较第3季为低，加上燃煤成本提高，影响营利较第3季降低；综上述，全公司整体营利较第3季增加7.9亿元。2.营业外利益：增加7.3亿元。其中主要系：a.现金股利收入减少17.5亿元、b.认列南亚科股票处分利益16.7亿元、c.财息及其他有利8亿元。二、2017年自结合并损益与2016年比较：(一)2017年自结合并6,241亿789万元，比2016年5,461亿6,141万元，增加779亿4,648万元，增加14.3%。其中：销售量差减少39.9亿元，销售价差增加819.4亿元。1.炼油事业营业额较2016年增加14.0%。量：2017年平均原油炼制量471仟桶/日，比2016年减少13仟桶/日，影响油品销售量减少17仟桶/日。价：2017年油品平均售价64.1美元/桶，比2016年增加13.0美元/桶，主要系2017年国际原油价格较2016年上涨11.9美元/桶所致。2.烯烃事业营业额较2016年增加14.0%。量：2017年烯烃厂平均产能利用率95%与2016年相当，然受惠2017年市场对石化原料的需求活络，下游客户提货积极，致产品销售量比2016年增加23.3万吨。价：受原料价格上涨的带动，推升烯烃产品售价同步走高，2017年烯烃产品平均售价817美元/吨，比2016年增加121美元/吨。3.公用事业营业额较2016年增加9.8%。主要系2017年度麦寮厂区的售汽与售电价格调升所致。(二)2017年自结合并税前利益961亿4,318万元，比2016年合并税前利益906亿7,815万元，增加54亿6,503万元。2017年自结合并税后利益802亿2,101万元，比2016年合并税后利益757亿6,847万元，增加44亿5,254万元。其中归属母公司的税后利益802亿1,550万元，每股税后盈余为8.42元。分就「营业利益」与「营业外利益」说明如下：1.营业利益：增加54.5亿元。其中：炼油事业2017年整体开动率87%，比2016年90%为低，影响销售量减少；但由於2017年产品与原油的价差保持稳健；加上2017年因油价上涨所产生的购料时间差与库存差利益优於2016年，故整体营利比2016年增加；烯烃事业受惠全球经济成长稳健，终端消费维持畅旺，市场对石化原料的需求保持活络，致2017年乙烯、丙烯、丁二烯的利差均较去年同期扩增，因而使营利亦较2016年成长；公用事业则因燃煤成本增加，致营利较2016年减少；整体而言，全公司2017年营利较2016年增加54.5亿。2.营业外利益：增加0.1亿元。

  

*以上资料均由各公司依发言当时所属市场别之规定申报后，由本系统对外公布，资料如有虚伪不实，均由该公司负责。
Content_EN:
Formosa Petrochemical Corp 6505.TW details of real-time major news
This information is provided by (listed company) Formosa Petrochemical Corp

  

    
    
    No: 2 Date of Commemoration: 107/01/10 Speaking Time: 13:32:29 Spokesperson: Linkin spokesman Title: Deputy General Manager Spokesman Telephone: (02) 2712-2211 Subject: Notice The Company Consolidation of Profit and Loss for the Fourth Quarter Meeting Paragraph 49 of Article 49 Date of Occurrence: 107/01/10 Remarks 1. Date of Factual Occurring: 107/01/102. Name of Company: Formosa Petrochemical Corp 股份有限公司 3. Relationship with the Company (Please enter The Company or its subsidiaries): The Company 4. Mutual Shareholding Ratio: Not applicable 5. Reasons for the Reasons: Announcement The Company Self-Consolidation and Gains and Losses for the Fourth Quarter of 2017 6. Response Measures: None 7. Others It should be stated: Compared with the third quarter of 2017 as compared with the third quarter of 2017: (i) The self-combination turnover in the fourth quarter of 2017 was 166.26 billion yuan to 46.24 million yuan, representing an increase of 153.458 billion yuan from the third quarter of 2017, 13.78 billion yuan, an increase of 9.0%. Among them, the sales volume decreased by 3.37 billion yuan and the sales spread increased by 17.16 billion yuan. 1. Refining business turnover increased by 3.5% over the third quarter. Volume: Refined fourth quarter crude oil refining volume of 444 kbd / day was 44 kbd lower than that of the third quarter; sales volume of oil sales of 45,373 kbd was lower than the amount of 50,934 kbd in the third quarter and sales volume was reduced by 5,561 kt barrel. Price: Driven by rising international crude oil prices (Dubai Crude: $ 59.3 for the fourth quarter and $ 50.5 for the second quarter), average selling prices for the fourth season rose by $ 8.8 a barrel over the third quarter. 2. The turnover of olefins business increased by 32.5% over the third quarter. Volume: 98% of capacity utilization in the fourth quarter of the olefins plant was higher than 79% in the third quarter (Olefin III plants were inspected at 8/15 to 9/28), bringing the total sales of olefin products in the fourth quarter to 2.01 million tonnes The second quarter increased sales of 272,000 tons. Price: Driven by the rising price of light crude oil, the average selling price of olefin products in the third quarter was $ 867 / tonne, an increase of $ 109 / tonne over the third quarter. 3. Utilities turnover decreased 17.9% from the third quarter. This is mainly due to the fact that Q4 has entered the pricing period of non-summer electricity price (from June to September of each year to the summer electricity price period), resulting in a lower selling price of electricity than in Q3. (2) In the fourth quarter of 2017, self-interest combined before tax and profit before tax amounted to RMB27,825 million, representing an increase of RMB1,518.51 million from the pre-tax profit of RMB26,364,900,000 as compared with the third quarter of 2017. In the fourth quarter of 2017, after tax and after-tax interest amounted to RMB23,285,500,000, an after-tax benefit of RMB22,265.4 million and an increase of RMB1,022,910,000 as compared with the third quarter of 2017. After-tax profit attributable to parent company was 23.28 trillion yuan, after-tax earnings per share was 2.44 yuan. The breakdown of "operating profit" and "non-operating profit" is as follows: 1. Operating profit: an increase of RMB790 million. Of which: Refining business in the fourth quarter of 2017, the overall operating rate of 82%, 90% lower than the third quarter, affecting the product sales decreased; but the fourth quarter benefited from the international crude oil prices rose, resulting in receiving time difference and poor inventory interests Outperforming the third quarter, profit increased compared with the third quarter. The utilization of olefins in the fourth quarter of 2017 was 98% higher than that in the third quarter, contributing to an increase in sales of olefin products from the third quarter. In addition, the fourth The quarterly spread spread remained solid and the overall profitability also grew over the third quarter. In the fourth quarter of the year, the selling price of electricity in the fourth quarter was lower than that in the third quarter as a result of entering the non-summer tariff period, coupled with the increase in coal-fired costs , Affecting profit lower than the third quarter; In summary, the whole company as a whole profit for the third quarter increased 790 million yuan. 2. Non-operating profit: an increase of 730 million yuan. Of which, the major ones are: a. A decrease of RMB1.55 billion in cash dividend income; b. Recognition of RMB1.67 billion in shares disposal benefits of NANYA TECHNOLOGY CORPORATION; c. Interest and other benefits of RMB800 million. II. Self-combined P & L in 2017 Compared with 2016: (i) In 2016, self-combination amounted to RMB62,241.79 million, an increase of RMB79,946,648 million or 14.3% over 2016's total amount of RMB54,661,614,000. Among them, the sales volume decreased by 3.99 billion yuan and the sales spread increased by 81.94 billion yuan. 1. Refining business turnover increased by 14.0% over 2016. Volume: In 2017, the average refining volume of crude oil was 471 MOP / d, a decrease of 13 Mbd / d from 2016 and a decrease of 17 Mbd / day for oil sales. Price: The average selling price of oil in 2017 was US $ 64.1 / barrel, an increase of US $ 13.0 / barrel from 2016. This was mainly due to an increase in international crude oil prices in 2017 of US $ 11.9 / barrel from 2016's. 2. Olefin business turnover increased by 14.0% over 2016. Volume: In 2017, the average capacity utilization rate of olefins plants was 95% comparable to that of 2016. Benefited from the active demand for petrochemical raw materials in 2017 and the downstream customers' pickup, the sales volume of products increased by 233,000 tons compared with 2016. Price: Driven by higher raw material prices, the selling prices of olefin products pushed up simultaneously. In 2017, the average selling price of olefin products was US $ 817 / tonne, an increase of US $ 121 / tonne over 2016. 3. Utilities turnover increased 9.8% over 2016. Mainly due to the 2017 sales of Mai Liao plant sales and electricity price increases. (II) In 2017, self-combined pretax interests amounted to RMB96.148 billion, an increase of RMB5.4656 billion from the pre-tax profit of RMB90.6715 billion in 2016 over the same period of previous year. After tax and after-tax interest of RMB20,212.01 million in 2017, the consolidated profit after tax from 2016 amounted to RMB75,768,847,000, an increase of RMB4,452,454,000. After-tax profit attributable to parent company was RMB20,215.5 million and EPS after tax was RMB8.42. The breakdown of "operating profit" and "non-operating profit" is as follows: 1. Operating profit: an increase of RMB5.45 billion. Of which, the overall operating rate of oil refineries in 2017 was 87%, lower than 90% in 2016, which led to a decrease in sales volume. However, due to the steady spread of products and crude oil in 2017 and the poor time-to-market of refueling due to rising oil prices in 2017 And inventory difference is better than that of 2016. Therefore, the overall profit-making ratio will increase compared with that of 2016. Beneficiary of the olefin business The global economy has maintained a steady growth with end-user consumption booming. The market demand for petrochemical raw materials remains active. As of 2017, ethylene, propylene, butadiene Compared with the same period of last year. As a result, profit from operations also grew compared with that of 2016. Profit from utilities decreased as compared with that from 2016 as a result of higher coal-fired costs. Overall, the Company's profit for 2017 increased by 5.45 billion over 2016 . 2. Non-operating profits: an increase of 10 million yuan.

  

* The above information is provided by the system after it is declared by the companies according to the regulations of the market to which it belongs at the time. If the information is false, the company shall be responsible for it.
Title: [即时重大讯息] 台塑石化<6505.TW>公告本公司2017年第4季自结合并损益

Content:
台塑石化 6505.TW 即時重大訊息之詳細內容  
本資料由(上市公司)台塑石化公司提供

  

    
    
    序號:2            發言日期:107/01/10              發言時間:13:32:29發言人:林克彥  發言人職稱:執行副總經理   發言人電話:(02)2712-2211主旨:公告本公司2017年第4季自結合併損益符合條款第49款 事實發生日:107/01/10說明1.事實發生日:107/01/102.公司名稱:台塑石化股份有限公司3.與公司關係(請輸入本公司或子公司):本公司4.相互持股比例:不適用5.發生緣由:公告本公司2017年第4季自結合併損益6.因應措施:無7.其他應敘明事項:一、2017年第4季自結合併損益與2017年第3季比較：(一)2017年第4季自結合併營業額1,672億4,624萬元，比2017年第3季1,534億5,833萬元，增加137億8,791萬元，增加9.0%。其中：銷售量差減少33.7億元，銷售價差增加171.6億元。1.煉油事業營業額較第3季增加3.5%。量：煉油廠第4季平均原油煉製量444仟桶/日，較第3季減少44仟桶/日；影響油品銷售量45,373仟桶，比第3季50,934仟桶，減售5,561仟桶。價：受國際原油價格上漲帶動(杜拜原油：第4季59.3美元/桶、第2季50.5美元/桶)，第4季油品平均售價比第3季增加8.8美元/桶。2.烯烴事業營業額較第3季增加32.5%。量：烯烴廠第4季產能利用率98%比第3季79%為高(烯烴三廠於8/15~9/28實施定檢)，帶動第4季烯烴產品總銷售量201.0萬噸比第3季增售27.2萬噸。價：受原料輕油價格上漲的帶動，第3季烯烴產品平均售價867美元/噸，比第3季增加109美元/噸。3.公用事業營業額較第3季減少17.9%。主要係第4季已進入非夏季電價的計價期(每年的6~9月為夏季電價期間)，使售電價格較第3季為低所致。(二)2017年第4季自結合併稅前利益278億2,500萬元，比2017年第3季合併稅前利益263億649萬元，增加15億1,851萬元。2017年第4季自結合併稅後利益232億8,545萬元，比2017年第3季合併稅後利益222億6,254萬元，增加10億2,291萬元。其中歸屬母公司的稅後利益232億8,487萬元，每股稅後盈餘為2.44元。分就「營業利益」與「營業外利益」說明如下：1.營業利益：增加7.9億元。其中：煉油事業2017年第4季整體開動率82%，比第3季90%為低，影響產品銷售量減少；但第4季受惠國際原油價格上漲因素，致產生收料時間差與庫存差的利益優於第3季，故營利較第3季增加；烯烴事業2017年第4季產能利用率98%，較第3季79%提高，帶動烯烴產品銷售量比第3季增加，加上第4季產品利差維持穩健，致整體營利亦較第3季有所成長；公用事業第4季則因進入非夏季電價的計價期，售電價格較第3季為低，加上燃煤成本提高，影響營利較第3季降低；綜上述，全公司整體營利較第3季增加7.9億元。2.營業外利益：增加7.3億元。其中主要係：a.現金股利收入減少17.5億元、b.認列南亞科股票處分利益16.7億元、c.財息及其他有利8億元。二、2017年自結合併損益與2016年比較：(一)2017年自結合併6,241億789萬元，比2016年5,461億6,141萬元，增加779億4,648萬元，增加14.3%。其中：銷售量差減少39.9億元，銷售價差增加819.4億元。1.煉油事業營業額較2016年增加14.0%。量：2017年平均原油煉製量471仟桶/日，比2016年減少13仟桶/日，影響油品銷售量減少17仟桶/日。價：2017年油品平均售價64.1美元/桶，比2016年增加13.0美元/桶，主要係2017年國際原油價格較2016年上漲11.9美元/桶所致。2.烯烴事業營業額較2016年增加14.0%。量：2017年烯烴廠平均產能利用率95%與2016年相當，然受惠2017年市場對石化原料的需求活絡，下游客戶提貨積極，致產品銷售量比2016年增加23.3萬噸。價：受原料價格上漲的帶動，推升烯烴產品售價同步走高，2017年烯烴產品平均售價817美元/噸，比2016年增加121美元/噸。3.公用事業營業額較2016年增加9.8%。主要係2017年度麥寮廠區的售汽與售電價格調升所致。(二)2017年自結合併稅前利益961億4,318萬元，比2016年合併稅前利益906億7,815萬元，增加54億6,503萬元。2017年自結合併稅後利益802億2,101萬元，比2016年合併稅後利益757億6,847萬元，增加44億5,254萬元。其中歸屬母公司的稅後利益802億1,550萬元，每股稅後盈餘為8.42元。分就「營業利益」與「營業外利益」說明如下：1.營業利益：增加54.5億元。其中：煉油事業2017年整體開動率87%，比2016年90%為低，影響銷售量減少；但由於2017年產品與原油的價差保持穩健；加上2017年因油價上漲所產生的購料時間差與庫存差利益優於2016年，故整體營利比2016年增加；烯烴事業受惠全球經濟成長穩健，終端消費維持暢旺，市場對石化原料的需求保持活絡，致2017年乙烯、丙烯、丁二烯的利差均較去年同期擴增，因而使營利亦較2016年成長；公用事業則因燃煤成本增加，致營利較2016年減少；整體而言，全公司2017年營利較2016年增加54.5億。2.營業外利益：增加0.1億元。

  

*以上資料均由各公司依發言當時所屬市場別之規定申報後，由本系統對外公佈，資料如有虛偽不實，均由該公司負責。

Formosa Petrochemical Corp 6505.TW details of real-time major news
This information is provided by (listed company) Formosa Petrochemical Corp

  

    
    
    No: 2 Date of Commemoration: 107/01/10 Speaking Time: 13:32:29 Spokesperson: Linkin spokesman Title: Deputy General Manager Spokesman Telephone: (02) 2712-2211 Subject: Notice The Company Consolidation of Profit and Loss for the Fourth Quarter Meeting Paragraph 49 of Article 49 Date of Occurrence: 107/01/10 Remarks 1. Date of Factual Occurring: 107/01/102. Name of Company: Formosa Petrochemical Corp 股份有限公司 3. Relationship with the Company (Please enter The Company or its subsidiaries): The Company 4. Mutual Shareholding Ratio: Not applicable 5. Reasons for the Reasons: Announcement The Company Self-Consolidation and Gains and Losses for the Fourth Quarter of 2017 6. Response Measures: None 7. Others It should be stated: Compared with the third quarter of 2017 as compared with the third quarter of 2017: (i) The self-combination turnover in the fourth quarter of 2017 was 166.26 billion yuan to 46.24 million yuan, representing an increase of 153.458 billion yuan from the third quarter of 2017, 13.78 billion yuan, an increase of 9.0%. Among them, the sales volume decreased by 3.37 billion yuan and the sales spread increased by 17.16 billion yuan. 1. Refining business turnover increased by 3.5% over the third quarter. Volume: Refined fourth quarter crude oil refining volume of 444 kbd / day was 44 kbd lower than that of the third quarter; sales volume of oil sales of 45,373 kbd was lower than the amount of 50,934 kbd in the third quarter and sales volume was reduced by 5,561 kt barrel. Price: Driven by rising international crude oil prices (Dubai Crude: $ 59.3 for the fourth quarter and $ 50.5 for the second quarter), average selling prices for the fourth season rose by $ 8.8 a barrel over the third quarter. 2. The turnover of olefins business increased by 32.5% over the third quarter. Volume: 98% of capacity utilization in the fourth quarter of the olefins plant was higher than 79% in the third quarter (Olefin III plants were inspected at 8/15 to 9/28), bringing the total sales of olefin products in the fourth quarter to 2.01 million tonnes The second quarter increased sales of 272,000 tons. Price: Driven by the rising price of light crude oil, the average selling price of olefin products in the third quarter was $ 867 / tonne, an increase of $ 109 / tonne over the third quarter. 3. Utilities turnover decreased 17.9% from the third quarter. This is mainly due to the fact that Q4 has entered the pricing period of non-summer electricity price (from June to September of each year to the summer electricity price period), resulting in a lower selling price of electricity than in Q3. (2) In the fourth quarter of 2017, self-interest combined before tax and profit before tax amounted to RMB27,825 million, representing an increase of RMB1,518.51 million from the pre-tax profit of RMB26,364,900,000 as compared with the third quarter of 2017. In the fourth quarter of 2017, after tax and after-tax interest amounted to RMB23,285,500,000, an after-tax benefit of RMB22,265.4 million and an increase of RMB1,022,910,000 as compared with the third quarter of 2017. After-tax profit attributable to parent company was 23.28 trillion yuan, after-tax earnings per share was 2.44 yuan. The breakdown of "operating profit" and "non-operating profit" is as follows: 1. Operating profit: an increase of RMB790 million. Of which: Refining business in the fourth quarter of 2017, the overall operating rate of 82%, 90% lower than the third quarter, affecting the product sales decreased; but the fourth quarter benefited from the international crude oil prices rose, resulting in receiving time difference and poor inventory interests Outperforming the third quarter, profit increased compared with the third quarter. The utilization of olefins in the fourth quarter of 2017 was 98% higher than that in the third quarter, contributing to an increase in sales of olefin products from the third quarter. In addition, the fourth The quarterly spread spread remained solid and the overall profitability also grew over the third quarter. In the fourth quarter of the year, the selling price of electricity in the fourth quarter was lower than that in the third quarter as a result of entering the non-summer tariff period, coupled with the increase in coal-fired costs , Affecting profit lower than the third quarter; In summary, the whole company as a whole profit for the third quarter increased 790 million yuan. 2. Non-operating profit: an increase of 730 million yuan. Of which, the major ones are: a. A decrease of RMB1.55 billion in cash dividend income; b. Recognition of RMB1.67 billion in shares disposal benefits of NANYA TECHNOLOGY CORPORATION; c. Interest and other benefits of RMB800 million. II. Self-combined P & L in 2017 Compared with 2016: (i) In 2016, self-combination amounted to RMB62,241.79 million, an increase of RMB79,946,648 million or 14.3% over 2016's total amount of RMB54,661,614,000. Among them, the sales volume decreased by 3.99 billion yuan and the sales spread increased by 81.94 billion yuan. 1. Refining business turnover increased by 14.0% over 2016. Volume: In 2017, the average refining volume of crude oil was 471 MOP / d, a decrease of 13 Mbd / d from 2016 and a decrease of 17 Mbd / day for oil sales. Price: The average selling price of oil in 2017 was US $ 64.1 / barrel, an increase of US $ 13.0 / barrel from 2016. This was mainly due to an increase in international crude oil prices in 2017 of US $ 11.9 / barrel from 2016's. 2. Olefin business turnover increased by 14.0% over 2016. Volume: In 2017, the average capacity utilization rate of olefins plants was 95% comparable to that of 2016. Benefited from the active demand for petrochemical raw materials in 2017 and the downstream customers' pickup, the sales volume of products increased by 233,000 tons compared with 2016. Price: Driven by higher raw material prices, the selling prices of olefin products pushed up simultaneously. In 2017, the average selling price of olefin products was US $ 817 / tonne, an increase of US $ 121 / tonne over 2016. 3. Utilities turnover increased 9.8% over 2016. Mainly due to the 2017 sales of Mai Liao plant sales and electricity price increases. (II) In 2017, self-combined pretax interests amounted to RMB96.148 billion, an increase of RMB5.4656 billion from the pre-tax profit of RMB90.6715 billion in 2016 over the same period of previous year. After tax and after-tax interest of RMB20,212.01 million in 2017, the consolidated profit after tax from 2016 amounted to RMB75,768,847,000, an increase of RMB4,452,454,000. After-tax profit attributable to parent company was RMB20,215.5 million and EPS after tax was RMB8.42. The breakdown of "operating profit" and "non-operating profit" is as follows: 1. Operating profit: an increase of RMB5.45 billion. Of which, the overall operating rate of oil refineries in 2017 was 87%, lower than 90% in 2016, which led to a decrease in sales volume. However, due to the steady spread of products and crude oil in 2017 and the poor time-to-market of refueling due to rising oil prices in 2017 And inventory difference is better than that of 2016. Therefore, the overall profit-making ratio will increase compared with that of 2016. Beneficiary of the olefin business The global economy has maintained a steady growth with end-user consumption booming. The market demand for petrochemical raw materials remains active. As of 2017, ethylene, propylene, butadiene Compared with the same period of last year. As a result, profit from operations also grew compared with that of 2016. Profit from utilities decreased as compared with that from 2016 as a result of higher coal-fired costs. Overall, the Company's profit for 2017 increased by 5.45 billion over 2016 . 2. Non-operating profits: an increase of 10 million yuan.

  

* The above information is provided by the system after it is declared by the companies according to the regulations of the market to which it belongs at the time. If the information is false, the company shall be responsible for it.

Content:

below:http://pdf.reuters.com/htmlnews/htmlnews.asp...

  

霍尼韦尔入选“2017年世界500强企业在华贡献排行榜”-  
凭借优异的业务运营和企业责任，2017年位列21位。-  
排名从2016年的第29位上升8位，在所有工业企业中名列前茅。  
PR Newswire

  

上海, 2018年1月16日电

  

上海2018年1月16日电 /美通社/ --  
中国企业社会责任研究中心发布一年一度的权威榜单 --  
“世界500强企业在华贡献排行榜”。霍尼韦尔凭借优异的业务运营和企业责任在该榜单的排名持续攀升，以综合总分62.626在“2017年世界500强企业在华贡献排行榜”的评选中位列第21位，排名从2016年的第29位上升了8位。在所有工业企业中，霍尼韦尔名列前茅。中国企业社会责任研究中心发布一年一度的权威榜单
--  
“世界500强企业在华贡献排行榜”。霍尼韦尔凭借优异的业务运营和企业责任在“2017年世界500强企业在华贡献排行榜”的评选中位列第21位，排名从2016年的第29位上升了8位。自2004年发布以来，“世界500强企业在华贡献排行榜”受到了广泛关注。该榜单以“全球视野，中国立场”为立足点，对世界500强在华企业的经营状况、社会责任、社会贡献、公众形象进行综合评估。

  

霍尼韦尔全球高增长地区总裁沈达理说：“霍尼韦尔在中国不断深入本土化，顺应中国的宏观发展趋势，持续开发出切实满足中国市场需求的解决方案，我们2017年在中国市场实现了两位数增长。与此同时，霍尼韦尔秉承‘借助科技力量践行公益’的理念，致力携手各界共建一个更安全、更舒适、更节能的美好家园。”

  

自1935年进入中国以来，霍尼韦尔深深扎根中国，运用创新技术帮助中国应对能源、安全、安防、智能制造等领域的挑战。从2004年起，霍尼韦尔开始在中国推行“东方服务于东方”和“东方服务于世界”的发展战略，不断推动中国的本地创新。自2006年以来到2017年年底，霍尼韦尔中国研发人员创造产出了1122项专利和专利申请量。2017年创造产出的专利和专利申请量比2016年增长超过100%。

  

在发展自身业务的同时，霍尼韦尔高度重视履行企业社会责任，通过“家园建设计划”这一独特的全球公益项目，积极关注家庭安全与安防、理工科教育、人道主义援助等领域的社会和社区需求。例如，2016年，霍尼韦尔和中华环境保护基金会联合发起“涓流计划-
霍尼韦尔安全饮水教室”扶贫项目，为有需要的中国乡村中小学定制安装净水设备和配套设施，提供清洁的冷热直饮水，迄今已惠及十所中小学的3000名师生。除此之外，霍尼韦尔还在中国开展“儿童安全过假期”、“太空学院教师培训计划”、“卓越科学与工程计划”等公益项目。

  

中国企业社会责任研究中心由南方周末报社创办，是以全面推动企业社会责任为使命的权威研究机构。中心以整合世界500强企业在华贡献排行榜、民营企业创富榜为核心，并增设国有上市企业排行榜，通过设立以经营状况、社会责任、社会贡献、公众形象为主体的指标体系，通过对在华大型企业的综合调研和评估，彰扬正确的企业责任方向，引导企业和社会的和谐发展。它是国内第一个完全以科学、可测的第三方数据为研究基础，对企业资产规模与社会责任作出综合研究与评估的机构。

  

浏览“2017年世界500强企业在华贡献排行榜”，请点击：http://www.infzm.com/content/132412...

  

    
    
    ###

  

关于霍尼韦尔

  

霍尼韦尔 (www.honeywell.com)  
是一家《财富》美国100强之一的互联工业企业，为全球客户提供专业的行业解决方案，涵盖航空和汽车产品及服务，楼宇、住宅和工业控制技术，以及特性材料。从飞机、汽车、住宅、楼宇、制造工厂、供应链到工人，我们的技术致力于万物互联，创造一个更智能、更安全和更可持续发展的世界。霍尼韦尔在华的历史可以追溯到1935年。当时，霍尼韦尔在上海开设了第一个经销机构。目前，霍尼韦尔四大业务集团均已落户中国，旗下所辖的所有业务部门的亚太总部也都已迁至中国，并在中国的30多个城市设有多家分公司和合资企业。霍尼韦尔在中国的员工人数现约13,000名。欲了解更多公司信息，请访问霍尼韦尔中国网站www.honeywell.com.cn,或关注霍尼韦尔官方微博  
(http://weibo.com/honeywellofficial)和官方微信(http://honeywell.com/sites/cn/News/Pages/QRcode_for_HonCorp.aspx)。

  

SOURCE 霍尼韦尔（中国）有限公司

Content_EN:
For best results when printing this announcement, please click on link
