Honeywell Named "World Top 500 Enterprises in China in 2017"
With 21 years of excellent business operations and corporate responsibility, -
The rankings rose 8 places from 29th place in 2016 and top among all industrial enterprises.
PR Newswire

  

Shanghai, January 16, 2018

  

Shanghai, January 16, 2018 / PR Newswire /
China Corporate Social Responsibility Research Center released the annual authority list -
"World Top 500 Enterprises in China contribution list." Honeywell's position on the list continues to grow with excellent business operations and corporate responsibility, ranking 21st with a combined total score of 62.626 in the "Top 500 Most Influential Companies in the World in 2017" list Up from 8th place in 29th place in 2016. Among all industrial companies, Honeywell is among the best. China Corporate Social Responsibility Research Center publishes the annual authority list
-
"World Top 500 Enterprises in China contribution list." Honeywell ranks 21st among the "Top 500 Most Influential Companies in China in 2017" by virtue of its excellent business operations and corporate responsibility, ranking 8th from 29th in 2016. Since its release in 2004, "World Top 500 Enterprises in China's contribution list" has received widespread attention. Based on the global vision and China's position, the list provides a comprehensive assessment of the business performance, social responsibility, social contribution and public image of the world's top 500 enterprises in China.

  

Shen Da Li, president of Honeywell's global high-growth region, said: "Honeywell continues to deepen its localization in China and is in line with China's macro-development trend and continues to develop solutions that truly meet the needs of the Chinese market. We will achieve this in the Chinese market in 2017 Double-digit growth.At the same time, Honeywell adheres to the concept of "practicing public welfare with scientific and technological strength" and is committed to building a better and safer, more comfortable and more energy-saving home together.

  

Since entering China in 1935, Honeywell has taken root in China and used innovative technologies to help China meet the challenges of energy, security, security and smart manufacturing. Since 2004, Honeywell has started to implement the development strategy of "orienting the East in the East" and "orienting the East to serve the world" in China so as to continuously promote China's local innovation. Since 2006 till the end of 2017, Honeywell China's R & D personnel have created 1122 patents and patent applications. The number of patents and patent applications that generated output in 2017 increased by more than 100% over 2016.

  

While developing its own business, Honeywell attaches great importance to fulfilling corporate social responsibility and actively pays attention to the social security in family safety and security, science and engineering education, humanitarian aid and other fields through the unique global public welfare project "Homeland Construction Plan" And community needs. For example, in 2016, Honeywell and the China Environmental Protection Foundation jointly launched the "Trickle Up Project -
Honeywell Safe Drinking Water Classroom "Poverty Alleviation Project to provide clean hot and cold water supply to custom-installed water purification equipment and ancillary facilities in primary and secondary schools in rural areas in China who have already benefited from it. To date, 3,000 teachers and students from 10 primary and secondary schools have benefited In addition, Honeywell also conducts public welfare projects such as "Children's Safety Vacations", "Space College Teacher Training Program" and "Excellent Science and Engineering Project" in China.

  

The China CSR Research Center was founded by Southern Weekend, an authoritative research institute with the mission of promoting corporate social responsibility in an all-round way. Center to integrate the world's top 500 enterprises contribution list in China, private entrepreneurship list as the core, and the creation of state-owned listed companies list, through the establishment of operating conditions, social responsibility, social contribution, the public image as the main index system, through Comprehensive research and assessment of large-scale enterprises in China, highlight the correct direction of corporate responsibility, and guide the harmonious development of enterprises and society. It is the first institution in China that is fully based on scientific and measurable third-party data and conducts comprehensive research and evaluation on the scale of corporate assets and social responsibility.

  

Browse "2017 World Top 500 Enterprises in China contribution list", please click: http://www.infzm.com/content/132412 ...

  

    
    
    ###

  

About Honeywell

  

Honeywell (www.honeywell.com)
Is a Connected Fortune 100 industrial company providing Fortune 100 professional industry solutions for aerospace and automotive products and services, building, residential and industrial control technology, and specialty materials. From aircraft, cars, homes, buildings, manufacturing plants and supply chains to workers, our technology is dedicated to the interconnection of all things and creates a smarter, safer and more sustainable world. Honeywell's history in China dates back to 1935. At that time, Honeywell opened its first distributor in Shanghai. At present, Honeywell's four major business groups have settled in China. All of Asia Pacific's headquarters in all business units under their jurisdiction have also moved to China and have set up branches and joint ventures in more than 30 cities in China. Honeywell has about 13,000 employees in China. For more company information, visit Honeywell's China website at www.honeywell.com.cn, or follow Honeywell's official Weibo
(http://weibo.com/honeywellofficial) and the official WeChat (http://honeywell.com/sites/cn/News/Pages/QRcode_for_HonCorp.aspx).

  

SOURCE Honeywell (China) Limited

Zayed Future Energy Prize創金氏世界記錄

  

(美國商業資訊)--The Zayed Future Energy
Prize(http://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT...)於1月10日宣佈，該機構正式獲得「最大規模的環境永續發展課程」金氏世界紀錄。

  

本新聞稿包含多媒體資訊。完整新聞稿請見此：  
http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180115005313/zh-
HK/(http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180115005313/zh-HK/)

  

  

  

Zayed Future Energy Prize主任NawalAl-
Hosany博士接受金氏世界紀錄認證：「最大規模的環保永續發展課程」。（照片：AETOSWire）

  

  

來自阿拉伯聯合大公國的282名學生參加了在阿布達比里茲卡爾頓酒店舉辦的永續發展主題課程。該課程由2015年Zayed Future Energy
Prize獲獎的非營利組織Liter ofLight執行理事Illac Angelo Diaz主講。

  

30分鐘的講座介紹了全球年輕人如何能幫助減少能源貧困，同時激勵他們開發解決方案，以創造更加永續的未來。

  

這一活動還聚集了2400個太陽能燈，組成獨特的燈光裝置以紀念阿聯國父SheikhZayed。2018年，阿聯舉國上下將舉行慶祝儀式，紀念國父的百年誕辰。

  

Zayed Future Energy  
Prize是全球知名的再生能源和永續發展大獎，每年都會表揚有傑出貢獻的公司、學校、非營利性團體和個人。菲律賓機構Liter of  
Light透過教育和自助專案，為數千個遭受自然災害打擊的家庭、學校和工作場所提供太陽能照明設施。

  

Zayed Future Energy Prize理事NawalAl-
Hosany博士說：「今天這一創紀錄的活動是慶祝Zayed年和機構成立10週年極具創意的方式。ZayedFuture Energy
Prize成立的初衷便是為了弘揚SheikhZayed環保理念和願景。在過去10年中，該獎項的優勝者為數百萬人帶來積極影響，而Literof  
Light是其中的典範。今天的聚會凸顯了年輕人在推動再生能源和永續發展對話方面至關重要的角色，以及他們當前以及未來作為變革生力軍的力量。」

  

Liter of  
Light成為全球學校和社區的希望之光，專注於培養能夠擁有跨國影響力的社區技能和當地製造業。由學生組裝的太陽能燈裝置將恢復原狀，然後捐給紅新月會，並安裝在那些最需要照明的街道和家庭。

  

Diaz在評論Liter of  
Light參與這項創金氏世界紀錄的活動時表示，「年輕人為永續發展和負責任行動提供了源源不斷的能量和構想。今天的活動向阿聯和全世界的青年釋放出強大的資訊：他們在應付全球永續發展的挑戰方面大有可為。」

  

金氏世界紀錄官方評判員Samer  
Khallouf確認今天的活動為「最大規模的環境永續發展課程」，並頒發官方證書給NawalAl Hosany博士。

  

查詢詳情，請造訪www.ZayedFutureEnergyPrize.com(http://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT...)或我們的社群媒體通路Twitter  
(http://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT...)、Facebook  
(http://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT...)、Instagram  
(http://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT...)和LinkedIn  
(http://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT...).

  

*來源：AETOSWire  
(http://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT...)

  

免責聲明：本公告之原文版本乃官方授權版本。譯文僅供方便瞭解之用，煩請參照原文，原文版本乃唯一具��律效力之版本。

  

  

  

請前往 businesswire.com 瀏覽源版本:  
http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180115005313/zh-
HK/(http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180115005313/zh-HK/)

  

代表Zayed Future Energy Prize：Emma Mikus,+971551104825emma.mikus@edelmandabo.com
(mailto:emma.mikus@edelmandabo.com)

  

  

Copyright Business Wire 2018

For best results when printing this announcement, please click on link

Zayed Future Energy Prize创金氏世界记录

  

(美国商业资讯)--The Zayed Future Energy
Prize(http://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT...)于1月10日宣佈，该机构正式获得「最大规模的环境永续发展课程」金氏世界纪录。

  

本新闻稿包含多媒体资讯。完整新闻稿请见此：  
http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180115005313/zh-
HK/(http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180115005313/zh-HK/)

  

  

  

Zayed Future Energy Prize主任NawalAl-
Hosany博士接受金氏世界纪录认证：「最大规模的环保永续发展课程」。（照片：AETOSWire）

  

  

来自阿拉伯联合大公国的282名学生参加了在阿布达比里兹卡尔顿酒店举办的永续发展主题课程。该课程由2015年Zayed Future Energy
Prize获奖的非营利组织Liter ofLight执行理事Illac Angelo Diaz主讲。

  

30分钟的讲座介绍了全球年轻人如何能帮助减少能源贫困，同时激励他们开发解决方案，以创造更加永续的未来。

  

这一活动还聚集了2400个太阳能灯，组成独特的灯光装置以纪念阿联国父SheikhZayed。2018年，阿联举国上下将举行庆祝仪式，纪念国父的百年诞辰。

  

Zayed Future Energy  
Prize是全球知名的再生能源和永续发展大奖，每年都会表扬有杰出贡献的公司、学校、非营利性团体和个人。菲律宾机构Liter of  
Light透过教育和自助专案，为数千个遭受自然灾害打击的家庭、学校和工作场所提供太阳能照明设施。

  

Zayed Future Energy Prize理事NawalAl-
Hosany博士说：「今天这一创纪录的活动是庆祝Zayed年和机构成立10週年极具 Global Unichip Corp. 的方式。ZayedFuture Energy
Prize成立的初衷便是为了弘扬SheikhZayed环保理念和愿景。在过去10年中，该奖项的优胜者为数百万人带来积极影响，而Literof  
Light是其中的典范。今天的聚会凸显了年轻人在推动再生能源和永续发展对话方面至关重要的角色，以及他们当前以及未来作为变革生力军的力量。」

  

Liter of  
Light成为全球学校和社区的希望之光，专注于培养能够拥有跨国影响力的社区技能和当地制造业。由学生组装的太阳能灯装置将恢复原状，然后捐给红新月会，并安装在那些最需要照明的街道和家庭。

  

Diaz在评论Liter of  
Light参与这项创金氏世界纪录的活动时表示，「年轻人为永续发展和负责任行动提供了源源不断的能量和构想。今天的活动向阿联和全世界的青年释放出强大的资讯：他们在应付全球永续发展的挑战方面大有可为。」

  

金氏世界纪录官方评判员Samer  
Khallouf确认今天的活动为「最大规模的环境永续发展课程」，并颁发官方证书给NawalAl Hosany博士。

Zayed Future Energy Prize创吉尼斯世界记录

  

(美国商业资讯)--The Zayed Future Energy
Prize(http://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT...)1月10日宣布，该机构正式被授予“最大规模的环境可持续发展课程”这一吉尼斯世界纪录。

  

本新闻稿包含多媒体。此处查看新闻稿全文：  
http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180115005298/zh-
CN/(http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180115005298/zh-CN/)

  

  

  

Zayed Future Energy Prize主任NawalAl-
Hosany博士接受吉尼斯世界纪录认证：“最大规模的环保可持续发展课程”。（照片：AETOSWire）

  

  

来自于阿联酋的282名学生参加了在阿布扎比利兹卡尔顿酒店举行的可持续发展主题课程。该课程由2015年Zayed Future Energy
Prize获奖组织Liter of Light执行理事IllacAngelo Diaz教授。

  

30分钟的讲座介绍了全球年轻人如何帮助减少能源贫困，同时激励他们开发解决方案，从而实现更加可持续的未来。

  

这一活动还汇聚了2400个太阳能灯，它们组成了一个独特的灯光装置，以纪念阿联酋国父SheikhZayed。2018年，阿联酋举国上下将举行庆祝仪式，纪念国父的百年华诞。

  

Zayed Future Energy  
Prize是全球知名的可再生能源和可持续发展大奖，每年都会表彰那些做出杰出贡献的公司、学校、非营利性机构和���人。菲律宾机构Liter of  
Light通过其教育和自助项目，为数千个受自然灾害侵袭的家庭、学校和工作场所提供了太阳能照明设施。

  

Zayed Future Energy Prize理事NawalAl-
Hosany博士说：“今天这一创纪录的活动是庆祝Zayed年和机构成立10周年一个极具创意的方式。ZayedFuture Energy
Prize成立的初衷便是为了弘扬SheikhZayed环保理念和愿景。在过去10年中，该奖项的优胜者为数百万人带来了积极影响，而Literof  
Light是其中的典范。今天的聚会凸显了年轻人在推动可再生能源和可持续发展对话方面所发挥的至关重要的作用，以及他们当前以及未来作为变革生力军的力量。”

  

Liter of  
Light成为了全球学校和社区的希望之光，专注于培养能够拥有跨国影响力的社区技能和当地制造业。由学生组成的太阳能灯装置将被拆卸，然后捐给红新月会，并安装在那些最需要照明的街道和家庭。

  

Diaz在评论Liter of  
Light这一创吉尼斯世界纪录的活动时表示，“青年人为可持续发展和负责任行动提供了源源不断的能量和理念。今天的活动向阿联酋和全世界的青年释放了一个强大的信息：他们在应对全球可持续发展挑战方面大有可为。”

  

吉尼斯世界纪录官方评判员Samer  
Khallouf确认了今天的活动为“最大规模的环境可持续发展课程”，并向NawalAl Hosany博士颁发了证书。

Zayed Future Energy Prize record the Guinness Book of World Records

  

(BUSINESS WIRE) - The Zayed Future Energy
Prize (http://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT ...) announced on January 10 that it is officially honored as the Guinness Book of Records for the "largest environmental sustainability curriculum".

  

This press release contains multimedia. View full text of press release here:
http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180115005298/zh-
CN / (http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180115005298/en/)

  

  

  

Zawed Future Energy Prize Director NawalAl-
Dr. Hosany accepts Guinness World Records certification: "The Largest Environmental Sustainability Course." (Photo: AETOSWire)

  

  

282 students from the United Arab Emirates participated in a sustainable development theme course at Carlton Hotel in Leeds, Abu Dhabi. This course is sponsored by 2015 Zayed Future Energy
Professor Illac Angelo Diaz, Executive Director of Liter of Light, a Prize award winning organization.

  

The 30-minute lecture introduced how young people around the world can help reduce energy poverty while inspiring them to develop solutions that will make for a more sustainable future.

  

The event also brought together 2400 solar lights, which formed a unique lighting device to commemorate the father of the UAE SheikhZayed. In 2018, the United Arab Emirates will hold a celebration ceremony throughout the country to commemorate the centennial birthday of the father.

  

Zayed Future Energy
Prize is a world-renowned award for renewable energy and sustainability that honors companies, schools, non-profit organizations and folks who make outstanding contributions every year. Filipino Agency Liter of
Through its education and self-help programs, Light provides solar lighting to thousands of homes, schools and workplaces that have been hit by natural disasters.

  

Zayed Future Energy Prize Director NawalAl-
Dr. Hosany said: "Today's record event is a great way to celebrate the tenth anniversary of the Zayed Year and the founding of the organization, Global Unichip Corp. Zayed Future Energy
Prize was originally established to promote SheikhZayed environmental philosophy and vision. The winners of this award have had a positive impact on millions of people over the past 10 years, while Literof
Light is one of the examples. Today's gathering highlights the crucial role that young people play in promoting the renewable energy and sustainable development dialogue and their current and future forces as a force for change. "

  

Liter of
Light is a light of hope for schools and communities around the world and focuses on building community skills and local manufacturing that can have transnational influence. The student-made solar-powered light fixtures will be disassembled and donated to the Crescent and installed on the streets and homes where lighting is most needed.

  

Diaz commented on Liter of
Light, a Guinness World Record event, said: "Young people provide a steady flow of energy and ideas for sustainable development and responsible action, and today's event releases a powerful message to youth in the UAE and around the world: There is a great way to deal with the challenges of global sustainability. "

  

Samer, official judge of the Guinness Book of Records
Khallouf confirmed today's event as "the largest environmental sustainability curriculum" and presented a certificate to Dr. Nawal Al Hosany.

  

For more information, visit www.ZayedFutureEnergyPrize.com (http://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT ...) or our social media channel Twitter
(http://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT...), Facebook
(http://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT...),Instagram
(http://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT ...) and LinkedIn
(http://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT ...).

携程商旅方继勤：在智能时代向世界级TMC迈进  
PR Newswire

  

上海, 2018年1月10日电

  

上海2018年1月10日电 /美通社/  
\--1月9日，第四届亚太商旅峰会在上海圆满落幕，携程商旅CEO方继勤在峰会现场正式发布智能化战略。在大数据、智能互联等新兴技术的助力下，未来行业的进化方向必然是由产品升级与效率升级双轮驱动，体现为以定制化、场景化、人性化为特征的智慧差旅。携程商旅将积极布局智能技术以引领行业发展，向世界级TMC的目标持续迈进。1月9日，第四届亚太商旅峰会在上海圆满落幕，携程商旅CEO方继勤在峰会现场正式发布智能化战略。在峰会现场，方继勤分享了携程商旅智能化战略背后的思考。他表示，每个行业都遵循着由导入期、成长期、成熟期、至衰退期甚至被替代的发展规律。行业在不同发展阶段具备不同的属性和需求。对于刚经历过2017洗礼过的中国差旅市场，方继勤介绍道，如今，中小企业进入了差旅管理的导入期，国央企处于更加快速的成长期，而在成熟阶段的五百强企业，则更迫切的期待行业能有创新的领导者来提升和赋予差旅管理新的价值。

  

为了应对不同阶段的差异化需求，方继勤指出，在2018年，“产品升级”与“效率升级”将是驱动行业发展的两大主题。“领先TMC一方面应该通过产品与品类的升级，赋予行业新的发展动力，包括积极采用新兴技术，以及提供全面的出行产品供应，以此去满足国企、民企以及中小企业对于成本以及多元化差旅产品的需求；另一方面，运营与服务效率的提升则能够实现快速迭代，满足成熟期企业对于效率以及更多附加价值的追求。”

  

方继勤认为，在产品与效率的驱动下，差旅行业的发展将会显示出定制化、场景化、人性化三大特征。定制化是指对于用户个性化需求的关注，行业通过标准化完成快速扩张，再经历群分化聚焦群体需求，直至借助技术手段关注和尊重个体需求。相应，差旅产品也应该保持灵活性，可以根据客户的个性化需求进行相应调整；同时，随着智能技术的加速扩散，用户在更多、更细分的场景下被激发出智能应用需求。

  

“就拿差旅来说，商务旅客可以与聊天机器人互动，通过语音咨询、预订、退改签、甚至上传消费凭证的照片就可以完成报销，智能的人机交互可以更高效的处理旅客在每个细小场景下的需求。”

  

从人性化的角度出发，TMC提供的差旅产品不仅仅是千篇一律的工具，而是通过对用户数据的精准分析，成为真正理解用户喜好和行为习惯的“差旅管家”，提供更为人性化的服务，提前一步想用户所想，减少差旅过程中的痛点和烦恼。

  

展望未来，方继勤认为，将来在中国诞生的世界级的TMC，扩张方式一定有别于国际传统的TMC，并不会通过海外并购和投资的方式进军国际，而是基于强大的技术实力，打造一个在云端链接全球差旅资源的系统，通过强大的搜索引擎来管理同一公司不同国家，同一地区不同公司的差旅政策，实现数据和信息的统一完整及文化和服务的落地。这将是中国TMC走上世界舞台的制胜点。

  

    
    
    ###

Ctrip travel follow-Qin: in the smart era to the world-class TMC forward
PR Newswire

  

Shanghai, January 10, 2018

  

Shanghai, January 10, 2018 / PRNewswire /
\ - - January 9, the Fourth Asia Pacific Business Summit ended in Shanghai, Ctrip CNROC CNDOC Limited Fangqin formally released at the summit intelligent strategy. With the help of technologies such as big data and intelligent interconnection, SINCERE NAVIGATION CORPORATION, the future direction of the industry evolution must be driven by product upgrades and efficiency upgrades, which are characterized by intelligent tours characterized by customization, scene orientation and humanization. Ctrip will actively deploy intelligent technology to lead the development of the industry, to the world-class TMC's goal of continuous progress. On January 9, the 4th Asia Pacific Business Summit was successfully concluded in Shanghai. Ctrip Business CNOOC LIMITED Fang Jiqin officially released the intelligent strategy at the summit. At the scene of the summit, Fang Jijin shared the thinking behind Ctrip's intelligent strategy. He said that each industry follows the law of development that has even been replaced by the period of introduction, growth, maturity and recession. Industry at different stages of development have different attributes and needs. For the Chinese travel market just experienced in 2017, Fang Jiqin introduced that nowadays, SMEs have entered the period of the introduction of travel management. State-owned enterprises are in a period of rapid growth. In the mature stage of the 500-strong enterprises, More pressing expectations The industry can have innovative leaders to enhance and give new value to travel management.

  

In response to the different needs of different stages, Fang Jiqin pointed out that in 2018, "product upgrades" and "efficiency upgrades" will be two major topics driving the development of the industry. "Leading TMC should give new impetus to the industry through the upgrading of products and categories on the one hand, including actively adopting SINCERE NAVIGATION CORPORATION technology and providing a full range of travel products to meet the needs of state-owned enterprises, private enterprises and small and medium enterprises Demand for travel products; on the other hand, operational and service efficiency improvements enable rapid iteration to meet the maturity of the business for efficiency and more value-added pursuit. "

  

Fang Jijin believes that driven by products and efficiency, the development of the travel industry will show three characteristics: customized, scene-oriented and humanized. Customization refers to the individual needs of the user's attention, the industry completed rapid expansion through standardization, and then go through the needs of group differentiation and focus groups, with the help of technical means to pay attention to and respect for individual needs. Correspondingly, the travel products should also be flexible and can be adjusted according to the individual needs of the customers. Meanwhile, with the acceleration of the smart technologies, users are stimulated with intelligent application needs in more and more subtle scenarios.

  

"Take travel, business travelers can interact with chat robots, reimbursement can be done through voice counseling, booking, re-signing, and even posting proof of spending vouchers. Smarter human-computer interaction can handle travelers more efficiently A small scenario needs. "

  

From a user-friendly point of view, TMC provides travel products that are more than just a one-size-fits-all tools, but a "travel steward" that truly understands user preferences and behavior through accurate analysis of user data, providing a more humane Service, one step ahead to the user's thinking, to reduce the pain points and troubles in the travel process.

  

Looking forward, Fang Jijin believes that the future expansion of world-class TMCs that are born in China will certainly be different from the international traditional TMCs and will not enter the world through overseas M & A and investment. Instead, they will build one based on strong technical strength In the cloud link global travel resources system, through a powerful search engine to manage the same company in different countries, different regions of the same company's travel policy, to achieve the integrity of data and information integrity and culture and service landing. This will be the winning point for China's TMC to embark on the world stage.

    序号:1            发言日期:107/01/12              发言时间:15:05:03发言人:谢芳宜  发言人职称:财务长            发言人电话:07-8139989#72801主旨:公告经济部投审会核准本公司经由第三地区间接投资大陆地区。符合条款第20款 事实发生日:107/01/12说明1.事实发生日:自民国107/1/12至民国107/1/122.本次新增（减少）投资方式:本公司经由第三地区投资事业,间接投资大陆地区投资设立如东富展科技有限公司。3.交易单位数量、每单位价格及交易总金额:美金35,000,000元4.大陆被投资公司之公司名称:如东富展科技有限公司5.前开大陆被投资公司之实收资本额:尚未实行投资，目前大陆被投资公司之实收资本额美金0元6.前开大陆被投资公司本次拟新增资本额:美金35,000,000元7.前开大陆被投资公司主要营业项目:生产、加工及销售软性铜箔基层板、保护胶片、铝塑膜。8.前开大陆被投资公司最近年度财务报表会计师意见型态:尚未成立;不适用9.前开大陆被投资公司最近年度财务报表净值:尚未成立;不适用10.前开大陆被投资公司最近年度财务报表损益金额:尚未成立;不适用11.迄目前为止，对前开大陆被投资公司之实际投资金额:美金0元12.交易相对人及其与公司之关系:不适用13.交易相对人为关系人者，并应公告选定关系人为交易对象之原因及前次移转之所有人、前次移转之所有人与公司及交易相对人间相互之关系、前次移转日期及移转金额:不适用14.交易标的最近五年内所有权人曾为公司之关系人者，尚应公告关系人之取得及处分日期、价格及交易当时与公司之关系:不适用15.处分利益（或损失）:不适用16.交付或付款条件（含付款期间及金额）、契约限制条款及其他重要约定事项:不适用17.本次交易之决定方式、价格决定之参考依据及决策单位:不适用18.经纪人:不适用19.取得或处分之具体目的:不适用20.本次交易表示异议董事之意见:无21.本次交易为关系人交易:否22.董事会通过日期:已於民国106年12月05日董事会通过。23.监察人承认或审计委员会同意日期:已於民国106年12月05日审计委员会通过。24.迄目前为止，投审会核准赴大陆地区投资总额（含本次投资）:约合新台币2,399,726仟元25.迄目前为止，投审会核准赴大陆地区投资总额（含本次投资）占最近期财务报表实收资本额之比率:114.94%26.迄目前为止，投审会核准赴大陆地区投资总额（含本次投资）占最近期财务报表总资产之比率:24.85%27.迄目前为止，投审会核准赴大陆地区投资总额（含本次投资）占最近期财务报表归属於母公司业主之权益之比率:34.57%28.迄目前为止，实际赴大陆地区投资总额:新台币1,307,188���元29.迄目前为止，实际赴大陆地区投资总额占最近期财务报表实收资本额之比率:62.61%30.迄目前为止，实际赴大陆地区投资总额占最近期财务报表总资产之比率:13.54%31.迄目前为止，实际赴大陆地区投资总额占最近期财务报表归属於母公司业主之权益之比率:18.83%32.最近三年度认列投资大陆损益金额:105年：新台币56,575仟元104年：新台币 2,991仟元103年：新台币76,683仟元33.最近三年度获利汇回金额:103年：新台币128,532仟元34.本次交易会计师出具非合理性意见:不适用35.其他叙明事项:无。

Title: [即时重大讯息] 台虹科技<8039.TW>公告经济部投审会核准本公司经由第三地区间接投资大陆地区。

    序號:1            發言日期:107/01/12              發言時間:15:05:03發言人:謝芳宜  發言人職稱:財務長            發言人電話:07-8139989#72801主旨:公告經濟部投審會核准本公司經由第三地區間接投資大陸地區。符合條款第20款 事實發生日:107/01/12說明1.事實發生日:自民國107/1/12至民國107/1/122.本次新增（減少）投資方式:本公司經由第三地區投資事業,間接投資大陸地區投資設立如東富展科技有限公司。3.交易單位數量、每單位價格及交易總金額:美金35,000,000元4.大陸被投資公司之公司名稱:如東富展科技有限公司5.前開大陸被投資公司之實收資本額:尚未實行投資，目前大陸被投資公司之實收資本額美金0元6.前開大陸被投資公司本次擬新增資本額:美金35,000,000元7.前開大陸被投資公司主要營業項目:生產、加工及銷售軟性銅箔基層板、保護膠片、鋁塑膜。8.前開大陸被投資公司最近年度財務報表會計師意見型態:尚未成立;不適用9.前開大陸被投資公司最近年度財務報表淨值:尚未成立;不適用10.前開大陸被投資公司最近年度財務報表損益金額:尚未成立;不適用11.迄目前為止，對前開大陸被投資公司之實際投資金額:美金0元12.交易相對人及其與公司之關係:不適用13.交易相對人為關係人者，並應公告選定關係人為交易對象之原因及前次移轉之所有人、前次移轉之所有人與公司及交易相對人間相互之關係、前次移轉日期及移轉金額:不適用14.交易標的最近五年內所有權人曾為公司之關係人者，尚應公告關係人之取得及處分日期、價格及交易當時與公司之關係:不適用15.處分利益（或損失）:不適用16.交付或付款條件（含付款期間及金額）、契約限制條款及其他重要約定事項:不適用17.本次交易之決定方式、價格決定之參考依據及決策單位:不適用18.經紀人:不適用19.取得或處分之具體目的:不適用20.本次交易表示異議董事之意見:無21.本次交易為關係人交易:否22.董事會通過日期:已於民國106年12月05日董事會通過。23.監察人承認或審計委員會同意日期:已於民國106年12月05日審計委員會通過。24.迄目前為止，投審會核准赴大陸地區投資總額（含本次投資）:約合新台幣2,399,726仟元25.迄目前為止，投審會核准赴大陸地區投資總額（含本次投資）占最近期財務報表實收資本額之比率:114.94%26.迄目前為止，投審會核准赴大陸地區投資總額（含本次投資）占最近期財務報表總資產之比率:24.85%27.迄目前為止，投審會核准赴大陸地區投資總額（含本次投資）占最近期財務報表歸屬於母公司業主之權益之比率:34.57%28.迄目前為止，實際赴大陸地區投資總額:新台幣1,307,188仟元29.迄目前為止，實際赴大陸地區投資總額占最近期財務報表實收資本額之比率:62.61%30.迄目前為止，實際赴大陸地區投資總額占最近期財務報表總資產之比率:13.54%31.迄目前為止，實際赴大陸地區投資總額占最近期財務報表歸屬於母公司業主之權益之比率:18.83%32.最近三年度認列投資大陸損益金額:105年：新台幣56,575仟元104年：新台幣 2,991仟元103年：新台幣76,683仟元33.最近三年度獲利匯回金額:103年：新台幣128,532仟元34.本次交易會計師出具非合理性意見:不適用35.其他敘明事項:無。

Title: [即時重大訊息] 台虹科技<8039.TW>公告經濟部投審會核准本公司經由第三地區間接投資大陸地區。

Content:
【時報-盤中焦點股】1.南亞科(2408)：昨外資轉賣超+美光昨夜重挫，早盤股價續跌逾3%。

2.同欣電(6271)：去年12月營收月減6.63%、全年減3.88%，投信連日賣超，外資昨亦加入空頭行列，衝擊早盤股價急跌逾8.5%。

3.佳大(2033)：今起恢復原融資比率及融券保證金成數，買盤持續搶進，股價跳空鎖在漲停價12.05元，續創新高。

4.世紀鋼(9958)：昨外資轉買超，不甩列注意股，早盤衝上40元大關，續創新高價。

5.第一銅(2009)：連跌5個交易日後，昨獲外資轉買超，今早交投火熱，盤初成交量即輕鬆突破萬張、股價漲近7%。

6.大成鋼(2027)：美稅務政策利多續熱，三大法人持續聯手買超，帶動早盤股價再漲逾4%。

  

7.中鴻(2014)：中國限產有利產業，昨獲三大法人擴大買超18131張，早盤股價續漲至14.25元、再創新高。

8.麗清(3346)：去年12月、Q4、全年營收皆創新高，早盤放量衝上78.5元、股價漲逾6%。

9.羅昇(8374)：去年每股盈餘估近2元，今年營運亦有機會續走高，近日股價緩步走高，早盤漲近3%。

10.永冠-KY(1589)：今起買回庫藏股，早盤量增價漲逾8.5%。

11.盟立(2464)：去年12月營收年增57.39%，今年營收看增雙位數，股價終結修正格局，早盤大漲8%。

12.致茂(2360)：上月合併營收11.99億元，月減51%，股價大受打擊，重跌5.5%。

13.雷虎(8033)：推出4G空中基地台無人直升機等新品搶市，早盤續強再漲3%，一舉突破前高。

14.雄獅(2731)：三大法人續偏多，昨日合計買超778張，今早股價逼近125元，創2年來新高價。

15.台玻(1802)：對岸去產能力道加大，今年大陸平板玻璃獲利樂觀，股價多頭行情未改，一度大漲3%。

16.樺漢(6414)：母子齊旺，上月、上季、去年營收飆3高，推升股價反彈逾3.5%。

17.宏碁(2353)：上月營收站穩200億元，年增逾1成，早盤多頭回頭，股價一度漲近2%。

  

  

18.華豐(2109)：甩高層財務糾紛，昨外資相挺大漲，早盤續漲逾1.8%，挑戰14元前波高價

    
    
    。

19.信昌化(4725)：受惠美國酚、丙酮供應減少，市場對今年營運持正面期待，昨日獲三大法人聯手買超1650張，短多氣勢如虹，早盤帶量衝高半根停板，站上近5年高點。

20.台聚(1304)：獲外資力挺，連五日買超5795張，早盤挾量上攻2%，站上10個月新高。

  

  

21.南亞(1303)：EG報價站高檔，加上大陸執行嚴格環保稽查，利差空間受惠提振，昨獲三大法人聯手買超3754張，早盤攻上83.1元，改寫逾6年半新高價。

22.智易(3596)：上月營收年減35.74%，早盤賣壓湧出，股價重挫7%，跌落月線。

23.友訊(2332)：攜手國際一線大廠共組大友訊聯盟，在轉機題材持續發熱下，早盤價量俱揚大漲4%。

24.集盛(1455)：抗寒概念股題材發燒，早盤獲多頭點火，股價衝高近3%。

Content:

盛橡酒店及度假村推出全新中文网站，从而更好地满足国际旅客不断增长的需求

  

(美国商业资讯)--为了满足国际市场对设施齐全、服务完善的住宿不断增长的需求，领先住宿提供商盛橡酒店及度假村(OaksHotels &
Resorts)在中国春节前及时推出了全新的中文网站(http://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT...)。

  

2017年，中国游客在过去七年间增至三倍以上，取代来自新西兰的游客，成为澳大利亚最大的旅游客源地。

  

另外，616万中国游客在2017年中国春节“黄金周”期间选择出国旅游，比上年增长了7%，且预计在2018年将再次打破记录，这就要求酒店业者更多地推出专属中文服务，以迎合中国这个蓬勃发展的客源市场。

  

盛橡酒店及度假村  
(http://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT...)的全新中文网站已经成功上线，为中国旅客提供易于使用的预订引擎、独家促销优惠，以及度假和商务旅行规划时所需的当地人文景点信息。

  

为庆祝网站上线，即日起至2月底，在盛橡酒店及度假村  
(http://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT...)中文官网上预订,
使用限时优惠码Luckydog，连住2晚立减20%(无须支付定金)、支持灵活更改取消、到店银联支付和一系列贴心的服务和设施。这也是盛橡酒店中国“贵宾”项目的一部分。

  

盛橡酒店及度假村  
(http://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT...)于去年早些时候精选了部分市中心酒店和热门景点度假村推出了  
“贵宾”项目。事实表明，这个项目是成功的，吸引了很多在旅行中渴望旅途能像在家一样方便舒适的中国旅客。

  

这一举措包括在部分酒店接受银联支付、在参与“贵宾”计划的酒店内部餐厅中增加中式美食、24小时免费无线上网、中文前台、在酒店客房中配备牙具和拖鞋。所有这些都能够给来访澳新的旅客带去便利和舒适的体验。

  

*立即使用限时优惠码“Luckydog”开始预订吧 (oakshotels.com.cn(http://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT...)
    
    
    ) ！

  

    
    
    *美国广播公司新闻（在线），中国即将超过新西兰，成为澳大利亚最大的旅游客源地，2017年10月27日。

  

关于『盛橡酒店及度假村Oaks Hotels & Resorts』

  

澳大利亚最大的服务式公寓酒店提供商之一，在5个国家管理着超过56家酒店组合，遍布澳大利亚昆士兰州、新南威尔士州、维多利亚州、北领地、南澳和西澳，也包括新西兰、泰国、阿联酋和印度。免责声明：本公告之原文版本乃官方授权版本。译文仅供方便了解之用，烦请参照原文，原文版本乃唯一具法律效力之版本。

  

  

  

  

  

在 businesswire.com 上查看源版本新闻稿:  
http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180115005697/zh-
CN/(http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180115005697/zh-CN/)

  

盛橡酒店及度假村Sara Sun, +61-4-2849-5185

Sheng Oaks Hotels & Resorts Launches VISUAL PHOTONICS EPITAXY CO.,LTD. Chinese Website to Better Meet International Travelers' Growing Needs

  

(BUSINESS WIRE) - In response to growing international demand for well-equipped, well-serviced accommodation, leading accommodation providers OaksHotels &
Resorts) launched the Chinese website of VISUAL PHOTONICS EPITAXY CO.,LTD. (Http://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT ...) in time for the Spring Festival of China.

  

In 2017, Chinese tourists tripled in the past seven years to replace tourists from New Zealand and become Australia's largest tourist destination.

  

In addition, 6.16 million Chinese tourists chose to travel abroad during the "Golden Week" of the Chinese Spring Festival in 2017, an increase of 7% over the previous year and is expected to break the record again in 2018. This will require the hoteliers to launch more exclusive Chinese services To cater to China's booming tourist market.

  

Sheng Oaks Hotels and Resorts
(http: //cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT ...) VISUAL PHOTONICS EPITAXY CO.,LTD. Chinese website has been successfully launched for Chinese travelers to provide easy-to-use booking engine, exclusive promotions, and vacation and Local cultural attractions required for business travel planning.

  

To celebrate the site on-line, now until the end of February at the Oak Hotel and Resort
(http://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT ...) Chinese official online booking,
Save up to 20% with 2 nights, save up to 2 bonus points for any cancellation fees, cancellations and flexible room changes. Pay with PayPal, pay a visit pack and have a great deal of service. It is also part of Sheng'ao Hotel China's "VIP" project.

  

Sheng Oaks Hotels and Resorts
(http://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT ...) selected some downtown hotels and popular attractions resorts earlier this year
"VIP" project. Facts have shown that this project is a success, attracting many Chinese travelers who are eager to travel on their journey to be as comfortable as their home.

  

The move included paying for UnionPay at some hotels, adding Chinese delicacies to the hotel's in-house restaurants participating in the "VIP" program, free 24-hour wireless Internet access, Chinese front desk, dental equipment and slippers in hotel rooms. All of this will bring a convenient and comfortable visit to ANZ travelers.

  

* Start booking now with the Limited Time Code "Luckydog" (oakshotels.com.cn (http://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT ...)
    
    
    )!

  

    
    
    * ABC News (online), China is about to overtake New Zealand and become Australia's largest tourist source, October 27, 2017.

  

About Oaks Hotels & Resorts

  

Australia is one of the largest serviced apartment hotel providers with more than 56 hotel portfolio managed in 5 countries throughout Queensland, New South Wales, Victoria, Northern Territory, South Australia and Western Australia, as well as New Zealand, Thailand UAE and India. 德州仪器全新的高分辨率DLP(R)技术革新车前大灯系统  
PR Newswire

  

北京, 2018年1月16日电

  

先进的新型自适应远光灯系统帮助汽车制造商和一级供应商提升驾驶员能见度和通信能力

  

  

北京2018年1月16日电 /美通社/ --  
近日，德州仪器在国际消费类电子产品展览会（CES）上展示了用于高分辨率车前大灯系统的DLP(®)技术。该技术使用的新型DLP芯片是市场上唯一一款同时集成可编程性和高分辨率特性的产品，可为每个车前大灯提供超过100万个可寻址像素点，分辨率是现有自适应远光技术的一万多倍。如需了解更多关于用于高分辨率车前大灯系统的DLP产品信息并获取样片，敬请访问：www.ti.com.cn/DLPheadlight-
pr-cn。

  

近日，德州仪器在CES展上展示了用于高分辨率车前大灯系统的DLP(R)技术。该技术使用的新型DLP芯片是市场上唯一一款同时集成可编程性和高分辨率特性的产品，可为每个车前大灯提供超过100万个可寻址像素点，分辨率是现有自适应远光技术的一万多倍。汽车制造商和一级供应商可使用该新型可编程自适应远光系统（ADB）解决方案设计车前大灯系统，从而最大限度地提高驾驶员的车前灯亮度，并减小对迎面车辆的眩光和来自交通标志的反光。该技术可应用于包括LED和激光照明在内的任何光源系统。工程师也可以利用其定制波束模式，更精确地控制道路上的光束分布。

  

利用灵活的DLP技术，汽车制造商和一级供应商可以开发与可编程软件和小型光学器件相匹配的车前大灯系统，从而在不影响设计风格的前提下提高车灯性能。系统工程师也可利用该解决方案部分或整体淡化车前灯像素点，这样驾驶员便可以在各种路况下打开远光灯行驶，同时不对其他司机的视线造成影响。

  

通过在路面上投射信息，用于高分辨率车前大灯系统的DLP技术帮助汽车制造商和一级供应商将车前大灯系统转变为新的交通通信方式。路面灯光投射技术能够加强驾驶员之间以及驾驶员与行人间的交流，为未来的自动驾驶和无人驾驶车辆提供了一种可行的解决方案。

  

供货  
目前，先期客户正在利用DLP5531-Q1芯片组进行高分辨率车前大灯系统的采样和设计，预计于2018年下半年可大范围提供。

  

了解更多用于汽车解决方案的DLP技术：

  * 了解DLP技术  
(http://www.ti.com/DLPheadlight-pr)在汽车抬头显示系统的应用

    
    
    *查看德州仪器创新的模拟和嵌入式处理产品组合，客户可以使用这些产品在任何车型上设计差异化的车身电子和照明系统(http://www.ti.com.cn/zh-cn/applications/automotive/body-lighting/overv...###

  

关于德州仪器公司DLP产品事业部  
自1996年以来，德州仪器公司的DLP显示技术屡获殊荣，为全球顶级的显示设备提供色彩丰富、对比鲜明、高清靓丽的优秀画质，已广泛应用于包括智能显示技术在内的各种装置，包括工业、汽车、医疗和互动投影等各种应用。从影院（DLPCinema®）到大型专业展厅，从会议室、教室到家庭影院，DLP技术都贯穿其中。此外，DLPPico™使移动设备能够在您手中轻易地投影出画面。每一块DLP芯片的核心是由微镜所排成的阵列，它们以高达每秒上万次的高速切换。更多信息，请访问www.ti.com.cn/dlp或关注官方微博http://e.weibo.com/tidlp
。

  

关于德州仪器 (TI)  
德州仪器 (TI)  
是一家全球性半导体设计制造公司，始终致力于模拟 IC  
及嵌入式处理器开发。TI  
拥有全球顶尖人才，锐意创新，塑造技术行业未来。今天，TI  
正携手超过 10  
万家客户打造更美好未来。更多详情，敬请查阅http://www.ti.com.cn。

  

商标  
TI E2E 和 TINA-TI是德州仪器 (TI)  
的商标。所有其它商标均归其各自所有者专属。

  

SOURCE 德州仪器半导体技术（上海）有限公司

Texas Instruments VISUAL PHOTONICS EPITAXY CO.,LTD.'s High-Resolution DLP (R) Technology Revolutionizes Headlight Systems
PR Newswire

  

Beijing, January 16, 2018

  

Advanced, Adaptive Adaptive High-beam System Helps Automotive Manufacturers and Tier-1 Suppliers Enhance Driver Visibility and Communication Capabilities

  

  

Beijing, January 16, 2018 / PR Newswire /
Recently, Texas Instruments demonstrated DLP (®) technology for high-resolution headlamp systems at the International Consumer Electronics Show (CES). The new DLP chip used in this technology is the only product on the market that combines both programmability and high resolution with more than 1 million addressable pixels for each headlamp, with a resolution of There are more than 10,000 times the adaptive high beam technology. To learn more about DLP product information for high-resolution headlamp systems and to obtain samples, visit: www.ti.com/DLPheadlight-
pr-cn.

  

Recently, Texas Instruments demonstrated DLP (R) technology for high-resolution headlamp systems at CES. The new DLP chip used in this technology is the only product on the market that combines both programmability and high resolution with more than 1 million addressable pixels for each headlamp, with a resolution of There are more than 10,000 times the adaptive high beam technology. Automotive manufacturers and Tier 1 suppliers can use the new ADB solution to design a headlamp system that maximizes the driver's headlamp brightness and reduces the need for oncoming vehicles Glare and reflections from traffic signs. The technology can be applied to any light source system including LED and laser lighting. Engineers can also use their custom beam mode to more precisely control the beam distribution on the road.

  

With flexible DLP technology, car manufacturers and Tier 1 suppliers can develop headlight systems that match programmable software and small optics to improve lamp performance without compromising on design style. System engineers can also use this solution to partially or completely down-pixel the front light so that the driver can turn on the high-beam in all conditions without affecting the driver's view.

  

By projecting information on the road, DLP technology for high-resolution headlamp systems helps automakers and Tier 1 suppliers transform headlamp systems into new modes of traffic communication. Pavement lighting projection technology to enhance communication between drivers and between drivers and pedestrians provides a viable solution for future autonomous and driverless vehicles.

  

Availability
Currently, leading customers are using the DLP5531-Q1 chipset for sampling and design of high-resolution headlamp systems for high-resolution vehicles, which are expected to be available in a wide range in the second half of 2018.

  

Learn more DLP Technology for Automotive Solutions:

  * Understand DLP technology
(http://www.ti.com/DLPheadlight-pr) in the car head-up display system

    
    
    * See Texas Instruments' portfolio of innovative analog and embedded processing products that customers can use to design differentiated body electronics and lighting systems in any vehicle model (http://www.ti.com/us/applications /automotive/body-lighting/overv...###

  

About Texas Instruments DLP Products Division
Since 1996, Texas Instruments DLP display technology has been awarded the award-winning, to provide the world's top display devices with rich color, contrast, high-definition beautiful picture quality, has been widely used in various devices, including smart display technology , Including industrial, automotive, medical and interactive projection and other applications. From cinema (DLPCinema®) to large professional showrooms, from conference rooms, classrooms to home theater, DLP technology runs through it. In addition, DLPPico ™ enables mobile devices to easily project pictures in your hands. At the heart of each DLP chip is an array of micromirrors that switch at speeds up to 10,000 times per second. For more information, visit www.ti.com/dlp or follow official Weibo http://e.weibo.com/tidlp
.

  

About Texas Instruments
Texas Instruments
Is a global semiconductor design and manufacturing company, has always been committed to analog IC
And embedded processor development. TI
With the world's top talent, committed to innovation, shaping the future of the technology industry. Today, TI
We are hand in hand more than ten
Wanjia customers create a better future. For more details, please visit http://www.ti.com.cn

  

Trademarks
TI E2E and TINA-TI are Texas Instruments (TI)
Trademark. All other trademarks are the property of their respective owners.

  

SOURCE Texas Instruments Semiconductor Technologies (Shanghai) Co.,Ltd.

  

  

  

Copyright (c) 2018 PR Newswire Association, LLC. All Rights Reserved.

2018深圳国际家具展创造全新乐活美学  
PR Newswire

  

深圳, 2018年1月15日电

  

深圳2018年1月15日电 /美通社/ --  
2018年3月19-22日，深圳时尚家居设计周暨第33届深圳国际家具展将为观众带来一个旨在聚集并培养出最具全球设计竞争力、品牌竞争力、设计多样化发展的设计平台，毫无疑问，爬梯行动展区已成为新生代原创设计师走向市场的首选地。今年，28名设计师将在4号馆设计馆展出他们的设计作品，以鲜明的设计个性和对当代生活的率性表达，集合众多新锐原创设计品牌，向世界发出来自中国家具原创设计的声音。

  

深圳国际家具展，爬梯行动，一个原创设计的孵化平台

  

爬梯行动是深圳时尚家居设计周暨深圳国际家具展为时下年轻设计师及新锐原创设计品牌提供的专属狂欢舞台，“爬梯”，即连通两端空间、目标及攀爬的工具（连接工具）。在爬梯行动展区，设计师们不仅享受到设计的狂欢，还将收获万众瞩目的展示机会以及助推自己成长的配套资源，从而找到适合自己品牌发展的阶梯。2018年3月19-22日，深圳时尚家居设计周暨第33届深圳国际家具展将为大家带来一个旨在聚集并培养出最具全球设计竞争力、品牌竞争力、设计多样化发展的设计平台，毫无疑问，爬梯行动展区已成为新生代原创设计师走向市场的首选地。爬梯行动，这个聚集并培养最具全球设计竞争力、品牌竞争力的设计群体平台，为中国家具产业搭建了一个原创设计的孵化平台，让这些设计思维不受限于空间内外、敢于突破惯性思维打破常规、善于探索新材料新技术及设计手法、重视设计的可持续性发展和生态环保的新锐设计师有更多精力和更好的平台来创作设计出经得起考验的作品。

  

深圳国际家具展，爬梯行动，洋溢小资情调的别样空间

  

凹凸的轻奢简约、本来设计的原木温暖、本土创造的材质本原、But  
design  
的创新变革……深圳国际家具展的家居产品展示空间将化为这群都市生活美学师小资情调的绽放舞台。每件产品都凝聚着设计师对于美、对于生活的感悟和情怀，他们将自身对设计与产品的独特理解，对过往的设计经验以及对未来的不同期许，融入设计与产品当中，为全面展现材料内涵品质和生活美学而不断坚持。

  

深圳国际家具展，爬梯行动，品质生活与个性齐飞

  

参与爬梯行动的原创家居品牌产品，不只是外形的简单优雅，更是内在的高品质，设计师们将产品设计通过“可实现的工艺、可视化的传播、可感受的体��”三点合一的方式转达给客户，让这些高品质且具有独特设计语言的家具或家居产品，展现一种简约、时尚、自由、舒适的生活美学，传达设计师的原创家居生活理念。

  

随着90后，甚至00后消费主力军的崛起，个性且具有品味的产品将成为市场消费主向，相信爬梯行动中这些独特的、与众不同的家居物品将成为居住者生活品味最完美的诠释。

  

一场都市生活美学师的狂欢派对，一群年轻、富有创意的新锐设计师，一个不见不散的品质家居生活课堂，2018年3月19-22日，深圳时尚家居设计周暨33届深圳国际家具展“爬梯行动”展，与大家不见不散。

  

    
    
    ###

https://photos.prnasia.com/prnh/20180115/2032208-1-b

  

SOURCE 深圳国际家具展

https://photos.prnasia.com/prnh/20180115/2032208-1-ahttps://photos.prnasia.com/prnh/20180115/2032208-1-b

Content:

Johnnie Walker在新年推出全新限量版威士忌  
PR Newswire

  

倫敦, 2018年1月11日電

  

倫敦2018年1月11日電 /美通社/ --

  

Johnnie Walker Blenders' Batch Sherry Cask Finish面向旅行者獨家推出

  

新年的到來意味著新計劃、新願望和新開始；但對 Johnnie  
Walker  
由12名專業威士忌調酒師組成的團隊而言，這就是每天的常態，因為他們不斷突破蘇格蘭威士忌口味的極限。

  

（圖片：http://mma.prnewswire.com/media/626698/Johnnie_Walker_Blenders_Batch.j...）

  

值此新年到來之際，全球第一大蘇格蘭威士忌品牌(1)背後的團隊面向旅行者獨家推出了特別版威士忌：JohnnieWalker Blenders' Batch
Sherry CaskFinish，目前在全球各地免稅店有售。

  

Johnnie Walker Blenders' Batch  
產品組合是一系列精心製作的威士忌，可以自由混配，挑戰威士忌製作傳統。由此帶來的成果是一系列獨特的體驗性威士忌，具有與眾不同的風味和令人驚奇的口感。值此新年到來之際，全球第一大蘇格蘭威士忌品牌背後的團隊面向旅行者獨家推出了特別版威士忌：JohnnieWalker
Blenders' Batch Sherry CaskFinish，目前在全球各地免稅店有售。  
新推產品背後的試驗以標誌性 Johnnie Walker Black
Label為靈感來源，後者在雪莉桶中熟化而成，擁有100多年的發展歷史。在這一製作過程的啟發下，JohnnieWalker  
威士忌調酒師想要更加深入挖掘並探索雪莉桶熟化為口感所帶來的果香

  * 打造濃郁香甜、陳釀12年的 Johnnie Walker Blenders Batch SherryCask Finish。

Johnnie Walker Blenders' Batch Sherry Cask Finish 由來自 BlairAthol、Cardhu 和
Strathmill  
等釀酒廠生產的威士忌製作而成，是一種純飲型黑蘇格蘭威士忌，口感富含甜美的香草、煙草、葡萄乾，以及讓人暖和的黑朱古力。

  

Johnnie Walker 專業威士���調酒師 Aimee Gibson 表示：「JohnnieWalker Blenders' Batch  
威士忌是大膽嘗試的成果，由此打破了口味的極限。以  
Johnnie Walker Black Label  
中的雪莉桶熟化為靈感來源，為混配而加入的濃郁果味吸引了我。它給予我靈感，即利用雪莉桶釀造來嘗試帶來更多的果味，並增加獨特的風味活力。」

  

她還表示：「由此產生的結果非比尋常；Johnnie Walker Blenders'Batch Sherry Cask Finish  
成為了一款非常香甜的濃郁威士忌。它非常適合推薦給想體驗蘇格蘭威士忌的新手，並且還會讓資深的威士忌愛好者為之振奮。」

  

Diageo Global Travel 董事總經理 Dayalan
Nayager在對通過旅遊零售渠道獨家銷售威士忌新品評論時說：「JohnnieWalker Blenders' Batch Sherry Cask
Finish 是為 Diageo Global Travel推出的特別產品，因為它是我們購物者的專屬。這是 Johnnie  
Walker Blenders' Batch  
系列推出的首款旅遊零售獨家產品，非常適合想要在新年贈送非常特別的禮品的旅行者購買。」

  

「旅行者尋求那些背後蘊含探索、原創、工藝和人類真實故事的各種品牌，而Johnnie Walker  
再也合適不過了。我們非常高興讓購物者一窺來自全球最大的蘇格蘭威士忌品牌的口味探索世界，並且為我們的系列產品再添創新。」

  

飲用 Johnnie Walker Blenders' Batch Sherry Cask
Finish的最佳方式是：將其與薑汁汽水混配，以新鮮橙片加以裝飾，旨在調製美味的家制雞尾酒。這種全新威士忌與Johnnie Walker Black
Label  
非常相似，非常適合混配。在聊天開始之際，敬請晚上享用這款長飲威士忌，為正濃的夜色增加豐富的情調。

  

敬請在新年讓自己或別人體驗令人振奮的全新口味威士忌。旅行者現在可以在全球特定免稅店購買一瓶Johnnie Walker Sherry Cask
Finish，而1升樽裝廠商建議零售價 (RRSP)為26.50英鎊/44美元。

  

(1) 出自於國際葡萄酒及烈酒研究機構 (IWSR)  
的2017年報告，以2016年銷量和銷售額數據為基礎。

  

敬請理性飲用 Johnnie Walker。

  

網址：http://www.DRINKiQ.com

  

SOURCE 尊尼獲加

  

  

  

Copyright (c) 2018 PR Newswire Association,LLC. All Rights Reserved.

Johnnie Walker Launches VISUAL PHOTONICS EPITAXY CO.,LTD. New Year Limited Edition Whiskey
PR Newswire

  

London, January 11, 2018

  

London, January 11, 2018 / PR Newswire /

  

Johnnie Walker Blenders' Batch Sherry Cask Finish is exclusively for travelers

  

The arrival of the New Year means new plans, new aspirations and new beginnings; but to Johnnie
Walker
For the team of 12 professional whiskey bartenders, that's the daily routine, as they continually break the limits of Scotch whiskey.

  

(Image: http://mma.prnewswire.com/media/626698/Johnnie_Walker_Blenders_Batch.j ...)

  

On the eve of the New Year, the team behind the world's # 1 Scotch whiskey brand (1) exclusively offers Travelers Special Edition whiskey: Johnnie Walker Blenders' Batch
Sherry CaskFinish, currently available in duty free shops around the world.

  

Johnnie Walker Blenders' Batch
The product mix is ​​a collection of carefully crafted whiskeys that are freely blended to challenge the tradition of whiskey making. The result is a unique collection of experience whiskeys with a distinctive flavor and amazing mouthfeel. On the occasion of the New Year, the team behind the world's # 1 Scotch whiskey brand exclusively offers Travelers Special Edition whiskey: Johnnie Walker
Blenders' Batch Sherry CaskFinish, currently available in duty-free shops around the world.
The test behind the new push is the iconic Johnnie Walker Black
Label is the source of inspiration, the latter mature in the Shirley barrel, with more than 100 years of development history. Inspired by this process, JohnnieWalker
Whiskey bartenders want to dig deeper and discover the fruit-flavored sherlock barrel

  * Build a rich, sweet, aged Johnnie Walker Blenders Batch SherryCask Finish.

Johnnie Walker Blenders' Batch Sherry Cask Finish by BlairAthol, Cardhu and
Strathmill
Made from whiskey from the brewery, it's a pure black Scotch whiskey with a sweet, vanilla, tobacco, raisin, and warm dark chocolate.

  

Johnnie Walker professional whiskey bartender Aimee Gibson said: "JohnnieWalker Blenders' Batch
Whiskey is the result of a bold attempt, thus breaking the limits of taste. To
Johnnie Walker Black Label
The Shirley Barrels were ripened as a source of inspiration and the rich fruity flavors added to the blend attracted me. It inspired me to try brewing more fruit with the Shirley pail and add a unique flavor to the flavor. "

  

She also said: "The result was extraordinary; Johnnie Walker Blenders'Batch Sherry Cask Finish
Become a very sweet and rich whiskey. It is perfect for beginners who want to experience Scotch whiskey, and also inspires experienced whiskey lovers. "

  

Dayalan, Managing Director, Diageo Global Travel
Commenting on the exclusive new whiskey sale through the travel retail channel, Nayager said: "JohnnieWalker Blenders' Batch Sherry Cask
Finish is a special product for Diageo Global Travel as it is exclusive to our shoppers. This is Johnnie
Walker Blenders' Batch
Series launched the first travel retail exclusive products, ideal for travelers who want to give a very special gift in the New Year. "

  

"Travelers seek the brands behind the true story of exploration, originality, craftsmanship and humanity, and Johnnie Walker
No longer suitable. We are thrilled to give shoppers a glimpse of the world of taste exploration from the world's largest Scotch whiskey brand and to add innovations to our range of products. "

  

Drink Johnnie Walker Blenders' Batch Sherry Cask
The best way to finish is: mix it with ginger soda and decorate with fresh orange slices to create delicious home-made cocktails. This VISUAL PHOTONICS EPITAXY CO.,LTD. Whiskey and Johnnie Walker Black
Label
Very similar, very suitable for mixing. At the beginning of the chat, please enjoy this long drink whiskey at night, add a rich mood for the strong night.

  

Please be in the New Year for yourself or others to experience exciting flavors of VISUAL PHOTONICS EPITAXY CO.,LTD. Travelers are now able to buy a bottle of Johnnie Walker Sherry Cask at a specific duty-free shop around the world
Finish, while the 1-liter bottle manufacturer's suggested retail price (RRSP) is £ 26.50 / $ 44.

  

(1) from the International Wine and Spirit Research Institute (IWSR)
2017 report, based on 2016 sales and sales figures.

  

Please reasonably drink Johnnie Walker.

  

Website: http://www.DRINKiQ.com

  

SOURCE Johnnie Walker

Title: Johnnie Walker在新年推出全新限量版威士忌

Content:

尊尼获加在新年推出全新限量版威士忌  
PR Newswire

  

伦敦, 2018年1月11日电

  

伦敦2018年1月11日电 /美通社/ --

  

Johnnie Walker Blenders' Batch Sherry Cask Finish面向旅行者独家推出

  

新年的到来意味着新计划、新愿望和新开始；但对尊尼获加  
(Johnnie Walker)  
由12名专业威士忌调酒师组成的团队而言，这就是每天的常态，因为他们不断突破苏格兰威士忌口味的极限。

  

（图片：http://mma.prnewswire.com/media/626698/Johnnie_Walker_Blenders_Batch.j...）

  

值此新年到来之际，全球第一大苏格兰威士忌品牌(1)背后的团队面向旅行者独家推出了特别版威士忌：JohnnieWalker Blenders' Batch
Sherry CaskFinish，目前在全球各地免税店有售。

  

Johnnie Walker Blenders' Batch  
产品组合是一系列精心制作的威士忌，可以自由混配，挑战威士忌制作传统。由此带来的成果是一系列独特的体验性威士忌，具有与众不同的风味和令人惊奇的口感。

  

值此新年到来之际，全球第一大苏格兰威士忌品牌背后的团队面向旅行者独家推出了特别版威士忌：JohnnieWalker Blenders' Batch
Sherry CaskFinish，目前在全球各地免税店有售。  
新推产品背后的试验以标志性尊尼获加黑牌 (Johnnie WalkerBlack Label)  
为灵感来源，后者在雪莉桶中熟化而成，拥有100多年的发展历史。在这一制作过程的启发下，尊尼获加威士忌调酒师想要更加深入挖掘并探索雪莉桶熟化为口感所带来的果香

  * 打造浓郁香甜、陈酿12年的Johnnie Walker Blenders Batch SherryCask Finish。

Johnnie Walker Blenders' Batch Sherry Cask Finish 由来自 BlairAthol（布莱尔-
阿苏酒厂）、Cardhu（卡杜酒厂）和  
Strathmill（斯特拉斯米尔酒厂）等酿酒厂生产的威士忌制作而成，是一种纯饮型黑苏格兰威士忌，口感富含甜美的香草、烟草、葡萄干，以及让人暖和的黑巧克力。

  

尊尼获加专业威士忌调酒师艾梅-吉普森 (Aimee Gibson)表示：“Johnnie Walker Blenders'
Batch威士忌是大胆尝试的成果，由此打破了口味的极限。以尊尼获加黑牌中的雪莉桶熟化为灵感来源，为混���而加入的浓郁果味吸引了我。它给予我灵感，即利用雪莉桶酿造来尝试带来更多的果味，并增加独特的风味活力。”

  

她还表示：“由此产生的结果很不寻常；Johnnie Walker Blenders'Batch Sherry Cask Finish  
成为了一款非常香甜的浓郁威士忌。它非常适合推荐给体验体验苏格兰威士忌的新手，并且还会让资深的威士忌爱好者为之振奋。”

  

Diageo Global Travel（帝亚吉欧环球旅行）董事总经理 DayalanNayager  
在对通过旅游零售渠道独家销售威士忌新品评论时说：“JohnnieWalker Blenders' Batch Sherry Cask Finish 是为
Diageo Global Travel推出的特别产品，因为它是我们购物者的专属。这是 Johnnie  
Walker Blenders' Batch  
系列推出的首款旅游零售独家产品，非常适合想要在新年赠送非常特别的礼品的旅行者购买。”

  

“旅行者寻求那些背后蕴含探索、原创、工艺和人类真实故事的各种品牌，而尊尼获加再也合适不过了。我们非常高兴让购物者一窥来自全球最大的苏格兰威士忌品牌的口味探索世界，并且为我们的系列产品再添创新。”

  

饮用 Johnnie Walker Blenders' Batch Sherry Cask
Finish的最佳方式是：将其与姜汁汽水混配，以新鲜橙片加以装饰，旨在调制美味的家制鸡尾酒。这种全新威士忌与尊尼获加黑牌非常相似，非常适合混配。在谈话开始之际，敬请晚上享用这款长饮威士忌，为正浓的夜色增加丰富的情调。

  

敬请在新年让自己或别人体验令人振奋的全新口味威士忌。旅行者现在可以在全球特定免税店购买一瓶Johnnie Walker Sherry Cask
Finish，而1升瓶装厂商建议零售价 (RRSP)为26.50英镑/44美元。

  

(1)出自于国际葡萄酒及烈酒研究机构(IWSR)的2017年报告，以2016年销量和销售额数据为基础。

  

敬请理性饮用尊尼获加。

英特尔推出全新立体内容工作室，提供真正沉浸式体育和娱乐体验  
PR Newswire

  

北京, 2018年1月10日电

  

北京2018年1月10日电 /美通社/ --  
2018年1月8日，英特尔公司宣布推出Intel  
Studios，这是一个全新建立的高水准工作室，专为下一代沉浸式媒体体验制作大规模立体内容。IntelStudios位于洛杉矶娱乐行业的核心地带，采用全球最大立体视频舞台和英特尔最新技术所支持的综合后期制作及控制设施。2018年1月8日，英特尔公司宣布推出Intel  
Studios，这是一个全新建立的高水准工作室，专为下一代沉浸式媒体体验制作大规模立体内容。IntelStudios采用全球最大立体视频舞台和英特尔最新技术所支持的综合后期制作及控制设施。用尖端沉浸式媒体体验重构故事讲述方式

  

就像数据正在改变我们日常生活的方方面面，它也正在推动着媒体领域的变革：带来沉浸式媒体体验时代。当今的消费者渴望更加个性化、交互式的体验，这是一种可控制并与之互动的体验。IntelStudios正有望将这些体验变成现实。

  

得益于以前所未有的角度进行拍摄的能力，沉浸式媒体体验开创了全新的叙事可能性。导演不仅可以由外而内的视角构想场景，也能够以从内向外的角度构建画面。观众可以被置于动作的中心，能从任意角度来观看动作，并最终能够按照他们自己的需求来控制观看体验。想象一下，在一个西部动作片中，观众可以从英雄或反面人物的角度来观影、参与角色的选择，并最终影响整个故事的结局。

  

Intel Studios内部

  

Intel  
Studios是一个无与伦比的沉浸式媒体体验中心，在一个10000平方英尺的圆顶摄影棚中采集立体视频。立体视频是英特尔TrueView技术背后的采集和渲染技术，用以创造这种全新沉浸式内容。拍摄流程始于一个摄像机阵列，采集一个场景内所有动作的高度、深度和宽度数据，从而制作出体素（立体像素）。这些信息以壮观的多角度3D形式渲染出一个虚拟环境，让用户能够从任意角度来体验采集的场景，并在增强现实/虚拟现实体验中提供真正的六个自由度。

  

创造栩栩如生的沉浸式媒体体验必须有处理海量视频数据的能力。英特尔凭借无与伦比的技术资源和专业知识、计算能力和数据中心处理能力，为IntelStudios提供支持，让数据变得生动。该工作室把采集的立体内容数据通过5英里的光纤电缆传输到定制的英特尔图像工作站和服务器上，每10秒就能处理超过1TB的数据。

  

此外，Intel  
Studios还提供端到端立体内容制作功能，包括现场提供前期/后期制作、制片、场景设计和视觉效果功能。内容可在增强现实/虚拟现实头显（HMDs）、移动应用、在线平台等多种平台上量身定制。

  

    
    
    ###

  

关于英特尔

  

英特尔致力于拓展科技疆界，让最佳精彩体验成为可能。如需了解更多信息，请访问英特尔中国新闻中心newsroom.intel.cn(http://newsroom.intel.cn/)
以及官方网站intel.cn (http://intel.cn/)。

  

英特尔、英特尔标识是英特尔公司或其子公司在美国和其他国家（地区）的商标。

  * 其它名称和品牌是其所有者的财产。

SOURCE 英特尔

Intel Launches VISUAL PHOTONICS EPITAXY CO.,LTD. 3D Content Studio for a Truly Immersive Sports and Entertainment Experience
PR Newswire

  

Beijing, January 10, 2018

  

Beijing, January 10, 2018 / PR Newswire /
January 8, 2018, Intel Corporation Announces Intel
Studios, a high-level studio established by VISUAL PHOTONICS EPITAXY CO.,LTD, to produce large-scale stereoscopic content for the next generation of immersive media experiences. Intel Studios is located in the heart of Los Angeles entertainment industry, using the world's largest stereo video arena and Intel's latest technology supports the integrated post-production and control facilities. January 8, 2018, Intel Corporation Announces Intel
Studios, a high-level studio established by VISUAL PHOTONICS EPITAXY CO.,LTD, to produce large-scale stereoscopic content for the next generation of immersive media experiences. Intel Studios uses the world's largest stereo video arena and the latest technology supported by Intel's integrated post-production and control facilities. Refactor storytelling style with cutting-edge immersive media experience

  

Just as data is changing all aspects of our everyday life, it is also driving changes in the media world: an immersive media experience. Consumers of today desire a more personalized, interactive experience that is a controlled and interactive experience. Intel Studios is hoping to make these experiences a reality.

  

Thanks to its ability to shoot with an unprecedented degree of perspective, the immersive media experience opens up the narrative possibilities of VISUAL PHOTONICS EPITAXY CO.,LTD. The director can not only imagine the scene from the outside but also the screen from the inside out. Audiences can be placed in the center of the action, watching movements from any angle and ultimately controlling the viewing experience to their own needs. Imagine, in a western action movie, viewers can watch the movie from the point of view of the hero or the opposite, participate in the choice of roles, and ultimately affect the outcome of the entire story.

  

Intel Studios interior

  

Intel
Studios is an unparalleled immersive media hub for capturing stereoscopic videos in a 10,000-square-foot dome studio. Stereoscopic video is the capture and rendering technology behind Intel TrueView technology to create immersive content for this VISUAL PHOTONICS EPITAXY CO.,LTD. The filming process begins with a camera array that captures the height, depth, and width data of all the actions in a scene to create voxels (solid-state pixels). The information renders a virtual environment in spectacular, multi-angle 3D, allowing users to experience acquired scenes from any angle and deliver true six degrees of freedom in an augmented reality / virtual reality experience.

  

Creating a lifelike immersive media experience requires the ability to handle massive amounts of video data. With unparalleled technical resources and expertise, computing power and data center processing capabilities, Intel supports Intel Studios and makes data lively. The studio transports collected stereo content to custom Intel image workstations and servers over a five-mile fiber-optic cable, handling over 1 terabyte of data every 10 seconds.

  

In addition, Intel
Studios also offers end-to-end 3D content creation, including on-site pre / post production, production, scene design and visual effects. Content can be tailored to a variety of platforms including augmented reality / virtual reality head-up (HMDs), mobile applications, online platforms and more.

  

    
    
    ###

  

About Intel

  

Intel is committed to expanding the boundaries of science and technology, so that the best exciting experience possible. For more information, visit the Intel China newsroom.intel.cn (http://newsroom.intel.cn/)
As well as the official website intel.cn (http://intel.cn/).

  

Intel, the Intel logo are trademarks of Intel Corporation or its subsidiaries in the United States and other countries.

  * Other names and brands are the property of their owners.

SOURCE Intel

pmdtechnologies展示全新的3D飛時測距深度感測影像儀IRS238XC和全球最小的3D攝影機

  

(美國商業資訊)--pmdtechnologies  
ag今日宣佈，將在拉斯維加斯CES上展出全新的3D影像儀IRS238XC。該影像儀由pmd和英飛淩科技公司(InfineonTechnologies  
AG)共同開發，可因應快速成長的3D深度感測市場需求。自iPhoneX上市以來，因其3D表情包(animojis)和人臉辨識(FaceID)等面對用戶的應用程式廣泛使用深度感測技術，使得整個智慧型手機產業對深度感測的需求大增。

  

本新聞稿包含多媒體資訊。完整新聞稿請見此：  
http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180110005465/zh-
HK/(http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180110005465/zh-HK/)

  

  

  

3D depth sensing cameras for face authentication. (Photo: Business Wire)

  

  

經由與智慧型手機、AR頭戴裝置、智慧家居裝置或機器人等已上市裝置整合的方式，pmd的3D深度感測技術已獲得可觀的市場進入。與此同時，pmd公司在市場需求方面已汲取大量寶貴經驗，因此公司在IRS238XC影像儀上採用市場期望可整合深度感測的飛時測距3D攝影機。

  

該產品整合一系列專用功能，可為3D深度感測攝影機模組與第1級雷射的相容性提供支援，大幅改善攝影機模組佈局和整合的簡便性。整合的MIPI介面和數位邏輯，使得操作3D攝影機模組變得極為簡便。IRS238XC影像儀每個畫素點內均採用背景光照抑制(SBI)電路，在戶外強大日光下能發揮可靠的深度感測。此外，IRS238XC具有38,000畫素，其解析度高於目前所有可整合的3D深度感測晶片，該產品還支援940nm工��波長，進一步改善了戶外操作性能。

  

不容忽視的一點是，pmd在其CES攤位上展示的IRS238XC攝影機模組樣品包括影像儀、鏡頭、IR發射器以及相互之間的連接電路，其封裝尺寸僅12mmx
8mm，是目前市場上全球最小的3D攝影機模組。

  

pmdtechnologies ag執行長Bernd  
Buxbaum博士表示：「自飛時測距晶片產品於2005年上市以來，我們累積了豐富的經驗，同時2016年公司在消費產品領域也大幅成長，我們很高興能夠將這項技術應用在新一代功能齊全、高度整合的影像儀上，而且目前正是市場需求正急劇成長的正確時間點。」

  

借助pmd和英飛淩的軟體合作夥伴提供的相應應用軟體，IRS238XC可應付市場對人臉辨識3D深度感測攝影機的需求。不僅如此，IRS238XC還可望用於AR/VR頭戴裝置、機器人、無人機和智慧家居裝置等其他裝置上。公司目前已開始供應IRS238XC樣品並計畫在2018第四季開始大量生產。欲索取樣品和瞭解更多資訊，敬請造訪Infineon.com/real3(http://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT...)。

  

眾多著名的模組封裝廠商合作夥伴已證明，使用pmd和英飛淩研發之影像儀的3D攝影機可快速量產，且擁有最穩定的一次校準通過率，它們也可以接受使用最新IRS238XC的模組並能夠大量生產。

  

如欲搶先目睹這一開創性晶片和全球最小的3D攝影機模組，敬請蒞臨pmd在CES

    
    
    2018(http://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT...)的攤位：Westgate Hospitality Suites 1310, Tech East。

  

如需安排會面，請用電子郵件聯絡：events@pmdtec.com。

  

關於pmdtechnologies ag

  

無晶圓廠IC公司pmdtechnologies  
ag座落於德國錫根與美國聖荷西，是全球首屈一指的3D飛時測距CMOS數位影像技術供應商。公司成立於2002年，擁有超過200項全球專利，主要涉及pmd的應用以及pmd測量原理與實現。pmd3D感測器的目標市場是工業自動化、汽車製造以及AR/VR等廣泛的消費類應用領域。

  

查詢詳情，請造訪：www.pmdtec.com  
(http://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT...)。

  

免責聲明：本公告之原文版本乃官方授權版本。譯文僅供方便瞭解之用，煩請參照原文，原文版本乃唯一具法律效力之版本。

  

  

  

  

  

請前往 businesswire.com 瀏覽源版本:  
http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180110005465/zh-
HK/(http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180110005465/zh-HK/)

  

pmdtechnologies agSabrina Buxbaum企業策略與行銷部電話：+49 271 2385 38 800傳真：+49 271 23
85 38 809電子郵件：s.buxbaum@pmdtec.com(mailto:s.buxbaum@pmdtec.com)
www.pmdtec.com(http://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT...)

Content_EN:
For best results when printing this announcement, please click on link
below: http: //pdf.reuters.com/htmlnews/htmlnews.asp ...

  

  

pmdtechnologies showcases VISUAL PHOTONICS EPITAXY CO.,LTD.'s 3D flying-time ranging depth-sensing imager, the IRS238XC, and the world's smallest 3D camera

  

(Business Wire) - pmdtechnologies
ag today announced the launch of the 3D Imager IRS238XC from VISUAL PHOTONICS EPITAXY CO.,LTD. at CES, Las Vegas. The imager by pmd and Infineon Technologies (InfineonTechnologies
AG) jointly developed to respond to the needs of the rapidly growing 3D depth market. Since iPhoneX went on the market, demand for depth sensing has grown dramatically across the smartphone industry as a result of the widespread use of depth-sensing technology for user-facing applications such as animojis and FaceID.

  

This press release contains multimedia information. See the full press release here:
http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180110005465/zh-
HK / (http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180110005465/zh-HK/)

  

  

  

3D depth sensing cameras for face authentication. (Photo: Business Wire)

  

  

Pmd's 3D depth sensing technology has gained considerable market entry via integration with already-on-market devices such as smartphones, AR headsets, smart home devices or robots. In the meantime, pmd has learned a great deal of valuable experience in the marketplace, so the company adopted market expectations on the IRS238XC imager to integrate depth-sensing time-of-flight 3D cameras.

  

The product incorporates a series of specialized functions that support the compatibility of 3D depth-sensing camera modules with Level 1 lasers and dramatically improve camera module layout and ease of integration. The integrated MIPI interface and digital logic make it extremely easy to operate a 3D camera module. The IRS238XC uses a background illumination suppression (SBI) circuit in each pixel to provide reliable depth sensing in outdoor daylight. In addition, the IRS238XC features 38,000 pixels with higher resolution than any currently available 3D depth sensing chip. The product also supports 940nm wavelength, further improving outdoor performance.

  

It should not be overlooked that the samples of the IRS238XC camera module displayed by pmd at its CES booth included an imager, a lens, an IR emitter and a connecting circuit to each other, with a package size of only 12mmx
8mm, is the world's smallest 3D camera module on the market.

  

pmdtechnologies ag CEO Bernd
Dr. Buxbaum said: "We have accumulated a wealth of experience since the launch of our range chip products in 2005 and we have also seen significant growth in consumer products in 2016. We are pleased to be able to apply this technology to next-generation functions Complete and highly integrated imager, and is at the right time for the market to grow rapidly. "

  

The IRS238XC addresses the market demand for face-based 3D depth-sensing cameras with the application software from pmd and Infineon's software partners. Not only that, IRS238XC is also expected to be used on other devices such as AR / VR headsets, robots, drones and smart home devices. The company has now begun supplying samples of the IRS238XC and plans to begin mass production in the fourth quarter of 2018. For samples and more information, visit Infineon.com/real3 (http://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT ...).

  

Many well-known module package manufacturer partners have demonstrated that 3D cameras using pmd and Infineon's imagers can be mass-produced quickly with the most stable primary pass-through rates and can accept modules using the latest IRS238XC And mass production.

  

To catch the first sight of this groundbreaking chip and the world's smallest 3D camera module, visit pmd at CES

    
    
    2018 (http://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT ...): Westgate Hospitality Suites 1310, Tech East Group Co.,Ltd.

  

To schedule a meeting, please email events@pmdtec.com.

  

About pmdtechnologies ag

  

Fabless IC company pmdtechnologies
Located in Germany's Tamarix and San Jose, USA, ag is the world's premier supplier of 3D time-of-flight CMOS digital imaging technology. Founded in 2002, with more than 200 global patents, the company focuses on the application of pmd and the principles and implementation of pmd measurement. The target markets for pmd3D sensors are a wide range of consumer applications such as industrial automation, automotive manufacturing and AR / VR.

  

For more information, please visit: www.pmdtec.com
(http://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT ...).

Title: pmdtechnologies展示全新的3D飛時測距深度感測影像儀IRS238XC和全球最小的3D攝影機

Content:
For best results when printing this announcement, please click on link
below:http://pdf.reuters.com/htmlnews/htmlnews.asp...

  

  

pmdtechnologies展示其全新3D时差测距深度感测成像仪IRS238XC和全球最小3D摄像头

  

(美国商业资讯)--pmdtechnologies  
ag今日宣布，公司全新3D成像仪IRS238XC将在拉斯维加斯CES上首次亮相。该成像仪由pmd和英飞凌科技公司(InfineonTechnologies  
AG)共同开发，可满足快速增长的3D深度感测市场需求。自iPhoneX面市以来，因其3D表情包(animojis)和人脸识别(FaceID)等面向用户的应用程序广泛使用了深度感测技术，使得整个智能手机行业对深度感测的需求大大增加。

  

本新闻稿包含多媒体。此处查看新闻稿全文：  
http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180110005464/zh-
CN/(http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180110005464/zh-CN/)

  

  

  

3D depth sensing cameras for face authentication. (Photo: Business Wire)

  

  

pmd的3D深度感测技术已占据巨大的市场份额，智能手机、AR耳机、智能家居设备以及机器人等普遍应用的设备上已广泛集成该项技术，与此同时，pmd公司在市场需求方面已汲取大量宝贵经验，因此公司在IRS238XC成像仪上采用了市场最期望的深度感测时差测距3D摄像头。

  

该产品集成有一系列专用功能，可为3D深度感测摄像头模块与1类激光的兼容性提供支持，极大地提高了摄像头模块布局和集成的简便性。通过集成MIPI接口和数字逻辑，使得3D摄像头模块的操作变得极为简便。IRS238XC成像仪每个像素点内均采用了背景光抑制(SBI)电路，在户外强日光下能实现可靠的深度感测。此外，IRS238XC具有38,000像素，其分辨率高于当前所有的3D深度感测集成芯片，该产品还支持940nm工作波长，因此户外操作性能得到了进一步改善。

  

不容忽视的一点是，pmd在其CES展位上展示的IRS238XC摄像头模块样品包括成像仪、镜头、IR发射器以及相互之间的连接电路，其封装尺寸仅12mmx
8mm，是目前市场上全球最小的3D摄像���模块。

  

pmdtechnologies ag首席执行官Bernd  
Buxbaum博士表示：“自时差测距芯片产品于2005年上市以来，我们积累了丰富的经验，同时2016年公司在消费产品领域也实现了极大的增长，我们很高兴能够将这项技术应用在新一代功能齐全、高度集成的成像仪上，而且我们还恰好契合了市场需求正急剧增长的正确时间点。”

  

借助pmd和英飞凌的软件合作伙伴提供的相应应用软件，IRS238XC将满足市场对人脸识别3D深度感测摄像头的需求。不仅如此，IRS238XC还有望用于AR/VR耳机、机器人、无人机和智能家居设备等其他设备上。公司目前已开始供应IRS238XC样品并计划在2018第四季度开始大批量生产。欲索取样品和了解更多信息，敬请访问Infineon.com/real3(http://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT...)。

  

经众多著名的模块封装厂商证明：使用pmd和英飞凌研发的成像仪的3D摄像头可实现快速量产，且拥有最稳定的一次校准通过率，它们也可用于使用新上市的IRS238XC的模块并能够实现批量化生产。

  

如需抢先目睹这一开创性芯片和全球最小3D摄像头模块，敬请莅临pmd在CES

    
    
    2018(http://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT...)上的展位：Westgate Hospitality Suites 1310, Tech East。

  

如需面谈，请联系events@pmdtec.com。

  

关于pmdtechnologies ag

  

无晶圆厂IC公司pmdtechnologies  
ag坐落于德国锡根与美国圣何塞，是一家全球领先的基于CMOS的3D时差测距数字成像技术供应商。公司成立于2002年，拥有超过200项全球专利，主要涉及基于pmd的应用以及pmd测量原理与实现。pmd3D传感器的目标市场是工业自动化、汽车制造以及AR/VR等广泛的消费类应用领域。

  

垂询详情，请访问：www.pmdtec.com  
(http://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT...)。

pmdtechnologies showcases its VISUAL PHOTONICS EPITAXY CO.,LTD. The 3D Time Difference Range Sensing Camera IRS238XC and the world's smallest 3D camera

  

(Business Wire) - pmdtechnologies
ag today announced the company's VISUAL PHOTONICS EPITAXY CO.,LTD. 3D Imager IRS238XC will debut at CES in Las Vegas. The imager by pmd and Infineon Technologies (InfineonTechnologies
AG) to meet the rapidly growing market demand for 3D depth sensing. Since iPhoneX was introduced, depth sensing technology has been used extensively for user-facing applications such as animojis and FaceID, resulting in a significant increase in the need for depth sensing throughout the smartphone industry.

  

This press release contains multimedia. View full text of press release here:
http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180110005464/zh-
CN / (http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180110005464/en/)

  

  

  

3D depth sensing cameras for face authentication. (Photo: Business Wire)

  

  

Pmd's 3D depth sensing technology has taken a significant market share and has been widely integrated with commonly used devices such as smartphones, AR headsets, smart home devices, and robots, while pmd has learned about market needs A lot of valuable experience, so the company in the IRS238XC imager using the market's most anticipated depth sensing TDC distance camera.

  

The product incorporates a series of special features that support the compatibility of 3D depth-sensing camera modules with Class 1 lasers, greatly improving the camera module layout and ease of integration. By integrating the MIPI interface and digital logic, the operation of the 3D camera module becomes extremely easy. The IRS238XC Imager uses a background light suppression (SBI) circuit in each pixel for reliable depth sensing outdoors in strong sunlight. In addition, the 38,000-pixel IRS238XC has a higher resolution than all current 3D depth sensing ICs, and the product also supports 940-nm operating wavelengths, further improving outdoor operating performance.

  

It should not be overlooked that the sample of the IRS238XC camera module exhibited by pmd at its booth at CES included an imager, lens, IR emitter and interconnecting circuitry with a package size of only 12mmx
8mm, is the world's smallest 3D camera module on the market today.

  

Bernd, CEO of pmdtechnologies ag
Dr. Buxbaum said: "We have accumulated a wealth of experience since the market for TDD chips was launched in 2005, and the company has also seen tremendous growth in consumer products in 2016. We are pleased to be able to apply this technology to A new generation of fully featured, highly integrated imagers, and we also fit in exactly with the market at the right time for dramatic growth. "

  

The IRS238XC will meet the market demand for face-based 3D depth-sensing cameras with the application software provided by pmd and Infineon's software partners. Not only that, IRS238XC is also expected to be used on other devices such as AR / VR headsets, robots, drones and smart home devices. The company has now begun supplying samples of the IRS238XC and plans to begin mass production in the fourth quarter of 2018. For samples and more information, visit Infineon.com/real3 (http://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT ...).

  

Proven by a number of prominent module package makers: 3D cameras using pmd and Infineon-developed imagers offer fast mass production with the most stable primary pass-through rates and are also available for use with the newly introduced IRS238XC module Can achieve mass production.

  

For the first to see this groundbreaking chip and the world's smallest 3D camera module, please visit pmd at CES

    
    
    2018 (http://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT ...): Westgate Hospitality Suites 1310, Tech East Group Co.,Ltd.

  

For an interview, contact events@pmdtec.com.

  

About pmdtechnologies ag

  

Fabless IC company pmdtechnologies
Located in Siegen, Germany and San Jose, USA, ag is a leading provider of CMOS-based 3D time-difference digital imaging technology. The company was founded in 2002 and has more than 200 global patents, mainly related to pmd-based applications and pmd measurement principles and implementation. The target markets for pmd3D sensors are a wide range of consumer applications such as industrial automation, automotive manufacturing and AR / VR.

  

For more information, visit: www.pmdtec.com
(http://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT ...).

携程商旅发布APP 6.0 全新企业用车平台上线  
PR Newswire

  

上海, 2018年1月10日电

  

上海2018年1月10日电 /美通社/ --  
1月9日，在2018亚太商旅峰会上，携程商旅发布了APP  
6.0新版本。新版本以管理为核心，新增了行程管理、消息管理、用车管理、海外出行管理等功能，为用户提供更加全面的差旅管理服务。此外，在智能技术的加持下，6.0版本聚合人性化与个性化，贴心的管家式服务为用户打造全新的差旅体验。1月9日，在2018亚太商旅峰会上，携程商旅发布了APP  
6.0新版本。新版本以管理为核心，新增了行程管理、消息管理、用车管理、海外出行管理等功能，为用户提供更加全面的差旅管理服务。集成四大管理功能
打造专业差旅管理平台

  

在行程管理方面，携程商旅APP  
6.0新版本可以实时感知用户行程，提供智能化提醒与日程管理功能：由他人代订的订单信息也会整合在行程规划中供实时查看；智能化的订单提醒，会在订单发生变化时通知用户并调整关联行程；无论是预订人，还是代订人，都将会收到行程的更改信息，让用户可以全面掌握自己的出行计划。

  

在消息管理方面，6.0支持分类保存和发布各类通知消息，包括订单通知、航班变化通知、行程关怀通知等8大类型消息，用户不会像以往一样，为了找某个通知信息，花费时间翻查短信和邮件通知；另一方面，消息管理功能还能够帮助差旅管理人员通过对收信人的筛选配置，实现突发安全提示的精准传达，这在发生地震等自然灾害事件、区域安全事件时尤为重要。

  

此外，全新的企业用车平台是新版本的另一大亮点。用车平台提供包括接送机（火车站）、专车、租车、包车等产品的月结、RC、授权等预订管理功能，同时支持用车多供应商产品的竞价比价。强大的用车管控后台支持灵活配置员工的用车权限，可配置包括可用车型、用车时间、用车限额、出发到达目的地等控制要求，结合Reasoncode、用车授权以及用车三方协议托管功能，实现企业用车的精细化管控，从而达到降低企业用车成本的目的。

  

随着企业出海步伐的加快，海外出行产品管控的重要性益发凸显。新版本APP进一步完善了海外出行相关的管控功能：国际机票方面，在原有的低价RC的基础上，新增按职级对舱位和飞行时长的控制；海外酒店全面支持公司账户支付与授权，员工无需先行垫付，也不用再贴票报销；通过预订授权，管理者也可以对海外出行差旅费进行有效控制。

  

满足用户个性化需求 给予贴心差旅服务

  

更令人惊喜的是，6.0通过对用户历史行为数据的分析，更加了解用户的喜好，提供智能值机选座、智能推荐、出行关怀功能，6.0会自动为用户选好喜欢的飞机座位，提醒用户及时完成缺口行程的预订，并且给予行程提醒、天气信息、安全提醒等关怀，将人性化的设计理念发挥的淋漓尽致。

  

另外，6.0产品充分考虑了客户的个性化需求，支持界面主色调的设置，绝大部分页面的头部、重要行动按钮、重点提示区域等均可以根据企业要求进行调整。其他包括首页LOGO上传设置、客户头像设置等其他个性化功能的增加，都使得6.0极具个性化。用户甚至可以定制一款企业专属的APP应用，拥有完全个性化的应用名称与图标，并在各大应用市场搜索并下载。

  

    
    
    ###

  

图片 - https://photos.prnasia.com/prnh/20180110/2029285-1-a图片 -
https://photos.prnasia.com/prnh/20180110/2029285-1-b

  

SOURCE 携程商旅

Ctrip travel APP 6.0 VISUAL PHOTONICS EPITAXY CO.,LTD. Enterprise car platform on the line
PR Newswire

  

Shanghai, January 10, 2018

  

SHANGHAI, January 10, 2018 / PR Newswire /
January 9, 2018 Asia Pacific Business Summit, Ctrip released APP
6.0 new version. The new version to manage as the core, added a new trip management, message management, car management, overseas travel management and other functions, to provide users with a more comprehensive travel management services. In addition, under the blessing of smart technology, 6.0 version of the integration of personalized and personalized, attentive butler service for users to create VISUAL PHOTONICS EPITAXY CO.,LTD. Travel experience. January 9, 2018 Asia Pacific Business Summit, Ctrip released APP
6.0 new version. The new version to manage as the core, added a new trip management, message management, car management, overseas travel management and other functions, to provide users with a more comprehensive travel management services. Integrated four management functions
Create a professional travel management platform

  

In the travel management, Ctrip APP
The new version 6.0 can sense the user's trip in real time and provide intelligent reminder and schedule management functions: order information ordered by others will also be integrated in the itinerary planning for real-time viewing; intelligent order reminder will inform the user when the order changes And adjust the associated itinerary; either the booker or on behalf of the booking, will receive the change of travel information, allowing users to fully grasp their travel plans.

  

In terms of message management, 6.0 supports the classification and preservation of various types of notification messages, including order notifications, flight change notifications, and travel care notifications. Users do not spend time looking for a notification message Check SMS and email notification; on the other hand, the message management function can also help travel managers through the screening of recipients to achieve accurate delivery of emergency safety tips, which occurred in the event of natural disasters such as earthquakes, regional security incidents Particularly important.

  

In addition, VISUAL PHOTONICS EPITAXY CO.,LTD. Enterprise car platform is another highlight of the new version. The car platform provides subscription management functions such as monthly delivery, RC, authorization and other products including pick-up and drop-off machines (train stations), limousines, car rentals and chartered vehicles, while supporting multi-vendor product bidding. Powerful vehicle control backstage support Flexibility to configure employees' car privileges, configurable control requirements including available models, car time, car limits, departure to destination, etc.,combined with Reasoncode, car license and car tripartite agreement hosting functions , To achieve the refinement of corporate car management and control, so as to reduce the cost of corporate car purposes.

  

With the accelerated pace of business to the sea, the importance of overseas travel product management benefits of hair highlights. The new version of APP further improves the control functions related to overseas travel: on the international plane ticket, based on the original low-cost RC, it newly added control of class and flight duration by rank; overseas hotels fully support the payment and authorization of company accounts; employees No advance advance, nor re-affixing claims reimbursement; through the booking authorization, managers can also travel overseas travel under effective control.

  

To meet the individual needs of users to give thoughtful travel services

  

Even more surprising is that, 6.0 through the analysis of user historical behavior data to better understand the user's preferences, providing intelligent check-seat selection, intelligent recommendation, travel care functions, 6.0 will automatically select the favorite aircraft seat for the user to remind Users to complete the gap in the booking schedule, and to give itinerary reminder, weather information, safety reminders and other care, the humanized design concept to play most incisive.

  

In addition, 6.0 products take full account of the individual needs of customers to support the main color interface settings, the vast majority of pages of the head, key action buttons, key tips area can be adjusted according to business requirements. Others including the home page LOGO upload settings, customer avatar settings and other personal features increase, all made the 6.0 highly personalized. Users can even customize a company-specific APP application, with fully-qualified application names and icons, and search and download in major application markets.

  

    
    
    ###

全新VR一体机CES强势来袭，Pico与国际品牌同台竞技  
PR Newswire

  

拉斯维加斯, 2018年1月10日电

  

拉斯维加斯2018年1月10日电 /美通社/

  * 当地时间1月9日，第51届CES (International Consumer ElectronicsShow)  
于美国拉斯维加斯市正式拉开帷幕，众多国际一线消费电子品牌参展，展示旗下新锐的产品与技术。国内VR领军品牌Pico 携旗下刚刚发布的 6DoF VR
一体机出展（LVCC South Hall1，No.  
21718）。本届CES是Pico第二次独立参展，刚亮相即引起中外媒体关注。当地时间1月9日，第51届CES  
于美国拉斯维加斯市正式拉开帷幕，国内VR领军品牌 Pico  
携旗下刚刚发布的 6DoF VR 一体机出展（LVCC South Hall 1， No.

    
    
    21718）。12月26日，Pico Neo 在北京新正式发布。Pico Neo搭载Qualcomm 骁龙™835移动 VR 平台，配备3K 高清显示屏，4GB高速RAM, 64GB UFS2.0ROM，并支持256GB扩展存储，外观采用简洁的一体式设计，配以舒适的布料材质。得益于骁龙835的出色性能及完善的超声波技术，PicoNeo实现了稳定高精度的头部和手部六自由度（6DoF）追踪定位功能，无需任何外部传感器，即可完成对头部和双手运动的追踪，是全球首款同时实现了头&手6DOF追踪及交互的量产VR 一体机。

  

与此同时，Pico Neo 作为首款接入VIVE WAVE™  
VR开放平台的第三方产品，将预置  
VIVEPORT™开放内容平台，为用户带来全球领域内的高品质VR内容。

  

CES 作为Pico 2018年的首展，推出了多套 ToB 端解决方案，及ToC 端使用可能。Pico Neo  
一体机商用版配备6DoF头盔和双6DoF手柄，首发主要针对行业应用领域，根据行业和商业客户具体需求提供VR全套定制化“产品+服务”解决方案。迄今为止，Pico公司已经形成一整套行业应用产品研发、优化、服务系统，在教育、汽车、商业展示等领域交付200多个VR+合作案例。本次CES展会上，Pico
也展示出内部研发的VR看车demo，通过两台PicoNeo  
实现汽车销售与汽车买家的虚拟交互，买家无需亲临真车场景即可详尽了解汽车细节，在虚拟场景中对汽车进行观赏、试坐、试驾，颠覆传统形式的看车体验，在提升看车临场感的同时大大降低销售商带看成本。

  

同时，Pico  
也深入教育领域，携手合作伙伴推出多套实现“头部+手部”6DoF的教育类展示方案。在CES展台现场，体验者即可以通过佩戴和操作 Pico Neo  
近距离观察植物对环境变化的反应、和微生物的细微运动等。近期，Pico携手国内人机交互技术商 uSens 集成推出 VR+  
裸手��互的解决方案，这套模组也在 uSens 展台（LVCC, SouthHall 1, No. 21723）展出。通过与 Fingo
新一代2.0模组结合，PicoGoblin 与 uSens Fingo  
一体化结合为教育培训、展览展示等行业提供具有自然交互体验的整合解决方案。

  

本次CES，Pico 也展出了与 Pico Neo 同期发布的 Pico
Zense深度传感解决方案，包括DCAM100，和DCAM710两套硬件深度摄像头模组。这两款摄像头模组都是基于TOF  
光飞技术，尺寸小，功耗经济，成像清晰度、精度均达到  
VGA  
标准，可以广泛适用于智能机器人，AR/VR，微投影，无人机等领域。

  

更多信息，请点击 Pico 官网了解 www.picovr.com

  

    
    
    ###

Las Vegas, January 10, 2018

  

LAS VEGAS, January 10, 2018 / PRNewswire /

To bring its already released 6DoF VR one machine (LVCC South Hall 1, No.

Equipped with a Qualcomm Snapdragon 835 mobile VR platform with 3K HD display, 4GB high-speed RAM, 64GB UFS2.0ROM and 256GB expansion storage, the Pico Neo features a compact, one-piece design with comfortable fabric. Benefiting from the excellent performance of the Snapdragon 835 and its sophisticated ultrasound technology, PicoNeo has achieved a stable and accurate 6DoF head and hand position tracking function that eliminates the need for any external sensors for head and hands Motion Tracking is the world's first mass production VR machine that enables both head & hand 6DOF tracking and interaction.

  

In the meantime, Pico Neo is the first access to VIVE WAVE ™
VR open platform third-party products, will be preset

As the first exhibition by Pico in 2018, CES introduced several sets of ToB-end solutions and the possible use of ToC. Pico Neo
All-in-one PC comes with a 6DoF helmet and dual 6DoF handles. The starter is aimed at industry applications and offers a full range of customized "products + services" solutions for VR based on industry and business customer needs. To date, Pico has formed a suite of industry application product development, optimization and service systems that deliver more than 200 VR + collaboration cases in education, automotive, business presentations and more. The CES show, Pico
Also showcased in-house VR demo cars, passing two PicoNeo's
Realize car sales and car buyers virtual interaction, buyers do not need to visit the real car scene to get a detailed understanding of the car details, in the virtual scene to watch the car, sit, test drive, subvert the traditional form of car experience, promotion Look at the car at the same time significantly reduce the cost of sales with the vendor.

  

At the same time, Pico
Also in-depth education, work together partners to launch multiple sets to achieve "head + hand" 6DoF educational demonstration program. At the CES stand, the experimenter can wear and operate Pico Neo
Close observation of plant response to environmental changes, and micro-organisms such as micro-movement. Recently, Pico and the domestic human-computer interaction technology company uSens integrated VR + launch
This hand-held solution is also available at the uSens booth (LVCC, South Hall 1, No. 21723). Via with Fingo
A new generation of 2.0 modules combined with PicoGoblin and uSens Fingo
The integration of integration for education and training, exhibitions and other industries to provide a natural interactive experience integrated solutions.

  

The CES, Pico also exhibited Pico Neo Poo released over the same period
Zense depth sensing solutions, including DCAM100, and DCAM710 two sets of hardware depth camera module. Both camera modules are based on TOF
Light fly technology, small size, power economy, imaging clarity, accuracy are achieved
VGA
Standard, can be widely applied to intelligent robots, AR / VR, micro-projection, UAV and other fields.

  

For more information, please visit www.picovr.com on the Pico website
