英特尔全新全互联PC首次亮相2018 CES  
PR Newswire

  

拉斯维加斯, 2017年1月9日电

  

拉斯维加斯2017年1月9日电 /美通社/ --  
在日益互联的移动世界中，用户们期望自己的 PC  
能够始终联网在线。  
(https://newsroom.intel.com/news/road-warriors-confess-top-tricks-
pet-p...年国际消费电子产品展  
(https://newsroom.intel.com/press-
kits/2018-ces/)上，英特尔的合作伙伴推出了一系列搭载英特尔(...)酷睿(TM )处理器和英特尔(®) XMM(TM  
)上网模块的全互联PC，其中包括：

  * 宏碁* 推出了搭载英特尔(®) 酷睿™ i7 处理器的Swift 7(https://www.acer.com/ac/en/US/press/2018/324993)*。这款笔记本电脑的厚度仅有

    
    
    8.98毫米，可为完美主义者和差旅人士提供出色的便携性、工作效率、全天候电池续航时间和随时4GLTE 连接。

  

  

  

  * 惠普* 推出了全新Envy X2  
(http://www8.hp.com/us/en/hp-news/press-
release.html...PC，支持随时随地进行创作、工作和娱乐。它采用性能强劲的英特尔(®)酷睿™ 处理器，电池续航时间长达 16.5  
小时（由惠普测量得出），并全面兼容各种 Windows 应用。

  * 戴尔* 已于12月25日宣布，在中国推出带有内置 4G LTE  
的全新灵越 5280* 2 合1笔记本，并免费提供两个月的 LTE数据流量。 这款时尚雅致的PC采用英特尔® 酷睿™ i7  
处理器和 Windows* 10  
操作系统，可为各种用户提供绝佳的连接体验。

英特尔一直以来都致力于为全互联 PC  
赋能，并继续与合作伙伴进行创新，为当前及未来用户提供性能依然强大、总是能够带来最新体验，且始终互联的下一代个人计算设备。在本周的2018  
年国际消费电子产品展上，英特尔的合作伙伴推出了一系列搭载英特尔酷睿处理器和英特尔XMM上网模块的全互联PC。内置 4G LTE 的全互联 PC
是非常重要的PC类别 --  
性能强大、响应迅捷，专为满足数据密集型需求而设计，并且可随时随地连网。如今，市场上已有超过30 种面向企业和消费者的基于英特尔的全互联  
PC。英特尔为这些PC产品提供了消费者所期望的领先性能、完整的  
PC  
体验，以及在各种连接选项，轻薄设计和价位上的超长电池续航时间。

  

此次在 2018  
年国际消费电子产品展上推出的新设备现已上市。除此之外，市面上在售的全互联PC还包括支持快速手机网络共享(Instant Tethering) 的谷歌*
Pixelbook*、通过美国 Verizon销售的三星Galaxy Book 12* 以及中国的小米笔记本 Air*。

  

所有这些设备均可提供最佳的全互联PC体验。凭借英特尔(®)  
酷睿™  
处理器提供的卓越性能，用户将获得沉浸式娱乐体验、无缝可靠的  
Windows  
体验，无论在办公室还是外出途中都可随时享受使用所有喜爱的应用程序所带来的高效畅快，一流的连接能力，超长电池续航时间，以及时尚轻薄的设计。

  

新闻资料：英特尔的 2018  
年国际消费电子产品展新闻资料可点击此处查看：https://newsroom.intel.com/press-kits/2018-ces/

  

法律声明：

  

英特尔技术可能需要支持的硬件、软件或服务得以激活。请从原始设备制造商或零售商处获得更多信息。

  

    
    
    ###

  

关于英特尔

  

英特尔致力于拓展科技疆界，让最佳精彩体验成为可能。如需了解更多信息，如需了解更多信息，请访问英特尔中国新闻中心newsroom.intel.cn(http://newsroom.intel.cn/)
以及官方网站intel.cn (http://intel.cn/)。

  

英特尔和Intel标识是英特尔公司在美国和其他国家（地区）的商标。

  

*文中涉及的其它名称及商标属于各自所有者资产。

2.精材(3374)：去年12月、Q4營收齊創高，全年扭轉連2年衰退態勢恢復成長，昨獲外資轉買超296張，早盤股價強漲逾4.5%。

    。

14.葡萄王(1707)：近期股價漲多，早盤獲利了結賣壓出籠，股價重摔5%，跌落月線。

15.上緯投控(3708)：去年稅前每股賺3.81元，早盤吸引買盤進駐，股價走揚3%，站上1個月新高。

16.美律(2439)：近期股價跌跌不休，早盤獲低接買盤進場承接，股價反彈2%。

17.永冠-KY(1589)：昨日起祭庫藏股，股價一舉突破5日、20日、60日線，早盤帶量續漲逾

    
    
    4.5%。

18.中宇(1535)：去年12月營收年增95.93%，全年增17.66%，早盤放量價漲逾7%。

19.華城(1519)：近日股價持續攀升，加上上月營收月增、年增率皆翻倍成長，早盤交投再升溫，放量漲逾3%。

20.瀧澤科(6609)：去年12月營收年增8成，創新高，早盤漲逾6%。

21.安勤(3479)：上季營收繳雙增，且接獲大單，預計Q1營收有高雙位數成長，推升股價走揚近2%。

22.長榮海(2603)：上月、去年營收雙創高，早盤重啟漲勢，股漲逾2%，收復周線、半年線

    
    
    。

23.台船(2208)：遭列警告股，上月每股虧0.78元，股價續回吐逾4%。

24.技嘉(2376)：上月營收年增近5成，今年營運續看升，近5日法人買超逾萬張，早盤再刷新高價，達65.4元。

25.廷鑫(2358)：去年12月營收年增7成、月增9成，激勵股價高漲9%，站上所有短均。

26.中橡(2104)：上月營收月減8.44%，早盤人氣消散、處高調節，股價走滑逾2%。

27晶心科(6533)：去年12���營收月減4成、年減5成，股價續跌逾5%。

28.鴻海(2317)：去年12月營收首破6千億元大關創新高，早盤股價最高來到92.5元、小漲1.8%，惟外資賣壓牽制多頭上行。

Content:
For best results when printing this announcement, please click on link
below:http://pdf.reuters.com/htmlnews/htmlnews.asp...

  

Mobileye联手四维图新 打造中国自动驾驶解决方案  
PR Newswire

  

北京, 2018年1月10日电

  

通过此次合作，双方将在中国开发和发布Mobileye的路网采集管理（REM®）产品，结合四维图新自动驾驶地图（HADMap）与高精度定位能力，联手推进中国自动驾驶一体化解决方案的落地与发展。

  

北京2018年1月10日电 /美通社/ -- 2018  
CES期间，英特尔子公司Mobileye和四维图新宣布达成全面战略合作伙伴关系，双方将在中国开发和发布Mobileye的路网采集管理（REM®）产品。Mobileye是高级驾驶辅助系统和自动驾驶解决方案的全球领导者，四维图新是中国领先的基于自动驾驶地图（HADMap）及高精度定位的自动驾驶解决方案提供商。未来，双方将利用Mobileye的REM技术集成中国的路书™（RoadBook™），结合四维图新自动驾驶地图与高精度定位能力，共同迎接自动驾驶大潮的来临。

    
    
    2018CES期间，英特尔子公司Mobileye和四维图新宣布达成全面战略合作伙伴关系，双方将在中国开发和发布Mobileye的路网采集管理（REM(R)）产品。Mobileye的REM系统可以高效益的为自动驾驶汽车提供更精准的定位，这是传统定位方式所不能比拟的。通过视觉识别技术，来自汽车前置摄像头的低带宽匿名数据包以众包形式，形成可驾驶路径的路书，并将其中的道路与车道边界和固定路标作为参考点进行定位。不论是对L2+系统还是L5自动驾驶车，这都是解决精确定位/高精度制图的关键传感器信息。通过与四维图新的合作，这一技术将正式进入中国。

  

路书™将以图层的形式作为四维图新全新地图解决方案的一部分，一方面促进了四维图新传统核心地图和ADAS地图的能力升级，更一方面使自动驾驶地图更高效地支持自动驾驶的实现。另外，借助四维图新的软件和其他技术，路书™与自动驾驶地图可以实现同步更新。将双方能力打包，提供整体解决方案，Mobileye与四维图新将携手为中国自动驾驶带来无限想象。

  

Mobileye首席执行官兼首席技术官Amnon  
Shashua教授表示：“Mobileye一直在追求与具有创新力企业的合作，我们相信这样的合作可以让安全、经济、可扩展的产品更快速地投入市场。与四维图新的合作就是最新的案例。四维图新的技术和市场地位使其成为最适合我们在中国布局相关产品的合作伙伴，很高兴可以和四维图新共同迎接自动驾驶全新时代的到来。”

  

四维图新CEO程鹏说道：“自动驾驶行业的发展需要多方伙伴的携手努力，创新和灵感需要合作与开放的态度。我们对Mobileye的愿景和技术能力充满信心，携起手来，相信我们有能力为市场与客户提供一流的解决方案和最佳的产品服务体验，共同推动自动驾驶行业的发展。”

  

    
    
    ###

  

关于英特尔子公司Mobileye

  

英特尔旗下的 Mobileye  
是高级驾驶辅助系统和自动驾驶解决方案的全球领导厂商，在计算机视觉和机器学习、数据分析、定位和高精地图开发方面处于领先地位。Mobileye的技术能够让乘客在道路上更加安全，降低交通事故发生风险，保护生命，并且凭借自动驾驶领域的技术能力来革新驾驶体验。Mobileye专有的软件算法EyeQ®  
芯片通过对视野进行详细分析来预见与车辆、行人、骑行者、动物、碎片和其它障碍物可能发生的碰撞。Mobileye的产品也能够检测道路标记，例如车道、道路边界、障碍物和类似物体；识别并辨认交通标志、方向标志和交通灯；使用REM™创建本地化的可行路线和视觉标志路书RoadBook™，为自动驾驶提供高精地图。Mobileye的产品已经或将被集成到来自全球超过25个汽车制造商的车型当中。Mobileye的产品也可用于后装市场。

  

关于四维图新

  

四维图新成立于2002年，是一家总部位于中国北京的科技企业。经十余年的创新发展，四维图新已成为导航地图、导航软件、动态交通信息以及乘用车和商用车定制化车联网解决方案领域的领导者。如今，四维图新以全面的技术发展战略迎接自动驾驶时代的来临，致力于以自动驾驶地图、高精度定位、以及应用于ADAS和自动驾驶的车规级半导体等核心业务，打造“智能汽车大脑”，成为中国市场乃至全球最值得信赖的自动驾驶解决方案提供商。

  

SOURCE 英特尔

  

  

  

Copyright (c) 2018 PR Newswire Association,LLC. All Rights Reserved.

below: http: //pdf.reuters.com/htmlnews/htmlnews.asp ...

  

Mobileye teamed up with NavInfo to build China's autonomous driving solution
PR Newswire

  

Beijing, January 10, 2018

  

Through this partnership, the two companies will jointly develop and release Mobileye's REM® products in China, combining the new HADMap and high-precision positioning capabilities of NavInfo to jointly promote the integration of China's autonomous driving solutions Landing and development.

  

Beijing, January 10, 2018 / PRNewswire / - 2018
During CES, Intel subsidiary Mobileye and NavInfo announced a comprehensive strategic partnership to develop and launch Mobileye's Road Network Acquisition Management (REM®) products in China. Mobileye is a global leader in advanced driver assistance systems and autonomous driving solutions, and Navtex is China's leading provider of autonomous driving solutions based on autonomous driving maps (HADMap) and high-precision positioning. In the future, the two companies will use Mobileye's REM technology to integrate China's RoadBook ™ with the new self-driving NavInfo and high-precision positioning capabilities to meet the advent of autonomous driving.

    
    
    During 2018CES, Intel subsidiary Mobileye and NavInfo announced a comprehensive strategic partnership to develop and launch Mobileye's Network Acquisition Management (REM (R)) products in China. Mobileye's REM system offers cost-effective positioning of autonomous vehicles more accurately than traditional positioning methods. Through visual recognition technology, low-bandwidth anonymous data packets from the front camera of a car are crowdsourced to form road-driving road books, and the roads and lane boundaries and fixed road signs are used as reference points for positioning. Whether for the L2 + system or the L5 autopilot, these are key sensor information for precision positioning / high-precision cartography. Through the new cooperation with NavInfo, this technology will officially enter China.

  

As a part of the map solution of NavInfo Photovision Co.,Ltd.,NaviStore ™ will be layered in the form of a layer to promote the capability upgrade of NavInfo traditional core map and ADAS map on the one hand, and on the other hand, autopilot map More efficient support for autonomous driving. In addition, road map ™ and autopilot maps can be updated simultaneously with new NavInfo software and other technologies. By combining the capabilities of both parties and providing total solutions, Mobileye and NavInfo will join hands to bring unlimited imagination to China's autonomous driving.

  

Amnon, Chief Executive Officer and CTO, Mobileye
Professor Shashua said: "Mobileye has been pursuing partnerships with innovative companies that we believe will bring faster, more secure, affordable and scalable products to market." The new collaboration with NavInfo is the latest example. The new technology and market position make it the best partner for the layout of our related products in China and we are delighted to welcome the new era of autonomous driving VISUAL PHOTONICS EPITAXY CO.,LTD. With NavInfo. "

  

NavInfo Limited Cheng Peng said: "The development of the autopilot industry requires the cooperation of many partners, innovation and inspiration need to cooperate and open attitude .We are full of confidence in Mobileye's vision and technical capabilities, join hands and trust us The ability to provide the market and customers with best-in-class solutions and the best product and service experience to drive the autonomous driving industry. "

  

    
    
    ###

  

About Intel's subsidiary Mobileye

  

Mobileye by Intel
Is a global leader in advanced driver assistance systems and autonomous driving solutions and is a leader in computer vision and machine learning, data analysis, positioning and high-definition map development. Mobileye's technology enables passengers to be safer on the road, reducing the risk of traffic accidents, protecting their lives and innovating the driving experience with the technical capabilities in the area of ​​autonomous driving. EyeQ®, Mobileye's proprietary software algorithm
The chip anticipates possible collisions with vehicles, pedestrians, cyclists, animals, debris and other obstacles by analyzing the field of view in detail. Mobileye's products are also capable of detecting road markings such as lanes, road borders, obstacles and similar objects; identifying and identifying traffic signs, direction signs and traffic lights; creating RoadmapTM, a viable route and visual landmark roadmap using REM ™, Autopilot provides high-precision maps. Mobileye's products have been or will be integrated into models from more than 25 car manufacturers worldwide. Mobileye's products can also be used in the aftermarket.

  

About NavInfo

  

NavInfo was founded in 2002, is a technology company headquartered in Beijing, China. After more than ten years of innovation and development, NavInfo has become a leader in navigation maps, navigation software, dynamic traffic information and customized car networking solutions for passenger cars and commercial vehicles. Today, NavInfo welcomes the auto-driving era with its comprehensive technology development strategy and its core businesses of autopilot maps, high-precision positioning, and vehicle-class semiconductors for ADAS and autopilot, to create the "smart car brain "To become the most trusted self-driving solution provider in China and even in the world.

  

SOURCE Intel

  

  

  

Copyright (c) 2018 PR Newswire Association, LLC. All Rights Reserved.
Title: Mobileye联手四维图新 打造中国自动驾驶解决方案

* 歐元上揚，上周升破1.22美元
  * 美元指數陷於三年低位
  * 日本央行總裁對經濟復甦的評語提振日圓
  * 今年以來全球主要貨幣匯率變化：http://tmsnrt.rs/2pokkMt

路透倫敦1月15日 - 繼上周勁升後，歐元兌美元周一守在三年高位，美元進一步走弱。市場對歐洲央行將收緊貨幣政策的預期日益升高，推動了歐元漲勢。

  

隨著市場更加深信一些主要央行將逐漸撤回貨幣刺激措施，美元走跌。美元指數 .DXY 周一下跌0.2%，觸及2015年初以來低位。

  

美元兌歐元近期走貶引入關注，因歐元區經濟日益復甦，引發更多投資者將他們的投資組合向該地區傾斜。

  

據最新的期貨數據，截至1月12日的一周，投機客的歐元凈多倉增至紀錄高位。歐元兌一籃子貨幣處於2014年底以來最高位。

  

“未來數月我們仍看多歐元，因為我們預計，在意大利3月大選後，歐元區的政治風險終將開始下降，”東方匯理銀行說道。

  

“另外，我們預計歐洲央行將繼續縮減購債，最終停止擴大其資產負債表規模...。”

  

歐元 EUR=
漲0.1%至1.2218美元，延續上周漲勢。歐洲央行(ECB)上周公布的12月會議記錄顯示，ECB應當在2018年初重新考慮溝通立場，並逐漸調整措辭以體現出增長前景的好轉。這強化了圍繞歐洲央行將準備削減刺激計劃的預期。(Full
Story)

  

不過鑒於歐元已處於三年高位，一些分析師警告稱，歐元強勢將很快令歐洲央行感到擔憂，促使該央行口頭打壓歐元。

  

美元兌日圓跌至9月中以來最低，因日本央行總裁的談話強調了日本經濟的復甦。

  

雖然日本央行總裁黑田東彥重申，央行決心維持大規模刺激措施，直到穩定實現2%的通脹目標，但他還表示，日本經濟料將繼續溫和擴張。(Full Story)

  

  

黑田東彥對日本央行地區分行經理講話時稱，核心消費者物價正在上  
升1%左右。這和他上次向地區分行經理的講話略有不同，他上次稱核心通脹率處於零附近。

  

“老實說，我們仍看到有人拋售美元兌日圓，”道富銀行駐東京支行  
經理Bart Wakabayashi稱。

  

“日本官方是否會開始就日圓強勢發表些許言論，讓我們拭目以待，  
”他表示。“我們或許會看到(官方)發表一些言論，以冷卻市場對日圓強勢的預期。”

  

人民幣兌美元上漲至逾兩年高點，因一名德國央行委員稱該行已決定  
在外匯儲備中納入人民幣，且企業出脫他們的美元持倉。

  

美元兌日圓 JPY= 下跌0.2%至110.74，稍早一度低見110.6。

  

    
    
                                              紐約   當日  今年來  2017年                               最新報價 上收市價 漲跌%  漲跌%收市價

  

    
    
        歐元/美元       <EUR=>      1.2238  1.2185  +0.43  +2.02  1.1996    美元/日圓       <JPY=>      110.58  111.03  -0.41  -1.85  112.67    歐元/日圓       <EURJPY=>   135.34  135.40  -0.04  +0.12  135.18    美元/瑞郎       <CHF=>      0.9630  0.9680  -0.52  -1.16  0.9743    英鎊/美元       <GBP=>      1.3753  1.3727  +0.19  +1.78  1.3512    美元/加元       <CAD=>      1.2420  1.2455  -0.28  -1.25  1.2577    美元/離岸人民幣    <CNH=>      6.4356  6.4597  -0.37  -1.18 6.5125    澳元/美元       <AUD=>      0.7955  0.7912  +0.54  +1.97  0.7801    新西蘭元/美元   <NZD=>      0.7290  0.7254  +0.50  +2.88  0.7086    歐元/瑞郎       <EURCHF=>   1.1787  1.1797  -0.08  +0.84  1.1689    歐元/英鎊       <EURGBP=>   0.8897  0.8884  +0.15  +0.16  0.8883    歐元/瑞典克朗   <EURSEK=>   9.8404  9.8163  +0.25  +0.01  9.8391    美元/挪威克朗   <NOK=>      7.9007  7.9231  -0.28  -3.73  8.2070

  

附注：上收市價是紐約匯市2100GMT(冬令時間)或2000GMT(夏令時間)報價，當日漲跌幅亦以此為基準計算。(完)

Content_EN:
* The euro rose last week, surpassing $ 1.22
  * The dollar index fell to a three-year low
  * Bank of Japan Governor comments on economic recovery boost yen
  * This year the world's major currency exchange rate changes: http://tmsnrt.rs/2pokkMt

Reuters LONDON, January 15 - The dollar weakened further after the euro rose against the dollar at a three-year high against the dollar on the day it rose last week. Market expectations of the European Central Bank will tighten monetary policy is rising day by day, promoting the euro gains.

  

As the market is more convinced that some major central banks will gradually withdraw monetary stimulus, the dollar fell. The dollar index, DXY, slipped 0.2% on Monday, hitting a low since early 2015.

  

The dollar weighed on the recent devaluation of the euro as concerns over the recovery of the euro zone economy prompted more investors to tilt their portfolios toward the region.

  

According to the latest futures data, as of January 12, speculative euro net longs jumped to a record high. The euro was at the highest level against a basket of currencies since the end of 2014.

  

"We are still watching the euro more in coming months because we expect the political risk in the euro zone will eventually begin to decline after the March election in Italy," Calyon Bank said.

  

"In addition, we expect the European Central Bank will continue to cut back on debt purchases and eventually stop expanding its balance sheet size ...."

  

EUR EUR
Up 0.1% to 1.2218 US dollars, extending gains last week. The December meeting of the European Central Bank (ECB) released last week showed that the ECB should reconsider its position of communication in early 2018 and gradually adjust the language to reflect the improvement of the growth prospects. This reinforces the expectation that the ECB will prepare to cut its stimulus package. (Full
Story)

  

However, given the euro is at three years high, some analysts warned that the strong euro will soon make the European Central Bank worried that prompting the central bank to orally suppress the euro.

  

The dollar fell to the lowest level since mid-September as the Bank of Japan's governor spoke in an understatement of Japan's economic recovery.

  

Although Bank of Japan Governor Masao Kuroda reiterated that the central bank is determined to maintain large-scale stimulus measures until it achieves a 2% inflation target steadily, he said the economy is expected to continue its moderate expansion. (Full Story)

  

  

Kuroda Haruhiko, Bank of Japan regional branch manager speech, said the core consumer prices are on
L% or so. This is a little different from his last speech to the regional branch manager, who last said the core inflation rate was near zero.

  

"To be honest, we still see someone selling the dollar against the yen," said Dow Jones Bank branch in Tokyo
Bart Wakabayashi manager said.

  

"Whether the Japanese government will start making a few comments on the strength of the yen makes us wait and see,
"He said." We may see (official) make some remarks to cool the market's strong yen expectations. "

  

RMB rose to more than two-year high against the U.S. dollar as a member of the German central bank said the bank has decided
Include RMB in foreign exchange reserves, and companies take out their dollar positions.

  

The dollar dropped 0.2% to 110.74 yen, down from 110.6 earlier.

Title: 《全球匯市》歐元���美元守在三年高位，美元進一步走弱

Content:
* 欧元上扬，上周升破1.22美元
  * 美元指数陷于三年低位
  * 日本央行总裁对经济复苏的评语提振日圆
  * 今年以来全球主要货币汇率变化：http://tmsnrt.rs/2pokkMt

路透伦敦1月15日 - 继上周劲升后，欧元兑美元周一守在三年高位，美元进一步走弱。市场对欧洲央行将收紧货币政策的预期日益升高，推动了欧元涨势。

  

随着市场更加深信一些主要央行将逐渐撤回货币刺激措施，美元走跌。美元指数 .DXY 周一下跌0.2%，触及2015年初以来低位。

  

美元兑欧元近期走贬引入关注，因欧元区经济日益复苏，引发更多投资者将他们的投资组合向该地区倾斜。

  

据最新的期货数据，截至1月12日的一周，投机客的欧元净多仓增至纪录高位。欧元兑一篮子货币处于2014年底以来最高位。

  

“未来数月我们仍看多欧元，因为我们预计，在意大利3月大选后，欧元区的政治风险终将开始下降，”东方汇理银行说道。

  

“另外，我们预计欧洲央行将继续缩减购债，最终停止扩大其资产负债表规模...。”

  

欧元 EUR=
涨0.1%至1.2218美元，延续上周涨势。欧洲央行(ECB)上周公布的12月会议记录显示，ECB应当在2018年初重新考虑沟通立场，并逐渐调整措辞以体现出增长前景的好转。这强化了围绕欧洲央行将准备削减刺激计划的预期。(Full
Story)

  

不过鉴于欧元已处于三年高位，一些分析师警告称，欧元强势将很快令欧洲央行感到担忧，促使该央行口头打压欧元。

  

美元兑日圆跌至9月中以来最低，因日本央行总裁的谈话强调了日本经济的复苏。

  

虽然日本央行总裁黑田东彦重申，央行决心维持大规模刺激措施，直到稳定实现2%的通胀目标，但他还表示，日本经济料将继续温和扩张。(Full Story)

  

  

黑田东彦对日本央行地区分行经理讲话时称，核心消费者物价正在上  
升1%左右。这和他上次向地区分行经理的讲话略有不同，他上次称核心通胀率处于零附近。

  

“老实说，我们仍看到有人抛售美元兑日圆，”道富银行驻东京支行  
经理Bart Wakabayashi称。

  

“日本官方是否会开始就日圆强势发表些许言论，让我们拭目以待，  
”他表示。“我们或许会看到(官方)发表一些言论，以冷却市场对日圆强势的预期。”

  

人民币兑美元上涨至逾两年高点，因一名德国央行委员称该行已决定  
在外汇储备中纳入人民币，且企业出脱他们的美元持仓。

  

美元兑日圆 JPY= 下跌0.2%至110.74，稍早一度低见110.6。

  

    
    
                                              纽约   当日  今年来  2017年                               最新报价 上收市价 涨跌%  涨跌%收市价

* The euro rose last week, surpassing $ 1.22
  * The dollar index fell to a three-year low
  * Bank of Japan Governor comments on economic recovery boost yen
  * This year the world's major currency exchange rate changes: http://tmsnrt.rs/2pokkMt

Reuters LONDON, January 15 - The dollar weakened further after the euro rose against the dollar at a three-year high against the dollar on the day it rose last week. Market expectations of the European Central Bank will tighten monetary policy is rising day by day, promoting the euro gains.

  

As the market is more convinced that some major central banks will gradually withdraw monetary stimulus, the dollar fell. The dollar index, DXY, slipped 0.2% on Monday, hitting a low since early 2015.

  

The dollar weighed on the recent devaluation of the euro as concerns over the recovery of the euro zone economy prompted more investors to tilt their portfolios toward the region.

  

According to the latest futures data, as of January 12, speculative euro net longs jumped to a record high. The euro was at the highest level against a basket of currencies since the end of 2014.

  

"We are still watching the euro more in coming months because we expect the political risk in the Eurozone will eventually begin to decline after the March election in Italy," Calyon Bank said.

  

"In addition, we expect the European Central Bank will continue to cut back on debt purchases and eventually stop expanding its balance sheet size ...."

  

EUR EUR
Up 0.1% to 1.2218 US dollars, extending gains last week. The December meeting of the European Central Bank (ECB) released last week showed that the ECB should reconsider its position of communication in early 2018 and gradually adjust the language to reflect the improvement of the growth prospects. This reinforces the expectation that the ECB will prepare to cut its stimulus package. (Full
Story)

  

However, given the euro is at three years high, some analysts warned that the strong euro will soon make the European Central Bank worried that prompting the central bank to orally suppress the euro.

  

The dollar fell to the lowest level since mid-September as the Bank of Japan's governor spoke in an understatement of Japan's economic recovery.

  

Although Bank of Japan Governor Masao Kuroda reiterated that the central bank is determined to maintain large-scale stimulus measures until it achieves a 2% inflation target steadily, he said the economy is expected to continue its moderate expansion. (Full Story)

  

  

Kuroda Haruhiko, Bank of Japan regional branch manager speech, said the core consumer prices are on
L% or so. This is a little different from his last speech to the regional branch manager, who last said the core inflation rate was near zero.

  

"To be honest, we still see someone selling the dollar against the yen," said Dow Jones Bank branch in Tokyo
Bart Wakabayashi manager said.

  

"Whether the Japanese government will start making a few comments on the strength of the yen makes us wait and see,
"He said." We may see (official) made some remarks to cool the market's strong yen expectations. "

  

RMB rose to more than two-year high against the U.S. dollar as a member of the German central bank said the bank has decided
Include RMB in foreign exchange reserves, and companies take out their dollar positions.

  

The dollar dropped 0.2% to 110.74 yen, down from 110.6 earlier.

Title: 《全球汇市》欧元兑美元守在三年高位，美元进一步走弱

Content:
For best results when printing this announcement, please click on link
below:http://pdf.reuters.com/htmlnews/htmlnews.asp...

  

荣之联蝉联中国电子工业标准化技术协会年度优秀会员单位  
PR Newswire

  

北京, 2018年1月10日电

  

北京2018年1月10日电 /美通社/ --  
2018年1月9日，第十届电子信息产业标准推动会暨中国信息技术服务年会（2018）在北京万寿宾馆隆重召开。作为ITSS分会副会长单位，北京荣之联科技股份有限公司（简称：荣之联）受邀出席此次活动，蝉联“中国电子工业标准化技术协会2017年度优秀会员单位”，同时斩获“2017中国IT服务优秀应用案例”奖。2018年1月9日,  
第十届电子信息产业标准推动会暨中国信息技术服务年会（2018）上，北京荣之联科技股份有限公司（简称：荣之联）蝉联“中国电子工业标准化技术协会2017年度优秀会员单位”，同时斩获“2017中国IT服务优秀应用案例”奖。本届电子信息产业标准推动会由中国电子工业标准化技术协会主办，中国电子工业标准化技术协会信息技术服务分会承办，活动主题为“以标准助力产业发展”，旨在推动信息技术标准化在国内的广泛应用。来自企业、标准化机构、标准化技术组织等数百位领导和专家、重要媒体代表出席会议。

  

荣之联高级副总裁吴烜、解决方案中心总经理王向东两位领导受邀出席活动，与各参会企业共同探讨信息技术服务领域和电子信息领域、云服务领域的标准化进展情况，展望2018年工作重点。

  

荣之联蝉联ITSS年度优秀会员单位

  

为进一步推动IT服务标准的制定和应用推广，表彰在2017年度为ITSS做出突出贡献的会员单位，信息技术服务标准年会设立了ITSS优秀会员单位颁奖环节。继2015年、2016年ITSS优秀会员单位之后，荣之联蝉联2017年度中国电子工业标准化技术协会优秀会员单位。

  

荣之联凭借多年的技术经验和专业洞察，受到行业及客户的一致认可，曾多次参与包括《信息技术服务质量需求和评价IT服务质量模型》（ISO/IEC25011）、《信息技术服务，服务级别协议指南》（SJ/T  
11691-2017）等国际、国家级行业标准的定制与起草、编写工作。

  

荣之联于2010年开始参与国家信息技术服务相关标准的标准化制定工作，并一直持续至今。荣之联作为ITSS分会副会长单位的同时，也是ITSS云服务和数据中心标准发起者。荣之联始终坚持以信息技术服务为基础、以企业实际需求为导向，输出自身在信息技术服务领域的专业能力，连续多年蝉联ITSS年度优秀会员单位，全面推动我国中小企业在信息技术服务领域制定更加健全的行业规范体系。

  

荣之联云数据中心项目荣膺“2017年中国IT服务优秀应用案例”奖

  

同期，活动现场公布了2017年度中国IT服务领军企业、优秀案例等的评选结果，荣之联云数据中心项目荣膺“2017年中国IT服务优秀应用案例”奖。

  

荣之联作为国内领先的信息技术服务提供商，始终专注于为国内外各类企业级用户提供更好的服务终端用户的解决方案，引领客户探索新型商务模式，借助自身产品优势及丰富的客户服务经验，助力企业的数字业务转型。同时，荣之联具备企业级IT服务的规划建设运维一体化能力，在IT战略规划、存储容灾备份、专业运维、安全防护、专项服务、IT治理等方面具备优势。

  

目前，荣之联在北、上、广、深等一线城市已经设立6个IDC托管服务中心，提供数据中心托管服务、数据容灾备份服务以及数据上云裸光纤服务。荣之联的数据中心建设，以应用系统为导引，聚焦行业支撑，利用云计算、大数据、物联网技术支撑系统级方案。

  

“2017年中国IT服务优秀应用案例”奖的授予，是对荣之联在数据中心运营服务方面工作的肯定，更是对荣之联数据中心建设能力的认可。在未来，荣之联将持续聚焦行业用户，帮助客户整合已有的IT资产，实现数据中心和IT基础设施的集约化管理，提升数据中心运营服务，加速助力企业的数字化转型。

  

聚焦行业应用 推动ITSS标准落地

  

未来，荣之联将继续发挥在信息技术服务方面的专业优势，积极拓展与各行业伙伴的深入合作，持续推动行业信息技术服务标准的制定和应用推广，提高企业信息化规划管理和运行服务能力，积极推动标准化建设、促进标准落地，在服务行业用户、推进标准化发展的道路上，更进一步。

 United Electronics Co.,Ltd. won the China Electronics Industry Standardization Association annual outstanding member units
PR Newswire

  

Beijing, January 10, 2018

  

Beijing, January 10, 2018 / PR Newswire /
January 9, 2018, the Tenth Electronics Industry Standards Promotion Conference and China Information Technology Services Annual Conference (2018) was held in Beijing Wanshou Hotel. As the Vice President Unit of IT Branch SS Branch, United Electronics Co.,Ltd. of Beijing was invited to attend the event and was awarded the title of "China Electronics Industry Standardization Technology Association 2017 Outstanding member ", at the same time gains" 2017 China IT LIMITED excellent service application case "award. January 9, 2018,
United Electronics Co.,Ltd. (Beijing, China) won the "China Electronics Standardization Technology Association 2017 Excellent Membership Unit ", at the same time won the" China IT LIMITED 2017 excellent service case "award. The current promotion of electronic information industry standards by the China Electronics Industry Standardization Technology Association, China Electronics Industry Standardization Technology Association Information Technology Services Branch contractors, theme of the event "to help boost the industry standards", to promote the standardization of information technology in the country wide application. Hundreds of leaders and experts from enterprises, standardization organizations and standardization technical organizations, and important media representatives attended the meeting.

  

 Wu Yong, Senior Vice President, United Electronics Co.,Ltd.,Wang Xiangdong, General Manager, Solution Center Two leaders were invited to attend the event to discuss with the participating enterprises on the progress of standardization in the fields of information technology services, electronic information and cloud services , Looking forward to 2018 focus of work.

  

 United Electronics Co.,Ltd. reelected I.T LIMITED SS annual outstanding member

  

To further promote the development and application of I.T LIMITED service standards and to recognize the member units that made outstanding contributions to I.T LIMITED SS in 2017, the IT Service Standards Annual Meeting set up the awarding ceremony for outstanding members of I.T LIMITED SS. Following the success of I.T LIMITED SS in 2015 and 2016, United Electronics Co.,Ltd. was awarded the Excellent Member of 2017 China Electronics Industry Standardization Technology Association.

  

 With years of technical experience and professional insight, United Electronics Co.,Ltd. has been recognized by industry and customers for many times. It has participated in a number of conferences including "IT Service Quality Requirements and Evaluation of IT Limited Service Quality Model" (ISO / IEC25011), " Information Technology Services, Service Level Agreement Guidelines "(SJ / T
11691-2017) and other international and national industry standards customization and drafting, preparation.

  

 United Electronics Co.,Ltd. began to participate in the standardization of relevant standards of national information technology services in 2010 and has been continuing to this day. As the Vice President of I.T LIMITED SS Branch, United Electronics Co.,Ltd. is also the initiator of I.T LIMITED SS Cloud Services and Data Center Standards. United Electronics Co.,Ltd. always adhere to the information technology services, based on the actual needs of enterprises, export their own expertise in the field of information technology services for many years won the IT LIMITED SS outstanding member units, and comprehensively promote China's small and medium enterprises In the field of information technology services to develop a more robust system of industry standards.

  

 United Electronics Co.,Ltd. Cloud Data Center Project Awarded Best Application Case of China I.T LIMITED in 2017

  

Over the same period, the event site announced the selection results of 2017 China I.T LIMITED service leaders and outstanding cases. The United Electronics Co.,Ltd. cloud data center project was awarded the "2017 China I.T LIMITED Service Excellence Application Award".

  

 As a leading information technology service provider in China, United Electronics Co.,Ltd. has always been focused on providing better end-user service solutions for all kinds of enterprise users both at home and abroad. It leads the customers to explore new business models and leverage their product advantages And rich customer service experience, help enterprises in the digital business transformation. At the same time, United Electronics Co.,Ltd. is equipped with the planning, operation, and maintenance integration capabilities of enterprise-class IT services. It is responsible for IT strategic planning, storage disaster recovery, professional operation and maintenance, security protection, special services and IT LIMITED management. Have the advantage.

  

Currently, United Electronics Co.,Ltd. has set up six IDC hosting service centers in North, Shanghai, Guangzhou and Shenzhen Tier 1 cities to provide data center hosting services, data disaster recovery backup services and data bare cloud service. United Electronics Co.,Ltd. data center construction, application system-oriented, focusing on industry support, the use of cloud computing, big data, IoT technology support system-level programs.

  

The award of "2017 China IT Limited Outstanding Service Applications" award is a recognition of United Electronics Co.,Ltd.'s work on data center operation and service and recognition of United Electronics Co.,Ltd.'s data center construction capability . In the future, United Electronics Co.,Ltd. will continue to focus on industry users, help customers integrate existing IT LIMITED assets, and implement centralized management of data center and IT LIMITED infrastructure to enhance data center operations and accelerate the digitization of enterprises Transformation.

  

Focus on industry applications to promote I. T LIMITED SS standard landing

  

In the future, United Electronics Co.,Ltd. will continue to exert its professional advantages in information technology services and actively expand in-depth cooperation with various industry partners. It will continue to promote the formulation and application of information technology service standards and promotion of enterprise informatization planning management And operation of service capabilities, and actively promote the standardization of construction, and promote the standard landing in the service industry users, to promote standardized development on the road to go further.

Segway-Ninebot闪耀CES 2018：个人陪伴机器人终于来了PR Newswire

  

北京, 2018年1月15日电

  

  

北京2018年1月15日电 /美通社/ -- 近期，备受瞩目的 CES 2018国际消费电子展在美国拉斯维加斯落下帷幕。今年的 CES  
展会以人工智能为核心，呈现了全球最新、最热的消费电子产品与技术。全球智能短交通和服务类机器人领域的领军企业

  * Segway-Ninebot  
公司携旗下智能出行和创新机器人产品重磅亮相，闪耀了  
CES 2018 展会的舞台。

今年的 CES  
展会以人工智能为核心，呈现了全球最新、最热的消费电子产品与技术。全球智能短交通和服务类机器人领域的领军企业--Segway-Ninebot  
公司携旗下智能出行和创新机器人产品重磅亮相，闪耀了  
CES 2018 展会的舞台。  
人工智是本届 CES  
的最大亮点，机器人作为其实现落地的重要载体最为吸引眼球。Segway-Ninebot旗下的Loomo 系列机器人是服务类机器人中的佼佼者，是  
Segway-Ninebot 在 CES2018 上的重头戏。在此次展会上，机器人Loomo  
的消费者版本首次亮相，这是全球第一个可用于室内室外的个人陪伴机器人，具备自平衡行走功能和自主研发情绪引擎，可实现跟随跟拍等诸多未来科技功能和特性，成为了展会现场的吸睛利器。Loomo消费者版本将于不久后在美国进行首发。同时，专注解决最后一公里问题的配送机器人

  * Loomo Go 也得到了现场媒体与观众的广泛关注。

在本届 CES  
展会上，各类充满未来科技感的智能电子产品层出不穷。Segway-Ninebot旗下的多款明星级智能出行产品也悉数亮相，包括 Segway  
i2、Segway x2、Segway miniLITE、Segway miniPLUS、Ninebot miniPRO、NinebotOne
S1、Ninebot One Z、Ninebot E+、Ninebot
KickScooter、CityGo等全球顶尖的智能短交通创新产品，向参展观众展示了科技与时尚相结合的智能出行方式及其巨大魅力。

  

  

此外，Segway  
品牌的核心技术首次赋能，润米科技90分品牌在本届 CES  
展会上发布了全球首个双轮驱动的自平衡智能跟随旅行箱  
90FUN Puppy1。90FUN Puppy1 内置 Segway 定制跟随芯片��采用
UWB精准军用无线电定位及自平衡技术，可实现前后双向智能跟随。这款智能旅跟随行箱的正式版将于2018年下半年量产上市。

  

作为全球最大的科技盛会之一，CES  
已成为全球各大科技公司对外展示自身创新产品和技术的重要窗口。本届CES 参展企业超过3900家，其中中国公司就多达1551  
家，整体占比高达33%，中国科技的力量让全世界再次惊艳。Segway-Ninebot以全新的品牌形象闪耀在今年 CES  
展会的舞台上，带来了旗下的智能出行产品和创新机器人产品，让世界重新以高端、优秀、创新等新名词来定义中国制造和中国品牌。

Segway-Ninebot shines CES 2018: Personal companion robot finally came PR Newswire

  

Beijing, January 15, 2018

  

  

BEIJING, January 15, 2018 / PRNewswire / PRNewswire / - CIT 2018, the highly anticipated CES recently concluded in Las Vegas, USA. This year's CES
Artificial intelligence as the core, showing the world's newest and hottest consumer electronics products and technologies. Global leader in smart short transportation and service robots

The company took its smart travel and innovative robotics products debut, shining
CES 2018 show stage.

This year's CES
Artificial intelligence as the core, showing the world's newest and hottest consumer electronics products and technologies. Segway-Ninebot, a global leader in smart short transportation and service robots

CES 2018 show stage.

At this CES

In addition, Segway

UWB precision military radio positioning and self-balancing technology, can be realized before and after two-way intelligent follow. This Smart Travel follow the official version of the box will be mass production in the second half of 2018 market.

Has become the world's major technology companies to display their own innovative products and technologies an important window. The current CES exhibitors more than 3,900, of which as many as 1551 Chinese companies

The stage of the exhibition brought its smart travel products and innovative robotics products, so that the world will once again re-define Chinese-made and Chinese brands with new terms such as high-end, excellence and innovation.

ADI与香港科技大学机器人研究院签署校企合作协议机器人研究助力粤港澳大湾区创新发展PR Newswire

  

北京, 2018年1月15日电

  

北京2018年1月15日电 /美通社/ -- Analog Devices,
Inc.(http://www.analog.com/en/index.html)(ADI)公司今天宣布，与香港科技大学机器人研究院正式签署工业合作伙伴计划(IPP)。双方将积极合作寻求技术突破，以创新助力粤港澳大湾区的建设与发展，支持中国提出的将加快建设创新型国家的国策。Analog
Devices, Inc.  
(ADI)公司今天宣布，与香港科技大学机器人研究院正式签署工业合作伙伴计划(IPP)。双方将积极合作寻求技术突破，以创新助力粤港澳大湾区的建设与发展，支持中国提出的将加快建设创新型国家的国策。作为立足粤港澳大湾区内的全球知名高校，香港科技大学将无人自动化技术与机器人研究作为该校五大战略发展方向之一，机器人研究院的研究方向包括自主系统与机器人、制造自动化与智能工厂、人与机器人交互，以及智能家庭和智能城市。ADI是全球领先的高性能模拟、混合信号和数字信号处理的半导体设计、制造厂商，专注于高性能模拟技术创新，特别是高性能传感器、数据转换器、放大器、数字处理器、射频与微波IC以及电源管理技术，持续帮助中国企业和高校更快速、更高质量地实现包括机器人在内的无人自动化应用的科技创新。

  

ADI全球大学计划总监Zoran  
Zvonar表示：“机器人是全球产业应用和科研的热点，也是‘中国制造2025’的重要组成部分。ADI作为一家以创新为核心文化的企业，一直积极参与其中并致力于提供卓越的模拟技术。香港科技大学有非常好的科研基础，培养了大量科技人才。与香港科技大学机器人研究院的深入合作，在机器人领域共同寻求突破性发展，是ADI助力粤港澳大湾区创新建设的一个美好开端。”

  

香港科技大学机器人研究院院长王煜表示：“香港科技大学机器人研究院与ADI以往就拥有良好的合作关系，现在通过签署校企合作项目协议将进一步拓展合作深度与广度。借助ADI在高性能、高可靠性信号处理、传感技术等领域的国际领先优势，帮助香港科技大学机器人研究院在机器人应用以及相关教学、科研上实现更大的发展。”

  

香港科技大学机器人研究院的目标在于围绕粤港澳，特别是深圳和东莞等地的电子制造企业的需求进行针对性技术研发，该地区上千家电子制造厂对工业机器人有大量的需求。ADI高性能模拟技术将拓展在包括机器人在内的更多科研上，探索超越一切可能的新契机。

  

关于ADI公司

  

Analog Devices (Nasdaq:  
ADI)是全球领先的高性能模拟技术公司，致力于解决最艰巨的工程设计挑战。凭借杰出的检测、测量、电源、连接和解译技术，搭建连接现实世界和数字世界的智能化桥梁，从而帮助客户重新认识周围的世界。详情请浏览ADI官网http://www.analog.com/cn

  

    
    
    ###

ADI Signs Agreement of Cooperation with School of Robotics with Robotics Institute of Hong Kong University of Science and Technology Robotics Enhances Innovation and Development in Tai Wan District of Guangdong, Hong Kong, Macau and Taiwan PR Newswire

  

Beijing, January 15, 2018

  

BEIJING, January 15, 2018 / PRNewswire / - Analog Devices,
Inc. (http://www.analog.com/en/index.html) (ADI) today announced the official signing of the Industrial Partnership Program (IPP) with Robotics Institute of Hong Kong University of Science and Technology. The two sides will actively cooperate in seeking technological breakthroughs and help boost the construction and development of the Bay Area of ​​Guangdong, Hong Kong, Macau and Hong Kong in support of China's national policy of accelerating the building of an innovative nation. Analog
Devices, Inc.
(ADI) today announced the official signing of the Industrial Partnership Program (IPP) with the Robotics Institute of Hong Kong University of Science and Technology. The two sides will actively cooperate in seeking technological breakthroughs and help boost the construction and development of the Bay Area of ​​Guangdong, Hong Kong, Macau and Hong Kong in support of China's national policy of accelerating the building of an innovative nation. As a world-renowned university based in Guangdong, Hong Kong, Macao and Taiwan, Hong Kong University of Science and Technology will be unmanned automation technology and robotics as one of the five strategic development direction of the school, Institute of robotics research, including autonomous systems and robots, manufacturing automation and intelligence Factory, human-robot interaction, smart home and smart city. Analog Devices is a leading designer and manufacturer of high-performance analog, mixed-signal and digital signal processing semiconductors in the world, specializing in high-performance analog technology innovations, specifically high performance sensors, data converters, amplifiers, digital processors, RF and microwave ICs As well as power management technology, continue to help Chinese enterprises and universities faster, higher quality unmanned automation applications, including robots, including scientific and technological innovation.

  

Zoran, Program Director, ADI Global University
Zvonar said: "Robots are a global industrial application and research hotspot, and are also an important part of Made in China 2025. ADI has always been an innovation-centric enterprise and is committed to providing superior simulation technology." Hong Kong Science and Technology University has a very good foundation for scientific research, training a large number of scientific and technological personnel with the Robotics Institute of Hong Kong University of Science and Technology in-depth cooperation in the field of robot jointly seek breakthrough development is ADI help Guangdong, Hong Kong and Macao Bay Area a good start for innovation and construction. "

  

Wang Yu, dean of the Robotics Research Institute of Hong Kong University of Science and Technology said: "The Institute of Robotics of Hong Kong University of Science and Technology has had a good relationship with ADI in the past and will further expand the depth and breadth of the cooperation by signing the agreement on the university-industry cooperation project. With ADI's high- , High-reliability signal processing, sensing technology and other areas of the international leading edge to help Robotics Institute of Hong Kong University of Science and Technology in robotics and related teaching, research and development to achieve greater development.

  

Robotics Institute of Hong Kong University of Science and Technology aims to develop targeted technologies around the needs of electronics manufacturing enterprises in Guangdong, Hong Kong and Macao, especially in Shenzhen and Dongguan. Thousands of electronics factories in the region have a large demand for industrial robots. ADI high-performance simulation technology will be expanded to include more robotics, including more research, to explore beyond all possible new opportunities.

  

About ADI Corporation

  

Analog Devices (Nasdaq:
ADI) is the world's leading high-performance analog technology company dedicated to solving the toughest engineering design challenges. With outstanding detection, measurement, power, connectivity and interpretation technologies, we build intelligent bridges connecting the real world with the digital world, helping customers to re-recognize the world around them. For more information, please visit the ADI website http://www.analog.com/cn

参与CES展会第六年，科沃斯机器人离智能家居生态还有多远？  
PR Newswire

  

拉斯维加斯和苏州, 2018年1月11日电

  

拉斯维加斯和苏州2018年1月11日电 /美通社/ --  
2018CES展会，中国参展厂商数量多达1551家，中国科技正一步步以自己的影响力去改变世界的看法。今年也是中国品牌科沃斯机器人参与CES展会的第六个年头，旗下推出的新品无线窗宝拿下本届CES创新大奖，得到权威认可。这些年里，科沃斯机器人在不断创新升级产品的同时，也密切关注智能家居的发展。

  

智能家居是本次展会的最大看点，从去年开始爆发，热度丝毫未减。去年开始，亚马逊和谷歌把各自的语音助手Echo和GoogleHome开放给第三方厂商合作，它们像一个神经中枢，把智能家居产品联结起来。科沃斯机器人瞄准先机，旗下地宝产品与两大语音助手展开合作，在国际市场上持续发力。今年，华为在本届CES展会上展示了华为HiLink智能家居生态阶段性成果，科沃斯机器人作为深度合作伙伴也强势入驻，让更多消费者了解科沃斯机器人的产品。2018CES展会，中国参展厂商数量多达1551家，中国科技正一步步以自己的影响力去改变世界的看法。今年也是中国品牌科沃斯机器人参与CES展会的第六个年头，旗下推出的新品无线窗宝拿下本届CES创新大奖，得到权威认可。此外，科沃斯机器人在CES展会上不止于产品的更新迭代。在国外媒体惊叹于科沃斯创造力的时候，科沃斯机器人更注重智能家居互联的构建。在一步步研发和磨合中，科沃斯机器人已逐步将扫地机器人地宝、擦窗机器人窗宝、空气净化机器人沁宝和管家机器人UNIBOT在内的完整家用服务机器人产品线融入到智能家居生态中。

  

往后，用户可以通过一个枢纽将这些产品一键掌控，简化了操作。用户可以使用科沃斯机器人APP操控各个机器人的工作路线、工作时间，查看到它们的路径规划。拿科沃斯扫地机器人来说，一旦后端平台发现它被卡住或者被缠绕，系统就会主动推送一条信息到用户的APP上，告诉你如何解决，不用等找到客服人员询问才获知解决办法。通过App端，不论用户人在哪里，都能享受智能家居带来的美好。

  

随着在CES展会上频频亮相，科沃斯机器人越来越受到国外消费者的欢迎。2016年是科沃斯机器人国际化的第一年，其产品业绩在欧洲和北美地区飞速成长，让人看到科���斯机器人在海外市场的无限潜力。今年“黑五”期间，科沃斯机器人在亚马逊平台上相较去年取得了超400%增长的成绩。由此看到，科沃斯机器人借助CES这个具有全球品牌传播意义的行业展会真正走出国门，在国际市场中稳步前行。

  

智能家居生态风潮在行业的推动下一定会有更长远的发展。对于科沃斯机器人而言，进一步探索如何为用户带来更人性化的智能体验，让全球家庭享受由机器人参与的现代智能家居生活，是未来不断研究的命题。

  

    
    
    ###

SOURCE 科沃斯机器人

https://photos.prnasia.com/prnh/20180111/2030560-1

Content_EN:
For best results when printing this announcement, please click on link
below: http: //pdf.reuters.com/htmlnews/htmlnews.asp ...

  

Sixth year at CES, how far is the Cobos robot from the smart home ecosystem?
PR Newswire

  

Las Vegas and Suzhou, January 11, 2018

  

Las Vegas and Suzhou January 11, 2018 / PR Newswire /
2018CES show, the number of exhibitors in China as many as 1551, China Science and Technology are gradually influencing each other to change the world's views. This year is also the sixth year that the Chinese brand Cobos robot participated in the CES exhibition. Its new wireless window glass won the CES Innovation Award and was authorized by the authority. In these years, Cobos robot constantly innovating and upgrading products, pay close attention to the development of smart home at the same time.

  

Smart home is the biggest highlight of this exhibition, starting from last year, the heat did not diminished. Last year, Amazon and Google opened up their own voice assistants, Echo and GoogleHome, to third-party vendors that act like a neural hub that connects smart home products. Cobos robots aimed at the first opportunity, its treasure products and two voice assistants to cooperate in the international market sustained force. This year, Huawei demonstrated the milestones of the Huawei HiLink smart home ecosystem at this CES show. Cobos robots have also entered the market as deep cooperation partners, enabling more consumers to understand the products of the Cobos robot. 2018CES exhibition, the number of exhibitors in China as many as 1551, China Science and Technology are gradually influencing each other to change the world's views. This year is also the sixth year that the Chinese brand Cobos robot participated in the CES exhibition. Its new wireless window glass won the CES Innovation Award and was authorized by the authority. In addition, the Cobos robotics at CES show more than product updates iterations. In foreign media marveled at the creativity of Cobos, Cobos robot pay more attention to the construction of smart home interconnection. In a step-by-step development and run-in, Cobos robot has gradually integrated the complete home service robot product line including robot cleaning treasure, window cleaning robot window treasure, air purification robot QinBao and butler robot UNIBOT into the smart home ecology .

  

In the future, users can control these products through a key hub, simplifying the operation. Users can use the Cobos robot APP to manipulate the working route of each robot, working hours, see their path planning. Take a Cobos sweeping robot, once the backend platform finds that it is stuck or wrapped, the system will proactively push a message to the user's APP, to tell you how to solve, do not wait for the customer service staff to find out before the solution . App end, no matter where users are, can enjoy the beauty of smart home.

  

With frequent appearances at CES, Cobos robots are increasingly welcomed by foreign consumers. In 2016, the first year of internationalization of Cobos robots, its product performance has been rapidly growing in Europe and North America, showing the boundless potential of Kozios robots in overseas markets. This year's "Black Five" period, Cobos robot on the Amazon platform compared to last year achieved a 400% increase in performance. From this we can see that with its help of CES, an industry exhibition with the significance of global brand communication, the Cobos robot truly goes abroad and steadily moves forward in the international market.

  

Smart home eco-trend in the promotion of the industry will certainly have more long-term development. For the Cobos robot, further exploration of how to provide users with a more humane and intelligent experience so that the global family can enjoy modern smart home-based robot-driven participation is the topic of continuous research in the future.

  

    
    
    ###

(1)取得之TWEL股權，24.5%的股權價格係依交易標的106/3/31股權淨值、

5.5%的股權價格係依協議價格決定；Diamond股東會  
(2)處分TYHZ之股權，交易價格係依交易標的106/9/30股權淨值；TWEL股東會11.迄目前為止，累積持有本交易證券（含本次交易）之數量、金額、持股比例及權利受限情形（如質押情形）:  
(1)TWEL累計持股比例：100%；累積金額：台幣2,008,377仟元(106/9/30淨值)(2)TYHZ累計持股比例：75.5%；累積金額：人民幣303,478仟元

(106/9/30淨值，折合台幣1,352,338仟元)  
12.迄目前為止，依「公開發行公司取得或處分資產處理準則」第三條所列之有價證券投資（含本次交易）占公司最近期財務報表中總資產及歸屬  
於母公司業主之權益之比例暨最近期財務報表中營運資金數額（註二）:占總資產比例:8.19%  
占歸屬於母公司業主之權益比例:20.16%  
營運資金數額:新台幣2,543,763仟元  
13.經紀人及經紀費用:  
不適用  
14.取得或處分之具體目的或用途:  
集團組織調整  
15.本次交易表示異議董事之意見:  
無  
16.本次交易為關係人交易:是  
17.董事會通過日期:  
民國106 年9月13日  
18.監察人承認或審計委員會同意日期:  
不適用  
19.本次交易會計師出具非合理性意見:不適用  
20.其他敘明事項:  
(1) 係子公司Tympany Group投資架構重整，原公告時間為106/11/14；(2) 原公告Diamond(Cayman)Holding
Ltd取得TWEL 30%股權之交易總額為

106年9月30日Tymphany Worldwide Enterprise Ltd.淨值新台幣602,513,190元，

更正為TWEL—USD19,240仟元(折合台幣577,200仟元)，

交易價格的計算如上第10點說明  
(3) 原公告Tymphany Worldwide Enterprise Ltd. (以下簡稱TWEL)出售惠州超聲音響

有限公司24.5%股權之交易總額為106年3月31日惠州超聲音響有限公司淨值人民幣

31,813,104元(新台幣141,763仟元)，因誤植淨值時間，故更正為

TYHZ—RMB98,480仟元(折合台幣438,840仟元) ，交易價格的計算如上第10點說明。

Title: [即時重大訊息] 致伸<4915.TW>代Tymphany Worldwide Enterprise Ltd補充公告106/9/13股東會決議，因組織重整之股權交易

Content:
东兴证券陈凤珠：推荐三生制药及中国旺旺

三生制药（０１５３０）：三生制药为内地的生物制药企业，旗下三大核心产品特比澳、益

赛普及益比奥于内地的市场占有领导地位，特比澳及益赛普于去年上半年的市占率超过四成；而

集团的多只药物被纳入国家医保目录中，或可提升产品于医院的渗透，料未来销售或有机会增加

。另外，集团的糖尿病新药百达扬已获国家食品药品监督管理总局批准，而集团将继续研发新药

并向国家药品总局递交新药申请，预期发展潜力庞大。除此之外，三生去年公布收购加拿大生物

制药公司Ｔｈｅｒａｐｕｒｅ的ＣＤＭＯ业务，以进入北美市场，料收购将于今年完成，而集团

亦于内地展开ＣＤＭＯ业务，预期将可产生协同效应。目标价１７．８０元，买入价１６．５０

元，止蚀价１５．９０元。（建议时股价：＄１６．６２）

中国旺旺（００１５１）：内地消费品零售总额稳定增长，加上消费升级，内需股普遍受支

持，其中中国旺旺截至去年９月底的首三季纯利按年下跌１３．８％至２０．２亿元人民币，而

收入则同比下滑１．１％至１３５．９亿元人民币，惟６月至９月的收入按年上升５．１％，核

心产品于第二季及第三季持续录得正增长，预期业绩将会逐步改善。虽然成本如包装、白糖及奶

粉等价格上涨，但集团预期未来销售将可录得中至高单位数增长，且新产品及产品组合优化将可

推动销售及毛利率改善。另外，集团手持现金达１０４亿元人民币，财政稳健，同时亦进行回购

及派息，预期春节前旺旺的产品需求将会增加，料股价或会受支持。目标价７．００元，买入价

６．４０元，止蚀价６．１０元。（建议时股价：＄６．５０）《东兴证券（香港）研究部总监

陈凤珠》（作者本人并没有持有上述股票）

永隆赵卓峰：推荐比亚迪股份及枫叶教育

比亚迪股份（０１２１１）：２０１７年９月份工信部开始研究何时停止生产销售传统能源

汽车及印发《乘用车企业平均燃料消耗量与新能源汽车积分并行管理办法》，加上新能源汽车免

徵收１０％的「车辆购置税」获续期三年至２０２０年年底，这些措施将有助推动内地汽车产业

发展。据中国汽车工业协会统计资料显示，去年首１１个月，内地新能源车销量达６０．９万辆

，同比增长５１．４％，今年的销量增速可望保持４０％至５０％。在逐渐淘汰化石燃料车辆的

政策下，新能源汽车发展空间巨大，身为内地电动车市场的车企龙头，集团最能受惠。集团将于

２０１８年推出多款新型号电动车，补贴后的售价非常有竞争力。除汽车业务外，「云轨」（架

空单轨铁路）作为集团的战略性产品，在有效解决城市交通拥堵难题时，也为集团的长期成长开

辟了一项新领域。在技术走势上，股价于去年最高升至＄８３．７０，经过两个月多的调整后，

于１００天线受到支持，有望重拾升势。故建议于５０天线约＄６９买入，目标价为＄８０，止

蚀价＄６１。（本周二建议时股价：＄７０．１）

枫叶教育（０１３１７）：截至去年８月底止年度，集团营业额上升３０．５％至人民币

１０．８亿元，股东应占溢利增长３３．５％至人民币４．１亿元。主要由于学费的收益增加及

注册入学人数上升带动利润率提升所致。集团拥有逾２２年经验，通过结合中西方教育理念的精

华，致力于内地及加拿大提供学前教育至第十二级（「Ｋ－１２」）的优质双语教育服务。集团

近年不断开设及透过收购提高学校及学生数目，于上月公布以现金代价人民币８９０４．５万元

向独立第三方收购伊思顿国际教育５５％股权。后者拥有可容纳１５００名学生，并配备现代先

进设施的深圳市伊思顿龙岗书院１００％股权。于完成收购事项后，集团将承担该校的营运，将

为集团于内地一线城市及经济最发达地区之一的省份建立战略据点及打造品牌知名度，强大的学

校网络将提升集团的盈利能力，并巩固其于内地教育行业的地位。教育行业较少受经济周期影响

，故预期集团收购活动将会持续。在技术走势上，股价于近日创新高，故建议待回调至约

＄９．５买入，目标价约＄１０．５，止蚀价＄８．６。（本周二建议时股价：＄１０．３）

《永隆银行证券分析师 赵卓峰》（本人并没持有上述股份）

Title: 《胜算在握���东兴证券陈凤珠：推荐三生制药及中国旺旺

Content:
中新控股科技集團（08207）除傳統貸款及融資外，屬下各業均涉及金融科技，且其平台獲監管機構及行業協會肯定及認可。去年通過收購進一步拓寬金融科技生態系統，業務已包括傳統貸款、第三方支付、在線投資、科技驅動貸款、社交遊戲、資產管理及保險共7個板塊。

去年，中新收購越南Amigo Technologies股權51%，又認購美國Bitfury
Group股權2.18%優先股，並合作成立合營公司；4月投資於Singapore
Life股權33%；5月入股Havenport，佔19.9%；9月合作收購平安證券（00231）實佔股權23.47%。

積極併購壯大

Amigo於越南提供第三方支付服務及IT解決方案服務，將與銀行合作推出新產品，去年前三季支付服務交易量達到113萬億越南盾，增長28%；交易筆數增53%，至9641萬筆，強勁增長來自貨到付款（COD）服務的貢獻，且已展開為公共行政機構及稅務局推出收費服務，已呈現按季增長，將嘗試為越南63個省的分公司提供培訓，以提高公共機構收款服務的交易量。

Bitfury為世界領先私人比特幣區塊鏈基礎設施供應商及交易處理公司，提供硬件及軟件產品方面的全面服務，投資1000萬美元於優先股，以發行新股支付。雙方將成立合營公司投資2000萬美元，中新佔80%，業務為於中國銷售Bitfury的開採設備。

Singapore
Life股權33.8%以1.65億元認購，已獲新加坡金管局批准為獲完全許可的直接壽險公司，其亦將透過線上平台及財務顧問向客戶提供壽險解決方案，將發行萬用壽險產品以及混合保險；中新由此走出國門實現國際化策略，並拓展至保險及財富管理行業。

Singapore
Life最新已協議收購蘇黎世人壽保險新加坡的業務，包括該公司所有保單，包括壽險、危廢險及殘障險，總值60億新加坡元，約為330億港元，包括逾5000名客戶，轉讓程序將於上半年完成。

Havenport為新加坡資產管理公司，持有基金管理、買賣及信託的資本市場服務牌照，成立於2010年，現時在市場提供14間亞洲及全球公司超過1000隻基金，並服務於10間新加坡領先的財務諮詢公司，與中新的全天候網上金融服務配合，此項投資3662萬元，日後雙方可能有若干合作或增購股權。

中新的主要收入，為在線投資及科技驅動貸款服務收入，包括網上物業貸款平台第一房貸、網貸平台金融工場及在線消費貸款平台掌眾金服等，2017年首三季收入28.85億元人民幣，按年增長14.5倍，佔總收入78.6%，增長之強由掌眾金服所推動，並提供分類業績12.81億元人民幣。

申轉主板候批

相信與政策有關，中新的若干業務根據「架構合約」進行，業務包括典當、信用管理、社交遊戲，以及第三方支付服務（提供網上第三方支付服務與預付卡發行業務），第三方支付服務的業績貢獻位居第二，約1.6億元人民幣，但總交易量則非常龐大。先鋒支付為行業領先者，已形成聚合支付跨境支付、直銷銀行、銀行資金存管解決方案、網貸雲平台、產業鏈金融及雲線包等解決方案。去年前三季總交易量4285億元人民幣，增長238%，其中9月份超過700億元人民幣。上海即富（佔權益35%）三季的總交易量11909億元，增長162%，期內重點推廣點刷/MPOS及點POS業務，市場反應熱烈，9月底註冊用戶1376萬，較2016年底增623萬，累計活躍用戶581萬，2016年底則為257萬。

至於購入平安證券股權，於香港市場的金融科技業務可以產生協同效益，提升知名度。事實上，中新現有的各項業務相互間可以產生強大的協同效應，有助於完善整個金融生態圈。

去年首三季應佔盈利7.81億元人民幣，按年增長259%；每股盈利3.57分，增長231%。市場注意的是，中新已於去年9月申請由創業板轉主板上市，屆時可加強交易流通性，提高知名度，更利於未來發展。另外，恒生指數公司將於2月中檢討季度綜合指數，大行估計或有利於中新，值得留意發展。

  

Copyright (c) 2018 Hong Kong Economic Journal Co., Ltd.
Content_EN:
Tianjin Zhongxin Pharmaceutical Group Corporation Limited (08207) In addition to the traditional loans and financing, all of the businesses involved in the field of finance and technology, and its platform by the regulatory agencies and industry associations affirmed and recognized. Last year, the financial science and technology ecosystem was further expanded through acquisitions. The business has covered seven sectors: traditional loans, third-party payments, online investments, technology-driven loans, social games, asset management and insurance.

Last year, Tianjin Zhongxin Pharmaceutical Group Corporation acquired 51% stake in Amigo Technologies in Vietnam and subscribed to Bitfury
Group 2.18% stake in preferred shares and co-operation to set up joint ventures; April investment in Singapore
Life shares 33%; May Havenport shares, accounting for 19.9%; September acquisition of Ping An Securities (00231) actually accounted for 23.47% stake.

Positive mergers and acquisitions

Amigo, which provides third-party payment services and IT LIMITED solution services in Vietnam, will jointly launch a new product with banks. In the first three quarters of last year, Amigo paid VND 113 trillion for service transactions, an increase of 28%; transactions increased by 53% to 9641 The strong growth comes from the contribution of COD service and has launched a fee-charging service for public administration agencies and the Inland Revenue Department which has been on a quarterly basis. It will try to provide training to branch offices in 63 provinces of Vietnam to Increase the volume of public service receivables.

Bitfury, a leading private Bitcoin blockchain infrastructure provider and transaction processor company in the world, provides comprehensive services in hardware and software products with an investment of $ 10 million in preferred shares for the issuance of new shares. The two parties will set up a joint venture to invest 20 million U.S. dollars, accounting for 80% of Tianjin Zhongxin Pharmaceutical Group Corporation Limited, whose business is to sell Bitfury's mining equipment in the PRC.

Singapore
Life 33.8% of the shares were subscribed for $ 165 million and have been approved by the MAS to be fully licensed direct life insurers. It will also provide life insurance solutions to customers through an online platform and financial advisor, and will issue life-long products and Mixed insurance; Tianjin Zhongxin Pharmaceutical Group Corporation Limited thus go abroad to achieve international strategy, and extended to the insurance and wealth management industries.

Singapore
Life has recently agreed to acquire Zurich Life Insurance Singapore, which includes all of the company's policies, including life insurance, endangerment and disability insurance, totaling S $ 6.0 billion at approximately HK $ 33 billion, including more than 5,000 customers, Completed in the first half.

Havenport, an asset management company in Singapore, holds a capital markets services license for fund management, trading and trust. Founded in 2010, Havenport currently offers over 1,000 funds in 14 Asian and global companies and serves on 10 of Singapore's leading financial Consultation firm cooperated with 24/7 online financial service of Tianjin Zhongxin Pharmaceutical Group Corporation Limited, with an investment of 36.62 million yuan. In the future, both parties may have some cooperation or purchase of additional shares.

 The revenue of Tianjin Zhongxin Pharmaceutical Group Corporation Limited, which is driven by online investment and technology-driven loan services, includes the first home loan of online property loan platform, the online loan platform financial workshop and the online consumer loan platform, etc. The revenue for the first three quarters of 2017 2.855 billion yuan, an increase of 14.5 times over the previous year, accounting for 78.6% of the total revenue. The growth was strongly driven by the Handan Gold Service and provided a segment result of 1.281 billion yuan.

Shen transfer board waiting for approval

Believed to be in compliance with the policy, certain businesses of Tianjin Zhongxin Pharmaceutical Group Corporation Limited are conducted under the "Structured Contracts", including pawn, credit management, social games and third party payment services (providing online third party payment services and prepaid card issuance business) Third-party payment services contributed the second-largest contribution of about 160 million yuan, but the total transaction volume was very large. Pioneer payment is the leader in the industry and has formed solutions such as cross-border payment of aggregated payment, direct-selling banks, bank funds depository and management solutions, net loan cloud platform, industrial chain finance and cloud-line package. In the first three quarters of last year, the total trading volume was 428.5 billion yuan, an increase of 238%, of which over 700 billion yuan in September. Shanghai Rich (35% of equity) recorded a total volume of 1.19909 trillion yuan, an increase of 162%. During the period, it focused on the promotion of dot-brush / MPOS and point-of-sale business with strong market response. Registered users reached 13.76 million by the end of September, 623 million, a total of 5.81 million active users, compared with 2.57 million by the end of 2016.

With respect to the acquisition of equity interests in Ping An Securities, the financial technology business in the Hong Kong market can generate synergy and enhance visibility. In fact, the existing businesses of Tianjin Zhongxin Pharmaceutical Group Corporation Limited can have strong synergies with each other and help to perfect the entire financial ecosystem.

The first three quarters of last year accounted for 781 million yuan of profit, an increase of 259%; earnings per share 3.57 points, an increase of 231%. It is noted in the market that Tianjin Zhongxin Pharmaceutical Group Corporation Limited, which applied for listing from the GEM on the Main Board in September last year, will enhance trade liquidity, enhance visibility and be more conducive to future development. In addition, the Hang Seng Index Company will review its quarterly composite index in mid-February, which is expected to benefit the Tianjin Zhongxin Pharmaceutical Group Corporation Limited.

below:http://pdf.reuters.com/htmlnews/htmlnews.asp...

  

久邦GOMO三个转型背后的中国移动互联网发展史  
PR Newswire

  

广州, 2018年1月15日电

  

广州2018年1月15日电 /美通社/ --  
2017年，手机终端的数量在全球范围内已经超过了电脑终端。移动互联网也基于手机终端的普及和通信技术的迭代蓬勃发展起来。在中国移动互联网发展的历史中，久邦GOMO是一家绕不开的企业。2003年久邦GOMO成立于广州，3G门户、GO桌面、出海这几个关键词分别对应着久邦GOMO的三次转型：模式转型、平台转型、战场转型。从收费到免费、从塞班到安卓、从国内到国外的战略转型，在一次次成就久邦GOMO的同时，也引领着中国移动互联网的发展。2003年久邦GOMO成立于广州，3G门户、GO桌面、出海这几个关键词分别对应着久邦GOMO的三次转型：模式转型、平台转型、战场转型。模式转型：从收费到免费

  

在2004年3G门户出现之前，中国手机上网主要通过通信运营商，这会产生一定的费用。移动端便于携带，可以随时随地获取信息，但人们希望通过手机获取信息的需求和昂贵的上网门槛产生了冲突。

  

当时，久邦GOMO的创始人邓裕强嗅到了移动互联网中免费的先机，率先开创了国内首个免费的WAP网站

    
    
    --3G门户，从此引领移动互联网走上免费模式的道路。从收费到免费，意味着移动互联网更加贴合自身的属性，意味着手机用户在随时随地获取免费的信息的同时，商业模式也随之改变。

  

免费的信息获取并不代表信息本身不具备价值，而是信息通过更广泛的传播获取收益。当在手机上获取信息越来越便捷的时候，用户数和使用粘性会不断提高，流量越多的地方，广告价值越高，成为连接买方与卖方的新桥梁。

  

3G门户运用其大量用户来进行移动互联网商业模式的探索，率先在移动互联网广告中获取收益。从收费到免费的模式转变，成就了早期的久邦GOMO。

  

平台转型：从塞班到安卓

  

在3G门户作为移动互联网入口之一取得巨大成功之时，久邦GOMO已经开始研发另外的手机流量入口

    
    
    --基于塞班平台的“手机心脏”。2008年，久邦GOMO的领导人邓裕强带领团队研发“手机心脏”已经有一年多，“手机心脏”是一款集桌面美化、天气预报、智能IP拨号和网络浏览器于一集的多功能软件。

  

当项目已经初步成型的时候，安卓来了。谷歌2008年10月发布了第一款安卓手机。安卓系统自身所具备的开放性能够兼���各式各样的移动硬件，在安卓平台上软件开发的方便自由，让久邦GOMO意识到，这将是移动互联网的未来。于是高层立即做出决策，放弃塞班，转向安卓。但这也意味着，团队一百多人努力了一年多的结果喊停。据久邦GOMO总裁朱志描述：“
当时很多人哭了。但裕强对趋势的判断非常准确，面对大家的压力，裕强很坚定。”

  

几个月后，久邦GOMO研发的GO桌面、GO输入法、GO短信等一系列GO产品发布，席卷全球总榜。伴随着手机终端的不断普及和通信技术的不断迭代，安卓在全球的市场份额逐渐取代了塞班。

  

放弃塞班，转向安卓，这个基于移动互联网趋势精准判断下的取舍，再次成就了久邦GOMO。

  

战场转型：从国内到国外

  

平台转型之后，久邦GOMO逐渐从门户业务转向移动互联网的APP业务。

  

移动互联网迅猛发展，使得百度、阿里、腾讯这三大互联网公司也逐渐进入到移动互联网领域，三足鼎立的局面逐渐形成。随着时间的推移，中国的移动互联网人口红利减弱，市场也逐渐稳定饱和。但是，国外的移动互联网仍是一片蓝海。相对国内用户而言，海外用户有着比较良好的软件使用付费习惯，对于在免费的应用中植入广告的形式接受程度也较高。

  

移动工具类产品成为第一个攻占点。久邦GOMO以其工具产品中个性化的主题、皮肤，轻便快速启动的桌面、相机等应用迅速抢占了海外手机工具应用市场。

  

久邦GOMO目前拥有超过三十款的APP在海外安卓平台发布，旗下应用中的主题、皮肤出售，以及在流量大的基础上进行的广告发行，第三次成就了久邦GOMO，也奠定其移动互联网出海领导者的地位，制造了一定的移动互联网出海壁垒。久邦GOMO是最早进行移动互联网出海的企业，也是第一个在纳斯达克上市的中国移动互联网企业。

  

如今，越来越多的中国移动互联网企把目光转向海外，工具类产品的竞争也日趋激烈。2017年，久邦GOMO在海外工具市场成熟的情况下，战略布局了游戏、以及内容（直播GOLive、短视频Viedo  
Me、新闻资讯BuzzHunt等）业务，将再次寻求移动互联网的转型。

  

久邦GOMO官方网址：www.gomo.com

  

    
    
    ###

below: http: //pdf.reuters.com/htmlnews/htmlnews.asp ...

  

The long history of GOMO behind the three transformations of China Mobile Limited Internet history
PR Newswire

  

Guangzhou, January 15, 2018

  

Guangzhou, January 15, 2018 / PRNewswire / -
In 2017, the number of mobile terminals in the world has exceeded the computer terminal. Mobile Internet is also booming based on the popularity of mobile terminals and the iteration of communication technologies. In the history of the Internet development of China Mobile Limited, the long-awaited GOMO is a company that can not be turned around. 2003 Gubon GOMO was founded in Guangzhou, 3G portal, GO desktop, sea, these three keywords correspond to the three transitions of long state GOMO: model transformation, platform transformation, battlefield transformation. From charging to freeing, the strategic transformation from Saipan to Android and from home to foreign countries led the development of the China Mobile Limited Internet while implementing the GOMO for a long time. 2003 Gubon GOMO was founded in Guangzhou, 3G portal, GO desktop, sea, these three keywords correspond to the three transitions of long state GOMO: model transformation, platform transformation, battlefield transformation. Model transformation: from free to free

  

Prior to the emergence of the 3G portal in 2004, China's mobile Internet access was mainly through the telecommunications carriers, which incurred a certain fee. The mobile is easy to carry and has access to information anytime, anywhere, but people want the conflict between the need to access information via their mobile phones and the expensive Internet access threshold.

  

At that time, the founder of long-state GOMO Deng Yuqiang smelled free mobile Internet initiative, pioneered the first free WAP site in China

    
    
    - 3G portal, from leading the mobile Internet on the road to free mode. From charging to free means that the mobile Internet is more fitting with its own attributes, which means that while mobile users get free information anytime, anywhere, the business model also changes.

  

Free access to information does not mean that the information itself does not have the value, but rather through a wider dissemination of information for revenue. When getting information on mobile phones more and more convenient, the number of users and the use of viscosity will continue to increase, the more traffic, the higher the value of advertising, as buyers and sellers to connect the new bridge.

  

3G portal to use its large number of users to explore the business model of mobile Internet, the first mobile Internet advertising for income. From charges to free mode change, the achievements of the early long Bang GOMO.

  

Platform Transformation: From Symbian to Android

  

When the 3G portal was a huge success as one of the mobile Internet portals, the long-awaited GOMO has started to develop additional handset traffic entrances

    
    
    - "Cell Phone Heart" based on Symbian platform. In 2008, a long time ago, the leader of the GOMO leader Deng Yuqiang led the team to develop the "mobile phone heart" which is a multi-functional software that integrates desktop beautification, weather forecasting, intelligent IP dialing and web browser .

  

When the project has been initially formed, Andrews came. Google released the first Android phone in October 2008. Android system itself has the openness of both a wide range of mobile hardware and Android software development on the free and easy, so that long-Bang GOMO realized that this will be the future of the mobile Internet. So senior immediate decision-making, to give up Saipan, turned to Andrews. But that also means that more than a hundred people in the team worked hard for more than a year to halt their results. According to Zhu Zhi, president of GOMO for a long time, "
Many people were crying at that time. However, Yu Qiang's judgment on the trend is very accurate. In the face of everyone's pressure, Yu Qiang is very firm. "

  

A few months later, GOBO Bang GOMO developed GO desktop, GO input method, GO SMS and a series of GO products released, sweeping the world total list. With the continuous popularization of mobile terminals and the continuous iteration of communication technologies, Android gradually replaced Saipan in the global market share.

  

Abandoned Saipan, turned to Andrews, this based on the precise judgments of the trend of mobile Internet trade-offs, once again achieved the long-Bang GOMO.

  

Battlefield transition: from home to abroad

  

After the platform transformation, the long-Bang GOMO gradually shifted from the portal business to the mobile Internet APP business.

  

Rapid development of mobile Internet, making Baidu, Ali, Tencent Holdings Limited these three Internet companies have gradually entered the field of mobile Internet, the three pillars of the gradual formation of the situation. With the passage of time, China's mobile Internet demographic dividend weakened, and the market also gradually stabilized and saturated. However, the overseas mobile Internet is still a blue ocean. Compared with domestic users, overseas users have relatively good paying habits of software usage, and are also more accepting of the form of advertisement embedded in free applications.

  

Mobile tools products become the first capture point. Jubang GOMO quickly seized the market for mobile handset applications overseas with its personalized themes in its tool products, skins, lightweight quick-start desktops and cameras.

  

Jubang GOMO currently has more than thirty models of APP released in the overseas Android platform, its application theme, the sale of the skin, as well as the flow of large-scale advertising, the third achievement of the long state GOMO, also laid Mobile Internet leader in the sea to the status of mobile Internet to create a certain barrier to the sea. The long-established GOMO is the earliest mobile internet company and the first China Mobile Limited internet company listed on NASDAQ.

  

Nowadays, more and more China Mobile Limited Internet companies turn their attention overseas, and the competition for tool products is getting fiercer. In 2017, Jubang GOMO strategic layout of the game in the overseas tool market, as well as the content (live GOLive, short video Viedo
Me, BuzzHunt, etc.) business, will once again seek the transformation of the mobile Internet.

  

Goodbang GOMO official website: www.gomo.com

  

    
    
    ###

EQS 新闻 / 2018-01-11 / 14:09 UTC+8

[请实时发布] 2018年1月11日

（股份代号：6183）

中国绿宝与国企漳投集团携手成立健康产业基金

全面布局漳州大健康产业

[2018年1月11日 - 香港] 中国领先的食用菌行业综合服务商 - 中国绿宝集团有限公

司（「中国绿宝」或「本集团」，股份代号：6183）于2018年1月9日，与国有企业漳

州投资集团有限公司(「漳投集团」)共同出资成立健康产业基金－龙海绿鑫健康投资

合伙企业（有限合伙）。该健康产业基金的成立，标志着中国绿宝集团与漳投集团的

强强联合，借力漳投集团的国企雄厚资源及人脉优势，同时结合中国绿宝在大健康及

食品领域的强大技术和人才队伍，从技术升级、产品研发、生产规模等方面进行全面

升级，推进本集团的大健康产品产业化，以至漳州市大健康产业的资源整合及蓬勃发

展。

漳投集团是福建漳州市市属十大重点国有企业之一，广泛参与投资基金及股权投资等

业务，目标以市级重点国有金融投融资运营平台，协助促进产融协同发展、服务地方

经济。

中国绿宝董事会主席郑松辉表示：「中国绿宝一直致力发展食用菌全产业链，并成功

研发及在日本及新加坡市场推出高质量的大健康保健品，口碑载道。是次与国企漳投

集团共同成立健康产业基金，投入更多资源发展大健康及食品产业，不但彰显其对集

团大健康业务方向的信心及认同，更打开了集团2018年全面布局漳州大健康产业的序

幕，借力漳投集团强大的资本后盾，加快优质大健康产品的研发及技术创新，拓阔产

品种类，并积极开拓有潜质的项目。我们有信心藉着健康产业基金的成立，将有效促

进漳州市的大健康产业蓬勃发展，并巩固集团作为领先食用菌大健康品牌的市场地位

。」

  * 完 -

关于中国绿宝集团有限公司

中国绿宝集团是中国一家领先的食用菌行业综合服务商。根据Euromonitor

International Limited 的资料，就产量而言，本公司于2013 年为中国杏鲍菇的第

一大供货商及蘑菇的第七大生产商。本公司的食用菌业务经营呈垂直一体化，覆盖种

植及销售新鲜食用菌产品，以及生产及销售多种加工食用菌产品。一体化的业务模式

令本公司从中国其他新鲜及加工食用菌供货商中脱颖而出。

本集团的产品主要以品牌「绿鲜」及「绿源宝菌」为核心进行销售，分为两种主要系

列，即(I) 新鲜食用菌产品，包括杏鲍菇、蘑菇及草菇；及(II) 加工食品，包括罐

头食品，例如食用菌罐头、蔬菜罐头、水果罐头等，以及其他加工食品，例如盐水菇

、酱腌菜及干菇等，而罐头食品主要以代加工产品为主。本集团于2016年3月获得由

中国易菇网主办的「2016 年最具投资价值食用菌企业TOP10」评选活动第一名。

中国绿宝集团有限公司于2015年6月18日在香港联合交易所主板上市，股份代号

：6183。

此新闻稿由金通策略有限公司代中国绿宝集团有限公司发布。

如有查询，请联络：

DLK Advisory 金通策略

传真：+852 2857 7103

EQS News / 2018-01-11 / 14:09 UTC +8

[Please publish in real time] January 11, 2018

(Stock code: 6183)

 CHINA GREENFRESH GROUP CO.,LTD. Join Hands with State-owned Zhangtou Group to Establish Health Industry Fund

Overall layout of Zhangzhou large health industry

[January 11, 2018 - Hong Kong] CHINA GREENFRESH GROUP CO.,LTD.,A leading integrated edible mushroom industry service provider in China

("CHINA GREENFRESH GROUP CO.,LTD." Or the "Group", stock code: 6183) on January 9, 2018, entered into an agreement with the state-owned Zhang

State Investment Group Co.,Ltd. ("Zhang Tire Group") co-financed the establishment of Health Industry Fund - Longhai Green Xin Health Investment

Partnership (limited partnership). The establishment of the health industry fund, marking the GREENFRESH GROUP CO.,LTD. Group and Zhang Investment Group's

Strong alliances, leveraging Zhang Group's state-owned enterprises abundant resources and network advantages, combined with CHINA GREENFRESH GROUP CO.,LTD. In the large health and

The field of food technology and a strong contingent of personnel, from technology upgrades, product development, production scale and so on a comprehensive

Upgrade, promote the Group's industrialization of large health products, as well as Zhangzhou City, the health industry resources integration and flourish

exhibition.

Zhang Investment Group is one of the ten key state-owned enterprises under the jurisdiction of Zhangzhou City, Fujian Province. It has extensive participation in investment funds and equity investments

Business, the goal of the municipal key state-owned financial investment and financing platform to help promote the synergy of industry and finance development, service areas

economic.

 CHINA GREENFRESH GROUP CO.,LTD. Chairman Zheng Songhui said: "CHINA GREENFRESH GROUP CO.,LTD. Has been committed to developing the whole edible fungus industry chain and succeeded

Research and development and in Japan and Singapore market launch of high-quality health care products, word of mouth. This time with the state-owned Zhang vote

The group jointly set up a health industry fund, devote more resources to the development of large health and food industries, not only demonstrate their right sets

The confidence and recognition of the group's health business direction, but also opened the group in 2018 layout of Zhangzhou large health industry

Curtain, leveraging Zhang Tung Investment Group a strong backing for the capital to speed up the development of quality and health products and technological innovation, broaden production

Varieties, and actively explore potential projects. We are confident that with the establishment of the Health Industry Fund, it will be effective

Zhangzhou City, the health industry into the vigorous development, and consolidate the group as a leading edible fungus big health brand's market position

. "

  * Finish -

About CHINA GREENFRESH GROUP CO.,LTD

 CHINA GREENFRESH GROUP CO.,LTD. The Group is a leading integrated edible mushroom industry service provider in China. According to Euromonitor

International Limited, in terms of production volume, the Company was the No. 1 supplier of Pleurotus eryngii in 2013 in the PRC

A major supplier of mushrooms and the seventh largest producer. The Company's edible fungi business is vertically integrated and covered

Plant and market fresh edible mushroom products, as well as the production and sale of a wide range of processed edible mushroom products. Integrated business model

Our company will stand out from other fresh and processed mushroom suppliers in China.

The Group's products are mainly marketed under the brand "Green Fresh" and "Luyuanbao" and divided into two main types

Columns, namely (I) Fresh edible mushroom products, including Pleurotus eryngii, mushrooms and mushrooms; and (II) Processed foods, including cans

Head foods such as canned edible mushrooms, canned vegetables, canned fruits and the like, as well as other processed foods such as salt mushrooms

, Pickles and dried mushrooms, etc.,while the main canned food processing products based. The Group was acquired in March 2016

China Mushroom Network hosted the "2016 most valuable investment in mushroom companies TOP10" first place.

 CHINA GREENFRESH GROUP CO.,LTD.,A company listed on the Main Board of the Hong Kong Stock Exchange on June 18, 2015, under the stock code

: 6183.

This press release was released by Golden Resources Strategy Ltd. on behalf of CHINA GREENFRESH GROUP CO.,LTD.

For inquiries, please contact:

DLK Advisory Golden Pass Strategy

Tel: +852 2857 7101

Fax: +852 2857 7103

Title: [6183.HK 中国绿宝] 中国绿宝与国企漳投集团携手成立健康产业基金 全面布局漳州大健康产业
